name: Tony
line: I feel like you're driving me to a court-martial. This is crazy. What did I do? I feel like you're going to pull over and snuff me. What, you're not allowed to talk? Hey, Forrest!

name: Soldier
line: We can talk, sir.

name: Tony
line: Oh, I see. So it's personal?

name: Tony
line: Good God, you're a woman. I honestly... I couldn't have called that. I mean, I'd apologize, but isn't that what we're going for here? I thought of you as a soldier first.

name: Tony
line: Well you have, actually, excellent bone structure, there. I'm kind of having a hard time not looking at you now. Is that weird? [The Soldiers in the vehicle laugh and chuckle.] Come on, it's okay, laugh.

name: Soldier
line: Sir, I have a question to ask.

name: Tony
line: Yes, please.

name: Soldier
line: Is it true you went 12 for 12 with last year's Maxim cover models?

name: Tony
line: That is an excellent question. Yes and no. March and I had a scheduling conflict, but fortunately, the Christmas cover was twins. Anything else? [The Soldier next to him, Jimmy, raises his hand.] You're kidding me with the hand up, right?

name: Tony
line: Yes. It's very cool. [The soldier next to him pulls his camera out and hands it to the soldier in the front seat.] I don't want to see this on your MySpace page. [The Soldier puts up a peace sign for the photo.] Please, no gang signs. No, throw it up. I'm kidding. Yeah, peace. I love peace. I'd be out of a job with peace.

name: Tony
line: What's going on?

name: Tony
line: What have we got?

name: Soldier
line: Jimmy, stay with Stark!

name: Tony
line: Yeah.

name: Tony
line: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait! Give me a gun!

name: He looked over to see it say
line: Stark Industries. He tried to get up and get away, but didn't in time. The bomb exploded and made him fly through the air a bit.]

name: Tony
line: Whoa!

name: Voice over
line: Tony. Visionary. Genius. American patriot. Even from an early age, the son of legendary weapons developer Howard Stark quickly stole the spotlight with his brilliant and unique mind. At age four, he built his first circuit board. At age six, his first engine. And at 17, he graduated summa cum laude from MIT. Then, the passing of a titan. Howard Stark's lifelong friend and ally, Obadiah Stane, steps in to help fill the gap left by the legendary founder, until, at age 21, the prodigal son returns and is anointed the new CEO of Stark Industries. With the keys to the kingdom, Tony ushers in a new era for his father's legacy, creating smarter weapons, advanced robotics, satellite targeting. Today, Tony has changed the face of the weapons industry by ensuring freedom and protecting America and her interests around the globe.

name: James Rhodes
line: As liaison to Stark Industries, I've had the unique privilege of serving with a real patriot. He is my friend and he is my great mentor. Ladies and gentlemen, it is my honor to present this year's Apogee Award to Mr. Tony. Tony?

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Thank you, Colonel.

name: James Rhodes
line: Thanks for the save.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: This is beautiful. Thank you. Thank you all very much. This is wonderful. Well, I'm not Tony. But if I were Tony, I would tell you how honored I feel and what a joy it is to receive this very prestigious award. Tony, you know...The best thing about Tony is also the worst thing. He's always working.

name: Tony
line: Work it! Come on! We should just stay till the morning.

name: James Rhodes
line: You are unbelievable.

name: Tony
line: Oh, no! Did they rope you into this?

name: James Rhodes
line: Nobody roped me into anything!

name: Tony
line: I'm so sorry.

name: James Rhodes
line: But they told me that if I presented you with an award, you'd be deeply honored.

name: Tony
line: Of course I'd be deeply honored. And it's you, that's great. So, when do we do it?

name: James Rhodes
line: It's right here. Here you go.

name: Tony
line: There it is. That was easy. I'm so sorry.

name: James Rhodes
line: Yeah, it's okay.

name: Tony
line: Wow! Would you look at that? That's something else. I don't have any of those floating around. Uh, we're gonna let it ride! Give me a hand, will you? Give me a little something-something. [hot girl blows on dice] Okay, you, too. [Tony holds the dice out to Rhodes.]

name: James Rhodes
line: I don't blow on a man's dice.

name: Tony
line: Come on, honey bear.

name: James Rhodes
line: I don't blow on a man's dice. [Rhodes knocks Tony's hand away causing the dice to roll]

name: Tony
line: There it is. Lieutenant Colonel Rhodes rolls! And...

name: Dealer
line: Two craps. Line away.

name: James Rhodes
line: That's what happens.

name: Tony
line: Worse things have happened. I think we're gonna be fine. Color me up, will ya?

name: James Rhodes
line: This is where I exit.

name: Tony
line: All right.

name: James Rhodes
line: Tomorrow, don't be late.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, you can count on it.

name: James Rhodes
line: I'm serious!

name: Tony
line: I know, I know. [Handing over his award to Caesar.] Render unto Caesar, that which is Caesar's. There you go.

name: Christine Everhart
line: Mr. Stark! Excuse me, Mr. Stark! Christine Everhart, Vanity Fair magazine. Can I ask you a couple of questions?

name: Happy Hogan
line: [whispering to Tony] She's cute.

name: Tony
line: She's all right? [Turns to face Christine.] Hi.

name: Christine Everhart
line: Hi.

name: Tony
line: Yeah. Okay--

name: Christine Everhart
line: It's okay?

name: Tony
line: Go.

name: Christine Everhart
line: You've been called the da Vinci of our time. What do you say to that?

name: Tony
line: Absolutely ridiculous. I don't paint.

name: Christine Everhart
line: And what do you say to your other nickname? "The Merchant of Death"?

name: Tony
line: That's not bad. Let me guess. Berkeley?

name: Christine Everhart
line: Brown, actually.

name: Tony
line: Well, Ms. Brown. It's an imperfect world, but it's the only one we've got. I guarantee you, the day weapons are no longer needed to keep the peace, I'll start making bricks and beams for baby hospitals.

name: Christine Everhart
line: You rehearse that much?

name: Tony
line: Every night in front of the mirror before bedtime.

name: Christine Everhart
line: I can see that.

name: Tony
line: I'd like to show you first-hand.

name: Christine Everhart
line: All I want is a serious answer.

name: Tony
line: Okay, here's serious. My old man had a philosophy, "Peace means having a bigger stick than the other guy."

name: Christine Everhart
line: That's a great line coming from the guy selling the sticks.

name: Tony
line: My father helped defeat the Nazis. He worked on the Manhattan Project. A lot of people, including your professors at Brown, would call that being a hero.

name: Christine Everhart
line: And a lot of people would also call that war profiteering.

name: Tony
line: Tell me, do you plan to report on the millions we've saved by advancing medical technology or kept from starvation with our intelli-crops? All those breakthroughs, military funding, honey.

name: Christine Everhart
line: You ever lose an hour of sleep your whole life?

name: Tony
line: I'd be prepared to lose a few with you.

name: JARVIS
line: Good morning. It's 7:00 a.m. The weather in Malibu is 72 degrees with scattered clouds. The surf conditions are fair with waist-to-shoulder high lines. High tide will be at 10:52 a.m.

name: Christine Everhart
line: [Walking around Tony's mansion.] Tony? Hey, Tony? [Tries to play with the controls on the wall. It beeps at her.]

name: JARVIS
line: You are not authorized to access this area.

name: Christine Everhart
line: Jesus.

name: Pepper Potts
line: That's JARVIS. He runs the house. I've got your clothes here. They've been dry-cleaned and pressed, and there's a car waiting for you outside that will take you anywhere you'd like to go.

name: Christine Everhart
line: You must be the famous Pepper Potts.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Indeed I am.

name: Christine Everhart
line: After all these years, Tony still has you picking up the dry-cleaning.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I do anything and everything that Mr. Stark requires, including, occasionally, taking out the trash. Will that be all?

name: Tony
line: Give me an exploded view.

name: JARVIS
line: The compression in cylinder three appears to be low.

name: Tony
line: Log that.

name: Pepper Potts
line: [Coming in on her phone.] I'm gonna try again, right now.

name: Tony
line: Please don't turn down my music.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'll keep you posted. [Getting off the phone.] You are supposed to be halfway around the world right now.

name: Tony
line: How'd she take it?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Like a champ.

name: Tony
line: Why are you trying to hustle me out of here?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Your flight was scheduled to leave an hour and a half ago.

name: Tony
line: That's funny, I thought with it being my plane and all, that it would just wait for me to get there.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony, I need to speak to you about a couple things before I get you out of the door.

name: Tony
line: I mean, doesn't it kind of defeat the whole purpose of having your own plane if it departs before you arrive?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Larry called. He's got another buyer for the Jackson Pollock in the wings. Do you want it? Yes or no.

name: Tony
line: Is it a good representation of his spring period?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Um, no. The Springs was actually the neighborhood in East Hampton where he lived and worked--

name: Tony
line: So?

name: Pepper Potts
line: --not "spring" like the season. I think it's a fair example. Um.. I think it's incredibly overpriced.

name: Tony
line: I need it. Buy it. Store it.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Okay. The MIT commencement speech...

name: Tony
line: Is in June. Please, don't harangue me about stuff that's way, way, down...

name: Pepper Potts
line: Well, they're haranguing me, so I'm gonna say yes.

name: Tony
line: Deflect it and absorb it. Don't transmit it back to me.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I need you to sign this before you get on the plane.

name: Tony
line: What are you trying to get rid of me for? What, you got plans?

name: Pepper Potts
line: As a matter of fact, I do.

name: Tony
line: I don't like it when you have plans.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'm allowed to have plans on my birthday.

name: Tony
line: It's your birthday?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yes.

name: Tony
line: I knew that. Already?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yeah. Isn't that strange? It's the same day as last year.

name: Tony
line: Well, get yourself something nice from me.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I already did.

name: Tony
line: And?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Oh, it was very nice.

name: Tony
line: Yeah.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Very tasteful. Thank you, Mr. Stark.

name: Tony
line: You're welcome, Miss Potts... Okay.

name: Tony
line: You're good. I thought I lost you back there.

name: Happy
line: You did, sir. [Grabbing Tony's things from the trunk.] I had to cut across Mulholland.

name: Tony
line: I got you. I got you.

name: James Rhodes
line: What's wrong with you? [Standing at the jet doorway.]

name: Tony
line: What?

name: James Rhodes
line: Three hours.

name: Tony
line: I got caught doing a piece for Vanity Fair.

name: James Rhodes
line: For three hours. For three hours you got me standing here.

name: Tony
line: Waiting on you now. Let's go. Come on. Wheels up! Rock and roll!

name: Tony
line: What you reading, platypus?

name: James Rhodes
line: Nothing.

name: Tony
line: Come on, sour patch.

name: James Rhodes
line: I'm not sour.

name: Tony
line: Don't be mad.

name: James Rhodes
line: I told you, I'm not mad. I'm indifferent, okay?

name: Tony
line: I said I was sorry.

name: James Rhodes
line: You don't need to apologize to me.

name: Tony
line: I told you I was sorry.

name: James Rhodes
line: I'm your man.

name: Tony
line: Hi. I told him I was sorry, but he...

name: James Rhodes
line: I'm just indifferent right now.

name: James Rhodes
line: You don't respect yourself, so I know you don't respect me.

name: Tony
line: I respect you.

name: James Rhodes
line: I'm just your babysitter. So, when you need your diaper changed... [grabs a hot towel] Thank you. Let me know and I'll get you a bottle, okay?

name: Tony
line: Hey! Heat up the sake, will you? Thanks for reminding me.

name: James Rhodes
line: No, I'm not talking... We're not drinking. We're working right now.

name: Tony
line: You can't have sashimi without sake.

name: James Rhodes
line: You are constitutionally incapable of being responsible.

name: Tony
line: It would be irresponsible not to drink. I'm just talking about a nightcap.

name: Tony
line: Yes, two, please.

name: James Rhodes
line: No. Just-- I'm not drinking. I don't want any.

name: James Rhodes
line: That's what I'm talking about. When I get up in the morning and I'm putting on my uniform, you know what I recognize? I see in that mirror that every person that's got this uniform on got my back!

name: Tony
line: Hey, you know what? I'm not like you. I'm not cut out...

name: James Rhodes
line: No, no. You don't have to be like me! But you're more than what you are.

name: Tony
line: Can you excuse me if I'm a bit distracted here?

name: James Rhodes
line: No! You can't be distracted right now! Listen to me!

name: Tony
line: General.

name: General
line: Welcome, Mr. Stark. We look forward to your weapons presentation.

name: Tony
line: Thanks.

name: Tony
line: Is it better to be feared or respected? I say, is it too much to ask for both? With that in mind, I humbly present the crown jewel of Stark Industries' Freedom Line. It's the first missile system to incorporate our proprietary repulsor technology. They say the best weapon is one you never have to fire. I respectfully disagree. I prefer the weapon you only have to fire once. That's how Dad did it. That's how America does it. And it's worked out pretty well so far. Find an excuse to let one of these off the chain, and I personally guarantee you the bad guys won't even want to come out of their caves. [The missiles get launched.] For your consideration, the Jericho. [The missiles explode]

name: Tony
line: [Opening a cooler full of alcohol]I'll be throwing one of these in with every purchase of 500 million or more. To peace! [Tony's phone begins ringing.]

name: Obadiah Stane
line: [through the video chat] Tony.

name: Tony
line: Obie, what are you doing up?

name: Obadiah Stane
line: I couldn't sleep till I found out how it went. How'd it go?

name: Tony
line: It went great. Looks like it's gonna be an early Christmas.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Hey! Way to go, my boy! I'll see you tomorrow, yeah?

name: Tony
line: Why aren't you wearing those pajamas I got you?

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Good night, Tony. [Tony hangs up the call as he enters the military vehicle.]

name: James Rhodes
line: Hey, Tony. [Coming up to the vehicle Tony's in.]

name: Tony
line: I'm sorry, this is the "fun-vee." The "hum-drum-vee" is back there.

name: James Rhodes
line: Nice job.

name: Tony
line: See you back at base.

name: Yinsen
line: I wouldn't do that if I were you.

name: Tony
line: What the hell did you do to me?

name: Yinsen
line: What I did? What I did is to save your life. I removed all the shrapnel I could, but there's a lot left, and it's headed into your atrial septum. Here, want to see? [Pulls out a bottle of shrapnel.] I have a souvenir. Take a look. [Tosses the bottle to Tony] I've seen many wounds like that in my village. We call them the walking dead because it takes about a week for the barbs to reach the vital organs.

name: Tony
line: What is this?

name: Yinsen
line: That is an electromagnet, hooked up to a car battery, and it's keeping the shrapnel from entering your heart. Hmm? [Tony sips up the jacket he's wearing and looks at the camera on the ceiling.] That's right. Smile. We met once, you know, at a technical conference in Bern.

name: Tony
line: I don't remember.

name: Yinsen
line: No, you wouldn't. If I had been that drunk, I wouldn't have been able to stand, much less give a lecture on integrated circuits.

name: Tony
line: Where are we?

name: Yinsen
line: Come on, stand up. Stand up! Just do as I do. Come on, put your hands up.

name: Tony
line: Those are my guns. How did they get my guns?

name: Yinsen
line: Do you understand me? Do as I do. [A man starts speaking in Arabic. Yinsen translates for him.] He says, "Welcome, Tony, the most famous mass murderer "in the history of America." [Man speaks in Arabic.] He is honored. [Man speaks in Arabic.] He wants you to build the missile. [Man speaks in Arabic.] The Jericho missile that you demonstrated. [Man speaks in Arabic, handing Yinsen a picture of the Jericho missile.] This one.

name: Tony
line: I refuse. [Tony then is shown with his head in a large thing of water. Flashes of himself and the electromagnet in his chest are shown.]

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony! [As a voice in his head as he tries not to drown.]

name: Yinsen
line: He wants to know what you think.

name: Tony
line: I think you got a lot of my weapons.

name: Yinsen
line: He says they have everything you need to build the Jericho missile. He wants you to make the list of materials. [Man speaks Arabic again] He says for you to start working immediately, and when you're done, he will set you free.

name: Tony
line: No, he won't. [Shaking the Arabic man's hand.]

name: Yinsen
line: No, he won't.

name: Yinsen
line: [Tony sitting around a small fire in the cave with Tony] I'm sure they're looking for you, Stark. But they will never find you in these mountains. Look, what you just saw, that is your legacy, Stark. Your life's work, in the hands of those murderers. Is that how you want to go out? Is this the last act of defiance of the great Tony? Or are you going to do something about it?

name: Tony
line: Why should I do anything? They're going to kill me, you, either way. And if they don't, I'll probably be dead in a week.

name: Yinsen
line: Well, then, this is a very important week for you, isn't it? Hm?

name: Tony
line: [Directing the men to where to put things while Yinsen's translating] If this is going to be my work station, I want it well-lit. I want these up. I need welding gear. I don't care if it's acetylene or propane. I need a soldering station. I need helmets. I'm gonna need goggles. I would like a smelting cup. I need two sets of precision tools. [Yinsen and Tony start taking apart the weapons.] How many languages do you speak?

name: Yinsen
line: A lot. But apparently, not enough for this place. They speak Arabic, Urdu, Dari, Pashto, Mongolian, Farsi, Russian.

name: Tony
line: Who are these people?

name: Yinsen
line: They are your loyal customers, sir. They call themselves the Ten Rings. [The men of the Ten Rings are shown watching Tony and Yinsen work on a TV.] You know, we might be more productive if you include me in the planning process.

name: Tony
line: Uh-huh. [Tony pulls apart a missile.] Okay, we don't need this.

name: Yinsen
line: What is that?

name: Tony
line: That's palladium, 0.15 grams. We need at least 1.6, so why don't you go break down the other 11?

name: Tony
line: Careful. Careful, we only get one shot at this.

name: Yinsen
line: Relax. I have steady hands. Why do you think you're still alive?

name: Tony
line: What do I call you?

name: Yinsen
line: My name is Yinsen.

name: Tony
line: Yinsen. Nice to meet you.

name: Yinsen
line: Nice to meet you, too. [Tony puts together a device while Yinsen watches.] Whoa. That doesn't look like a Jericho missile.

name: Tony
line: That's because it's a miniaturized arc reactor. I got a big one powering my factory at home. It should keep the shrapnel out of my heart.

name: Yinsen
line: But what could it generate?

name: Tony
line: If my math is right, and it always is, three gigajoules per second.

name: Yinsen
line: That could run your heart for 50 lifetimes.

name: Tony
line: Yeah. Or something big for 15 minutes.

name: Tony
line: [Looking at sheets of paper with Tony] This is our ticket out of here.

name: Yinsen
line: What is it?

name: Tony
line: Flatten them out and look. [Yinsen flattens the sheets out to see a drawing of a metal suit.]

name: Yinsen
line: Oh, wow. Impressive.

name: Yinsen
line: Good. Good roll. Good roll.

name: Tony
line: You still haven't told me where you're from.

name: Yinsen
line: I'm from a small town called Gulmira. It's actually a nice place.

name: Tony
line: Got a family?

name: Yinsen
line: Yes, and I will see them when I leave here. And you, Stark?

name: Tony
line: No.

name: Yinsen
line: No? So you're a man who has everything and nothing.

name: Raza
line: Relax. [Motioning for the two men to remove their hands from above their heads. They do so as Raza comes up and inspects Tony's arc reactor.] The bow and arrow once was the pinnacle of weapons technology. It allowed the great Genghis Khan to rule from the Pacific to the Ukraine. An empire twice the size of Alexander the Great and four times the size of the Roman Empire. But today, whoever holds the latest Stark weapons rules these lands. And soon, it will be my turn. [Starts speaking in Urdu as he stares down Tony.] Why have you failed me?

name: Yinsen
line: We're working. Diligently. [Speaking in Urdu.]

name: Raza
line: [Turns and walks toward Yinsen.] I let you live. This is how you repay me? [Speaking in Urdu.]

name: Yinsen
line: It's very complex. He's trying very hard. [Speaking in Urdu.]

name: Raza
line: On his knees. [He commands his men in Urdu. Yinsen is forced to his knees.] You think I'm a fool? I'll get the truth. [Speaking in Urdu as he takes a coal from the dying fire.]

name: Yinsen
line: We're both working. [Speaking in Urdu.]

name: Raza
line: Open your mouth. [Speaking in Urdu.]

name: Tony
line: What does he want?

name: Raza
line: You think I'm a fool? What's going on? Tell me the truth. [Speaking in Urdu. Raza forces Yinsen's head to lay on the table.]

name: Yinsen
line: He's building your Jericho. He's building your Jericho. [Speaking in Urdu.]

name: Tony
line: What do you want? A delivery date? [Tony tries to go towards Raza and Yinsen but the other men pull their guns on him.] I need him. Good assistant.

name: Raza
line: You have till tomorrow to assemble my missile.

name: Yinsen
line: Okay? Can you move? Okay, say it again.

name: Tony
line: 41 steps straight ahead. Then 16 steps, that's from the door, fork right, 33 steps, turn right.

name: Raza
line: Where is Stark? [Speaking Arabic]

name: Man
line: He was here a moment ago. [Speaking Arabic]

name: Raza
line: Go look for him. [Speaking Arabic]

name: Man
line: Yinsen! Yinsen! Stark!

name: Tony
line: Say something. Say something back to him.

name: Yinsen
line: He's speaking Hungarian. I don't...

name: Tony
line: Then speak Hungarian.

name: Yinsen
line: Okay. I know.

name: Tony
line: What do you know?

name: Tony
line: How'd that work?

name: Yinsen
line: Oh, my goodness. It worked all right.

name: Tony
line: That's what I do.

name: Yinsen
line: Let me finish this.

name: Tony
line: Initialize the power sequence.

name: Yinsen
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: Now!

name: Yinsen
line: Tell me. Tell me.

name: Tony
line: Function 11. Tell me when you see a progress bar. It should be up right now.

name: Yinsen
line: Yes.

name: Tony
line: Talk to me. Tell me when you see it.

name: Yinsen
line: I have it.

name: Tony
line: Press Control "l".

name: Tony
line: "I." "Enter."

name: Yinsen
line: Got it.

name: Tony
line: "l" and "Enter." Come over here and button me up.

name: Yinsen
line: Okay. All right.

name: Tony
line: Every other hex bolt.

name: Yinsen
line: They're coming!

name: Tony
line: Nothing pretty, just get it done. Just get it done.

name: Yinsen
line: They're coming.

name: Tony
line: Make sure the checkpoints are clear before you follow me out, okay?

name: Yinsen
line: We need more time. Hey, I'm gonna go buy you some time.

name: Tony
line: Stick to the plan! Stick to the plan! [Yinsen runs out of the cave with a gun from one of the dead men.] Yinsen! Yinsen!

name: Tony
line: Yinsen!

name: Yinsen
line: Watch out! [Raza tries to shoot at Tony but misses. Tony shoots back, hitting the wall behind Raza, causing a mini explosion and knocking Raza out.] Stark.

name: Tony
line: Come on. [Tony opens is helmet.] We got to go. Move for me, come on. We got a plan. We're gonna stick to it.

name: Yinsen
line: This was always the plan, Stark.

name: Tony
line: Come on, you're gonna go see your family. Get up.

name: Yinsen
line: My family is dead. I'm going to see them now, Stark. It's okay. I want this. I want this.

name: Tony
line: Thank you for saving me.

name: Yinsen
line: Don't waste it. Don't waste your life.

name: Tony
line: My turn. [Tony shoots fire at the men and their camp from his suit. The men continue to shoot at Tony, beginning to cause damage to the suit. Tony flips a suit and shoots up in the air. He screams as he falls into the sand on the other side of the mountains. The suit breaks when he lands.] Not bad.

name: Tony
line: Hey! [Waving down the helicopters.] Hey!

name: James Rhodes
line: How was the "fun-vee"? Next time, you ride with me, okay?

name: James Rhodes
line: Watch it, coming up here.

name: Tony
line: Are you kidding me with this? Get rid of them. [Tony walks up to Pepper.] Your eyes are red. A few tears for your long-lost boss?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tears of joy. I hate job hunting.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, vacation's over.

name: Happy
line: Where to, sir?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Take us to the hospital, please, Happy.

name: Tony
line: No.

name: Pepper Potts
line: No? Tony, you have to go to the hospital.

name: Tony
line: No is a complete answer.

name: Pepper Potts
line: The doctor has to look at you.

name: Tony
line: I don't have to do anything. I've been in captivity for three months. There are two things I want to do. I want an American cheeseburger, and the other...

name: Pepper Potts
line: That's enough of that.

name: Tony
line: ...is not what you think. I want you to call for a press conference now.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Call for a press conference?

name: Tony
line: Yeah.

name: Pepper Potts
line: What on earth for?

name: Tony
line: Hogan, drive. Cheeseburger first.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Look at this! Tony. We were going to meet at the hospital.

name: Tony
line: No, I'm fine.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Look at you! You had to have a burger, yeah?

name: Tony
line: Well, come on.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: You get me one of those?

name: Tony
line: There's only one left. I need it.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Hey, look who's here! Yeah!

name: Agent Coulson
line: Miss Potts?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yes.

name: Agent Coulson
line: Can I speak to you for a moment?

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'm not part of the press conference, but it's about to begin right now.

name: Agent Coulson
line: I'm not a reporter. I'm Agent Phil Coulson, with the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division.

name: Pepper Potts
line: That's quite a mouthful.

name: Agent Coulson
line: I know. We're working on it.

name: Pepper Potts
line: You know, we've been approached already by the DOD, the FBI, the CIA...

name: Agent Coulson
line: We're a separate division with a more specific focus. We need to debrief Mr. Stark about the circumstances of his escape.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'll put something in the book, shall I?

name: Agent Coulson
line: Thank you.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Well, let's get this started, uh...

name: Tony
line: Hey, would it be all right if everyone sat down? [Sitting in front of the podium.] Why don't you just sit down? That way you can see me, and I can... A little less formal and... [Tony takes a bite of his cheeseburger as everyone sits, or squats, down]

name: James Rhodes
line: What's up with the love-in?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Don't look at me. I don't know what he's up to.

name: Tony
line: Good to see you.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Good to see you.

name: Tony
line: I never got to say goodbye to Dad. I never got to say goodbye to my father. There's questions that I would have asked him. I would have asked him how he felt about what this company did. If he was conflicted, if he ever had doubts. Or maybe he was every inch the man we all remember from the newsreels. I saw young Americans killed by the very weapons I created to defend them and protect them. And I saw that I had become part of a system that is comfortable with zero accountability.

name: Reporters
line: Mr. Stark!

name: Tony
line: Hey, Ben.

name: Tony
line: I had my eyes opened. [Tony stands and moves behind the podium.] I came to realize that I have more to offer this world than just making things that blow up. And that is why, effective immediately, I am shutting down the weapons manufacturing division of Stark International [Everyone stands up in commotion.] until such a time as I can decide what the future of the company will be.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: I think we're gonna be selling a lot of newspapers. [Standing up beside Tony.]

name: Tony
line: What direction it should take, one that I'm comfortable with and is consistent with the highest good for this country, as well. [Tony leaves the stage.]

name: Obadiah Stane
line: What we should take away from this is that Tony's back! And he's healthier than ever. We're going to have a little internal discussion and we'll get back to you with the follow-up. [Obadiah is shown on a Segway, riding up to one of the Stark buildings. Happy leaning against a car outside.] Where is he?

name: Happy
line: He's inside.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Well, that..uh... That went well.

name: Tony
line: Did I just paint a target on the back of my head?

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Your head? What about my head? What do you think the over-under on the stock drop is gonna be tomorrow?

name: Tony
line: Uh, optimistically, 40 points.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: At minimum.

name: Tony
line: Yep.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Tony, we're a weapons manufacturer.

name: Tony
line: Obie, I just don't want a body count to be our only legacy.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: That's what we do. We're iron mongers. We make weapons.

name: Tony
line: It's my name on the side of the building.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: And what we do keeps the world from falling into chaos.

name: Tony
line: Not based on what I saw. We're not doing a good enough job. We can do better. We're gonna do something else.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Like what? You want us to make baby bottles?

name: Tony
line: I think we should take another look into arc reactor technology.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Ah, come on. The arc reactor, that's a publicity stunt! Tony, come on. We built that thing to shut the hippies up.

name: Tony
line: It works.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Yeah, as a science project. The arc was never cost effective. We knew that before we built it. Arc reactor technology, that's a dead end, right?

name: Tony
line: Maybe.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Huh? Am I right? We haven't had a breakthrough in that in what? Thirty years.

name: Tony
line: That's what they say. Could you have a lousier poker face? Just tell me, who told you?

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Never mind who told me. Show me.

name: Tony
line: It's Rhodey or Pepper.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: I want to see it.

name: Tony
line: Okay, Rhodey. [Tony opens his shirt to show Obadiah the reactor in his chest.]

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Okay. [Obadiah begins to button Tony's shirt back up.]

name: Tony
line: Okay? It works.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Listen to me, Tony. We're a team. Do you understand? There's nothing we can't do if we stick together, like your father and I.

name: Tony
line: I'm sorry I didn't give you a heads-up, okay? But if I had...

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Tony. Tony, no more of this "ready, fire, aim" business. You understand me?

name: Tony
line: That was Dad's line.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: You gotta let me handle this. We're gonna have to play a whole different kind of ball now. We're going to have to take a lot of heat. I want you to promise me that you're gonna lay low.

name: Newcaster
line: Stark Industries! I've got one recommendation! Ready? Ready? Sell, sell, sell! Abandon ship! Does the Hindenburg ring any bells? Let me show you the new Stark Industries business plan! Look, that's a weapons company that doesn't make weapons!

name: Tony
line: [Over the intercoms] Pepper. How big are your hands?

name: Pepper Potts
line: What?

name: Tony
line: How big are your hands?

name: Pepper Potts
line: I don't understand why...

name: Tony
line: Get down here. I need you. [Pepper enters Tony's workshop to find Tony lying shirtless on a chair.] Hey. Let's see them. Show me your hands. Let's see them. [Pepper holds up her hands as she comes closer.] Oh, wow. They are small. Very petite, indeed. I just uh.. need your help for a sec.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Oh, my God, is that the thing that's keeping you alive?

name: Tony
line: It was. It is now an antique. This is what will be keeping me alive for the foreseeable future. I'm swapping it up for an upgraded unit, and I just ran into a little speed bump.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Speed bump, what does that mean?

name: Tony
line: It's nothing. It's just a little snag. There's an exposed wire under this device. And it's contacting the socket wall and causing a little bit of a short. It's fine. [Tony pulls out the old device, handing it to Pepper.]

name: Pepper Potts
line: What do you want me to do?

name: Tony
line: Put that on the table over there. That is irrelevant.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Oh, my God! [Setting the old reactor on the table.]

name: Tony
line: I want you to reach in, and you're just gonna gently lift the wire out.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Is it safe?

name: Tony
line: Yeah, it should be fine. It's like Operation. You just don't let it touch the socket wall or it goes "beep."

name: Pepper Potts
line: What do you mean, "Operation"?

name: Tony
line: It's just a game, never mind. Just gently lift the wire.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: Okay? Great.

name: Pepper Potts
line: You know, I don't think that I'm qualified to do this.

name: Tony
line: No, you're fine. You're the most capable, qualified, trustworthy person I've ever met. You're gonna do great. Is it too much of a problem to ask? 'Cause I'm...

name: Pepper Potts
line: Okay, okay.

name: Tony
line: I really need your help here.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Okay. [Slides her hand into the hole in Tony's chest.] Oh, there's pus!

name: Tony
line: It's not pus. It's an inorganic plasmic discharge from the device, not from my body.

name: Pepper Potts
line: It smells!

name: Tony
line: Yeah, it does. The copper wire. The copper wire, you got it?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Okay, I got it! I got it!

name: Tony
line: Okay, you got it? Now, don't let it touch [Pepper lets it touch the side.] the sides when you're coming out!

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'm sorry. I'm sorry.

name: Tony
line: That's what I was trying to tell you before. Okay, now make sure that when you pull it out, that you don't... [Pepper pulls out the wire with the magnet attached and the medical equipment starts beeping.] There's a magnet at the end of it! That was it. You just pulled it out.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Oh, God!

name: Tony
line: Okay, I was not expecting...

name: Pepper Potts
line: Okay, what do I do?

name: Tony
line: Don't put it back in! Don't put it back in!

name: Pepper Potts
line: What's wrong?

name: Tony
line: Nothing, I'm just going into cardiac arrest--

name: Pepper Potts
line: What? You said it was safe!

name: Tony
line: 'cause you yanked it out like a trout... We gotta hurry. Take this. Take this. You gotta switch it out really quick.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Okay. Okay. Tony?

name: Tony
line: What?

name: Pepper Potts
line: It's going to be okay. Okay?

name: Tony
line: Is it?

name: Pepper Potts
line: It's gonna be okay. I'm gonna make this okay.

name: Tony
line: Let's hope. Okay, you're gonna attach that to the base plate. Make s-sure you... [Screams went it attaches.] Was that so hard? That was fun, right? Here, I got it. I got it. Here. Nice.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Are you okay?

name: Tony
line: Yeah, I feel great. You okay?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Don't ever, ever, ever, ever ask me to do anything like that ever again.

name: Tony
line: I don't have anyone but you. Anyway... [Tony rips on the wires off and stands up.]

name: Pepper Potts
line: What do you want me to do with this? [Holding Tony's old reactor.]

name: Tony
line: That? Destroy it. Incinerate it.

name: Pepper Potts
line: You don't want to keep it?

name: Tony
line: Pepper, I've been called many things. "Nostalgic" is not one of them.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Will that be all, Mr. Stark?

name: Tony
line: That will be all, Miss Potts. [Turns to talk to his robot while he eyes Pepper as she walks away.] Hey, Butterfingers, come here. What's all this stuff doing on top of my desk? That's my phone, that's a picture of me and my dad. Right there. In the garbage. All that stuff.

name: James Rhodes
line: The future of air combat. Is it manned or unmanned? I'll tell you, in my experience, no unmanned aerial vehicle will ever trump a pilot's instinct, his insight, that ability to look into a situation beyond the obvious and discern its outcome, or a pilot's judgment.

name: Tony
line: Colonel? Why not a pilot without the plane?

name: James Rhodes
line: Look who fell out of the sky. Mr. Tony.

name: Man
line: Hello, sir.

name: Tony
line: Speaking of manned or unmanned, you gotta get him to tell you about the time he guessed wrong at spring break. Just remember that, spring break, 1987. That lovely lady you woke up with.

name: James Rhodes
line: Don't do that!

name: Tony
line: What was his name?

name: James Rhodes
line: Don't do that.

name: Tony
line: Was it Ivan?

name: James Rhodes
line: Don't do that. They'll believe it.

name: Tony
line: Okay.

name: James Rhodes
line: Don't do that.

name: Tony
line: Okay.

name: James Rhodes
line: Don't do that.

name: Tony
line: Pleasure meeting you.

name: James Rhodes
line: Give us a couple minutes, you guys. [The group walks off.] I'm surprised.

name: Tony
line: Why?

name: James Rhodes
line: I swear, I didn't expect to see you walking around so soon.

name: Tony
line: I'm doing a little better than walking.

name: James Rhodes
line: Really?

name: Tony
line: Yeah. Rhodey, I'm working on something big. I came to talk to you. I want you to be a part of it.

name: James Rhodes
line: You're about to make a whole lot of people around here real happy, 'cause that little stunt at the press conference, that was a doozy.

name: Tony
line: This is not for the military. I'm not... It's different.

name: James Rhodes
line: What? You're a humanitarian now or something?

name: Tony
line: I need you to listen to me.

name: James Rhodes
line: No. What you need is time to get your mind right. I'm serious.

name: Tony
line: Okay.

name: James Rhodes
line: It's nice seeing you, Tony. [Rhodey walks off.]

name: Tony
line: Thanks.

name: Tony
line: JARVIS, you up?

name: JARVIS
line: For you, sir, always.

name: Tony
line: I'd like to open a new project file, index as Mark Two.

name: JARVIS
line: Shall I store this on the Stark Industries Central Database?

name: Tony
line: Actually, I don't know who to trust right now. Till further notice, why don't we just keep everything on my private server?

name: JARVIS
line: Working on a secret project, are we, sir?

name: Tony
line: I don't want this winding up in the wrong hands. Maybe in mine, it can actually do some good.

name: Tony
line: Next. Up. Not in the boot, Dummy. Right here. You got me? Stay put. Nice. You're of no benefit at all. Move down to the toe. I got this. Okay, I'm sorry, am I in your way? Up. Screw it. Don't even move. You are a tragedy.

name: Tony
line: Okay, let's do this right. Start mark, half a meter, and back and center. Dummy, look alive. You're on standby for fire safety. You, roll it. Okay. Activate hand controls. We're gonna start off nice and easy. We're gonna see if 10% thrust capacity achieves lift. And three, two, one.

name: Tony
line: Up two. All right, set that.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I've been buzzing you. Did you hear the intercom?

name: Tony
line: Yeah, everything's... What? [Still distracted with the flight stabilizer.]

name: Pepper Potts
line: Obadiah's upstairs.

name: Tony
line: Great!

name: Pepper Potts
line: What would you like me to tell him?

name: Tony
line: Great. I'll be right up.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Okay. I thought you said you were done making weapons.

name: Tony
line: It is. This is a flight stabilizer. It's completely harmless. [The stabilizer shoots, flinging Tony backwards and scaring Pepper.] I didn't expect that. [Tony then comes up stairs to find Obadiah playing the piano and Pepper working on the couch.] How'd it go? It went that bad, huh?

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Just because I brought pizza back from New York doesn't mean it went bad. [Still playing the piano.]

name: Tony
line: Sure doesn't. Oh, boy.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: It would have gone better if you were there.

name: Tony
line: Uh-huh. You told me to lay low. That's what I've been doing. I lay low, and you take care of all...

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Hey, come on. In public. The press. [Comes over to sit next to Tony.] This was a board of directors meeting.

name: Tony
line: This was a board of directors meeting?

name: Obadiah Stane
line: The board is claiming you have post-traumatic stress. They're filing an injunction.

name: Tony
line: A what?

name: Obadiah Stane
line: They want to lock you out.

name: Tony
line: Why, 'cause the stocks dipped 40 points? We knew that was gonna happen.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Fifty-six and a half.

name: Tony
line: It doesn't matter. We own the controlling interest in the company.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Tony, the board has rights, too. They're making the case that you and your new direction isn't in the company's best interest.

name: Tony
line: I'm being responsible! That's a new direction for me, for the company. I mean, me on the company's behalf being responsible for the way that... This is great. [Tony stands up, taking the pizza box with him. Obadiah follows.]

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Oh, come on. Tony. Tony.

name: Tony
line: I'll be in the shop.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Hey, hey! Hey, Tony. Listen. I'm trying to turn this thing around, but you gotta give me something. Something to pitch them. Let me have the engineers analyze that. You know, draw up some specs.

name: Tony
line: No. No, absolutely not.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: It'll give me a bone to throw the boys in New York!

name: Tony
line: This one stays with me. That's it, Obie. Forget it.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: All right, well, this stays with me, then. [Obadiah takes the pizza box back.] Go on, here, you can have a piece. Take two.

name: Tony
line: Thank you.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: You mind if I come down there and see what you're doing?

name: Tony
line: Good night, Obie. [Tony heads back down to his workshop]

name: Tony
line: [running another flight test, this time wearing the boots and hand flight stabilizers] Day 11, test 37, configuration 2.0. For lack of a better option, Dummy is still on fire safety. If you douse me again, and I'm not on fire, I'm donating you to a city college. All right, nice and easy. Seriously, just gonna start off with 1% thrust capacity. And three, two, one. [Lifts off the ground and hovers for a bit before landing.] Okay. Please don't follow me around with it, either, 'cause I feel like I'm gonna catch on fire spontaneously. Just stand down! If something happens, then come in. And again, let's bring it up to 2.5. Three, two, one. [Lifts off the ground with less control and starts hovering all over the workshop.] Okay, this is where I don't want to be! Not the car, not the car! Table! Could be worse! Could be worse! We're fine! Okay. [Lands where he started. Dummy goes to use the fire extinguisher.] No! Uh-uh! Uh-uh! Yeah, I can fly.

name: Tony
line: JARVIS, are you there?

name: JARVIS
line: At your service, sir.

name: Tony
line: Engage heads-up display.

name: JARVIS
line: Check.

name: Tony
line: Import all preferences from home interface.

name: JARVIS
line: Will do, sir.

name: Tony
line: All right, what do you say?

name: JARVIS
line: I have indeed been uploaded, sir. We're online and ready.

name: Tony
line: Can we start the virtual walk-around?

name: JARVIS
line: Importing preferences and calibrating virtual environment.

name: Tony
line: Do a check on control surfaces

name: JARVIS
line: As you wish. [The full suit is shown.] Test complete. Preparing to power down and begin diagnostics.

name: Tony
line: Uh, yeah. Tell you what. Do a weather and ATC check. Start listening in on ground control.

name: JARVIS
line: Sir, there are still terabytes of calculations needed before an actual flight is...

name: Tony
line: JARVIS! Sometimes you got to run before you can walk. Ready? In three, two, one. [Begins hovering and flies out of the garage into the sky.] Handles like a dream. All right, let's see what this thing can do. What's SR-71's record?

name: JARVIS
line: The altitude record for fixed wing flight is 85,000 feet, sir.

name: Tony
line: Records are made to be broken! Come on! [Begins flying straight up.]

name: JARVIS
line: Sir, there is a potentially fatal buildup of ice occurring.

name: Tony
line: Keep going! Higher! [Ice builds up around the suit, causing it to stop working and him to start flying from the sky.] We iced up, JARVIS! Deploy flaps! JARVIS! Come on, we got to break the ice!

name: Tony
line: Kill power.

name: Tony
line: Notes. Main transducer feels sluggish at plus 40 altitude. Hull pressurization is problematic. I'm thinking icing is the probable factor.

name: JARVIS
line: A very astute observation, sir. Perhaps, if you intend to visit other planets, we should improve the exosystems.

name: Tony
line: Connect to the sys. co. Have it reconfigure the shell metals. Use the gold titanium alloy from the seraphim tactical satellite. That should ensure a fuselage integrity while maintaining power-to-weight ratio. Got it?

name: JARVIS
line: Yes. Shall I render using proposed specifications?

name: Tony
line: Thrill me.

name: TV Reporter
line: Tonight's red-hot red carpet is right here at the Disney Concert Hall, where Tony's third annual benefit for the Firefighter's Family Fund has become the place to be for L.A.'s high society.

name: Tony
line: JARVIS, we get an invite for that?

name: JARVIS
line: I have no record of an invitation, sir.

name: TV Reporter
line: ... hasn't been seen in public since his bizarre and highly controversial press conference. Some claim he's suffering from post traumatic stress and has been bedridden for weeks. Whatever the case may be, no one expects an appearance from him tonight.

name: JARVIS
line: The render is complete.

name: Tony
line: A little ostentatious, don't you think?

name: JARVIS
line: What was I thinking? You're usually so discreet.

name: Tony
line: Tell you what. Throw a little hot-rod red in there.

name: JARVIS
line: Yes, that should help you keep a low profile. The render is complete.

name: Tony
line: Hey, I like it. Fabricate it. Paint it.

name: JARVIS
line: Commencing automated assembly. Estimated completion time is five hours.

name: Tony
line: Don't wait up for me, honey.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Weapons manufacturing is only one small part of what Stark Industries is all about, and our partnership with the fire and rescue community...

name: Random Woman
line: Hey, Tony, remember me?

name: Tony
line: Sure don't. You look great, Hef.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: We're going to have a great quarter.

name: Tony
line: What's the world coming to when a guy's got to crash his own party?

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Look at you. Hey, what a surprise.

name: Tony
line: I'll see you inside.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Hey. Listen, take it slow, all right? I think I got the board right where we want them

name: Tony
line: You got it. Just cabin fever. I'll just be a minute. Give me a Scotch. I'm starving.

name: Agent Coulson
line: Mr. Stark?

name: Tony
line: Yeah?

name: Agent Coulson
line: Agent Coulson.

name: Tony
line: Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah. The guy from the..

name: Agent Coulson
line: Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division.

name: Tony
line: God, you need a new name for that.

name: Agent Coulson
line: Yeah, I hear that a lot. Listen, I know this must be a trying time for you, but we need to debrief you. There's still a lot of unanswered questions, and time can be a factor with these things.

name: Tony
line: Let's just put something on the books.

name: Agent Coulson
line: How about the 24th at 7:00 p.m. at Stark Industries?

name: Tony
line: Tell you what. You got it. You're absolutely right. Well, I'm going to go to my assistant, and we'll make a date. You look fantastic! I didn't recognize you.

name: Pepper Potts
line: What are you doing here?

name: Tony
line: Just avoiding government agents.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Are you by yourself?

name: Tony
line: Yes. Where'd you get that dress?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Oh, it was a birthday present.

name: Tony
line: That's great.

name: Pepper Potts
line: From you, actually.

name: Tony
line: Well, I got great taste.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yes.

name: Tony
line: You want to dance?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Oh, no.

name: Tony
line: All right, come on.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Thank you. No.

name: Tony
line: Am I making you uncomfortable?

name: Pepper Potts
line: No. No. I always forget to wear deodorant and dance with my boss in front of everyone that I work with in a dress with no back.

name: Tony
line: You look great and you smell great.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Oh, God.

name: Tony
line: But I could fire you if that would take the edge off.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I actually don't think that you could tie your shoes without me.

name: Tony
line: I'd make it a week. Sure.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Really? What's your Social Security number?

name: Tony
line: Five.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Five?

name: Tony
line: Right.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Right. You're missing just a couple of digits there.

name: Tony
line: The other eight? So, I got you for the other eight. How about a little air?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yes, I need some air. That was totally weird.

name: Tony
line: Totally harmless.

name: Pepper Potts
line: It was totally not harmless, by the way.

name: Tony
line: We're dancing. No one's even watching.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Everybody who I work with... No, you know why?

name: Tony
line: I think you lost objectivity. I think they just... People... We just danced.

name: Pepper Potts
line: No, it was not just a dance. You don't understand because you're you. And everybody knows exactly who you are and how you are with girls and all of that, which is completely fine. But, you know, then me, you're my boss, and I'm dancing with you.

name: Tony
line: I don't think it was taken that way.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Because it makes me look like the one who's trying to...

name: Tony
line: I just think you're overstating it.

name: Pepper Potts
line: You know, and we're here, and then I'm wearing this ridiculous dress, and then we were dancing like that and... I would like a drink, please.

name: Tony
line: Got it, okay.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I would like a vodka martini, please.

name: Tony
line: Okay.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Very dry with olives, a lot of olives. Like, at least three olives.

name: Tony
line: Two vodka martinis, extra dry, extra olives, extra fast. Make one of them dirty, will you?

name: Christine Everhart
line: Wow. Tony.

name: Tony
line: Oh, hey.

name: Christine Everhart
line: Fancy seeing you here.

name: Tony
line: Carrie.

name: Christine Everhart
line: Christine.

name: Tony
line: Carrie.

name: Christine Everhart
line: Christine.

name: Tony
line: That's right.

name: Christine Everhart
line: You have a lot of nerve showing up here tonight. Can I at least get a reaction from you?

name: Tony
line: Panic. I would say panic is my reaction.

name: Christine Everhart
line: 'Cause I was referring to your company's involvement in this latest atrocity

name: Tony
line: Yeah. They just put my name on the invitation. I don't know what to tell you.

name: Christine Everhart
line: I actually almost bought it, hook, line and sinker.

name: Tony
line: I was out of town for a couple months, in case you didn't hear.

name: Christine Everhart
line: Is this what you call accountability? It's a town called Gulmira. Heard of it?

name: Tony
line: When were these taken?

name: Christine Everhart
line: Yesterday.

name: Tony
line: I didn't approve any shipment.

name: Christine Everhart
line: Well, your company did.

name: Tony
line: Well, I'm not my company.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Please, do you mind?

name: Tony
line: Have you seen these pictures? What's going on in Gulmira?

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Tony, Tony. You can't afford to be this naive.

name: Tony
line: You know what? I was naive before, when they said, "Here's the line. We don't cross it. This is how we do business." If we're double-dealing under the table... Are we?

name: Reporter
line: Tony, your picture, please!

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Let's take a picture. Come on. Picture time! Tony. Who do you think locked you out? I was the one who filed the injunction against you. It was the only way I could protect you.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: No. No.

name: TV Reporter
line: The 15-mile hike to the outskirts of Gulmira can only be described as a descent into hell, into a modern-day Heart of Darkness. Simple farmers and herders from peaceful villages have been driven from their homes, displaced from their lands by warlords emboldened by a new-found power. Villagers have been forced to take shelter in whatever crude dwellings they can find in the ruins of other villages, or here in the remnants of an old Soviet smelting plant. Recent violence has been attributed to a group of foreign fighters referred to by locals as the Ten Rings. As you can see, these men are heavily armed and on a mission. A mission that could prove fatal to anyone who stands in their way. With no political will or international pressure, there's very little hope for these refugees. Around me, a woman begging for news on her husband, who was kidnapped by insurgents, either forced to join their militia. Desperate refugees clutch yellowed photographs, holding them up to anyone who will stop. A child's simple question, "Where are my mother and father?" There's very little hope for these refugees, refugees who can only wonder who, if anyone, will help.

name: Tony
line: He's all yours.

name: Captain
line: What the hell was that? Were we cleared to go in there?

name: Major Allen
line: Put me through to State. They're going to be all over this.

name: Major Allen
line: We got the CIA on the line?

name: Captain
line: I've got Langley on the line. They want to know if it's us.

name: Major Allen
line: I need answers! Can I please get eyes on target?

name: Major Allen
line: Get me Colonel Rhodes from weapons development down here now!

name: Major Allen
line: We ran an ID check and cross-referenced with all known databases. We have nothing.

name: James Rhodes
line: Any high-altitude surveillance in the region?

name: Captain
line: We got an AWAC and a Global Hawk in the area.

name: James Rhodes
line: So, this thing just appeared out of nowhere? How come it didn't show up on the radar?

name: James Rhodes
line: Is it stealth?

name: Major Allen
line: Colonel, what are we dealing with here?

name: James Rhodes
line: Let me make a call.

name: Major Allen
line: Sergeant, clear a hole.

name: Tony
line: Hello?

name: James Rhodes
line: Tony?

name: Tony
line: Who's this?

name: James Rhodes
line: It's Rhodes.

name: Tony
line: Sorry, hello?

name: James Rhodes
line: I said it's Rhodes.

name: Tony
line: Speak up, please.

name: James Rhodes
line: What in the hell is that noise?

name: Tony
line: Oh, yeah, I'm driving with the top down.

name: James Rhodes
line: Yeah, well, I need your help right now.

name: Tony
line: It's funny how that works, huh?

name: James Rhodes
line: Yeah. Speaking of funny, we've got a weapons depot that was just blown up a few clicks from where you were being held captive.

name: Tony
line: Well, that's a hot spot. Sounds like someone stepped in and did your job for you, huh?

name: James Rhodes
line: Why do you sound out of breath, Tony?

name: Tony
line: I'm not, I was just jogging in the canyon.

name: James Rhodes
line: I thought you were driving.

name: Tony
line: Right, I was driving to the canyon, where I'm going to jog.

name: James Rhodes
line: You sure you don't have any tech in that area I should know about?

name: Tony
line: Nope!

name: James Rhodes
line: Okay, good, 'cause I'm staring at one right now, and it's about to be blown to kingdom come.

name: Tony
line: That's my exit.

name: James Rhodes
line: Whiplash One, what is it?

name: Major Allen
line: You have radio contact?

name: Major Allen
line: Then you are clear to engage.

name: Tony
line: Hit it.

name: JARVIS
line: Inbound missile.

name: Tony
line: Flares!

name: Tony
line: Deploy flaps!

name: Major Allen
line: What is it?

name: James Rhodes
line: Hello?

name: Tony
line: Hi, Rhodey, it's me.

name: James Rhodes
line: It's who?

name: Tony
line: I'm sorry, it is me. You asked. What you were asking about is me.

name: James Rhodes
line: No, see, this isn't a game. You do not send civilian equipment into my active war zone. You understand that?

name: Tony
line: This is not a piece of equipment. I'm in it. It's a suit. It's me!

name: Major Allen
line: Rhodey, you got anything for me?

name: Major Allen
line: Mark your position and return to base.

name: Major Allen
line: Whiplash Two, reengage. If you get a clear shot, you take it.

name: James Rhodes
line: Major, we don't even know what we're shooting at. Call off the Raptors.

name: Major Allen
line: That thing just took out an F-22 inside a legal no fly zone! Whiplash Two, if you have a clear shot, take it!

name: JARVIS
line: You've been reengaged. Execute evasive maneuver.

name: James Rhodes
line: Tony, you still there?

name: Tony
line: Hey, thanks.

name: James Rhodes
line: Oh, my God, you crazy son of a bitch. You owe me a plane. You know that, right?

name: Tony
line: Yeah, well, technically, he hit me. Now are you going to come by and see what I'm working on?

name: James Rhodes
line: No, no, no, no, no, no, the less I know, the better. Now, what am I supposed to tell the press?

name: Tony
line: Training exercise. Isn't that the usual BS?

name: James Rhodes
line: It's not that simple. An unfortunate training exercise involving an F-22 Raptor occurred yesterday. I am pleased to report that the pilot was not injured. As for the unexpected turn of events on the ground in Gulmira, it is still unclear who or what intervened, but I can assure you that the United States government was not involved.

name: Tony
line: Hey!

name: JARVIS
line: It is a tight fit, sir. Sir, the more you struggle, the more this is going to hurt.

name: Tony
line: Be gentle. This is my first time. I designed this to come off, so... Hey. I really should be able to...

name: JARVIS
line: Please, try not to move, sir.

name: Pepper Potts
line: What's going on here?

name: Tony
line: Let's face it. This is not the worst thing you've caught me doing.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Are those bullet holes?

name: Raza
line: Welcome. Compliments of Tony.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: If you'd killed him when you were supposed to, you'd still have a face.

name: Raza
line: You paid us trinkets to kill a prince.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Show me the weapon.

name: Raza
line: Come. Leave your guards outside. [Raza and Stane walk inside the tent] His escape bore unexpected fruit.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: So this is how he did it.

name: Raza
line: This is only a first, crude effort. Stark has perfected his design. He has made a masterpiece of death. A man with a dozen of these can rule all of Asia. And you dream of Stark's throne. We have a common enemy. If we are still in business, I will give you these designs... as a gift. And in turn, I hope you'll repay me with a gift of iron soldiers.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Technology. [Stane uses a machine to stun Raza] It's always been your Achilles' heel in this part of the world. Don't worry. It'll only last for 15 minutes. That's the least of your problems. [Stane walks out of the tent] Crate up the armor and the rest of it. All right, let's finish up here.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: [Talking in the phone while in a car] Set up Sector 16 underneath the arc reactor, and I'm going to want this data masked. Recruit our top engineers. I want a prototype right away.

name: Tony
line: Hey. You busy? You mind if I send you on an errand? I need you to go to my office. You're going to hack into the mainframe and you're going to retrieve all the recent shipping manifests. This is a lock chip. This'll get you in. It's probably under Executive Files. If not, they put it on a ghost drive, in which case you need to look for the lowest numeric heading.

name: Pepper Potts
line: And what do you plan to do with this information if I bring it back here?

name: Tony
line: Same drill. They've been dealing under the table, and I'm going to stop them. I'm going to find my weapons and destroy them.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony, you know that I would help you with anything, but I cannot help you if you're going to start all of this again.

name: Tony
line: There is nothing except this. There's no art opening. There is no benefit. There is nothing to sign. There is the next mission and nothing else.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Is that so? Well, then, I quit. [Pepper throws the lock chip on the table.]

name: Tony
line: You stood by my side all these years while I reaped the benefits of destruction. And now that I'm trying to protect the people that I put in harm's way, you're going to walk out?

name: Pepper Potts
line: You're going to kill yourself, Tony. I'm not going to be a part of it.

name: Tony
line: I shouldn't be alive, unless it was for a reason. I'm not crazy, Pepper. I just finally know what I have to do. And I know in my heart that it's right.

name: Pepper Potts
line: [Pepper picks the lock drive back up.] You're all I have, too, you know. [In Stark's office, Pepper goes on a computer to use the drive.] Sector 16? What are you up to, Obadiah? [She finds a video of Stark held hostage and translates it.]

name: Video Voice Over
line: You did not tell us that the target you paid us to kill was the great Tony. As you can see, Obadiah Stane...

name: Pepper Potts
line: Oh, my God.

name: Video Voice Over
line: ... your deception and lies will cost you dearly. The price to kill Tony has just gone up.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: [Walks in on Pepper.] So, what are we going to do about this? I know what you're going through, Pepper. Tony. He always gets the good stuff, doesn't he? I was so happy when he came home. It was like we got him back from the dead. Now I realize, well, Tony never really did come home, did he? He left a part of himself in that cave. Breaks my heart.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Well, he's a complicated person. He's been through a lot. I think he'll be all right.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: You are a very rare woman. Tony doesn't know how lucky he is.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Thank you. Thanks. I'd better get back there. [Pulls the drive out, hiding it under a newspaper.]

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Is that today's paper?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yes.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Do you mind?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Not at all.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Puzzle.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Of course.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Take care. [Goes on the computer and sees that the files have been downloaded.]

name: Agent Coulson
line: Ms. Potts? We had an appointment. Did you forget about our appointment?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Nope, right now. Come with me.

name: Agent Coulson
line: Right now?

name: Pepper Potts
line: We're going to have it right now. Yeah, walk with me.

name: Agent Coulson
line: Okay.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'm going to give you the meeting of your life. Your office.

name: William
line: [On the phone.] Yeah, we've been working our best to do it. Absolutely, we're... I'm going to have to call you back. [Ends the call as Stane walks in] Mr. Stane? Sir, we've explored what you've asked us, and it seems as though there's a little hiccup. Actually...

name: Obadiah Stane
line: A hiccup?

name: William
line: Yes, to power the suit, sir, the technology actually doesn't exist. So, it's...

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Wait, wait, wait. The technology? William, here is the technology. I've asked you to simply make it smaller.

name: William
line: Okay, sir, and that's what we're trying to do, but honestly, it's impossible.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Tony was able to build this in a cave! With a box of scraps!

name: William
line: Well, I'm sorry. I'm not Tony.

name: Pepper Potts
line: [On the phone.] Tony? Tony, are you there? Hello?

name: Obadiah Stane
line: [Stuns Stark with the same machine as he did Raza.] Breathe. Easy, easy. You remember this one, right? It's a shame the government didn't approve it. There's so many applications for causing short-term paralysis. Tony. When I ordered the hit on you, I worried that I was killing the golden goose. But, you see, it was just fate that you survived that. [Pulls out the arc reactor from Starks chest.] You had one last golden egg to give. Do you really think that just because you have an idea, it belongs to you? Your father, he helped give us the atomic bomb. Now, what kind of world would it be today if he was as selfish as you? Oh, it's beautiful. Tony, this is your Ninth Symphony. What a masterpiece. Look at that. This is your legacy. A new generation of weapons with this at its heart. Weapons that will help steer the world back on course, put the balance of power in our hands. The right hands. I wish you could've seen my prototype. It's not as... Well, not as conservative as yours. Too bad you had to involve Pepper in this. I would have preferred that she lived.

name: James Rhodes
line: [On the phone.] What do you mean, he paid to have Tony killed? Pepper, slow down. Why would Obadiah... Okay, where's Tony now?

name: Pepper Potts
line: [On the phone.] I don't know. He's not answering his phone. Please go over there and make sure everything's okay. Thank you, Rhodey. I know a shortcut.

name: Tony
line: [Dummy hands Stark Pepper's gift] Good boy.

name: James Rhodes
line: Tony? Tony? Tony? Tony? Tony! Tony! You okay?

name: Tony
line: Where's Pepper?

name: James Rhodes
line: She's fine. She's with five agents. They're about to arrest Obadiah.

name: Tony
line: That's not going to be enough.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Section 16. Section 16. There it is. My key's not working. It's not opening the door. Oh, wow! What's that? It's, like, a little device. It's, like, a thing that's going to pick the lock?

name: Agent Coulson
line: You might want to take a few steps back.

name: James Rhodes
line: That's the coolest thing I've ever seen.

name: Tony
line: Not bad, huh? Let's do it.

name: James Rhodes
line: You need me to do anything else?

name: Tony
line: Keep the skies clear.

name: James Rhodes
line: Damn! Next time, baby.

name: Agent Coulson
line: Looks like you were right. He was building a suit.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I thought it'd be bigger.

name: Tony
line: How do you think the Mark One chest piece is going to hold up?

name: JARVIS
line: The suit's at 48% power and falling, sir. That chest piece was never designed for sustained flight.

name: Tony
line: Keep me posted. Pepper!

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony! Tony, are you okay?

name: Tony
line: I'm fine. How are...

name: Pepper Potts
line: Obadiah, he's gone insane!

name: Tony
line: I know. Listen, you'd better get out of there.

name: Pepper Potts
line: He built a suit.

name: Tony
line: Get out of there right now!

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Where do you think you're going? Your services are no longer required.

name: Tony
line: Stane!

name: Obadiah Stane
line: I love this suit!

name: Tony
line: Put them down!

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Collateral damage, Tony.

name: Tony
line: Divert power to chest RT.

name: Jarvis
line: Power reduced to 19%.

name: Tony
line: Lady! No, no, no, no, no, no!

name: Obadiah Stane
line: For 30 years, I've been holding you up! I built this company from nothing! Nothing is going to stand in my way. Least of all... you! Impressive. You've upgraded your armor! I've made some upgrades of my own!

name: JARVIS
line: Sir, it appears that his suit can fly.

name: Tony
line: Duly noted. Take me to maximum altitude.

name: JARVIS
line: With only 15% power, the odds of reaching that--

name: Tony
line: I know the math! Do it!

name: James Rhodes
line: Not necessary, people. Just a training exercise.

name: JARVIS
line: Thirteen percent power, sir.

name: Tony
line: Climb!

name: JARVIS
line: Eleven percent.

name: Tony
line: Keep going!

name: JARVIS
line: Seven percent power.

name: Tony
line: Just leave it on the screen! Stop telling me!

name: Obadiah Stane
line: You had a great idea, Tony, but my suit is more advanced in every way!

name: Tony
line: How'd you solve the icing problem?

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Icing problem?

name: Tony
line: Might want to look into it.

name: JARVIS
line: Two percent. We are now running on emergency backup power.

name: Tony
line: Woah! Potts!

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony! Oh, my God, are you okay?

name: Tony
line: I'm almost out of power. I've got to get out of this thing. I'll be right there.

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Nice try!

name: Tony
line: Weapons status?

name: JARVIS
line: Repulsors offline. Missiles offline.

name: Tony
line: Flares!

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Very clever, Tony.

name: Tony
line: Potts?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony!

name: Tony
line: This isn't working. We're going to have to overload the reactor and blast the roof.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Well, how are you going to do that?

name: Tony
line: You're going to do it. Go to the central console, open up all the circuits. When I get clear of the roof, I'll let you know. You're going to hit the master bypass button. It's going to fry everything up here.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Okay. I'm going in now.

name: Tony
line: Make sure you wait till I clear the roof. I'll buy you some time. This looks important! [Pulls out a wire from Obadiah Stane's suit.]

name: Obadiah Stane
line: I never had a taste for this sort of thing, but I must admit, I'm deeply enjoying the suit! You finally outdid yourself, Tony! You'd have made your father proud!

name: Pepper Potts
line: It's ready, Tony! Get off the roof! Tony!

name: Obadiah Stane
line: How ironic, Tony! Trying to rid the world of weapons, you gave it its best one ever!

name: Tony
line: Pepper!

name: Obadiah Stane
line: And now I'm going to kill you with it! You ripped out my targeting system!

name: Tony
line: Time to hit the button!

name: Pepper Potts
line: You told me not to!

name: Obadiah Stane
line: Hold still, you little prick!

name: Tony
line: Just do it!

name: Pepper Potts
line: You'll die!

name: Tony
line: Push it!

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony!

name: James Rhodes
line: [On the TV] You've all received the official statement of what occurred at Stark Industries last night. There have been unconfirmed reports that a robotic prototype malfunctioned and caused damage to the arc reactor. Fortunately, a member of Tony's personal security staff...

name: Tony
line: "Iron Man." That's kind of catchy. It's got a nice ring to it. I mean, it's not technically accurate. The suit's a gold-titanium alloy, but it's kind of evocative, the imagery, anyway.

name: Agent Coulson
line: Here's your alibi.

name: Tony
line: Okay?

name: Agent Coulson
line: You were on your yacht.

name: Tony
line: Yeah.

name: Agent Coulson
line: We have port papers that put you in Avalon all night, and sworn statements from 50 of your guests.

name: Tony
line: See, I was thinking maybe we should say it was just Pepper and me alone on the island.

name: Agent Coulson
line: That's what happened.

name: Tony
line: All right.

name: Agent Coulson
line: Just read it, word for word.

name: Tony
line: There's nothing about Stane here.

name: Agent Coulson
line: That's being handled. He's on vacation. Small aircraft have such a poor safety record.

name: Tony
line: But what about the whole cover story that it's a bodyguard? He's my... I mean, is that... That's kind of flimsy, don't you think?

name: Agent Coulson
line: This isn't my first rodeo, Mr. Stark. Just stick to the official statement, and soon, this will all be behind you. You've got 90 seconds.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Agent Coulson? I just wanted to say thank you very much for all of your help.

name: Agent Coulson
line: That's what we do. You'll be hearing from us.

name: Pepper Potts
line: From the Strategic Homeland...

name: Agent Coulson
line: Just call us S.H.I.E.L.D.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Right. Let's get this show on the road.

name: Tony
line: You know, it's actually not that bad. Even I don't think I'm Iron Man.

name: Pepper Potts
line: You're not Iron Man.

name: Tony
line: Am so.

name: Pepper Potts
line: You're not.

name: Tony
line: All right, suit yourself. You know, if I were Iron Man, I'd have this girlfriend who knew my true identity. She'd be a wreck, 'cause she'd always be worrying that I was going to die, yet so proud of the man I'd become. She'd be wildly conflicted, which would only make her more crazy about me. Tell me you never think about that night.

name: Pepper Potts
line: What night?

name: Tony
line: You know.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Are you talking about the night that we danced and went up on the roof, and then you went downstairs to get me a drink, and you left me there, by myself? Is that the night you're talking about? Thought so. Will that be all, Mr. Stark?

name: Tony
line: Yes, that will be all, Miss Potts.

name: James Rhodes
line: And now, Mr. Stark has prepared a statement. He will not be taking any questions.

name: Tony
line: Thank you. Been a while since I was in front of you. I figure I'll stick to the cards this time. There's been speculation that I was involved in the events that occurred on the freeway and the rooftop...

name: Christine Everhart
line: I'm sorry, Mr. Stark, but do you honestly expect us to believe that that was a bodyguard in a suit that conveniently appeared, despite the fact that you...

name: Tony
line: I know that it's confusing. It is one thing to question the official story, and another thing entirely to make wild accusations, or insinuate that I'm a superhero.

name: Christine Everhart
line: I never said you were a superhero.

name: Tony
line: Didn't? Well, good, because that would be outlandish and fantastic. I'm just not the hero type. Clearly. With this laundry list of character defects, all the mistakes I've made, largely public.

name: James Rhodes
line: Just stick to the cards, man.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, okay. Yeah. The truth is... I am Iron Man.

name: Tony
line: Jarvis!

name: JARVIS
line: [distorted] Welcome home, Sir. [Jarvis cuts out]

name: Nick Fury
line: "I am Iron Man." You think you're the only superhero in the world? Mr. Stark, you've become part of a bigger universe. You just don't know it yet.

name: Tony
line: Who the hell are you?

name: Nick Fury
line: [appears in light] Nick Fury, Director of S.H.I.E.L.D.

name: Tony
line: [nonchalantly] Ah.

name: Nick Fury
line: I'm here to talk to you about the Avengers Initiative.

name: Tony
line: Been a while since I was up here in front of you. Maybe Ill do us all a favour and just stick to the cards. Theres been some speculation that I was somehow involved in the events that occurred on the freeway and on the rooftop

name: Tony
line: Yes

name: Pretty much everyone in the crowd
line: Tony! Tony! Tony! Tony!

name: Tony
line: Its good to be back. You missed me?

name: Man in crowd
line: Blow something up!

name: Tony
line: I missed you too. Blow something up? I already did that. Im not saying that the world is enjoying its longest period of uninterrupted peace in years because of me. Im not saying that from the ashes of captivity, never has a greater phoenix metaphor been personified in human history. Im not saying that Uncle Sam can kick back on a lawn chair, sipping on an iced tea because I havent come across anyone whos man enough to go toe-to-toe with me on my best day.

name: Woman in crowd
line: I love you Tony!

name: Tony
line: Please, its not about me. [People still cheering Tony] Its not about you. Its not even about us. Its about legacy. Its about what we choose to leave behind for future generations. And thats why for the next year and for the first time since 1974, the best and brightest men and women of nations and corporations the world over will pool their resources, share their collective vision, to leave behind a brighter future. Its not about us. Therefore, what Im saying, if Im saying anything, is welcome back to the Stark Expo. [Big cheer from crowd.] And now, making a special guest appearance from the great beyond to tell you what its all about, please welcome my father, Howard.

name: Reporter
line: We are coming to you live from the kickoff at the Stark Expo, where Tony has just walked offstage. Dont worry if you cant make it down here tonight because this Expo goes on all year long. And Im gonna be here checking out all the attractions and the pavilions and inventions from all around the world.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Make sure you join me

name: Tony
line: All right, its a zoo out there, watch out.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Open up, lets go.

name: Tony
line: Hey, nice to see you. All right. Thank you. I remember you.

name: People
line: Tony, Tony

name: Tony
line: Hey, hey.

name: Woman
line: Call me.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Hey, hey, hey, hey. Come on, come on.

name: Tony
line: [signing a picture of Iron Man] Hello. It would be a pleasure.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: [what would be ruffling the hair of a small boy if said small boy were not wearing an Iron Man helmet making hair unreachable] See you buddy.

name: Happy Hogan
line: This is Larry.

name: Tony
line: Hey, the oracle of Oracle. What a pleasure. Nice to see you.

name: Larry King
line: Call me. Call me.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Larry King.

name: Tony
line: Larry! Larry. Yes, my people, my people.

name: Happy Hogan
line: [Scene shows them finally at the door] Come on, Tony. There we go.

name: Tony
line: Very mellow.

name: Happy Hogan
line: That wasnt so bad.

name: Tony
line: No, it was perfect.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Look what we got here, the new model.

name: Tony
line: Hey, does she come with the car?

name: Happy Hogan
line: I certainly hope so. Hi.

name: Tony
line: Hi. And you are?

name: Woman
line: Marshal.

name: Tony
line: Irish. I like it.

name: Marshal
line: Pleased to meet you Tony.

name: Tony
line: Im on the wheel. Do you mind? Where you from?

name: Marshal
line: Bedford.

line: I got it. You are hereby ordered to appear before the Senate Armed Services Committee tomorrow morning at 9 am.
