line: Yep. [Starts engine] How far are we from D.C.?

name: Senator Stern
line: Mr Stark, could we pick up now where we left off? Mr Stark. Please.

line: [turns around from where he was trying to talk to Pepper who looks like she was trying to tell him off.] Yes dear?

line: Can I have your attention?

name: Stern
line: Do you or do you not possess a specialised weapon?

line: I do not. Well, it depends on how you define the word weapon.

name: Stern
line: The Iron Man weapon.

line: My device does not fit that description.

line: I would describe it by defining it as what it is, Senator.

name: Stern

line: Its a high-tech prosthesis. That is That is Thats actually the most apt description I can make of it.

line: Its a weapon. Its a weapon, Mr Stark.

line: Please, if your priority was actually the well-being of the American citizen

line: My priority is to get the Iron Man weapon turned over to the people of the United States of America.

name: Tony
line: Well, you can forget it. I am Iron Man. The suit and I are one. To turn over the Iron Man suit would be to turn over myself which is tantamount to indentured servitude or prostitution, depending or what state youre in. You cant have it.

line: Look, Im no expert

name: Tony
line: In prostitution? Of course not. Youre a senator. Come on.

name: Stern
line: Im no expert in weapons. We have somebody here who is an expert on weapons. Id now like to call Justin Hammer, our current primary weapons contractor.

name: Tony
line: Let the record reflect that I observed Mr Hammer entering the chamber, and I am wondering if and when any actual expert will also be in attendance.

name: Justin Hammer
line: Absolutely. Im no expert. I defer to you, Anthony. Youre the wonder boy. Senator, if I may. I may well not be an expert, but you know who was the expert? Your dad. Howard Stark. Really a father to us all, and to the military-industrial age. Lets just be clear, he was no flower child. He was a lion. We all know why were here. In the last six months, Anthony Stark has created a sword with untold possibilities. And yet, he insists its a shield. He asks us to trust him as we cower behind it. I wish I were comforted, Anthony, I really do. Id love to leave my door unlocked when I leave the house, but this aint Canada. You know, we live in a world of grave threats, threats that Mr Stark will not always be able to foresee. Thank you. God bless Iron Man. God bless America.

name: Stern
line: That is well said Mr Hammer. The committee would now like to invite Lieutenant Colonel James Rhodes to the chamber.

line: Personality overview. Mr Stark displays compulsive behaviour. In my own defence, that was last week. Prone to self-destructive tendencies. I was dying. I mean, please. Arent we all? Textbook narcissism? Agreed. Okay, here it is. Recruitment assessment for Avenger Initiative. Iron Man? Yes. I gotta think about it.

name: Fury
line: Read on.

name: Tony
line: Tony not Not recommended? That doesnt make any sense. How can you approve me but not approve me? I got a new ticker. Im trying to do right by Pepper. Im in a stable-ish relationship. [Fury walks round and rest against the table by Tonys chair]

name: Fury
line: Which leads us to believe at this juncture wed only like to use you as a consultant. [Tony stands and offers his hand. They shake]

name: Tony
line: [Clasping his other hand on top of Furys] You cant afford me. [Goes to leave, but turns around again] Then again, I will waive my customary retainer in exchange for a small favour. Rhodey and I are being honoured in Washington and we need a presenter.

name: Fury
line: Ill see what I can do.

name: Stern
line: It is my honour to be here today to present these distinguished awards to Lieutenant Colonel James Rhodes and Mr Tony, who is, of course, a national treasure. [Pinning on medals] Thank you Lieutenant Colonel, for such and exceptionally distinguished performance. You deserve this.

name: Rhodey
line: Thank you sir.

name: Stern
line: Mr Stark. Thank you for such as exceptionally distinguished performance. You deserve this. [Tony winces in pain] Oh, sorry. Funny how annoying a little prick can be, isnt it? Lets get a photo.

line: (to Maya.) Half hour till the ball drops.

name: Tony
line: Hey, do you want...?

name: Party Guest
line: Tony? Great speech, man!

line: I got you, pal.

name: Tony
line: I gave a speech? How was it?

name: Happy Hogan
line: Edifying

name: Maya Hansen
line: Unintelligible.

line: Mmm-hmm.

name: Tony
line: It's my favorite kind, a winning combo.

line: Where are we going?

name: Tony
line: Uh, to town on each other, probably back in your room. Cause I also wanna see your research.

line: Okay, you can see my research, but that's...I'm not gonna show you my "town."

name: Ho Yinsen
line: Mr. Stark

name: Tony
line: Oh, I finally met a man called "Ho."

name: Ho Yinsen
line: Mr. Stark.

name: Tony
line: Hey. (Dr. Wu greets Tony in mandarin as they shake hands.) You're a heart doctor. She's going to need a cardiologist after I... (Tony turns, starts blowing on his party horn & walks away with Maya.)

line: Bye.

name: Ho Yinsen
line: Perhaps another time.

line: Mr. Stark!

line: Oh, wow! Hey, Tony! Aldrich Killian. (Stuttering to Maya) I'm a big fan of your work!

name: Maya Hansen
line: My work?

name: Tony
line: Who isn't? He means me.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Well, of course. But, Miss Hansen, my organization has been tracking your research since year two of MIT.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Yeah, we're full.

name: Tony
line: Oh, wow. He made it. He made the cut.

name: Happy Hogan
line: What floor are you going to, pal?

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Oh, now, that is an appropriate question. The ground floor, actually. I've got a proposal I'm putting together with myself. It's a privately-funded think tank called, Advanced Idea Mechanics. [He holds out two business cards towards Tony and Maya]

name: Tony
line: Uh... she'll take both.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Okay. [takes the cards]

name: Tony
line: One to throw away and one to not call.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Advanced Idea Mechanics, or AIM for short. (Points to the logo on his shirt) Do you get it?

name: Tony
line: I see that, cause it's on your t-shirt.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Aw!

name: Tony
line: (to the party of women in the elevator; referring to Hogan as they walk out) Ladies, follow the mullet.(To Maya) Ladies first.

name: Maya Hansen
line: (to Aldrich as she walks out of the elevator) Thank you, I'll call you.

name: Tony
line: I'm titillated by the notion of working with you.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Yeah?

name: Tony
line: Yeah, cheese clown. I'll see you up on the roof in five minutes. [steps out of the elevator] I'm just going to try to get my beef wet real quick. You know what I'm talkin' about?

name: Aldrich Killian
line: I'll see you up there.

name: Tony
line: Damn betcha.

name: Tony
line: Come on! I thought that was just a theory.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Well, it was. If I'm right, we can access the area of the brain that governs repair...

name: Tony
line: Wow.

name: Maya Hansen
line: ...And chemically recode it.

name: Tony
line: That's incredible. Essentially you're hacking into the genetic...

name: Both
line: ...Genetic operating system...

name: Maya Hansen
line: Exactly.

name: Tony
line: ...living organism.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Yes.

name: Tony
line: Wow.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Is that... Can you...

name: Happy Hogan
line: What?

name: Maya Hansen
line: Can you not touch my plant? It's not...she doesn't like it. She prefers...

name: Tony
line: She's not like the others. (to Maya) Come on. Let's go in the bedroom. Happy...

name: Maya Hansen
line: That's cute, but...

name: Tony
line: Leave her ficus alone.

name: Maya Hansen
line: [turns to Hogan] Because... and, no, seriously don't. [walks into the bedroom]

name: Tony
line: And you're starting with plants?

name: Maya Hansen
line: For now, yeah.

name: Tony
line: Huh.

name: Maya Hansen
line: I'm calling it Extremis.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Well, it's...

name: Both
line: Human application.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Exactly! Exactly.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Dendritic revitalization.

name: Tony
line: It's revolutionary.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Disease prevention...

name: Tony
line: Changes the world.

name: Maya Hansen
line: ...even limb regrowth.

name: Tony
line: You're the most gifted woman I've ever met.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Wow.

name: Tony
line: In Switzerland.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Hmm, that's better. Aw, you're seeing things.

name: Tony
line: This week.

name: Tony
line: You almost bought it, didn't you?

name: Maya Hansen
line: This is what I'm talking about, the glitch.

name: Tony
line: Have you checked the telomerase algorithm?

name: Maya Hansen
line: The what?

name: Happy Hogan
line: Down! Stay down! Stay down, boss.

name: Tony
line: We're good.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Stay down.

name: Tony
line: You're...you're right on me. I made it. (Happy gets up) What the hell was that?

name: Happy Hogan
line: What was that?

name: Maya Hansen
line: It's a glitch in my work. It's...

name: Tony
line: She was just talking about it. Glitches happening.

name: Happy Hogan
line: It's not Y2K.

name: Maya Hansen
line: No.

name: Tony
line: Hey!

name: Happy Hogan
line: Happy New Year.

name: Tony
line: Happy New Year.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Happy New Year.

name: Tony
line: Alright, I'll see you in the morning, goodnight.

name: Happy Hogan
line: You good?

name: Tony
line: Yep.

name: Happy Hogan
line: I'll be right outside.

name: Tony
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: [voice over] So why am I telling you this? Because I had just created demons, and I didn't even know it.

name: Tony
line: [voice over] Yeah, those were the good times. Then I moved on. After a brief soiree in an Afghan cave, I said goodbye to the party scene. Forgot that night in Switzerland. These days I'm a changed man, I'm different now. I'm well... you know who I am.

name: Tony
line: Ow!

name: JARVIS
line: Sir, please may I request just a few hours to calibrate...

name: Tony
line: No. Forty-eight. [he injects himself] Ah! Micro-repeater implanting sequence complete.

name: JARVIS
line: As you wish, sir. I've also prepared a safety briefing for you to entirely ignore.

name: Tony
line: Which I will. Right, let's do this.

name: Tony
line: Dummy. Hi, Dummy. How did you get that cap on your head? You earned it.

name: Tony
line: Hey. Hey! What are you doing round in the corner? You know what you did. Blood on my mat, handle it.

name: JARVIS
line: Sir, may I remind you that you've been awake for nearly seventy-two hours.

name: Tony
line: Focus up, ladies. Good evening, and welcome to the birthing suite. I'm pleased to announce the imminent arrival of your bouncing, bad-ass, baby brother.

name: Tony
line: Start tight and go wide, stamp in time. Mark 42 autonomous prehensile propulsion suit test. Initialize sequence.

name: Tony
line: Jarvis, drop my needle.

name: Tony
line: Crap.

name: Tony
line: Alright, I think we got this. Send 'em all.

name: Tony
line: Probably a little fast, slow it down. Slow it down just a...

name: Tony
line: ...little bit.

name: Tony
line: Cool it, will you, Jarvis?

name: Tony
line: Come on. I ain't scared of you.

name: Tony
line: I'm the best.

name: JARVIS
line: As always, sir, a great pleasure watching you work.

name: Tony
line: [voice over] And I guess seventy-two hours isn't a long time between siesta's. Didn't think it could get any worse. Then I had to go and turn on the TV.

name: Tony
line: [voice over] That's when he happened.

name: The Mandarin
line: Some people call me a terrorist, I consider myself a teacher. America, ready for another lesson. In 1864 in Sand Creek Colorado the U.S. military waited till the friendly Cheyenne braves all gone hunting, waited to attack and slaughter their families left behind, and claim their land. Thirty-nine hours ago the Ali Al Salem Air Base in Kuwait was attacked. I...I...I did that. A quaint military church filled with wives and children, of course. The soldiers were out on maneuvers, the braves were away. President Ellis, you continue to resist my attempts to educate you, sir. And now, you've missed me again. You know who I am, you don't know where I am, and you'll never see me coming.

name: President Ellis
line: Central to my Administration's response to this terrorist event, is a newly minted resource. I know him as Colonel James Rhodes, the American people will soon know him as the Iron Patriot.

name: Bill Maher
line: And how is President Ellis responding? By taking the guy they call War Machine and giving him a paint job.

name: Joan Rivers
line: Same suit, but painted red, white, and blue. Look at rhat. And they also renamed him Iron Patriot. You know, just in case the paint was too subtle.

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: It tested well with focus groups, alright?

name: Tony
line: [putting on a mocking voice] I am Iron Patriot...

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: Listen, War Machine was a little too aggressive, alright? This sends a better message.

name: Tony
line: So what's really goin' on? With Mandarin. Seriously, can we talk about this guy?

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: It's classified information, Tony. Okay, there have been nine bombings.

name: Tony
line: Nine.

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: The public only knows about three. Here's the thing, nobody can ID a device. There's no bomb casings.

name: Tony
line: You know I can help, just ask. I got a ton of new tech, I got a prehensile, I got a...I got a new bomb disposal. Catches explosions mid-air.

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: When's the last time you got a good night's sleep?

name: Tony
line: Einstein slept three hours a year. Look what he did?

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: People are concerned about you, Tony. I'm concerned about you.

name: Tony
line: You're gonna come at me like that?

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: No. No, look, I'm not trying to be a dic...

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: ...tator.

name: Erin
line: Do you mind signing my drawing?

name: Tony
line: If Richard doesn't mind. [to Rhodes] You alright with this, Dick?

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: Fine with me.

name: Tony
line: [To the girl] What's your name?

name: Erin
line: Erin.

name: Tony
line: I loved you in A Christmas Story, by the way.

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: Listen, the Pentagon is scared. After what happened in New York... aliens, come on. They need to look strong. Stopping the Mandarin is priority, but it's not...

name: Tony
line: It's not superhero business, I get it.

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: No, it's not, quite frankly. It's American business.

name: Tony
line: That's why I said I...got it.

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: Are you okay?

name: Tony
line: I broke the crayon.

name: Erin
line: Are you okay, Mr. Stark?

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: Take it easy. Tony...

name: Little Boy
line: [the little boy whispers to Tony] How did you get out of the wormhole? How did you get out of the wormhole?

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: Wait a minute! Tony!

name: Tony
line: What'd he say?!

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: Tony!

name: Tony
line: Sorry. Have to check on the suit...make sure...okay.

name: Tony
line: Check the heart, check the...check the...is it the brain?

name: JARVIS
line: No sign of cardiac analomy or unusual brain activity.

name: Tony
line: Okay, so I was poisoned?

name: Jarvis
line: My diagnosis is that you've experienced a severe anxiety attack.

name: Tony
line: Me?

name: Colonel James Rhodes
line: Come on, man. This isn't a good look, open up.

name: Tony
line: Sorry, I gotta split.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Badge. Badge. Come on, badge. Badge, guys. I put a memo in the toilet, come on. [referring to Tony's robots as Hogan meets with Pepper] Tony has got them in his basement, they're wearing party hats. This is an asset that we can put to use.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Uh-huh. So, you're suggesting that I replace the entire janitorial staff with robots?

name: Happy Hogan
line: What I'm saying is that the human element of Human Resources is our biggest point of vulnerability. We should start phasing it out immediately.

name: Pepper Potts
line: What!?

name: Happy Hogan
line: [to another employee as Hogan walks past them] Excuse me, Bambi.

name: Pepper Potts
line: [Hogan points to his badge] Did you just say that?

name: Happy Hogan
line: Security.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Happy?

name: Happy Hogan
line: Yes.

line: Okay, I am thrilled that you're now the Head of Security, okay? It is the perfect position for you.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Thank you.

name: Pepper Potts
line: However...

name: Happy Hogan
line: I do appreciate it

name: Pepper Potts
line: Since you've taken the post...

name: Happy Hogan
line: You don't have to thank me.

name: Pepper Potts
line: We've had a rise in staff complaints of three hundred percent

name: Happy Hogan
line: Thank you.

name: Pepper Potts
line: That's not a compliment.

name: Happy Hogan
line: That's not a compli...? It is a compliment! Clearly somebody's trying to hide something.

name: s Assistant
line: Excuse me.

line: Yes?

line: Miss Potts, your four o'clock is here.

line: Thank you.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Did you clear this four o'clock with me?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Happy, we'll talk about this later. But right now I have to go deal with this very annoying thing.

name: Happy Hogan
line: How so?

name: Pepper Potts
line: I used to work with him, and he used to ask me out all the time. So it's a little awkward.

name: Happy Hogan
line: I don't like the sound of that.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Pepper.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Killian?

name: Aldrich Killian
line: You look great. You look really great.

name: Pepper Potts
line: God, you look...you look great. I... I...I can't... What on earth have you been doing?

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Nothing fancy, just five years in the hands of physical therapists. And please, call me Aldrich.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Uh...you were supposed to be issued a security badge.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Happy, it's okay.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Yes?

name: Pepper Potts
line: We're good.

name: Happy Hogan
line: You sure?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yes. Stand down.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Okay. I'm gonna linger, right here.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Thank you.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Okay.

name: Pepper Potts
line: It's very nice to see you, Killian.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Hey, guy.

name: Savin
line: Merry Christmas.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: After years dodging the President's ban on "immoral biotech research", my think tank now has a little something in the pipeline. It's an idea we like to call Extremis. I'm gonna turn your lights down.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Regard the human brain.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Uh...wait. Hold on, hold on. That's...that's the universe, my bad. But if I do that...

name: Aldrich Killian
line: That's the brain. Strangely mimetic though, wouldn't you say?

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Thanks, it's mine.

name: Pepper Potts
line: What?

name: Aldrich Killian
line: This...you're inside my head. It's a...

name: Aldrich Killian
line: It's a live feed. Come on up, I'll prove it to you.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Come on.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Now, pinch my arm. I can take it. Pinch me.

name: Pepper Potts
line: What is that?

name: Aldrich Killian
line: It's the primary somatosensory cortex. It's the brain's pain center. But this is what I wanted to show you.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Now, Extremis harnesses our bioelectrical potential and it goes...here. This is essentially an empty slot, and what this tells us is that our mind, our entire DNA in fact, is destined to be upgraded.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Wow.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Hello?

name: Tony
line: Is this forehead of Security?

name: Happy Hogan
line: What? You know, look, I got a real job. What do you want? I'm working, I got something going on here.

name: Tony
line: What? Harassing interns?

name: Happy Hogan
line: Let me tell you something, you know what happened when I told people I was Iron Man's body guard? They would laugh in my face.

name: Happy Hogan
line: I had to leave while I still had a shred of dignity. Now I got a real job, I'm watching Pepper.

name: Tony
line: What's going on? Fill me in.

name: Happy Hogan
line: For real?

name: Tony
line: Yeah.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Alright, so she's meeting up with this scientist. Rich guy, handsome.

name: Tony
line: Right.

name: Happy Hogan
line: I couldn't make his face at first, right? You know I'm good with faces.

name: Tony
line: Oh, Yeah, yeah. You're the best.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Yeah. Well, so I run his credentials, I make him Aldrich Killian. We actually met the guy back in... where were we in '99? The science conference?

name: Tony
line: Um...Switzerland.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Right, right, exactly.

name: Tony
line: Killian? No, I don't remember that guy.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Of course you don't. He's not a blond with a big rack. At first it was fine, they were talking business, but now it's like getting weird. He's showing her a big brain.

name: Tony
line: His what?

name: Happy Hogan
line: Big brain, and she likes it. Here, let me show you. Hold on. See? [he holds his tablet up and points it towards Pepper's glass office, where Aldrich and Pepper are standing close together on the coffee table watching the 3d image of the brain, but all Tony sees is Hogan pointing the tablet camera at himself]

name: Tony
line: Look at what? You watching them? Flip the screen and then we can get started.

name: Happy Hogan
line: I'm not a tech genius like you. Just...just trust me, get down down here.

name: Tony
line: Flip the screen, then I can see what they're doing.

name: Happy Hogan
line: I can't! I don't know how to flip the screen! Don't talk to me like that anymore. You're not my boss.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Alright, I don't work for you. Now I don't trust this guy. He's got another guy with him, he's shifty.

name: Tony
line: Relax.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Seriously?

name: Tony
line: I'm just asking you to secure the perimeter. Tell him to go out for a drink or something?

name: Happy Hogan
line: You know what? You should take more of an interest in what's going on here. This woman... this woman's the best thing that ever happened to you, and you...you're just ignoring her.

name: Tony
line: A giant brain?

name: Happy Hogan
line: Yeah, there's a giant brain, there's a shifty character. I'm gonna follow this guy. I'm gonna run his plates and if it gets rough, so be it.

name: Tony
line: I miss you, Happy.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Yeah, I miss you too. But the way it used to be. Now you're off with the 'superfriends', I don't know what's going on with you anymore. The world's getting weird...

name: Tony
line: Hey, I...I'd hate to cut you off. Do you have your taser on you?

name: Happy Hogan
line: Why?

name: Tony
line: I think there's a gal in HR who's trying to steal some printer ink, you should probably go over there and zap her.

name: Happy Hogan
line: Yeah, nice.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Imagine if you could hack into the hard drive of any living organism and recode its DNA.

name: Pepper Potts
line: It would be incredible.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Mm.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Unfortunately, to my ears it also sounds highly weaponizable. As in enhanced soldiers, private armies, and Tony is not...

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Tony. Tony. You know, I invited Tony to join AIM thirteen years ago, he turned me down. But something tells me now there is a new genius on the throne who doesn't have to answer to Tony anymore, and who has slightly less of an ego.

name: Pepper Potts
line: It's gonna be a no, Aldrich. As much as I'd like to help you.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Well, I can't say that I'm not disappointed. But then as my father used to say, 'Failure is the fog through which we glimpse triumph.'

name: Pepper Potts
line: That's very deep.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Mm

name: Pepper Potts
line: And I have no idea what it means.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Well, me neither. He was kind of an idiot, my old man.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: I'm sure I'll see you again, Pepper.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Happy...

name: Happy Hogan
line: The car is ready, if you're ready to go.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yes. I just um... God, I forgot my... other thing, so... I'm just gonna...

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'm sorry I'm late. I was... What the...? What is that?!

name: Pepper Potts
line: You're wearing this in the house now? What is that, like Mark 15?

name: Tony
line: Uh...yeah. Something like that. You know everybody needs a hobby.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Oh, and you have to wear your hobby in the living room?

name: Tony
line: Just breakin' it in. You know, it's always a little pinchy in the gooey bag at first, so.

name: Tony
line: Oh hey, did you see your Christmas present?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yes, I did. I...I don't know how I could have missed that Christmas present. Is it gonna fit through the door?

name: Tony
line: Well actually, uh...it's a good question. I got a team of guys comin' tomorrow, they're gonna blow out that wall.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: So, uh...tense? Good day?

name: Tony
line: Ooh shoulders, a little knotty. Naughty girl. I don't wanna harp on this, but did you like the custom rabbit?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Did I like it?

name: Tony
line: Nailed it, right?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Wow. I appreciate the thought very much.

name: Pepper Potts
line: So why don't you lift up that face mask and give me a kiss?

name: Tony
line: Huh. Yup, dammit. No can do. You wanna just kiss it on the...

name: Pepper Potts
line: Uh-huh.

name: Tony
line: The facial slit?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Well, why don't I run down to the garage and see if I can't find a crowbar to shimmy that thing open?

name: Tony
line: Crowbar. Yeah.

name: Tony
line: Oh, except there's been a...uh...a radiation leak.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'll take my chances.

name: Tony
line: That's risky.

name: Tony
line: At least let me get you like a Hazmat suit or a Geiger counter or something like that.

name: Tony
line: Busted.

name: Pepper Potts
line: This is a new level of lame.

name: Tony
line: Sorry.

name: Pepper Potts
line: You ate without me, already? On date night?

name: Tony
line: [referring to Mark 42 suit] He was just...

name: Pepper Potts
line: You mean you?

name: Tony
line: Well, yeah. I just mean we were just...just hosting you while I finished up a little work.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Uh-huh.

name: Tony
line: And yes, I had a quick bite. I didn't know if you were comin' home or if you were having drinks with Aldrich Killian.

name: Pepper Potts
line: What?

name: Tony
line: What?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Aldrich Killian? What are you checking up on me?

name: Tony
line: Happy was concerned.

name: Pepper Potts
line: No, you're spying on me.

name: Tony
line: I wasn't...

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'm going to bed.

name: Tony
line: Hold on. Come on. Pep.

name: Tony
line: Hey, I admit it! My fault. Sorry.

name: Tony
line: I'm a piping hot mess. It's been going on for a while, I haven't said anything.

name: Tony
line: Nothing's been the same since New York.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Oh really? Well, I didn't notice that, at all.

name: Tony
line: You experience things and then they're over and you still can't explain 'em. Gods, aliens, other dimensions. I...I'm just a man in a can. The only reason I haven't cracked up is probably because you moved in. Which is great. I love you, I'm lucky. But, honey, I can't sleep. You go to bed, I come down here. I do what I know, I tinker.

name: Tony
line: But threat is imminent, and I have to protect the one thing that I can't live without. That's you. My suits, they're uh...

name: Pepper Potts
line: Machines.

name: Tony
line: They're part of me.

name: Pepper Potts
line: A distraction.

name: Tony
line: Maybe.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'm gonna take a shower.

name: Tony
line: Okay.

name: Pepper Potts
line: And you're gonna join me.

name: Tony
line: Better.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony! Tony! Tony! Tony...

name: Tony
line: Power down!

name: Tony
line: I must have called it in my sleep. That's not supposed to happen. I'll recalibrate the sensors. Can we just...just let me...just let me catch my breath, okay?

name: Tony
line: Don't go, alright? Pepper?

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'm going to sleep downstairs. Tinker with that.

name: Savin
line: Can you regulate?

name: Taggert
line: Yes, I can regulate.

name: Savin
line: Are you sure about that?

name: Taggert
line: Yes.

name: Savin
line: It's a decent batch. Don't say I never did nothin' for you.

name: Taggert
line: Thank you...I mean for understanding.

name: Happy Hogan
line: I'm sorry, buddy.

name: Savin
line: What are you doin', buddy? You out by yourself? A little date night? Watching your favorite chick flick maybe?

name: Happy Hogan
line: Yeah, a little movie called "The Party's Over", starring you and your junkie girlfriend, and here's the ticket. [Hogan shows him what he took from Taggert's suitcase]

name: Savin
line: No kidding? That doesn't belong to you. [Savin goes to take the item from Hogan's hand, but Hogan punches Savin in the face twice, Hogan notices Savin's face glow red and heal, then Savin grabs hold of Hogan and with super strength throws him aside, as Savin walks towards Hogan, Taggert begins to glow red and turn super hot]

name: Taggert
line: Savin!

name: Savin
line: What?

name: Taggert
line: Help! Help me! [Taggert suddenly explodes, causing a massive explosion inside the theater which wounds Hogan, as he lies injured, Hogan sees Savin, also glowing red and then healing and walking off as if nothing has happened]

name: The Mandarin
line: True story about fortune cookies. They look Chinese, they sound Chinese, but they're actually an American invention. Which is why they're hollow, full of lies, and leave a bad taste in the mouth. My disciples just destroyed another cheap American knock-off, The Chinese Theater. Mr. President, I know this must be getting frustrating, but this season of terror is drawing to a close. And don't worry, the big one is coming; your graduation.

name: Tony
line: Hi.

name: s Nurse
line: Oh.

name: Tony
line: [referring to the TV] Uh...mind leaving that on?

name: s Nurse
line: Sure. [Tony rises from his seat]

name: Tony
line: Sunday night's PBS 'Downtown Abbey'. That's his show, he thinks it's elegant. [he pauses for a moment] One more thing...make sure everyone wears their badges. He's a stickler for that sort of thing, plus my guys won't let anyone in without them. [Tony turns to leave]

name: Hospital News Reporter
line: We're awaiting the arrival of Tony. We're hoping he'll give us the reaction...his reaction to the latest attack. [Tony walks out and all the reporters swarm toward him] Mr. Stark! Mr. Stark! Our sources are telling us that this is another Mandarin attack. Anything else you can tell us? [Tony ignores the questions and walks toward his car]

name: Pushy Tabloid Reporter
line: Hey, Mr. Stark! When is somebody gonna kill this guy? Just sayin'. [Tony turns to face the reporter]

name: Tony
line: Is that what you want? Here's a little Holiday greeting I've been wanting to send to the Mandarin. I just didn't know how to phrase it until now. My name is Tony and I'm not afraid of you. I know you're a coward, so I've decided [He removes his sunglasses and stares into the phone's camera] that you just died, pal. I'm gonna come get the body. There's no politics here; it's just good old-fashioned revenge. There's no Pentagon; it's just you and me. And on the off-chance you're a man, here's my home address: 10-8-80, Malibu Point, 9-0-2-6-5. I'll leave the door unlocked. [to the reporter] That's what you wanted, right? [He takes the phone and throws it at a wall] Bill me. [Tony gets in his car and drives off]

name: JARVIS
line: I've compiled a Mandarin database for you, sir. Drawn from S.H.I.E.L.D., F.B.I., and C.I.A. intercepts. Initiating virtual crime scene reconstruction. [Tony starts looking at all the data gathered]

name: Tony
line: Okay, what do we got here? His name is an ancient Chinese war mantle, meaning "adviser to the King". South American insurgency tactics, talks like a Baptist preacher. There's lots of pageantry going on here...lots of theater. [Tony pushes the virtual information down to close] Close. [Tony looks at the virtual crime scene reconstruction]

name: JARVIS
line: The heat from the blast was in excess of 3000 degrees Celsius. Any subjects within 12.5 yards were vaporized instantly.

name: Tony
line: No bomb parts found in a three mile radius of the Chinese theater.

name: JARVIS
line: No, sir.

name: Tony
line: Talk to me, Happy. [in the virtual reconstruction, Tony sees Hogan pointing his finger at some dog tags] When is a bomb not a bomb? [Tony picks up the virtual image of the dog tags to investigate them further] When is a bomb not a bomb? [Tony picks up the virtual image of the dog tags to investigate them further] Any military victims?

name: JARVIS
line: Not according to public records, sir.

name: Tony
line: Bring up the thermogenic signatures again, factor in three thousand degrees.

name: JARVIS
line: The oracle cloud has completed analysis. Accessing satellites and plotting the last twelve months of thermogenic occurrence now.

name: Tony
line: Take away everywhere that there's been a Mandarin attack. [Tony looks at the information popping up] Nope. [he sees an attack in Rose Hill, Tennessee] That. You sure that's not one of his?

name: JARVIS
line: It predates any known Mandarin attack. The incident was the use of a bomb to assist a suicide.

name: Tony
line: Bring her around.

name: JARVIS
line: The heat signature is remarkably similar. Three thousand degrees Celsius. [Tony looks at all the information being presented on the Tennessee attack]

name: Tony
line: That's two military guys. Ever been to Tennessee, Jarvis?

name: JARVIS
line: Creating a flight plan for Tennessee. [as Tony is about to get ready to leave for Tennessee, he hears his door bell ring]

name: Tony
line: Are we still at "ding-dong"? We're supposed to be on total security lock down. Come on, I threatened a terrorist. Who is that?

name: JARVIS
line: There's only so much I can do, sir, when you give the world's press your home address. [we see Maya standing outside Tony's house, the glass doors are opened and she enters]

name: Tony
line: Right there's fine. [Tony dressed in his Iron Man suit walks toward her] You're not the Mandarin, are you? Are you?

name: Maya Hansen
line: You don't remember. Why am I not surprised?

name: Tony
line: Don't take it personally, I don't remember what I had for breakfast.

name: JARVIS
line: Gluten-free waffles, sir.

name: Tony
line: That's right.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Okay, look, I need to be alone with you. Someplace not here, it's urgent.

name: Tony
line: Normally, I'd go for that sort of thing, but now I'm in a committed relationship. [as he turns to walk into the living room, two bags are thrown down from the above balcony] It's...with her.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony, is somebody there? [Tony steps out of his suit]

name: Tony
line: Yeah, it's Maya Hansen. [Maya smiles] Old botanist pal that I used to know, barely. [as Pepper starts walking downstairs, Tony moves towards Maya and speaks quietly] Please don't tell me that there is a twelve year-old kid waiting in the car that I've never met.

name: Maya Hansen
line: He's thirteen. And no, I need your help.

name: Tony
line: What...what for? Why now?

name: Maya Hansen
line: Because I read the papers, and, frankly, I don't think you'll last the week.

name: Tony
line: I'll be fine.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'm sorry. With Happy in the hospital, I didn't know we were expecting guests.

name: Tony
line: We weren't.

name: Maya Hansen
line: No, I...

name: Pepper Potts
line: And old girlfriends!

name: Tony
line: She's not really.

name: Maya Hansen
line: No, not really. It...it was just one night.

name: Tony
line: Yep.

name: Pepper Potts
line: That's how you did it, isn't it? Yep.

name: Tony
line: It was a great night.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Well, you know...

name: Maya Hansen
line: Yeah.

name: Pepper Potts
line: You have saved yourself a world of pain.

name: Maya Hansen
line: I'm sure.

name: Tony
line: What?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Trust me. [to Tony] We're going out of town.

name: Tony
line: Okay, we've been through this. Nope.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yep!

name: Tony
line: The man says no.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Immediately and indefinitely!

name: Tony
line: Honey...

name: Maya Hansen
line: Great idea. Let's go.

name: Tony
line: I'm sorry. That's a terrible idea. Please don't touch her bags.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony, this is how normal people behave.

name: Tony
line: I can't protect you out there. I challenged... [Maya notices giant stuffed rabbit Tony had bought for Pepper]

name: Maya Hansen
line: Is...is that normal?

name: Tony
line: Yes, this is normal!

name: Pepper Potts
line: Sadly, that...is very normal.

name: Tony
line: It's a big bunny, relax about it!

name: Pepper Potts
line: Calm down!

name: Tony
line: I got this for you.

name: Pepper Potts
line: I'm aware of that.

name: Tony
line: You still haven't even told me that you liked it!

name: Pepper Potts
line: I don't like it!

name: Tony
line: I asked you three... You don't like it?! [as Tony and Pepper are bickering, Maya notices on the TV that helicopters are coming toward Tony's home]

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony, we are leaving the house; that's not even up for discussion.

name: Tony
line: I said no.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Guys, can we um...

name: Tony
line: What?

name: Maya Hansen
line: [she points to the bomb heading straight for the house] Do we need to worry about that? [The house is suddenly hit, as everything explodes around them, Tony manages to get his Iron Man suit onto Pepper to protect her from the fall, Tony looks over to Maya, who's lying unconscious on the ground, as the ceiling is about to fall on Tony, Pepper saves him with the Iron Man suit]

name: Pepper Potts
line: I got you.

name: Tony
line: I got you first. Like I said, we can't stay here. [the helicopters starts shooting at the house] Move! I'm right behind! [as they run to get out, the floor between Pepper and Tony collapses] Get her, I'm gonna find a way around. [Pepper hesitates] Stop stopping! Get her, get outside! Go! [Pepper manages to grab Maya and use the Iron Man suit to get them safely out of the house, but the house gets further destroyed as the helicopters continue to fire on it]

name: Pepper Potts
line: Oh my God. Tony! [back inside as the house is being destroyed around Tony]

name: JARVIS
line: Sir, Miss Potts is clear of the structure. [Tony motions for his Iron Man suit to come off Pepper and onto him]

name: Tony
line: Jarvis, where's my flight power?!

name: JARVIS
line: Working on it, sir. This is a prototype. [Tony manages to fire a piano at a helicopter to destroy it]

name: Tony
line: That's one.

name: JARVIS
line: Sir, the suit is not combat-ready. [Tony manages to get away from the bullets being fired at him from one of the remaining helicopters and again uses his suit to bring down the helicopter]

name: Tony
line: That's two. [as the helicopter explodes it crashes into the house, the remaining helicopter continues on shooting at the house, finally the remains of house with Tony inside fall into the ocean, Pepper runs to the edge of the cliff and looks down into the ocean. In the water, Tony starts to feel like he's drowning]

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony!

name: JARVIS
line: Sir, take a deep breath. [after a few moments Tony's suit gets its flight power activated by Jarvis] Flight power restored. [finally Tony manages to fly out of the ocean.]

name: JARVIS
line: Sir. Sir!

name: Tony
line: Alright, kill the alarm. I got it.

name: JARVIS
line: That's the emergency alert triggered by the power dropping below five percent. [Tony notices that he's flying through the snow at night, he falls and crashes into the ground in the middle of a forest, he takes off his face helmet as he lies on the ground catching his breath]

name: Tony
line: It's snowing, right? Where are we, upstate?

name: JARVIS
line: We're five miles outside of Rose Hills, Tennessee.

name: Tony
line: Why?! Jarvis! Not my idea! What are we doing here? This is thousands of miles away, I gotta get Pepper, I gotta...

name: JARVIS
line: I prepared a flight plan. This was the location.

name: Tony
line: Who asked you? Open the suit.

name: JARVIS
line: I...I think I may be malfunctioning, sir.

name: Tony
line: Open eject. [the suit gets off Tony and he sits up] That's brisk! [as Tony starts to feel the cold weather.] Maybe I'll just cozy back up for a bit.

name: JARVIS
line: I actually think I need to sleep now, sir. [the suit loses power]

name: Tony
line: Jarvis. Jarvis? Don't leave me, buddy. [Tony drags the suit to a petrol station and makes a call to Pepper]

name: Computer Voice
line: Stark Secure Server: Now transferring to all known receivers.

name: Tony
line: Pepper, it's me. I've got a lot of apologies to make and not a lot of time. So first off, I'm so sorry I put you in harm's way. That was selfish and stupid and it won't happen again. Also, it's Christmas time, the rabbit's too big. Done. Sorry. And I'm sorry in advance because...I can't come home yet. I need to find this guy. You gotta stay safe. That's all I know. I just stole a poncho from a wooden Indian. [Tony drags the suit to an abandoned looking farmhouse, he places the suit on a couch and sits next to it] Let's get you comfy. [he places its hand by its side] You happy now? [as Tony tries to fix the micro-repeater implants in his arm, a boy stands by the doorway and points his toy gun at Tony]

name: Harley Keener
line: Freeze! Don't move.

name: Tony
line: You got me. Nice potato gun. Barrel's a little long. Between that and the wide gauge, it's gonna diminish your FPS. [the boy points his gun at a glass on a shelf and shoots at it, breaking the glass] And now you're out of ammo.

name: Harley Keener
line: What's that thing on your chest?

name: Tony
line: It's a electromagnet. You should know, you've got a box of them right here.

name: Harley Keener
line: What does it power? [Tony stands and points the desk light at his suit sitting on the couch behind him] Oh my God! [Harley drops his toy gun and takes a step towards Tony] Oh my god! That... that's... Is that Iron Man?

name: Tony
line: Technically, I am.

name: Harley Keener
line: Technically, you're dead. [he give Tony a newspaper which has Tony's picture with the headline 'Mandarin Attack: Stark presumed dead']

name: Tony
line: A valid point.

name: Harley Keener
line: [referring to the suit as he sits next to it on the couch checking it out] What happened to him?

name: Tony
line: Life. I built him, I take care of him, I'll fix him.

name: Harley Keener
line: Like a mechanic?

name: Tony
line: Yeah.

name: Harley Keener
line: Oh. If I was building Iron Man and War Machine.

name: Tony
line: [Interupting Harley] It's Iron Patriot now.

name: Harley Keener
line: That's way cooler!

name: Tony
line: No, it's not.

name: Harley Keener
line: Anyways, I would have added in um... the retro...

name: Tony
line: Retroreflective panels?

name: Harley Keener
line: To make him stealth mode.

name: Tony
line: You want a stealth mode?

name: Harley Keener
line: Cool, right?

name: Tony
line: That's actually a good idea. Maybe I'll build one.

name: Harley Keener
line: [as he touches the suit, Harley accidentally snaps off one of its fingers] Oops!

name: Tony
line: Not a good idea! What are you doing? You're gonna break his finger? He's in pain, he's been injured. Leave him alone.

name: Harley Keener
line: S...Sorry.

name: Tony
line: Are you? Don't worry about it, I'll fix it. So, uh, who's home?

name: Harley Keener
line: Well, my mom already left for the diner and dad went to 7-Eleven to get scratchers. I... I guess he won, 'cause that was six years ago.

name: Tony
line: Mm. Which happens, dads leave. No need to be a pussy about it. Here's what I need: a laptop, a digital watch, a cell phone, the pneumatic actuator from your bazooka over there, a map of town, a big spring, and a tuna fish sandwich.

name: Harley Keener
line: What's in it for me?

name: Tony
line: Salvation. What's his name?

name: Harley Keener
line: Who?

name: Tony
line: The kid that bullies you at school, what's his name?

name: Harley Keener
line: How'd you know that?

name: Tony
line: I got just the thing. [he opens a compartment on the suit and takes out a metal object] This is a pinata for a cricket. I'm kidding, it's a very powerful weapon. Point it away from your face, press the button on top. It discourages bullying. Non-lethal, just to cover one's ass. [Harley reaches out to take it, but Tony pulls his hand away] Deal? Deal? What'd you say?

name: Harley Keener
line: Deal.

name: Tony
line: Deal? [Tony gives the object to Harley] What's you're name?

name: Harley Keener
line: Harley. And you're...

name: Tony
line: The mechanic. Tony [Tony looks at Harley for a moment] You know what keeps going through my head? Where's my sandwich? [back at Tony's house, which is now surrounded by emergency rescue and news reporters, Pepper stands alone and looks out across the ocean. She sees one of Tony's shattered Iron Man helmets and pulls it towards her, her forehead resting against the helmet's. She sees a red flashing light inside the helmet and as she puts the helmet on she receives the message Tony had left her earlier]

name: Computer Voice
line: Stark Secure Server. Retinal scan: Verified.

name: Tony
line: Pepper, it's me. [Pepper gasps and smiles] I've got a lot of apologies to make and not a lot of time. So first off, I'm so sorry I put you in harm's way. That was selfish and stupid and it won't happen again.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Why were you at the house tonight? What was so important that you had to speak to Tony?

name: Maya Hansen
line: [A beat] I think that my boss is working for the Mandarin. So if you still want to talk about it, I suggest that we get ourselves someplace safe.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Your boss works for the Mandarin, you think? But Tony says you're a botanist, so...

name: Maya Hansen
line: That figures. What I actually am is a biological DNA coder running a team of forty out of a privately-funded think tank, but sure you can call me a botanist.

name: Pepper Potts
line: This boss of yours, does he have a name?

name: Maya Hansen
line: Yeah, Aldrich Killian. [Pepper looks at her in shock]

name: Savin
line: Well, we took the house down, sir...

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Mmhmm.

name: Savin
line: But there's no sign of a body.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: I see.

name: Savin
line: No Stark.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: I have to go. [Aldrich rises from his seat walks towards another room] The Master is about to record and he's a little... Well, you know how he gets. Keep your appointment tonight and call me when it's done. [Aldrich walks into a room which has been set up as a set with all of Mandarin's props in place and camera crew ready to record Mandarin's message] Alright everybody. No talking and no eye contact, unless you wanna get shot in the face.

name: Out
line: The Master is travelling. [the Mandarin arrives on set and takes a sit, he looks at Aldrich]

name: The Mandarin
line: Well then. What are we waiting for?

name: Tony
line: The sandwich was fair, the spring was a little rusty, the rest of the materials, I'll make do. By the way, when you said your sister had a watch, I was kinda hoping for something a little more than that. [he pulls his sleeve up and we see he's wearing a little girl's pink watch, Harley laughs]

name: Harley Keener
line: She's six! Anyway, it's limited edition. When can we talk about New York?

name: Tony
line: Maybe never, relax about it.

name: Harley Keener
line: What about The Avengers, can you talk about them?

name: Tony
line: I don't know, later. Hey kid, give me a little space. [they stop and Tony looks at the remains of the local explosion site that Tony came to investigate] What's the official story here? What happened?

name: Harley Keener
line: I guess this guy named Chad Davis, used to live roundabouts, won a bunch of medals in the army. One day, folks said he went crazy and made, you know, a bomb. Then he blew himself up right here. [Tony looks around at the remains]

name: Tony
line: Six people died, right?

name: Harley Keener
line: Yeah.

name: Tony
line: Including Chad Davis?

name: Harley Keener
line: Yeah. [Tony keeps looking around at the remains of the explosion site]

name: Tony
line: Yeah. That doesn't make sense. [he sits next to Harley] Think about it. Six dead, only five shadows.

name: Harley Keener
line: Yeah, people said these shadows are like the mark of souls gone to Heaven. Except the bomb guy, he went to Hell on account of he didn't get a shadow. That's why there's only five.

name: Tony
line: Do you buy that?

name: Harley Keener
line: That's what everyone says. You know what this crater reminds me of?

name: Tony
line: No idea. I'm not...I don't care.

name: Harley Keener
line: That giant wormhole, in um...in New York. Does it remind you?

name: Tony
line: That's manipulative. I don't want to talk about it.

name: Harley Keener
line: Are they coming back? The aliens?

name: Tony
line: Maybe. Can you stop? Remember when I told you, that I have an anxiety issue?

name: Harley Keener
line: Does this subject make you...make you edgy?

name: Tony
line: Yeah, a little bit. Can I just catch my breath for a second?

name: Harley Keener
line: Are there bad guys in Rose Hills? Do you...do you need a plastic bag to breathe into? Do you have medication?

name: Tony
line: Nope.

name: Harley Keener
line: Do you need to be on it?

name: Tony
line: Probably.

name: Harley Keener
line: Do you have PTSD?

name: Tony
line: I don't think so.

name: Harley Keener
line: Are you...are you going completely mental? I can stop, do you want me to stop? Do you want me to stop?

name: Tony
line: Remember when I said to stop doing that? I swear to God, you're going to freak me out! [Tony, looking agitated, suddenly rises] Ah man, you did it, didn't you? You happy now?

name: Harley Keener
line: What did I say? [Tony starts running off and Harley runs after him] Hey, wait up! Wait, wait. [Tony stops running and Harley catches up with him] What the hell was that? [Tony holds his face in his hands for a moment and then throws some snow at Harley]

name: Tony
line: Your fault, you spazzed me out. Okay, back to business. Where were we? The guy who died...relatives? Mom? Mrs. Davis, where is she?

name: Harley Keener
line: Where she always is.

name: Tony
line: See, now you're being helpful. [later we see Tony walking towards a bar and he bumps into a woman] Sorry. [the woman drops something] Lady, this uh... [he picks up the item and hands it back to the woman]

name: Brandt
line: Thank you. [Tony notices the woman has burn marks on one side of her face]

name: Tony
line: Nice haircut, suits you.

name: Brandt
line: Nice watch.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, limited edition.

name: Brandt
line: Oh, I don't doubt it. [there's a moment's pause] Well, have a good evening. [the woman turns and walks off] [Tony enters the bar and walks up to Mrs. Davis, who's sat at table drinking alone]

name: Tony
line: Mrs. Davis, mind if I join you?

name: Davis
line: Free country.

name: Tony
line: It sure is. [Tony sits next to her, Mrs. Davis looks at Tony for a moment]

name: Davis
line: Alright. Where'd you like to start?

name: Tony
line: I just want to say I'm sorry about your loss. I want to know what you think happened.

name: Davis
line: Look, I brought your damn file. You take it and go. [she drops the file in front of him] Whatever was in here, he wanted no part of it. [Tony opens the file]

name: Tony
line: Clearly, you're waiting for someone else. Yeah? Supposed to meet somebody here?

name: Davis
line: Yeah. [Tony looks at the file again and notices a photo of Taggart next to the photo of Chad]

name: Tony
line: Mrs. Davis, your son didn't kill himself, I guarantee you. He didn't kill anyone. Someone used him.

name: Davis
line: What?

name: Tony
line: As a weapon.

name: Davis
line: You're not the person who called me after all, are you? [suddenly a cell phone is slammed on their table]

name: Brandt
line: Actually, I am. [Tony looks up and it's the woman he bumped into outside the bar] [suddenly Brandt grabs hold of Tony's arm and twists it, slamming his head onto the table, Tony manages to quickly grab hold of Chad's dog tags that were on the table]

name: Rose Hills Sheriff
line: Hey, hey, hey! What's all this about? What the hell's going on here?

name: Brandt
line: It's called an arrest. [she pushes Tony to the ground and steps towards the Sheriff] Sheriff, is it?

name: Rose Hills Sheriff
line: Yes ma'am, it is. And you are?

name: Brandt
line: Homeland Security. [she holds up her badge] We good here?

name: Rose Hills Sheriff
line: No, we're not good. I need a little more information than that.

name: Brandt
line: Well, I think it's a little above your pay grade, Sheriff.

name: Rose Hills Sheriff
line: Yeah, well, why don't you get on the horn to Nashville and uh...upgrade me? [Tony gestures to Mrs. Davis to hide the file, she pushes it under the bar]

name: Brandt
line: Alright, you know what? I was hoping to do this the smart way, but uh...the fun way's always good. [Tony notices her hand turning red hot, burning the badge in her hand]

name: Rose Hills Sheriff
line: Deputy, get this woman and... [suddenly Brandt shoves the hot badge into the Sheriff's face, she takes his gun and shoots him, Tony runs out of the bar and Brandt follows him, he turns to her]

name: Tony
line: Hey hot wings, you wanna party? You and me, let's go. [as Tony turns to run again he sees Savin getting out of a car and walk towards him, as Savin gets his gun out to shoot at him, Tony runs off and Harley throws something at Savin to make him miss Tony, Tony stops behind a car and sees a man hiding low on the ground] Crazy, huh?

name: Rose Hill Christmas Tree Shopper
line: Yeah.

name: Tony
line: Watch this. [Tony smashes into the window of a shop] [as Tony and Brandt are fighting in the shop, Tony starts a fire in shop] You walked right into this one, I've dated hotter chicks than you. [Tony puts Chad's dog tags into the microwave and he turns on the gas]

name: Brandt
line: That's all you got? Cheap trick and a cheesy one-liner?

name: Tony
line: Sweetheart, that could be the name of my autobiography. [Tony quickly leaves through the back door, as the dog tags heat up in the microwave they start sparking up fire, Brandt realizes the gas has been left on and suddenly the shop explodes killing Brandt] [Tony stumbles out of the shop as people run past. A water tank falls down and traps Tony's leg. He finds that Savin has grabbed Harley]

name: Harley Keener
line: Let me go! [Savin mocks Harley]

name: Savin
line: Help me! Help me! [as Tony's leg is trapped under some rubble, Savin sits in front of him with Harley sat on his lap] Hey kid, what would you like for Christmas?

name: Harley Keener
line: Mr. Stark, I am so sorry!

name: Savin
line: Oh. No, no. I think he was trying to say, "I want my god damn file."

name: Tony
line: It's not your fault, kid. Remember what I told you about bullies. [Harley uses the gadget Tony gave him earlier and runs away] Do you like that, Westworld? That's the thing about smart guys, we always cover our ass. [Tony brings up his hand and reveals his Iron Man suit hand. He fires at Savin and sends him flying backwards. Tony makes his way out of the rubble before leaving.]

name: Harley Keener
line: You're welcome

name: Tony
line: For what? Did I miss something?

name: Harley Keener
line: Me saving your life

name: Tony
line: Yeah. A, saved you first. B, thanks, sort of. And C, if you do someone a solid, don't be a yutz, alright? Just play it cool otherwise you come off grandiose.

name: Harley Keener
line: Unlike you? Admit it, you need me. We're connected.

name: Tony
line: What I need is for you to go home, be with your mom, keep your trap shut, guard the suit and stay connected to the telephone because if I call, you better pick up. Okay, can you feel that? We're done here. Move it out the way or I'm going to run you over. Bye kid. [Tony gets in his car] I'm sorry, kid, you did good.

name: Harley Keener
line: So now you're just going to leave me here, like my dad?

name: Tony
line: Yep [A beat] Wait, you're guilt tripping me, aren't you?

name: Harley Keener
line: [Childishly] I'm cold.

name: Tony
line: [Mocking him] I can tell. You know how I can tell? Cus we're connected. [Tony drives away]

name: Harley Keener
line: It was worth a shot.

name: Government Employee
line: Mr Vice President, I think you should see this.

name: Vice President
line: Oh god, not again. Is the President getting this?

name: The Mandarin
line: Mr President. Only two lessons remain and I intend to finish this before Christmas morning. Meet Thomas Richards. [The screen zooms out to show a man lying on the floor while Mandarin points a gun at him] Good strong name. Good strong job. Thomas, here, is an accountant for the Roxxon Oil Corporation. [Thomas sobs] But I'm sure he's a really good guy. I'm going to shoot him in the head, live on your television in 30 seconds.

name: Thomas Richards
line: No!

name: The Mandarin
line: The number for this telephone is in your cell phone. Exciting, isn't it, imagining how it got there? America, if your president calls me in the next half-minute, Tom lives. Go!

name: President Ellis
line: I have to make this call.

name: President Ellis
line: This is the right thing to do. [The phone rings but Mandarin doesn't answer. He waits for a few seconds before firing the gun.]

name: The Mandarin
line: There's just one lesson left, President Ellis. So run away, hide, kiss your children goodbye. Because nothing, not your army, not your red, white and blue attack dog, can save you. I'll see you soon.

name: President Ellis
line: Tell Rhodes, find this lunatic right now.

name: Military Aide
line: Sir, we tracked the broadcast signal. We have a possible point of origin in Pakistan and the Patriot is ready to strike.

name: President Ellis
line: Right now.

name: Military Aide
line: Yes, sir.

name: Tony
line: Man. Happy, Happy, Happy-

name: Rhodey
line: Don't move! (His phone rings.) Uh... Hang on a second. Hello?

name: Tony
line: You ever have a chick straddling you and you look up and suddenly she's glowing from the inside out, kind of a bright orange?

name: Rhodey
line: Yeah, I've had that. Who is this?

name: Tony
line: It's me, pal. Now, last time I went missing, if I remember correctly, you came looking for me. What are you doing?

name: Rhodey
line: A little knock-and-talk, making friends in Pakistan. What are you doing?

name: Tony
line: Your redesign, your big rebrand, that was AIM, right?

name: Rhodey
line: Yeah.

name: Tony
line: I'm gonna find a heavy-duty comm sat right now, I need your login.

name: Rhodey
line: It's the same as it's always been, "WarMachine68."

name: Tony
line: And password, please.

name: Rhodey
line: Well, look, I gotta change it every time you hack in, Tony.

name: Tony
line: It's not the '80s, nobody says "hack" any more. Give me your login. (Rhodey sighs.)

name: Rhodey
line: "WAR MACHINE ROX" with an "X," all caps.

name: Tony
line: (He's laughing.) That is so much better than "lron Patriot."

name: EMCEE
line: Very nice. Very nice. I have one question for you. What would you like for Christmas this year?

name: Elk Ridge
line: Well, David...

name: Crew
line: Do not erase a programme from my DVR unless you are 100% sure...

name: EMCEE
line: One more time! Ms Elk Ridge, everybody! All right.

name: Cameraman
line: Because you erase my shows!

name: Tony
line: That ain't gonna cut it.

name: Cameraman
line: We talked about this. Excuse me, sir. I don't know who... (Tony turns around.)

name: Tony
line: Shh.

name: Cameraman
line: Mom, I need to call you back. Something magical is happening. Tony is in my van.

name: Tony
line: Shh. Keep it down.

name: Cameraman
line: Tony is in my van!

name: Tony
line: No, he's not.

name: Cameraman
line: I knew you were still alive!

name: Tony
line: Come on in. Close the door. (The cameraman gets in the van & closes the door.) Shh...

name: Cameraman
line: Oh, wow. Can I just say, sir...

name: Tony
line: Yep.

name: Cameraman
line: I am your biggest fan.

name: Tony
line: Okay. First, is this your van? Is anyone else gonna come in?

name: Cameraman
line: No, no, no. Just us.

name: Tony
line: Great. What's your name?

name: Cameraman
line: Gary

name: Tony
line: Gary?

name: Gary
line: Oh, wow.

name: Tony
line: Right there is fine.

name: Gary
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: Okay? I get a lot of this, it's okay.

name: Gary
line: Oh, good. Can I just say?

name: Tony
line: What do you want?

name: Gary
line: Yeah. I don't know if you can tell, but I have, like, patterned my whole look after you. My hair's a little...

name: Tony
line: It's fine.

name: Gary
line: It's not right, 'cause there's no product in it.

name: Tony
line: Right.

name: Gary
line: I don't want to make things awkward for you, but I do have to show you... Boom!

name: Tony
line: A Hispanic Scott Baio. I'm sorry. Is that me?

name: Gary
line: Yeah. It's... I mean... I had them do it off a doll that I made, so it's not like it's off a picture. So it's a little bit...

name: Tony
line: Gary. Listen to me, okay? I don't want to clip your wings, here. We're both a little over-excited. I got an issue. I'm chasing bad guys. I'm trying to grab a little something from some hard-crypt data files. I don't have enough juice. I need you to jump on the roof... Right? Recalibrate the lSDNs. Pump it up by about 40%.

name: Gary
line: Got it.

name: Tony
line: All right? It's a mission.

name: Gary
line: Yeah.

name: Tony
line: Tony needs Gary.

name: Gary
line: And Gary needs Tony.

name: Tony
line: Be quiet about it. Go.

name: Gary
line: Yeah.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: What would you regard as the defining moment of your life?

name: Chad Davis
line: Well, uh, I think that would be the day I decided not to let my injury beat me. (Tony types again and another video shows up.)

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Will you please state your name for the camera?

name: Brandt
line: Ellen Brandt.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Okay. So, the injections are administered periodically. Addiction will not be tolerated. And those who cannot regulate will be out from the programme. (More typing, another video.) Once misfits, cripples... You are the next iteration of human evolution. Everybody, before we start... I promise you, looking back at your life, there will be nothing as bitter as the memory of that glorious risk you prudently elected to forego. Today is your glory- Let's begin. (Brandt's missing arm grows back as she glows red. The other volunteers glow red & scream too.) We gotta get out of here! We gotta get out of here! Get her out! Get them out of here! (One of the volunteers exploads.)

name: Tony
line: (He's muttering.) A bomb is not a bomb when it's a misfire. The stuff doesn't always work. Right, pal? It's faulty, but you found a buyer, didn't you? Sold it to the Mandarin. Got you, pal.

name: Maya Hansen
line: What happened? Fun fact. Before he built rockets for the Nazis, the idealistic Wernher von Braun dreamed of space travel. He stargazed. Do you know what he said when the first V-2 hit London? "The rocket performed perfectly. It just landed on the wrong planet." See, we all begin wide-eyed. Pure science. And then the ego steps in, the obsession. And you look up, you're a long way from shore.

name: Pepper Potts
line: You can't be too hard on yourself, Maya. I mean, you gave your research to a think tank.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Yeah, but Killian built that think tank on military contracts.

name: Pepper Potts
line: That's exactly what we used to do. So, don't judge yourself.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Thank you, Pepper. I really appreciate that. (Someone knocks on the door & Pepper looks over. She gets up & opens the door. Room service pushes in a tray of food but Killain appears & snaps his neck. Pepper gasps.)

name: Pepper Potts
line: Maya, run! [Killian grabs Pepper by the arm, spins her around and slams her against the wall, holding her by the neck.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Hi, Pepper. (To Maya) So, you want to tell me why you were at Stark's mansion last night?

name: Maya Hansen
line: I'm trying to fix this thing. I didn't know you and the master were gonna blow the place up.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Oh, I see. So, you were trying to save Stark when he threatened us?

name: Maya Hansen
line: I've told you, Killian, we can use him.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Pepper. Pepper. Pepper.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Look, if we want to launch product next year, I need Stark. He just lacked a decent incentive. Now, he has one.

name: Man
line: [On radio] This is support team Blue-Zero. Sending coordinates for a suspected Mandarin broadcast point of origin.

name: Rhodey
line: Copy. [Repulsor firing, people shrieking] Nobody move. [Women exclaiming in fear] Oh. Support Blue-Zero, unless the Mandarin's next attack on the U.S. involves cheaply-made sportswear, I think you messed up again. Yes, you're free, uh, if you weren't before. It's... Of course. Yes, ma'am. Iron Patriot on the job. Happy to help. No need to thank me, ma'am. It's my pleasure. [One of the women shakes Rhodey's hand and her hand glows red. Rhodey falls backwards, grunting.]

name: Woman
line: Savin? I've acquired the Patriot armour.

name: Rhodey
line: If you want this suit, you're going to have to pry my cold dead body out of it.

name: Woman
line: That's the plan, Colonel.

name: Tony
line: Harley, tell me what's happening. Give me a full report.

name: Harley Keener
line: Yeah, I'm still eating that candy. Do you want me to keep eating it?

name: Tony
line: How much have you had?

name: Harley Keener
line: Two or three bowls.

name: Tony
line: Can you still see straight?

name: Harley Keener
line: Sort of.

name: Tony
line: That means you're fine. Give me Jarvis. Jarvis, how are we?

name: JARVIS
line: It's totally fine, sir. I seem to do quite well for a stretch, and then at the end of the sentence I say the wrong cranberry. And, sir, you were right. Once I factored in available AIM downlink facilities I was able to pinpoint the Mandarin's broadcast signal.

name: Tony
line: What are we talking? Far East, Europe, North Africa, Iran, Pakistan, Syria? Where is it?

name: JARVIS
line: Actually, sir, it's in Miami.

name: Tony
line: Okay, kid, I'm gonna have to walk you through rebooting Jarvis's speech drive, but not right now. Harley, where is he really? Just look on the screen and tell me where it is.

name: Harley Keener
line: Um, it does say Miami, Florida.

name: Tony
line: Okay, first things first, I need the armour. Where are we at with it?

name: Harley Keener
line: Uh, it's not charging. [Tony pulls over to the side of the road, heavy breathing]

name: JARVIS
line: Actually, sir, it is charging, but the power source is questionable. It may not succeed in revitalising the Mark 42.

name: Tony
line: What's questionable about electricity? All right? It's my suit, and I can't... I'm not gonna... I don't wanna... [Breathing heavily] Oh, God, not again.

name: Harley Keener
line: Tony? [Tony gets out of the car] Are you having another attack? I didn't even mention New York.

name: Tony
line: Right, and then you just said it by name while denying having said it.

name: Harley Keener
line: Okay, um, uh...

name: Tony
line: [Panting] God, what am I gonna do?

name: Harley Keener
line: Just breathe. Really, just breathe. You're a mechanic, right?

name: Tony
line: Right.

name: Harley Keener
line: You said so.

name: Tony
line: Yes, I did.

name: Harley Keener
line: Why don't you just build something?

name: Tony
line: Okay. Thanks, kid. [He gets back in the car.] [Cut to Tony in a shop buying supplies.] [Cut to Tony building something.] [Cut to Miama, Florida. Tony climbs a wall and begins fighting guards. He makes his way into the house and finds a woman lying on a table.] [Cut to a different woman lying on a sofa with a man sitting at a desk.]

name: Woman
line: Why is it so hot in here? I told you to put it at 68.

name: Man
line: [Scoffs] My fault again. Let me tell you something, sweetheart. I am not your personal air con... [Tony puts a gloved hand on his head, electrocuting him. He gets the gun and leaves the room. He makes his way to the bedroom and pulls the duvet off the bed, revealling two girls. Tony sushes them and the toilet flushes.]

name: The Mandarin
line: Well, I wouldn't go in there for 20 minutes. [He laughs] Now, which one of you is Vanessa?

name: Vanessa
line: That's me.

name: The Mandarin
line: Ah! Nessie. Did you know that fortune cookies aren't even Chinese?

name: Vanessa
line: There's some guy over here.

name: The Mandarin
line: They're made by Americans, based on a Japanese recipe.

name: Tony
line: Hey! [Mandarin raises his hands]

name: The Mandarin
line: Bloody hell. Bloody hell.

name: Tony
line: Don't move.

name: The Mandarin
line: I'm not moving. You want something? Take it. Although the guns are all fake because those wankers wouldn't trust me with the real ones.

name: Tony
line: What?

name: The Mandarin
line: Hey, do you fancy either of the birds?

name: Tony
line: Heard enough. You're not him. The Mandarin, the real guy. Where? Where's the Mandarin? Where is he?

name: The Mandarin
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa. He's here. He's here, but he's not here. He's here, but he's not here.

name: Tony
line: What do you mean?

name: The Mandarin
line: It's complicated. Hey, it's complicated.

name: Tony
line: It is?

name: The Mandarin
line: It's complicated.

name: Tony
line: Uncomplicate it. Ladies, out. Get out of the bed. Get into the bathroom. Sit. [Door closes. Gunshot. Women exclaim in fear]

name: The Mandarin
line: My name is Trevor. Trevor Slattery.

name: Tony
line: What are you? What are you, a decoy? You're a double, right?

name: Trevor Slattery
line: What, you mean like an understudy? No, absolutely not. [Tony points the gun at Trevor's face] Don't hurt the face! I'm an actor.

name: Tony
line: You got a minute to live. Fill it with words.

name: Trevor Slattery
line: It's just a role. "The Mandarin," see, it's not real.

name: Tony
line: Then how did you get here, Trevor?

name: Trevor Slattery
line: Um. Well, I, um, had a little problem with, um, substances. And I ended up, um, doing things, no two ways about it, in the street, that a man shouldn't do.

name: Tony
line: Next?

name: Trevor Slattery
line: Then, they approached me about the role, and they knew about the drugs.

name: Tony
line: What did they say? They'd get you off them?

name: Trevor Slattery
line: They said they'd give me more. They gave me things. They gave me this palace. They gave me plastic surgery. They gave me things. [Snoring]

name: Tony
line: Did you just nod off? Hey. [Tony kicks him]

name: Trevor Slattery
line: No, and a lovely speedboat. And the thing was, he needed someone to take credit for some accidental explosions. [Mimic explosion]

name: Tony
line: "He"? Killian?

name: Trevor Slattery
line: Killian.

name: Tony
line: He created you?

name: Trevor Slattery
line: He created me.

name: Tony
line: Custom-made terror threat.

name: Trevor Slattery
line: Yes. Yes. His think tank thinked it up. The pathology of a serial killer. The manipulation of Western iconography. Ready for another lesson? Blah, blah, blah. No. Of course, it was my performance that brought the Mandarin to life.

name: Tony
line: Your performance? Where people died?

name: Trevor Slattery
line: No, they didn't. Look around you. The costumes, green screen. Honestly, I wasn't on location for half this stuff. And when I was, it was movie magic, love.

name: Tony
line: I'm sorry, but I got a best friend who's in a coma and he might not wake up. So you're gonna have to answer for that. You're still going down, pal. You under... [Savin hits Tony around the head, unconcious]

name: Savin
line: Okay, Trevor, what did you tell him?

name: Trevor Slattery
line: I didn't tell him anything.

name: Savin
line: Nothing?

name: Trevor Slattery
line: No.

name: Savin
line: You should have pressed the panic button.

name: Trevor Slattery
line: Well, I panicked, but then I handled it.

name: Tony
line: Ah... [Sighs] Okay.

name: Maya Hansen
line: It's just like old times, huh?

name: Tony
line: Oh, yeah. With zip ties. It's a ball.

name: Maya Hansen
line: It wasn't my idea.

name: Tony
line: Okay. So you took Killian's card.

name: Maya Hansen
line: I took his money.

name: Tony
line: And here you are 13 years later, in a dungeon.

name: Maya Hansen
line: No.

name: Tony
line: Yeah.

name: Maya Hansen
line: No, you're in a dungeon. I'm free to go.

name: Tony
line: Yeah?

name: Maya Hansen
line: [Sighs and walks towards him] A lot has happened, Tony. But I'm close. Extremis is practically stabilised.

name: Tony
line: [Shouting] I'm telling you it isn't. [Lowers voice to usual volume] I'm on the street. People are going bang. They're painting the walls. Maya, you're kidding yourself.

name: Maya Hansen
line: Then help me fix it. [She shows him the "You Know Who I Am" note he left in 1999.]

name: Tony
line: Did I do that?

name: Maya Hansen
line: Yes.

name: Tony
line: I remember the night, not the morning. Is this what you've been chasing around?

name: Maya Hansen
line: You don't remember?

name: Tony
line: I can't help you. You used to have a moral psychology. You used to have ideals. You wanted to help people. Now look at you. I get to wake up every morning with someone who still has their soul. Get me out of here. Come on.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: You know what my old man used to say to me? One of his favourite of many sayings... "The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese."

name: Tony
line: You're not still pissed off about the Switzerland thing, are you?

name: Aldrich Killian
line: How can I be pissed at you, Tony? I'm here to thank you. You gave me the greatest gift that anybody's ever given me. Desperation. If you think back to Switzerland, you said you'd meet me on the rooftop, right? Well, for the first 20 minutes, I actually thought you'd show up. And the next hour... I considered taking that one-step shortcut to the lobby. If you know what I mean.

name: Tony
line: Honestly, I'm still trying to figure out what happened to the first mouse.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: But as I looked out over that city, nobody knew I was there, nobody could see me, no one was even looking. I had a thought that would guide me for years to come. Anonymity, Tony. Thanks to you, it's been my mantra ever since. Right? You simply rule from behind the scenes. Because the second you give evil a face, a bin Laden, a Gaddafi, a Mandarin, you hand the people a target.

name: Tony
line: You're something else.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: You have met him, I assume?

name: Tony
line: Yes. Sir Laurence Oblivier.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: I know he's a little over the top sometimes. It's not entirely my fault. He has a tenden... He's a stage actor. They say his Lear was the toast of Croydon, wherever that is. Anyway, the point is, ever since that big dude with the hammer fell out of the sky, subtlety has kind of had its day.

name: Tony
line: What's next for you in your world?

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Well, I wanted to repay you the selfsame gift that you so graciously imparted to me. [Killian rolls three balls forwards and they stop, projecting an image of Pepper. She has Extremis.] Desperation. Now, this is live. I'm not sure if you can tell, but at this moment the body is trying to decide whether to accept Extremis or just give up. And if it gives up, I have to say, the detonation is quite spectacular. But until that point, it's really just a lot of pain. We haven't even talked salary yet. What kind of perk package are you thinking of?

name: Maya Hansen
line: Let him go.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Hold on, hold on. Maya...

name: Maya Hansen
line: I said, let him go.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: What are you doing?

name: Maya Hansen
line: 1200 CCs. A dose half of this size, I'm dead.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: It's times like this my temper is tested somewhat. Maya, give me the injector.

name: Maya Hansen
line: If I die, Killian, what happens to your soldiers? What happens to your product?

name: Aldrich Killian
line: We're not doing this, okay?

name: Maya Hansen
line: What happens to you? What happens if you go too hot? [He looks back at Tony and shoots Maya]

name: Aldrich Killian
line: The good news is, a high-level position has just been vacated.

name: Tony
line: You are a maniac.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: No, I'm a visionary. But I do own a maniac. And he takes the stage tonight. [Killian leaves and talks to Savin] Once we get the Patriot installed, it will take me nine or 10 minutes for the takedown.

name: Savin
line: Well, that's great, but the last time I looked there was somebody inside of it. [Whirring]

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Afternoon, gentlemen. [Whirring ceases] Hello, Colonel. Step aside. [Killian places his hand on the suit and it blows orange.] Oh! We'll get you out of there. Don't worry.

name: Savin
line: You'll damage the armour.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Yes, I will. But you can fix it, right? I'm gonna take the Chinook to base camp. And I want Potts with me.

name: Savin
line: She's still in Phase Two.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: You're not going deaf, are you?

name: Tony
line: [Watch beeping.] Careful, there. It's a limited edition. Hey, uh, Ponytail Express. What's the mileage count between Tennessee and Miami?

name: Tony
line: Very nice.

name: Tony
line: Break it, you bought it.

name: Tony
line: Okay, that wasn't mine to give away. That belongs to my friend's sister. And that's why I'm gonna kill you first.

name: Tony
line: You'll see.

name: Alrich Killian
line: Are you coming out?

name: Rhodey
line: [Panting and sweating] Do not open. Do not open. Don't open. Don't open. [Beeping.] All right. Let's go. [The suit opens, Rhodey jumps and punches Savin in the face, then kicks him. Killian glows red and breathes fire at Rhodey.] You... You breathe fire? Okay. [Savin knocks Rhodey unconcious.]

name: Aldrich Killian
line: It's a glorious day, Savin. This time tomorrow, I'll have the West's most powerful leader in one hand, and the world's most feared terrorist in the other. I'll own the war on terror. Create supply and demand. For you, for your brothers and sisters.

name: Tony
line: Trust me, you're gonna be in a puddle of blood on the ground in five, four, three... Come on! Two...

name: Tony
line: All right, I'm gonna give you a chance to escape. Put down your weapons. Tie yourselves to those chairs. I'll let you live. In five, four, bang!

name: Tony
line: You should be gone by now. You should've already been gone.

name: Tony
line: Here it comes. Three, four...

name: Tony
