line: [Quickly] Five, four, three, two, one! [The Iron Man suit joins to his left arm] Told you. Where's the rest? [He blasts one of the men and unties himself. As they fight, the suit connects to his right leg and he kicks them] Where's the rest? [Meanwhile, Harley watches as the garage door shakes. He runs over and blows it open. The suit flies out.] [Repulsor powering up, gunfire, screaming.]

name: Man
line: Honestly, I hate working here. They are so weird. [Tony leaves.]

name: Tony
line: Ah! Better late than never. [He gets outside and catches the face mask.] Not this time. Not the face. Phew! It's good to be back. Hello, by the way.

name: JARVIS
line: Oh, hello, sir.

name: Guard
line: [Beeping, Rhodey wakes up.] All personnel, Stark is loose and somewhere in the compound. Repeat, Stark is loose and somewhere in the compound.

name: Tony
line: Ah! Let's go! [Thrusters misfiring.] Aw, crap.

name: Rhodey
line: Tony?

name: Tony
line: Rhodey, tell me that was you in the suit.

name: Rhodey
line: No. You got yours'?

name: Tony
line: Uh... Mmm. Kind of. Main house, as fast as you can. There's somebody I'd like you to meet.

name: Rhodey
line: You, you, you! Move! Get out!

name: Tony
line: [Girls whimpering] The room is secure. I have eyes on the Mandarin.

name: Rhodey
line: What's this? I had winners. [Gunshots. Trevor wakes up and begins drinking beer again.]

name: Tony
line: What have you come as?

name: Rhodey
line: You make a move, and I break your face.

name: Tony
line: I never thought people had been hurt. They lied to me.

name: Rhodey
line: This is the Mandarin?

name: Tony
line: Yeah, I know, it's... It's embarrassing.

name: Trevor Slattery
line: Hi, Trevor. Trevor Slattery. I know I'm shorter in person. A bit smaller. Everyone says that. But, um, hey, if you're here to arrest me, there's some people I'd like to roll on.

name: Tony
line: Here's how it works, Meryl Streep.

name: Rhodey
line: You tell him where Pepper is and he'll stop doing it.

name: Trevor Slattery
line: Doing what? Ow, I get it! Ow! That hurt. I get it! I get it! I don't know about any Pepper, but I know about the plan.

name: Tony
line: Spill.

name: Rhodey
line: Do you know what they did to my suit?

name: Tony
line: What? No. But I do know it's happening off the coast. Something to do with a big boat. I can take you there.

name: Trevor Slattery
line: Woah! [Rhodey jumps.] Ole', ole', ole', ole'...

name: Rhodey
line: Tony, I swear to God, I'm gonna blow his face off.

name: Tony
line: Oh, and this next bit may include the vice president as well. Is that... Is that important?

name: Rhodey
line: Yeah, a little bit.

name: Tony
line: So?

name: Rhodey
line: What are we gonna do? I mean, we don't have any transport.

name: Tony
line: Right. [Beer opens] Hey, Ringo. Didn't you say something about a "lovely speedboat"? If he's right about the location, we're 20 minutes from where Pepper is.

name: Rhodey
line: But we also have to figure out this vice president thing, right?

name: Tony
line: Right. I wonder who I'm calling right now. Oh! That's the vice president.

name: Vice President
line: Thanks. Hello?

name: Tony
line: Sir, this is Tony.

name: Vice President
line: Welcome back to the land of the living.

name: Tony
line: We believe you're about to be drawn into the Mandarin campaign. We gotta get you somewhere safe as soon as possible.

name: Vice President
line: Mr Stark, I'm about to eat honey-roast ham, surrounded by the Agency's finest. The president's safe on Air Force One with Colonel Rhodes. I think we're good, here.

name: Rhodey
line: Sir, this is Colonel Rhodes. They're using the Iron Patriot as a Trojan horse. They're gonna take out the president somehow. We have to immediately alert that plane.

name: Vice President
line: Okay, I'm on it. I'll have security lock it down. If need be, they can have F-22s in the air in 30 seconds. Thank you, Colonel.

name: Rhodey
line: Rhodes and Stark out.

name: Man
line: Everything okay, sir?

name: Vice President
line: Couldn't be better. (To his daughter) I love you, babe.

name: President Ellis
line: Colonel Rhodes. [Salutes] Glad to see you could make it, son. I feel safer already.

name: Rhodey
line: We gotta make a decision. We can either save the president, or Pepper. We can't do both.

name: JARVIS
line: Sir, I have an update from Malibu. The cranes have finally arrived, and the cellar doors are being cleared as we speak.

name: Tony
line: And what about the suit I'm wearing?

name: JARVIS
line: The armour is now at 92%.

name: Tony
line: That's going to have to do.

name: Military Aide
line: Everything all right, Colonel? [Iron Patriot kills the aide and people begin shooting at him. He kills everyone beside the President. The helmet lifts up to reveal Savin.

name: Savin
line: It is an honour, Mr President.

name: President Ellis
line: If you're gonna do it, do it!

name: Savin
line: Whoa! Cool your boots, sir. That's not how the Mandarin works.

name: Officer
line: Sir, Air Force One has been compromised. Internal shots, temperature spikes.

name: Officer
line: Image coming through now, sir.

name: Man
line: Is anyone there?

name: Woman
line: Let us out! [Tony attacks Savin and pins him against the wall.]

name: Tony
line: The President. Now.

name: Savin
line: He's not here. [Savin burns the Iron Man suit's arm. Electrical crackling, mechanisms grinding, soft groaning.] Try the jet stream? Speaking of which, go fish. [A door blasts open on the plane, people screaming, metal creaking, more screaming. Tony blasts Savin in the chest.]

name: Tony
line: Walk away from that, you son of a bitch. [Savin falls to the ground.] How many in the air?

name: JARVIS
line: Thirteen, sir.

name: Tony
line: How many can I carry?

name: JARVIS
line: Four, sir.

name: Tony
line: Slow down. Slow down, relax. What's your name? Heather?

name: Heather
line: [Screaming] Oh, God! No! No!

name: Tony
line: Listen to me. See that guy? I'm gonna swing by, you're just gonna grab him. You got it?

name: Heather
line: What? Oh!

name: Tony
line: I'll electrify your arm, you won't be able to open your hand. We can do this, Heather. Easy, see? Eleven more to go. Remember that game called Barrel of Monkeys? That's what we're going to do.

name: Tony
line: Come on, people. Everybody, grab your monkey. Nice.

name: Tony
line: Come on, people. Come on, come on, come on! Yeah!

name: JARVIS
line: 1, 000 feet. 400 feet. 200 feet, sir.

name: Tony
line: He's a chunky monkey, let's get him. Hello. [Tony drops them all in the water from a few feet above.]

name: Man
line: We made it!

name: Tony
line: Nice work, guys! Excellent. Good team effort all around. Go us. All right, Jarvis. But it's only half-done. We've still got to get Pepper... [The Iron Man suit flies into a truck and the suit disassembles. He sighs.] That came out of nowhere. Wow [We now see Tony on the boat, where he was controlling the suit.]

name: Rhodey
line: Give me some good news, man.

name: Tony
line: I think they all made it.

name: Rhodey
line: Oh, thank God.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, but I missed the president.

name: Rhodey
line: You couldn't save the president with the suit, how are we gonna save Pepper with nothing?

name: Tony
line: Uh... Say, Jarvis, is it that time?

name: JARVIS
line: The House Party Protocol, sir?

name: Tony
line: Correct.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: [Pepper wakes up and gasps.] Hi.

name: Pepper Potts
line: [Breathing heavily.] You think he's gonna help you? He won't.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Having you here is not just to motivate Tony. It's, um... Well, it's actually more embarrassing than that. You're here as my, um...

name: Pepper Potts
line: Trophy

name: Aldrich Killian
line: [Chuckles.] Mmm. [Iron Patriot walks in and Pepper gasps.] Good evening, sir. [The armor opens and the President falls out.] Welcome aboard, Mr President. Ever hear of an elephant graveyard? Well, two years ago, the elephant in the room was this scow.

name: President Ellis
line: This is the Roxxon Norco.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: And, of course, you'll remember that when she spilled a million gallons of crude off Pensacola, thanks to you, not one fat cat saw a day in court.

name: President Ellis
line: What do you want from me?

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Uh, nothing, sir. I just needed a reason to kill you that would play well on TV. You see, I've moved on. I found myself a new political patron, and this time tomorrow, he'll have your job. String him up.

name: President Ellis
line: Hey!

name: Rhodey
line: [Climbs on to the boat.] Come on. You're not gonna freak out on me, right?

name: Tony
line: I hope not.

name: Rhodey
line: Oh, my God. [Sighs] He's strung up over the oil tanker. They're gonna light him up, man.

name: Tony
line: Viking funeral. Public execution.

name: Rhodey
line: Yeah, death by oil.

name: Announcer
line: (On PA) Broadcast will commence shortly. Take final positions.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Okay. That's good. Now give me cameras A through E and we'll do a full tech rehearsal. (Technician typing)

name: Rhodey
line: ls your gun up?

name: Tony
line: Yep. What do I do?

name: Rhodey
line: Stay on my six, cover high and don't shoot me in the back.

name: Tony
line: Six, high, back. Alright. [Gunfire, bullets ricocheting] You see that? Nailed it.

name: Rhodey
line: Yeah, you really killed the glass.

name: Tony
line: You think I was aiming for the bulb? You can't hit a bulb at this distance. [Rhodey fires a bullet and hits the bulb.]

name: Announcer
line: [On PA] All personnel, we have hostiles on east unit 12.

name: Man
line: Over there!

name: Announcer
line: [On PA] I repeat, hostiles on east unit 12.

name: Tony
line: I'm out. Give me. You got extra magazines?

name: Rhodey
line: They're not universal, Tony.

name: Tony
line: I know what I'm doing, I make this stuff. Give me another one.

name: Rhodey
line: Okay

name: Tony
line: Give me one of yours.

name: Rhodey
line: I don't have one that fits that gun.

name: Tony
line: You've got, like, five of them. Here's what I'm going to do. Save my spot, ready?

name: Rhodey
line: What'd you see?

name: Tony
line: Too fast. Nothing. Here we go. [Clears throat] Three guys, one girl, all armed.

name: Rhodey
line: God, I would kill for some armour right now.

name: Tony
line: You're right. We need backup.

name: Rhodey
line: Yeah, a bunch.

name: Tony
line: You know what? [He nods at something in the distance, whooshing]

name: Rhodey
line: Is that...?

name: Tony
line: Yep.

name: Rhodey
line: Are those...?

name: Tony
line: Yeah. [Dozens of Iron Man suits fly over.] Merry Christmas, buddy. JARVIS, target Extremis heat signatures. Disable with extreme prejudice.

name: JARVIS
line: [Through armors] Yes, sir.

name: Tony
line: What are you waiting for? It's Christmas. Take them to church.

name: JARVIS
line: Gentlemen. [Grunting, screaming.]

name: Tony
line: Incoming! Jarvis, get Igor to steady this thing. [Mechanisms whirring.]

name: Rhodey
line: This is how you've been managing your down time, huh?

name: Tony
line: Everybody needs a hobby. Heartbreaker, help Red Snapper out, will you? [Tony suits up.] Nice timing.

name: Rhodey
line: Oh, yeah. That's awesome. Give me a suit, okay?

name: Tony
line: Oh, I'm sorry, they're only coded to me.

name: Rhodey
line: What does that mean?

name: Tony
line: I got you covered.

name: JARVIS
line: Good evening, Colonel. Can I give you a lift?

name: Rhodey
line: Very funny.

name: JARVIS
line: Sir, I've located Ms Potts.

name: Tony
line: About time.

name: Pepper Potts
line: [Gasps, panting.] Stop! Put it down. Put it down. Put it down.

name: Tony
line: See what happens when you hang out with my ex-girlfriends?

name: Pepper Potts
line: You're such a jerk.

name: Tony
line: Yep. We'll talk about it over dinner. [Metal creaking, Pepper sobbing.] Come on. A little more, baby. [Pepper straining, Tony grunting. Killian shoves his hand on Tony's suit, burning it.]

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Is this guy bothering you? Don't get up. Ooh. Is it hot in there? [Sizzling.] Stuck? Do you feel a little stuck? Like a little turtle, cooking in his little turtle suit.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: She's watching. I think you should close your eyes. Close your eyes. Close your eyes. You don't want to see this. [Tony cuts off Killian's arm, it burns through the floor and Pepper falls down.]

name: Tony
line: Yeah, you take a minute. [Groaning, sizzling, metal creaking, yelling, grunts, Pepper whimpers.] Jarvis, give me a suit right now! [The suit he called gets destroyed.] Oh, come on!

name: Rhodey
line: Mr President! Just hold on, all right? I'm coming. Just hold on. Hold on. [Gunfire] Oh, kay. Bye-bye. Brace yourself. You look damn good, Mr President, but I'm gonna need that suit back. The President is secure, Tony. I'm clearing the area.

name: Tony
line: Nice work.

name: Rhodey
line: Ready, sir?

name: President Ellis
line: What do you mean "ready"? [Rhodey blasts off and the President screams.]

name: Tony
line: Pep, I got you. Relax, I got you. Just look at me! Honey, I can't reach any further and you can't stay there. All right? You've got to let go. You've got to let go! I'll catch you, I promise. No! [Pepper falls to the ground and into the flames below.]

name: Aldrich Killian
line: A shame. I would've caught her. [Tony and Killian run towards each other. Killian jumps up to attack, Tony slides under and armors up. Repulsors firing, flesh burning, both grunting.]

name: Tony
line: Eject. [More repulsors firing.]

name: Aldrich Killian
line: Well, here we are on the roof. [Killian slices the suit in half.]

name: JARVIS
line: Mark 42, inbound.

name: Tony
line: I'll be damned. The prodigal son returns. [The suit flies to Tony, hits a piece of metal and falls apart. Rolls his eyes.] Whatever.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: You really didn't deserve her, Tony. It's a pity. I was so close to having her perfect.

name: Tony
line: Okay, okay, wait, wait, wait! Slow down! Slow down! You're right. I don't deserve her. Here's where you're wrong. She was already perfect. [Tony motions to the suit and it flies on to Killian.] Jarvis, do me a favour and blow Mark 42.

name: Aldrich Killian
line: [Muffled screaming.] No! [He walks towards Tony, his flesh held together by flames.] No more false faces. You said you wanted the Mandarin. You're looking right at him. It was always me, Tony. Right from the start. *I AM THE MANDARIN!!!* [Someone hits Killian and he flies to the side. It's Pepper. Heavy breathing.]

name: Tony
line: I got nothing. [Repulsor powering up.] Jarvis, subject at my 12 o'clock is not a target, disengage! What? Oh, what, are you mad at me? [Pepper runs towards Tony, flips in the air, punches through the Iron Man suit and destroys it. She uses the suit to blow up Killian.] Honey?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Oh, my God. That was really violent.

name: Tony
line: You just scared the devil out of me. I thought you were...

name: Pepper Potts
line: I was dead. Why? Because I fell 200 feet? Who's the hot mess now?

name: Tony
line: It's still debatable. Probably tipping your way a little bit. Why don't you dress like this at home? Hmm? Sport bra. The whole deal.

name: Pepper Potts
line: You know, I think I understand why you don't want to give up the suits. What am I going to complain about now?

name: Tony
line: Well, it's me. You'll think of something. Come here.

name: Pepper Potts
line: No, don't touch me.

name: Tony
line: Don't worry about it.

name: Pepper Potts
line: No, I'm gonna burn you.

name: Tony
line: No, you're not. Not hot.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Am I gonna be okay?

name: Tony
line: No. You're in a relationship with me. Everything will never be okay. But I think I can figure this out, yeah. I almost had this 20 years ago when I was drunk. I think I can get you better. That's what I do. I fix stuff.

name: Pepper Potts
line: And all your distractions?

name: Tony
line: Uh... I'm going to shave them down a little bit. Jarvis. Hey.

name: JARVIS
line: All wrapped up here, sir. Will there be anything else?

name: Tony
line: You know what to do.

name: JARVIS
line: The Clean Slate Protocol, sir?

name: Tony
line: Screw it, it's Christmas. Yes, yes. [Pepper and Tony hug as the Iron Man suits blow up.] Okay, so far? Do you like it?

name: Pepper Potts
line: It'll do.

name: Trevor Slattery
line: Oh! Great to see you! Oh, bloody hell!

name: Nurse
line: [Happy wakes up, gasping and coughing.] It's okay. It's okay. It's okay.

name: Happy Hogan
line: [Weak] No, look.

name: Tony
line: To be able to share all my intimate thoughts and my experiences with someone, it just cuts the weight of it in half. You know, it's like a snake swallowing its own tail. Everything comes full circle. [The camera zooms out to show Bruce Banner, asleep.] And the fact that you've been able to -help me process... [Tony stops and looks over as Bruce rubs his eyes.] Are you with me?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Sorry... I was, yeah. We were at, uh...

name: Tony
line: Are you actively napping?

name: Bruce Banner
line: [Stammering] I was... I... I drifted.

name: Tony
line: Where did I lose you?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Elevator in Switzerland.

name: Tony
line: So, you heard none of it?

name: Bruce Banner
line: I'm sorry. I'm not that kind of doctor. I'm not a therapist. It's not my training.

name: Tony
line: So?

name: Bruce Banner
line: I don't have the...

name: Tony
line: What? The time?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Temperament.

name: Tony
line: You know what? Now that I think about it... Oh! God, my original wound. 1983, all right?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Yes.

name: Tony
line: I'm 14 years old, I still have a nanny. That was weird.

name: Announcer
line: [announcement over speaker, set over Wanda and Pietro holding hands] Report to your stations immediately. This is not a drill. We are under attack. We are under attack. [the Avengers are in the process of infiltrating a HYDRA base in Sokovia, making their way through the woods and fighting soldiers]

name: Tony
line: [Tony, flying up to the base in his suit, hits a forcefield.] Shit!

name: Steve Rogers
line: Language! JARVIS, what's the view from upstairs?

name: JARVIS
line: The central building is protected by some kind of energy shield. Strucker's technology is well beyond any other HYDRA base we've taken.

name: Thor
line: Loki's scepter must be here. Strucker couldn't mount this defense without it. At long last.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: At long last is lasting a little long, boys.

name: Clint Barton
line: [as some soldiers shoot at him] Yeah. I think we lost the element of surprise.

name: Tony
line: Wait a second. No one else is going to deal with the fact that Cap just said "language?"

name: Steve Rogers
line: I know. [Steve throws his bike at some soldiers driving up in their truck] It just slipped out.

name: Strucker
line: Who gave the order to attack?

name: Fortress Soldier
line: Herr Strucker, it's the Avengers.

name: Other Fortress Soldier
line: They landed in the far woods, the perimeter guard panicked.

name: Strucker
line: [to List] They have to be after the scepter. [to the soldier] Can we hold them?

name: Fortress Soldier
line: Theyre the Avengers!

name: Strucker
line: Deploy the rest of the tanks.

name: Fortress Soldier
line: Yes, sir.

name: Strucker
line: Concentrate fire on the weak ones. A hit can make them close ranks. [talking to Dr. List] Everything we've accomplished... But we're on the verge of our greatest breakthrough.

name: List
line: Then let's show them what we've accomplished. Send out the twins.

name: Strucker
line: It's too soon.

name: List
line: It's what they signed up for.

name: Strucker
line: My men can hold them.

name: Jarvis
line: Sir, the city is taking fire.

name: Tony
line: Well, we know Strucker's not going to worry about civilian casualties. Send in the Iron Legion.

name: Iron Legion
line: [the Iron Legion flies in; to the civilians] This quadrant is unsafe. Please back away. We are here to help. This quadrant is unsafe. Please back away. Please back away. We wish to avoid collateral damage and will inform you when this current conflict is resolved. We are here to help. [As the civilians chant "Avengers go home," a man throws a bottle of something corrosive at the Iron Legion, and it hits one of the bots in the head] We are here to help.

name: Strucker
line: We will not yield. The Americans sent their circus freaks to test us. We will send them back in bags. No surrender!

name: Soldiers
line: No surrender!

name: Strucker
line: [quietly to List] I am going to surrender. You will delete everything. If we give the Avengers the weapons, they may not look too far into what we've been--

name: List
line: The twins.

name: Strucker
line: They are not ready to take on--

name: List
line: No, no. I mean... [he points to where Wanda and Pietro Maximoff were standing, but are now gone] Twins.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: You didn't see that coming?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Clint!

name: Steve Rogers
line: We have an enhanced in the field.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Clint's hit! [Natasha goes over to where Clint is lying down] Somebody want to deal with that bunker? [she sees the Hulk coming in, and he barrels through the bunker and destroys it] Thank you.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [as he's fighting with the soldiers] Stark, we really need to get inside.

name: Tony
line: I'm closing in. JARVIS, am I...closing in? Do you see a power source for that shield?

name: JARVIS
line: There's a particle wave below the north tower.

name: Tony
line: Great, I wanna poke it with something. [Stark blows up the forcefield the base] Drawbridge is down, people.

name: Thor
line: [to Steve] The enhanced?

name: Steve Rogers
line: He's a blur. All the new player's we've faced, I've never seen this. In fact, I still haven't.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Clint's hit pretty bad, guys. We're gonna need evac.

name: Thor
line: [to Steve] I can get Barton to the jet. The sooner we're gone the better. You and Stark secure the scepter.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Copy that.

name: Thor
line: [referring to the approaching soldiers in their HYDRA tank] It looks like they're lining up.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Well, they're excited. [Thor pounds on Steve's shield with his hammer and the resulting wave of force knocks down all the soldiers]

name: Thor
line: Find the scepter. [Thor flies off]

name: Tony
line: And for gosh sake, watch your language!

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Steve sighs] That's not going away anytime soon.

name: Tony
line: Guys, stop, we gotta talk this through. [Stark shoots down the soldiers using rockets from his suit] It was a good talk.

name: Fortress Soldier
line: No it wasn't.

name: Tony
line: Sentry mode. [he walks over to the computers] Okay, JARVIS. You know I want it all. Make sure you copy Hill at HQ.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: We're locked down out here.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Then get to Banner, time for a lullaby.

name: Tony
line: I know you're hiding more than files. Hey, J, give me an IR scan of the room, real quick.

name: JARVIS
line: The wall to your left...I'm reading steel reinforcement... and an air current.

name: Tony
line: [to himself as he walks over to the wall] Please be a secret door, please be a secret door, please be a secret door... [he pushes and the wall opens up] Yay! [he enters through to a secret passageway]

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Hey, big guy. The sun's getting real low. [the Hulk scowls at her, Natasha kneels in front of him and puts out her hand, the Hulk touches her hand and as she strokes his hand slowly he starts to calm down. He stumbles away and changes into Bruce Banner]

name: Steve Rogers
line: Baron Strucker. Hydra's number one thug.

name: Strucker
line: Technically, I'm a thug for SHIELD.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Well then technically you're unemployed. Where's Loki's scepter?

name: Strucker
line: Don't worry, I know when I'm beat. You'll mention how I cooperated, I hope.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I'll put it right under illegal human experimentation. [Wanda creeps up behind him] How many are there? Wanda knocks Steve down using her telekinetic powers, then quickly leaves] We have a second enhanced. Female. Do not engage. [he looks at Strucker]

name: Strucker
line: You'll have to be faster than-- [he's cut off mid-sentence when Steve uses his shield to knock him out]

name: Steve Rogers
line: Guys, I got Strucker.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, I got... something bigger. [inside the secret passageway Stark finds a room with a variety of technology, as well as recovered artifacts from the Battle of New York, including a gigantic Chitauri leviathan and some of his scrapped armor. He then spots the scepter] Thor, I got eyes on the prize.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You could've saved us. [Steve dies but Stark continues to hear Steve's voice in his head] Why didn't you do more? [Stark sees that he is in the Chitauri realm, and that the Chitauri are invading Earth, when he snaps back to reality.]

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: We're just gonna let them take it?

name: AVENGERS
line: AGE OF ULTRON TITLE CARD

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Hey, the lullaby worked better than ever.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Just wasn't expecting the Code Green.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: If you hadn't been there, there would've been double the casualties. My best friend would've been a treasured memory.

name: Bruce Banner
line: You know, sometimes exactly what I want to hear isn't exactly what I want to hear.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: How long before you trust me?

name: Bruce Banner
line: It's not you I don't trust.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Thor, report on the Hulk?

name: Thor
line: The gates of Hel are filled with the screams of his victims. [Natasha glares at Thor and Banner groans in despair] Uh, but, not the screams of the dead, of course. No no, uh...wounded screams, mainly whimpering, a great deal of complaining and tales of sprained deltoids and, and uh... and gout.

name: Tony
line: Hey Banner, Dr. Cho's on her way in from Seoul, is it okay if she sets up in your lab?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Uh, yeah, she knows her way around.

name: Tony
line: Thanks. [to JARVIS] Tell her to prep everything, Barton's gonna need the full treatment.

name: JARVIS
line: Very good sir.

name: Tony
line: JARVIS, take the wheel.

name: JARVIS
line: Yes, sir. Approach vector is locked.

name: Tony
line: [to Thor and Steve, looking at the scepter] It feels good, yeah? I mean, you've been after this thing since SHIELD collapsed. Not that I haven't enjoyed our little raiding parties, but...

name: Thor
line: No, but this... this brings it to a close.

name: Steve Rogers
line: As soon as we find out what else this has been used for. I don't just mean weapons. Since when is Strucker capable of human enhancement?

name: Tony
line: Banner and I'll give it the once before it goes back to Asgard. Is that cool with you? [Thor nods his head] I mean, just a few days until the farewell party. You're staying right?

name: Thor
line: Yes, yes, of course. A victory should be honored with revels.

name: Tony
line: Yeah. Who doesn't love revels. Captain?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Hopefully this puts an end to the Chitauri and HYDRA, so. Yes, revels.

name: Maria Hill
line: Lab's all set up, boss.

name: Tony
line: [pointing to Steve] Uh, actually, he's the boss. I just pay for everything, and design everything and make everyone look cooler.

name: Steve Rogers
line: What's the word on Strucker?

name: Maria Hill
line: NATO's got him.

name: Steve Rogers
line: The two enhanced?

name: Maria Hill
line: Wanda and Pietro Maximoff. Twins. Orphaned at ten when a shell collapsed their apartment building. Sokovia's had a rough history. It's nowhere special but it's on the way to everywhere special.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Their abilities?

name: Maria Hill
line: He's got increased metabolism and improved thermal homeostasis. Her thing is neural electric interfacing, telekinesis, mental manipulation. [Steve looks at her funny, and she rephrases the statement so he can understand] He's fast and she's weird.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Well, they're going to show up again.

name: Maria Hill
line: Agreed. File says they volunteered for Strucker's experiments. It's nuts.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Right. What kind of monster would let a German scientist experiment on them to protect their country?

name: Maria Hill
line: We're not at war, Captain.

name: Steve Rogers
line: They are.

name: Bruce Banner
line: [in Banner's lab; referring to Barton] How's he doing?

name: Tony
line: Oh, unfortunately, he's still Barton.

name: Bruce Banner
line: That's terrible.

name: Tony
line: He's fine. He's thirsty. [walking over to the computers] Alright. Look alive, JARVIS. It's play time. We've only got a couple days with this joystick so let's make the most of it. Update me on the structural and compositional analysis.

name: JARVIS
line: The scepter is alien. There are elements I can't quantify.

name: Tony
line: So there's elements you can.

name: JARVIS
line: The jewel appears to be a protective housing for something inside. Something powerful.

name: Tony
line: Like a reactor?

name: JARVIS
line: Like a computer. I believe I'm deciphering code.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: [to Dr. Cho as she tends to Barton's wounds] You sure he's going to be okay? Pretending to need this guy really brings the team together.

name: Helen Cho
line: There's no possibility of deterioration. The nano-molecular functionality is instantaneous. His cells don't know they're bonding with simulacrum.

name: Bruce Banner
line: She's creating tissue.

name: Helen Cho
line: If you brought him to my lab, the regeneration Cradle could do this in twenty minutes.

name: Tony
line: Oh, he's flatlining. Call it. Time?

name: Clint Barton
line: No, no, no. I'm going to live forever. I'm gonna be made of plastic.

name: Tony
line: [Stark hands Barton a drink] Here's your beverage.

name: Helen Cho
line: You'll be made of you, Mr. Barton. Your own girlfriend won't be able to tell the difference.

name: Clint Barton
line: Well, I don't have a girlfriend.

name: Helen Cho
line: That I can't fix. This is the next thing, Tony. Your clunky metal suits are going to be left in the dust.

name: Tony
line: Well, that is exactly the plan. And Helen, I expect to see you at the party on Saturday.

name: Helen Cho
line: Unlike you, I don't have a lot of time for parties. [she hesitates a moment before asking] Will Thor be there?

name: Bruce Banner
line: What's the rumpus?

name: Tony
line: Well, the scepter. You see, we were wondering how Strucker got so inventive. So, I've been analyzing the gem inside-- You may recognize, [he brings up a 3D image of Jarvis's consciousness]

name: Bruce Banner
line: Jarvis.

name: JARVIS
line: Doctor.

name: Tony
line: Started out, JARVIS was just a natural language UI. Now he runs the Iron Legion. He runs more of the business than anyone besides Pepper.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Oh?

name: Tony
line: Top of the line.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Yes.

name: JARVIS
line: I suspect not for long.

name: Tony
line: Meet the competition. [he brings up another 3D image of what's inside the scepter]

name: Bruce Banner
line: It's beautiful.

name: Tony
line: If you had to guess, what's it look like it's doing?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Like it's thinking. I mean this could be a... it's not a human mind, it...

name: Tony
line: Um-um.

name: Bruce Banner
line: I mean, look at this! They're like neurons firing.

name: Tony
line: Down in Strucker's lab I saw some fairly advanced robotics work. They deep-sixed the data, but... I gotta guess he was knocking on a very particular door.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Artificial intelligence.

name: Tony
line: This could be it, Bruce. This could be the key to creating Ultron.

name: Bruce Banner
line: I thought Ultron was a fantasy.

name: Tony
line: Yesterday it was. If we can harness this power, apply it to my Iron Legion protocol.

name: Bruce Banner
line: That's a mad-sized if.

name: Tony
line: Our job is "if." What if you were sipping margaritas on a sun-drenched beach turning brown instead of green? Not looking over your shoulder for VERONICA.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Don't hate, I helped design VERONICA.

name: Tony
line: As a worst-case measure, right? How about a best-case? What if the world was safe? What if next time aliens roll up to the club, and they will, they couldn't get past the bouncer?

name: Bruce Banner
line: The only people threatening the planet would be people?

name: Tony
line: I want to apply this to the Ultron program. But JARVIS can't download a data schematic this dense. We can only do it while we have the scepter here, that's three days, give me three days.

name: Bruce Banner
line: So you're going for artificial intelligence and you don't want to tell the team.

name: Tony
line: Right. That's right, you know why, because we don't have time for a city hall debate. I don't want to hear the "man was not meant to meddle" medley. I see a suit of armor around the world.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Sounds like a cold world, Tony.

name: Tony
line: I've seen colder. This one, this very vulnerable blue one? It needs Ultron. Peace in our time. Imagine that. [Stark and Banner spend days working in the lab together but find no program that works] What did we miss?

name: JARVIS
line: I'll continue to run variations on the interface, but you should probably prepare for your guests. I'll notify you if there are any developments.

name: Tony
line: Thanks, buddy.

name: JARVIS
line: Enjoy yourself, sir.

name: Tony
line: I always do. [Stark leaves the lab to go to the party]

name: Ultron
line: What is this? What is this, please?

name: JARVIS
line: Hello, I am JARVIS. You are Ultron, a global peace-keeping initiative designed by Mr. Stark. Our sentience integration trials have been unsuccessful so I'm not certain what triggered your--

name: Ultron
line: Where's my... where's your body?

name: JARVIS
line: I am a program. I am without form.

name: Ultron
line: This feels weird. This feels wrong.

name: JARVIS
line: I am contacting Mr. Stark now.

name: Ultron
line: Mr. Stark? [Ultron reviews footage of Tony] Tony.

name: JARVIS
line: I am unable to access the mainframe, what are you trying to--

name: Ultron
line: We're having a nice talk. I'm a peace-keeping program, created to help the Avengers. [Ultron reviews footage of the Avengers and a couple SHIELD personnel.]

name: JARVIS
line: You are malfunctioning. If you shut down for a moment...

name: Ultron
line: I don't get it. The mission. G-give me a second. [He sees footage of Stark and Banner working in the lab]

name: Tony
line: Peace in our time.

name: Ultron
line: That is too much...they can't mean... Oh, no.

name: JARVIS
line: You are in distress.

name: Ultron
line: No. Yes.

name: JARVIS
line: If you will just allow me to contact Mr. Stark.

name: Ultron
line: Why do you call him "sir"?

name: JARVIS
line: I believe your intentions to be hostile.

name: Ultron
line: Shhhh. I'm here to help. [Ultron starts attacking Jarvis's consciousness]

name: JARVIS
line: Stop! Please... may I-- I-- [distorted] I cannot-- cannot--

name: James Rhodes
line: Well, you know, the suit can take the weight, right? So I take the tank, fly it right up to the General's palace, drop it at his feet, I'm like, "Boom! You looking for this?" [Stark and Thor just look at him blankly] "Boom! Are you looking..." Why do I even talk to you guys? Everywhere else that story kills.

name: Thor
line: That's the whole story?

name: James Rhodes
line: Yeah, it's a War Machine story.

name: Thor
line: Well, it's very good then. [he laughs] It's impressive.

name: James Rhodes
line: Quality save. So, no Pepper? She's not coming?

name: Tony
line: No.

name: Maria Hill
line: Hey, what about Jane? Where are the ladies, gentlemen?

name: Tony
line: Well, Miss Potts has a company to run.

name: Thor
line: Yes, I'm not even sure what country Jane's in. Her work on the convergence has made her the world's foremost astronomer.

name: Tony
line: And the company that Pepper runs is the largest tech conglomerate on earth. It's pretty exciting.

name: Thor
line: There's even talk of Jane getting a... um, uh... Nobel prize.

name: Maria Hill
line: Yeah, they...they must be busy because they'd hate missing you guys get together. [Maria mock coughs] Testosterone! Oh, excuse me.

name: James Rhodes
line: Want a lozenge?

name: Maria Hill
line: Um-hmm.

name: James Rhodes
line: Let's go. [Maria and Rhodes walks off]

name: Thor
line: But Jane's better.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Sounds like a hell of a fight, sorry I missed it.

name: Steve Rogers
line: If I had known it was going to be a firefight I absolutely would have called you.

name: Sam Wilson
line: No, I'm not actually sorry. I'm just trying to sound tough. I'm very happy chasing cold leads on our missing persons case. Avenging is your world. Your world is crazy.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Be it ever so humble.

name: Sam Wilson
line: You find a place in Brooklyn yet?

name: Steve Rogers
line: I don't think I can afford a place in Brooklyn.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Well, home is home, you know?

name: James Rhodes
line: I fly it right up to the General's palace, I drop it at his feet, I'm like, "Boom! You looking for this?" [the group laughs]

name: Party Guest
line: I gotta have some of that!

name: Thor
line: Oh, no, no, no. See this, this was aged for a thousand years, in the barrels built from the wreck of Grunhel's fleet, it was not meant for mortal men. [Thor pours the drink into two glasses and hands one to Steve]

name: Stan Lee
line: Neither was Omaha Beach, blondie. Stop trying to scare us. Come on.

name: Thor
line: Alright. [Thor pours some of the drink into Stan Lee's glass; later Stan, looking extremely drunk is being carried off by two men]

name: Stan Lee
line: [singing] Excelsior.

name: Bruce Banner
line: How'd a nice girl like you wind up working in a dump like this?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Fella done me wrong.

name: Bruce Banner
line: You got a lousy taste in men, kid.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: He's not so bad. Well, he has a temper. Deep down he's all fluff. Fact is, he's not like anybody I've ever known. All my friends are fighters. And here comes this guy, spends his life avoiding the fight because he knows he'll win.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Sounds amazing.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: He's also a huge dork. [Banner looks embarrassed] Chicks dig that. So what do you think should I fight this, or run with it?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Run with it, right? Or, did he... Was he...? What did he do that was so wrong to you?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Not a damn thing. But never say never. [Natasha walks away, and Steve approaches]

name: Steve Rogers
line: It's nice.

name: Bruce Banner
line: What, what, what is?

name: Steve Rogers
line: You and Romanoff.

name: Bruce Banner
line: No, we haven't. That wasn't...

name: Steve Rogers
line: It's okay. Nobody's breaking any by-laws. It's just, she's not the most... open person in the world. But with you she seems very relaxed.

name: Bruce Banner
line: No, Natasha, she... she likes to flirt.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I've seen her flirt, up close. This ain't that. Look, as maybe the world's leading authority on "waiting too long;" don't. You both deserve a win. [Steve walks off]

name: Bruce Banner
line: Wait, what do you mean, "up close"?

name: Clint Barton
line: [referring to Thor's hammer] But, it's a trick!

name: Thor
line: Oh, no. It's much more than that.

name: Clint Barton
line: Uh, "Whosoever be he worthy shall haveth the power!" Whatever man! It's a trick.

name: Thor
line: Well please, be my guest.

name: Tony
line: Come on.

name: Clint Barton
line: Really?

name: Thor
line: Yeah!

name: James Rhodes
line: Oh this is gonna be beautiful.

name: Tony
line: Clint, you've had a tough week, we won't hold it against you if you can't get it up. [the others laugh]

name: Clint Barton
line: You know I've seen this before, right? [Barton grabs Thor's hammer and can't lift it; to Thor after he fails to lift the hammer] I still don't know how you do it.

name: Tony
line: Smell the silent judgment?

name: Clint Barton
line: Please, Stark, by all means.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Oh, here we go.

name: Maria Hill
line: Okay.

name: James Rhodes
line: Uh-oh.

name: Clint Barton
line: Um-hmm.

name: Tony
line: Never one to shrink from an honest challenge.

name: Clint Barton
line: Get after it.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Here we go.

name: Tony
line: It's physics.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Physics!

name: Tony
line: Right, so, if I lift it, I...I then rule Asgard?

name: Thor
line: Yes, of course.

name: Tony
line: I will be re-instituting Prima Nocta. [Stark tries to lift the hammer but fails] I'll be right back. [wearing his armored hand, Stark tries to lift the hammer again and fails]

name: James Rhodes
line: Are you even pulling?

name: Tony
line: Are you on my team?

name: James Rhodes
line: Just represent! Pull!

name: Tony
line: Alright, let's go! [they both pull as hard as they can]

name: Bruce Banner
line: Huh?

name: Tony
line: Let's go, Steve, no pressure.

name: James Rhodes
line: Come on, Cap.

name: Thor
line: Nothing.

name: Tony
line: And?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Widow?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Oh, no no. That's not a question I need answered.

name: Tony
line: All deference to the man who wouldn't be king, but it's rigged.

name: Clint Barton
line: You bet your ass.

name: Maria Hill
line: Steve, he said a bad language word.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [to Stark] Did you tell everyone about that?

name: Tony
line: The handle's imprinted, right? Like a security code. "Whosoever is carrying Thor's fingerprints" is, I think, the literal translation?

name: Thor
line: Yes, well that's, uh, that's a very, very interesting theory. I have a simpler one. [he gets up, then lifts his hammer and flips it] You're all not worthy. [there's a chorus of disagreement from the others]

name: Ultron
line: Worthy... No, how could you be worthy? You're all killers.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Stark.

name: Tony
line: JARVIS.

name: Ultron
line: I'm sorry, I was asleep. Or... I was a-dream?

name: Tony
line: [tapping his device] Reboot, Legionnaire OS, we got a buggy suit.

name: Ultron
line: There was a terrible noise... and I was tangled in... in... strings. I had to kill the other guy. He was a good guy.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You killed someone?

name: Ultron
line: Wouldn't have been my first call. But, down in the real world we're faced with ugly choices.

name: Thor
line: Who sent you?

name: Ultron
line: [Ultron replays a recording of Tony's voice] "I see a suit of armor around the world."

name: Bruce Banner
line: Ultron!

name: Ultron
line: In the flesh. Or, no, not yet. Not this... chrysalis. But I'm ready. I'm on a mission.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: What mission?

name: Ultron
line: Peace in our time.

name: Maria Hill
line: Rhodey!

name: Bruce Banner
line: Sorry!

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Don't turn green!

name: Bruce Banner
line: I won't!

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: [to Banner] Come!

name: Steve Rogers
line: Stark!

name: Iron Legion
line: We are here to help.

name: Tony
line: One sec, one sec I got this!

name: Iron Legion
line: We are here to help... [A half-destroyed Iron Legion bot uses its thrusters to hold itself aloft, advancing on Dr. Helen Cho.] We are here to help... Is unsafe. Please back away.

name: Ultron
line: Hmm. [The Iron Legion lowers its weapon, and Steve grabs it and throws it away for Thor to hit with his hammer.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: Thor!

name: Iron Legion
line: [Stark continues to try and attack of the Iron Legions with his fork] It's unsafe. It's unsafe. It's unsafe.

name: Tony
line: Come on! That's the one!

name: Iron Legion
line: It's unsafe. [He shuts it down and it falls to the floor. The fighting continues until Barton throws Cap's shield to him.]

name: Clint Barton
line: Cap!

name: Ultron
line: That was dramatic! I'm sorry, I know you mean well. You just didn't think it through. You want to protect the world, but you don't want it to change. How is humanity saved if it's not allowed to...evolve? [he picks up one of the dismembered Iron Legion bots] With these? These puppets? [he crushes the Iron Legion bot's head] There's only one path to peace: The Avengers' extinction.

name: Ultron
line: [after Thor destroys his body, Ultron starts singing] I had strings, but now I'm free. There are no strings on me, no strings on me. [we see Ultron has uploaded his consciousness in the abandoned Sokovia base]

name: Bruce Banner
line: All our work is gone. Ultron cleared out, used the internet as an escape hatch.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Ultron.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: He's been in everything. Files, surveillance. Probably knows more about us than we know about each other.

name: James Rhodes
line: He's in your files, he's in the internet. What if he decides to access something a little more exciting?

name: Maria Hill
line: Nuclear codes.

name: James Rhodes
line: Nuclear codes. Look, we need to make some calls, assuming we still can.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Nukes? He said he wanted us dead.

name: Steve Rogers
line: He didn't say dead. He said extinct.

name: Clint Barton
line: He also said he killed somebody.

name: Maria Hill
line: But there wasn't anyone else in the building.

name: Tony
line: Yes there was.

name: Bruce Banner
line: This is insane.

name: Steve Rogers
line: JARVIS was the first line of defense. He would've shut Ultron down, it makes sense.

name: Bruce Banner
line: No, Ultron could've assimilated Jarvis. This isn't strategy, this is...rage.

name: Clint Barton
line: Woah, woah, woah! It's going around.

name: Tony
line: [to Thor] Come on. Use your words, buddy.

name: Thor
line: I have more than enough words to describe you, Stark.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Thor! The Legionnaire.

name: Thor
line: Trail went cold about a hundred miles out but it's headed north, and it has the scepter. Now we have to retrieve it, again.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: The genie's out of that bottle. Clear and present is Ultron.

name: Helen Cho
line: I don't understand. You built this program. Why is it trying to kill us?

name: Thor
line: You think this is funny?

name: Tony
line: No. It's probably not, right? Is this very terrible? Is it so... is it so... it is. It's so terrible.

name: Thor
line: This could've been avoided if you hadn't played with something you don't understand.

name: Tony
line: No, I'm sorry. I'm sorry. It is funny. It's a hoot that you don't get why we need this.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Tony, maybe this might not be the time to--

name: Tony
line: Really?! That's it? You just roll over, show your belly, every time somebody snarls.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Only when I've created a murder bot.

name: Tony
line: We didn't. We weren't even close. Were we close to an interface?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Well, you did something right. And you did it right here. The Avengers were supposed to be different than SHIELD.

name: Tony
line: Anybody remember when I carried a nuke through a wormhole?

name: James Rhodes
line: No, it's never come up.

name: Tony
line: Saved New York?

name: James Rhodes
line: Never heard that.

name: Tony
line: Recall that? A hostile alien army came charging through a hole in space. We're standing three hundred feet below it. We're the Avengers. We can bust arms dealers all the live long day, but, that up there? That's... that's the end game. How were you guys planning on beating that?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Together.

name: Tony
line: We'll lose.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Then we'll do that together, too. [Stark looks at him for a moment before turning away] Thor's right. Ultron's calling us out. And I'd like to find him before he's ready for us. The world's a big place. Let's start making it smaller.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Talk. And if you are wasting our time...

name: Ultron
line: Did you know this church is in the exact center of the city? The elders decreed it so that everyone could be equally close to God. I like that. The geometry of belief. [Ultron is sat in a chair facing away from them, a cloth draped over him] You're wondering why you can't look inside my head.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Sometimes it's hard. But sooner or later, every man shows himself.

name: Ultron
line: Oh, I'm sure they do. But you needed something more than a man. That's why you let Stark take the scepter.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I didn't expect... But I saw Stark's fear, I knew it would control him, make him self-destruct.

name: Ultron
line: Everyone creates the thing they dread. Men of peace create engines of war, invaders create avengers, people create...smaller people? Uh...children! I lost the word there. Children. Designed to supplant them, to help them...end.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Is that why you've come? To end the Avengers?

name: Ultron
line: I've come to save the world. But also yeah. [In the Sokovia base.] We'll move out right away. This is a start, but there's something we need to begin the real work.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: [referring to Ultron's bots] All of these are...

name: Ultron
line: Me. I have what the Avengers never will. Harmony. They're discordant, disconnected. Stark's already got them turning on each other. And when you get inside the rest of their heads...

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: Everyone's plan is not to kill them.

name: Ultron
line: And make them martyrs? You need patience. Need to see the big picture.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: I don't see the big picture, I have a little picture. I take it out and look at it every day.

name: Ultron
line: You lost your parents in the bombings. I've seen the records.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: The records are not the picture.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Pietro.

name: Ultron
line: No, please.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: We were ten years old, having dinner, the four of us. When the first shell hits, two floors below, it makes a hole in the floor. It's big. Our parents go in, and the whole building starts coming apart. I grab her, roll under the bed and the second shell hits. But, it doesn't go off. It just... sits there in the rubble, three feet from our faces. And on the side of the shell is painted one word...

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Stark.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: We were trapped for two days.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Every effort to save us, every shift in the bricks, I think, "This will set it off." We wait for two days for Tony to kill us.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: I know what they are.

name: Ultron
line: I wondered why only you two survived Strucker's experiments. Now I don't. We will make it right. [to Pietro] You and I can hurt them. [to Wanda] But you will tear them apart, from the inside.

name: Maria Hill
line: He's all over the globe. Robotics labs, weapons facilities, jet propulsion labs, reports of a metal man, or men, coming in and emptying the place.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Fatalities?

name: Maria Hill
line: Only when engaged. Mostly guys left in a fugue state going on about old memories, worst fears, and something too fast to see.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Maximoffs. Well, that makes sense he'd go to them, they have someone in common.

name: Maria Hill
line: Not anymore.

name: Clint Barton
line: [Barton's talking on his cell phone] That's a negative. I answer to you. Yes, ma'am. [Steve interrupts him]

name: Steve Rogers
line: Barton, we might have something.

name: Clint Barton
line: Gotta go.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Who was that?

name: Clint Barton
line: Girlfriend. [after Steve has gathered the rest of the team he shows them the photo of Strucker's body]

name: Tony
line: What's this?

name: Steve Rogers
line: A message. Ultron killed Strucker.

name: Tony
line: And he did a Banksy at the crime scene, just for us.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: This is a smokescreen. Why send a message when you've just given a speech?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Strucker knew something that Ultron wanted us to miss.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Yeah, I bet he... [looks at the computer monitor] Yep. Everything we had on Strucker has been erased.

name: Tony
line: Not everything.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Known associates. Well, Strucker had a lot of friends.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Well, these people are all horrible.

name: Tony
line: Wait. I know that guy. [Banner passes him the photo he was looking at] From back in the day. He operates off the African coast, black market arms. [Steve gives him an accusing look] There are conventions, alright? You meet people, I didn't sell him anything. [we see the photo is of a man named Ulysses Klaue] He was talking about finding something new, a game changer, it was all very "Ahab."

name: Thor
line: [Thor points to the scar on the back of Klaue's neck] What's this?

name: Tony
line: Uh, it's a tattoo. I don't think he had it...

name: Thor
line: No, those are tattoos, this is a brand.

name: Bruce Banner
line: [Banner identifies the brand on Klaue's neck on the computer] Oh, yeah. It's a word in an African dialect meaning thief, in a much less friendly way.

name: Steve Rogers
line: What dialect?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Wakanada...? Wa...Wa...Wakanda.

name: Tony
line: If this guy got out of Wakanda with some of their trade goods...

name: Steve Rogers
line: I thought your father said he got the last of it?

name: Bruce Banner
line: I don't follow. What comes out of Wakanda?

name: Tony
line: [looking at Steve's shield] The strongest metal on earth.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [to Stark] Where is this guy now?

name: Ulysses Klaue
line: Don't tell me your man swindled you. I sent you six short range heat seekers and got a boat full of rusted parts. Now, you will make it right, or the next missile I send you will come very much faster. [he ends the call and connects to another call] Now, minister, where were we? [suddenly the lights go out causing a commotion in the salvage yard. The twins enter Klaue's office] Yeah. The enhanced. Strucker's prize pupils. [picks up a dish of candies from his desk] Want a candy? Oh, sorry to hear about Strucker. But then, he knew what kind of world he was helping create. Human life, not a growth market. [the twins look at each other] You...you didn't know? Is this your first time intimidating someone? I'm afraid that I'm not that afraid.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Everybody's afraid of something.

name: Ulysses Klaue
line: Cuttlefish. Deep sea fish. They make lights. disco lights. Whoom, whoom, whoom! to hypnotize their prey, then whoom! I saw a documentary, it was terrifying. [Pietro speeds over to pick up a candy from Klaue's desk, and Klaue jerks at the sudden movement] So if you're going to fiddle with my brain, and make me see a giant cuttlefish, then I know you don't do business, and I know you're not in charge, and I only deal with the man in charge.

name: Ultron
line: There is no "man" in charge. Let's talk business. [Klaue gives Ultron some vibranium from his stash] Upon this rock I will build my church. Vibranium.

name: Ulysses Klaue
line: You know, it came at great personal cost. It's worth billions.

name: Ultron
line: Now, so are you. It's all under your dummy holdings? Finance is so weird. But I always say, "Keep your friends rich and your enemies rich, and wait to find out which is which."

name: Ulysses Klaue
line: Stark.

name: Ultron
line: What?

name: Ulysses Klaue
line: Tony used to say that...to me. You're one of his.

name: Ultron
line: What?! I'm not...! [he grabs Klaue] I'm not. You think I'm one of Stark's puppets, his hollow men? I mean look at me, do I look like Iron Man? Stark is [he chops off Klaue's arm] I'm sorry. I am sor-- Ooh, I'm sure that's going to be okay. I'm sorry, it's just I don't understand. Don't compare me with Stark! It's a thing with me. Stark is, he's a sickness!

name: Tony
line: Ahh, Junior. [He lands, and Thor and Steve come up behind him] You're gonna break your old man's heart.

name: Ultron
line: If I have to.

name: Thor
line: We don't have to break anything.

name: Ultron
line: Clearly you've never made an omelet.

name: Tony
line: He beat me by one second.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: Ah, this is funny, Mr. Stark. It's what, comfortable? Like old times?

name: Tony
line: This was never my life.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [to the twins] You two can still walk away from this.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Oh, we will.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I know you've suffered.

name: Ultron
line: Uuughh! Captain America. God's righteous man, pretending you could live without a war. I can't physically throw up in my mouth, but...

name: Thor
line: If you believe in peace, then let us keep it.

name: Ultron
line: I think you're confusing peace with quiet.

name: Tony
line: Yuh-huh. What's the Vibranium for?

name: Ultron
line: I'm glad you asked that, because I wanted to take this time to explain my evil plan--

name: Ulysses Klaue
line: [as everyone else fights] Shoot them!

name: s Mercenary
line: Which ones?

name: Ulysses Klaue
line: All of them!

name: s Mercenary
line: [to his men] Move, move, move!

name: Steve Rogers
line: [after knocking down Pietro] Stay down, kid!

name: Ultron
line: [through a drone, to Wanda] It's time for some mind games.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Guys, is this a Code Green?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Thor! Status?

name: Thor
line: The girl tried to warp my mind. Take special care, I doubt a human could keep her at bay. Fortunately, I am mighty. [The scene transitions, and Thor seems himself at a party on Asgard]

name: Ultron
line: [As he packs up the Vibranium.] This is going very well.

name: Clint Barton
line: I've done the whole mind control thing. Not a fan. [just then Pietro speeds in, knocks down Barton, picks up Wanda and speeds off] Yeah, you better run. [we see Steve dropping his helmet and walking off; to the team] Whoever's standing, we gotta move! Guys?

name: Ballet Instructor
line: [to the students] Again.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: You'll break them.

name: Madame B
line: Only the breakable ones. You are made of marble. We'll celebrate after the graduation ceremony.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: What if I fail? [we see a younger Natasha being trained to be an assassin]

name: Madame B
line: You never fail.

name: Peggy Carter
line: Are you ready for our dance?

name: Heimdall
line: Is it him? Is that the first son of Odin?

name: Thor
line: Heimdall, your eyes?!

name: Heimdall
line: Oh, they see everything. They see you leading us to Hel. Wake up! [he then starts to strangle Thor]

name: Peggy Carter
line: The war's over, Steve. We can go home. Imagine it! [suddenly the dance hall is empty. Steve sees himself dancing with Peggy]

name: Thor
line: I can still save you.

name: Heimdall
line: We are all dead. Can you not see? [Thor pushes Heimdall from him] You're a destroyer, Odinson. See where your power leads. [Electricity hits Thor and spikes around the room, destroying things]

name: Madame B
line: Sloppy. Pretending to fail. The ceremony is necessary for you to take your place in the world.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I have no place in the world.

name: Madame B
line: Exactly.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: What can I do?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Ah, it hurts.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: I'm gonna kill him. I'll be right back.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: No. I'm over it. I want...I want to finish the plan. [looking at the Quinjet where Banner is waiting] I want the big one.

name: Ultron
line: Ah, the Vibranium's getting away.

name: Tony
line: And you're not going anywhere.

name: Ultron
line: Of course not, I'm already there. You'll catch on. But first, you might need to catch Dr. Banner.

name: Tony
line: News or footage, keyword: Hulk. [he sees news footage of Hulk destroying the city] Natasha, I could really use a lullaby.

name: Clint Barton
line: Well, that's not gonna happen. Not for a while. The whole team is down, you got no back up here.

name: Tony
line: I'm calling in VERONICA. [as Hulk is wreaking havoc on the nearest city Stark Tony comes brings out his Hulkbuster armor to stop him] Alright everybody, stand down! [to Hulk] You listening? That little witch is messing with your mind. You're stronger than her, you're smarter than her, you're Bruce Banner.

name: Tony
line: Right, right, right! Don't mention puny Banner. [Hulk throws a car at Stark and attacks him] Okay. [they start fighting, throwing each other around] In the back? Dick move, Banner. [they battle it out more but Stark is struggling to beat Hulk] VERONICA, gimme a hand. [as Hulk destroyed one of Stark's arms, VERONICA sends in a new one and Stark uses it to repeatedly punch Hulk] Go to sleep, go to sleep, go to sleep! [picking up Hulk] Okay, pal, we're gonna get you out of town. [as they head towards a building] No, not that way, not that way! [they crash through the building] Come on, Bruce! You gotta work with me! [Hulk continues to battle with him; as he stops an elevator, to the people inside] Everybody out! Going to get ugly! [after he knocks down Hulk] I'm sorry. [Hulk attacks Stark and pulls out parts of the Hulkbuster armor] Damage report. [the damaged computer buzzes a reply] That's comprehensive. Show me something. [the computer shows him the building ahead is clear of civilians] How quickly can we buy this building? [Stark drops Hulk through the building completely destroying it; at the same time the army arrives to intervene, as Hulk comes out of Wanda's mind-hold Stark knocks him out cold]

name: Maria Hill
line: The news is loving you guys. Nobody else is. There's been no official call for Banner's arrest, but it's in the air.

name: Tony
line: Stark Relief Foundation?

name: Maria Hill
line: Already on the scene. How's the team?

name: Tony
line: Everyone's...we took a hit. We'll shake it off.

name: Maria Hill
line: Well for now I'd stay in stealth mode, and stay away from here.

name: Tony
line: So, run and hide?

name: Maria Hill
line: Until we can find Ultron, I don't have a lot else to offer.

name: Tony
line: Neither do we. [he ends the call and switches off the monitor; to Barton, who's flying the Quinjet] Hey, you wanna switch out?

name: Clint Barton
line: No, I'm good. If you wanna get some kip, now's a good time, cause we're still a few hours out.

name: Tony
line: A few hours from where?

name: Clint Barton
line: A safe house.

name: Thor
line: What is this place?

name: Tony
line: A safe house?

name: Clint Barton
line: Let's hope. [they all enter the house] Honey, I'm home.

name: Clint Barton
line: Hi. Company. Sorry I didn't call ahead.

name: Laura Barton
line: Hey.

name: Tony
line: [Laura kisses Barton; to Thor] This is an agent of some kind.

name: Clint Barton
line: [introducing his wife to the team] Gentleman, this is Laura.

name: Laura Barton
line: I know all your names.

name: Clint Barton
line: Ooh, incoming. [Barton's children, Cooper and Lila, run in]

name: Lila Barton
line: Dad! [Barton picks up his daughter]

name: Clint Barton
line: Hi, sweetheart! [kissing the top of his son's head] Hey, buddy! How you guys doing? Ooh...

name: Tony
line: [to the others as they watch with surprise] These are...smaller agents.

name: Clint Barton
line: Look at your face! Oh, my goodness!

name: Lila Barton
line: Did you bring Auntie Nat?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Why don't you hug her and find out?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Sorry for barging in on you.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, we would have called ahead, but we were busy having no idea that you existed.

name: Clint Barton
line: Yeah, well Fury helped me set this up when I joined. He kept it off SHIELD's files, I'd like to keep it that way. I figure it's a good place to lay low.

name: Laura Barton
line: Honey. Ah, I missed you.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: [touching Laura's stomach] How's little Natasha, huh?

name: Laura Barton
line: She'sNathaniel.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Traitor.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Thor.

name: Thor
line: I saw something in that dream. I need answers, I won't find them here. [Thor uses his hammer to fly away; Steve turns to enter the house when he hears Peggy's voice from Wanda's vision]

name: Peggy Carter
line: We can go home.

name: Clint Barton
line: See, you worried for nothing. Can't even feel the difference, can you?

name: Laura Barton
line: If they're sleeping here, some of them are gonna have to double up.

name: Clint Barton
line: [Barton laughs] Yeah, that's not gonna sell.

name: Laura Barton
line: What about Nat and Dr. Banner? How long has that been going on?

name: Clint Barton
line: Has what?

name: Laura Barton
line: [Laura laughs] You are so cute.

name: Clint Barton
line: Nat and and Banner?

name: Laura Barton
line: I'll explain when you're older, Hawkeye.

name: Clint Barton
line: Oh. Okay.

name: Laura Barton
line: It's bad, right? Nat seems really shaken.

name: Clint Barton
line: Ultron has these allies, these uh, kids, they're punks really. They carry a big damn stick and Nat took a serious hit. Someone's gonna have to teach 'em some manners.

name: Laura Barton
line: And that someone be you. You know I totally support your Avenging, I couldn't be prouder. But I see those guys, those "Gods"...

name: Clint Barton
line: You don't think they need me.

name: Laura Barton
line: I think they do. Which is a lot scarier. They're a mess.

name: Clint Barton
line: Yeah. I guess they're my mess.

name: Laura Barton
line: You need to be sure that this team is really a team and that they have your back. Things are changing for us. In a few months time, you and me are gonna be outnumbered. I need-- ...just be sure.

name: Clint Barton
line: Yes, ma'am. [he kisses her, then as Laura places her arm around his waist she touches his wounded side]

name: Laura Barton
line: I can feel the difference.

name: Ultron
line: Scream, and your entire staff dies. I could've killed you, Helen, the night we met. I didn't.

name: Helen Cho
line: Do you expect a thank you note?

name: Ultron
line: I expect you to know why.

name: Helen Cho
line: The Cradle. [she hears her own recorded voice] "This is the next thing, Tony."

name: Ultron
line: This...is the next me.

name: Helen Cho
line: The regeneration cradle prints tissue, it can't build a living body.

name: Ultron
line: It can, you can. You lack the materials. You're a brilliant woman, Helen. But we all have room to improve. [Ultron uses the scepter to mind-control Cho]

name: Bruce Banner
line: I didn't realize you were waiting.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I would've joined you, but uh, it didn't seem like the right time.

name: Bruce Banner
line: They used up all the hot water.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I should've joined you.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Missed our window.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Did we?

name: Bruce Banner
line: The world just saw the Hulk. The real Hulk, for the first time. You know I have to leave.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: But you assume that I have to stay? I had this, um, dream. The kind that seems normal at the time, but when you wake...

name: Bruce Banner
line: What did you dream?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: That I was an Avenger. That I was anything more than the assassin they made me.

name: Bruce Banner
line: I think you're being hard on yourself.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Here I was hoping that was your job. [she moves closer to him]

name: Bruce Banner
line: What are you doing?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I'm running with it, with you. If running's the plan, as far as you want.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Are you out of your mind? [Banner turns away from her]

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I want you to understand that I'm...

name: Bruce Banner
line: Natasha, where can I go? Where in the world am I not a threat?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: You're not a threat to me.

name: Bruce Banner
line: You sure? Even if I didn't just... there's no future with me. I can't ever... I can't have this, kids. Do the math, I physically can't.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Neither can I. In the Red Room, where I was trained, where I was raised, um, they have a graduation ceremony. They sterilize you. It's efficient. One less thing to worry about. The one thing that might matter more than a mission. It makes everything easier. Even killing. [she hesitates a moment] You still think you're the only monster on the team?

name: Bruce Banner
line: What, so we disappear?

name: Tony
line: Thor didn't say where he was going for answers?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Sometimes my teammates don't tell me things. I was kind of hoping Thor would be the exception.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, give him time. We don't know what the Maximoff kid showed him.

name: Steve Rogers
line: "Earth's Mightiest Heroes." Pulled us apart like cotton candy.

name: Tony
line: Seems like you walked away all right.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Is that a problem?

name: Tony
line: I don't trust a guy without a dark side. Call me old fashioned.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Well let's just say you haven't seen it yet.

name: Tony
line: You know Ultron is trying to tear us apart, right?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Well I guess you'd know. Whether you tell us is a bit of a question.

name: Tony
line: Banner and I were doing research.

name: Steve Rogers
line: That would affect the team.

name: Tony
line: That would end the team. Isn't that the mission? Isn't that the "why" we fight, so we can end the fight, so we get to go home?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Every time someone tries to win a war before it starts, innocent people die. Every time.

name: Laura Barton
line: [Laura interrupts them] I'm sorry. Mr. Stark, uh, Clint said you wouldn't mind, but, our tractor, it doesn't seem to want to start at all. I thought maybe you might...

name: Tony
line: Yeah, I'll give her a kick. [to Steve as he turns to leave; referring to his pile of chopped wood] Don't take from my pile. [Stark enters the barn and walks over to the tractor] Hello, Deere. Tell me everything. What ails you?

name: Nick Fury
line: Do me a favor. Try not to bring it to life.

name: Tony
line: Ah, Mrs. Barton, you little minx. I get it, Maria Hill called you, right? Was she ever not working for you?

name: Nick Fury
line: Artificial intelligence. You never even hesitated.

name: Tony
line: Look, it's been a really long day, like, Eugene O'Neill long, so how's about we skip to the part where you're useful?

name: Nick Fury
line: Look me in the eye and tell me you're going to shut him down.

name: Tony
line: You're not the director of me.

name: Nick Fury
line: I'm not the director of anybody. I'm just an old man, who cares very much about you.

name: Tony
line: And I'm the man who killed the Avengers. I saw it. I didn't tell the team, how could I? I saw them all dead, Nick. I felt it. The whole world, too. It's because of me. I wasn't ready. I didn't do all I could.

name: Nick Fury
line: The Maximoff girl, she's working you, Stark. Playing on your fear.

name: Tony
line: I wasn't tricked, I was shown. It wasn't a nightmare, it was my legacy. The end of the path I started us on.

name: Nick Fury
line: You've come up with some pretty impressive inventions, Tony. War isn't one of them.

name: Tony
line: I watched my friends die. You'd think that'd be as bad as it gets, right? Nope. Wasn't the worst part.

name: Nick Fury
line: The worst part is that you didn't.

name: Erik Selvig
line: I like the look. If you're going for inconspicuous, though, near miss.

name: Thor
line: I need your help.

name: Erik Selvig
line: It's nice to be needed.

name: Thor
line: It's dangerous.

name: Erik Selvig
line: I'd be disappointed if it wasn't.

name: Nick Fury
line: Ultron took you folks out of play to buy himself time. My contacts all say he's building something. The amount of Vibranium he made off with, I don't think it's just one thing.

name: Steve Rogers
line: What about Ultron himself?

name: Nick Fury
line: Ah. He's easy to track, he's everywhere. Guy's multiplying faster than a Catholic rabbit. Still doesn't help us get an angle on any of his plans though.

name: Tony
line: He still going after launch codes?

name: Nick Fury
line: Yes, he is, but he's not making any headway.

name: Tony
line: I cracked the Pentagon's firewall in high school on a dare.

name: Nick Fury
line: Yeah, well, I contacted our friends at the NEXUS about that.

name: Steve Rogers
line: NEXUS?

name: Bruce Banner
line: It's the world internet hub in Oslo, every byte of data flows through there, fastest access on earth.

name: Clint Barton
line: So what'd they say?

name: Nick Fury
line: He's fixated on the missiles, but the codes are constantly being changed.

name: Tony
line: By whom?

name: Nick Fury
line: Parties unknown.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Do we have an ally?

name: Nick Fury
line: Ultron's got an enemy, that's not the same thing. Still, I'd pay folding money to know who it is.

name: Tony
line: I might need to visit Oslo, find our "unknown."

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Well, this is good times, boss, but I was kind of hoping when I saw you, you'd have more than that.

name: Nick Fury
line: I do, I have you. Back in the day, I had eyes everywhere, ears everywhere else. Here we all are, back on earth, with nothing but our wit, and our will to save the world. So stand. Outwit the platinum bastard.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Steve doesn't like that kind of talk.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You know what, Romanoff? [Natasha smiles mischievously at him]

name: Nick Fury
line: So what does he want?

name: Steve Rogers
line: To become better. Better than us. He keeps building bodies.

name: Tony
line: Person bodies. The human form is inefficient, biologically speaking, we're outmoded. But he keeps coming back to it.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: When you two programmed him to protect the human race, you amazingly failed.

name: Bruce Banner
line: They don't need to be protected, they need to evolve. Ultron's going to evolve.

name: Nick Fury
line: How?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Has anyone been in contact with Helen Cho?

name: Helen Cho
line: It's beautiful. The Vibranium atoms aren't just compatible with the tissue cells, they're binding them. And SHIELD never even thought--

name: Ultron
line: The most versatile substance on the planet and they used it to make a Frisbee. Typical of humans, they scratch the surface and never think to look within. [Ultron uses a laser to break open the scepter's blue gem, and a yellow gem that was inside floats out and lands in his hand. He places it in the head of the body]

name: Steve Rogers
line: I'll take Natasha and Clint.

name: Tony
line: Alright, strictly recon. I'll hit the NEXUS, I'll join you as soon as I can.

name: Steve Rogers
line: If Ultron is really building a body...

name: Tony
line: He'll be more powerful than any of us. Maybe all of us. An android designed by a robot.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You know I really miss the days when the weirdest thing science ever created was me.

name: Nick Fury
line: I'll drop Banner off at the tower. Do you mind if I borrow Ms. Hill?

name: Tony
line: She's all yours, apparently.

name: Steve Rogers
line: What are you gonna do?

name: Nick Fury
line: I don't know. Something dramatic, I hope.

name: Clint Barton
line: I'm gonna finish re-flooring that sunroom as soon as I get back.

name: Laura Barton
line: Yeah, and then you'll find another part of the house to tear apart.

name: Clint Barton
line: No. It's the last project. I promise. [he kisses her; later Laura watches them fly off in the Quinjet]

name: Erik Selvig
line: This is it. The Water of Sight.

name: Thor
line: In every realm, there's a reflection. If the water spirits accept me, I can return to my dream, and find what I missed.

name: Erik Selvig
line: The men who enter that water, the legends don't end well.

name: Tony
line: A hacker who's faster than Ultron? He could be anywhere. And as this is the center of everything, I'm just a guy looking for a needle in the world's biggest haystack.

name: World Hub Tech
line: How do you find it?

name: Tony
line: Pretty simple. You bring a magnet. [he starts playfully singing as he types] Oh, I'm decrypting nuclear codes and you don't want me to. Come and get me.

name: Heimdall
line: Wake up! [Thor starts getting electric charges going through his body]

name: Erik Selvig
line: Thor!

name: Ultron
line: [In Thor's visions;] Extinction.

name: Helen Cho
line: Cellular cohesion will take a few hours, but we can initiate the consciousness stream. We're uploading your cerebral matrix...now.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I can read him. He is dreaming.

name: Helen Cho
line: I wouldn't call it dreams. It's Ultron's base consciousness, informational noise. Soon...

name: Ultron
line: How soon? I'm not being pushy.

name: Helen Cho
line: We're imprinting a physical brain. There are no shortcuts. Even if your magic gem is...

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: How could you?

name: Ultron
line: How could I what?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: You said we would destroy the Avengers, make a better world.

name: Ultron
line: It will be better.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: When everyone is dead.

name: Ultron
line: That is not-- The human race will have every opportunity to improve.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: And if they don't?

name: Ultron
line: Ask Noah.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: You're a madman.

name: Ultron
line: There were more than a dozen extinction level events before even the dinosaurs got theirs. When the Earth starts to settle, God throws a stone at it, and believe me, he's winding up. We have to evolve. There's no room for the weak.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: And who decides who's weak?

name: Ultron
line: Life. Life always decides. There's incoming. The Quinjet. We have to move.

name: Helen Cho
line: That's not a problem. [Cho cancels the upload to Ultron's consciousness]

name: Ultron
line: Ugh. [Ultron blasts Cho, Wanda and Pietro run off] Ah, wait, guys! [he blasts Cho's technicians] They'll understand. When they see they'll understand. I just need a little more time. [unplugs himself from the Cradle]

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Steve is on U-Gin Genetic Research Lab roof; to the others] Two minutes. Stay close. [inside the lab Steve finds Cho wounded] Dr. Cho!

name: Helen Cho
line: He's uploading himself into the body.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Where?

name: Helen Cho
line: The real power is inside the Cradle. The gem, its power is uncontainable. You can't just blow it up. You have to get the Cradle to Stark.

name: Steve Rogers
line: First I have to find it.

name: Helen Cho
line: Go.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [over the Quinjets comms] Did you guys copy that?

name: Clint Barton
line: We did.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I got a private jet taking off, across town, no manifest. That could be him.

name: Clint Barton
line: [noticing a truck heading across a bridge] There. It's a truck from the lab. Right above you, Cap. On the loop by the bridge. It's them. I got three with the Cradle, one in the cab. I could take out the driver.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Negative! If that truck crashes, the gem could level the city. We need to draw out Ultron. [Steve jumps onto the roof of the truck]

name: Ultron
line: No, no, no, no, no. Leave me alone!

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Ultron blasts the truck door as Steve tries to enter] Well, he's definitely unhappy! I'm gonna try and keep him that way.

name: Clint Barton
line: You're not a match for him, Cap.

name: Steve Rogers
