line: Thanks, Barton. [Ultron unplugs himself from the Cradle and blasts Steve back onto another car as he tries to enter the truck, but with some maneuvering Steve manages to get back onto the truck's roof]

name: Ultron
line: You know what's in that Cradle? The power to make real change, and that terrifies you.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I wouldn't call it a comfort. [Steve tries to fight with Ultron]

name: Ultron
line: Stop it! [Steves shield gets caught in his chest, and he smacks it away and fires at Steve]

name: Clint Barton
line: [to Natasha] We got a window. Four, three give 'em hell.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I'm always picking up after you boys.

name: Clint Barton
line: They're heading under the overpass, I've got no shot.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Which way?

name: Clint Barton
line: Hard right... Now. [Natasha heads over the truck. She throws Steve back his shield and he uses it to knock Ultron away from him]

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: [to the pedestrians on the pavement as she chases after the truck on her bike] Out of the way, coming through! Sorry, coming through!

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Steve continues his battle with Ultron on top of the truck] Come on!

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Clint, can you draw out the guards?

name: Clint Barton
line: Let's find out.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: [to the pedestrians in her way] Beep beep!

name: Clint Barton
line: Heading back towards you. So whatever youre gonna do, do it now.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I'm going in. Cap, can you keep him occupied?

name: Steve Rogers
line: [as he continues his battle with Ultron on a speeding train] What do you think I've been doing?

name: Clint Barton
line: The package is airborne. I have a clean shot.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Negative. I am still in the truck.

name: Clint Barton
line: What the hell are you...?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Just be ready, I'm sending the package to you.

name: Clint Barton
line: How do you want me to take it?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Uhh, you might wish you hadn't asked that.

name: Ultron
line: Please. Don't do this.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: What choice do we have?

name: Steve Rogers
line: I lost him! He's headed your way!

name: Clint Barton
line: Nat, we gotta go.

name: Clint Barton
line: Nat! Cap, you see Nat?

name: Steve Rogers
line: If you have the package, get it to Stark! Go!

name: Clint Barton
line: Do you have eyes on Nat?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Go! [reluctantly Barton takes off in the Quinjet; back to the train] Civilians in our path. [Pietro speeds off; to Wanda] Can you stop this thing? [as Pietro picks up civilians and moves them out of the way of the train, Wanda uses her powers and stops the train]

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: I'm fine. I just need to take a minute.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I'm very tempted not to give you one.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: The Cradle, did you get it?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Stark will take care of it.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: No, he won't.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You don't know what you're talking about, Stark's not crazy.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: He will do anything to make things right.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Stark, come in. Stark. Anyone on comms?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Ultron can't tell the difference between saving the world and destroying it. Where do you think he gets that?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Anything on Nat?

name: Tony
line: Haven't heard. But she's alive, or Ultron'd be rubbing our faces in it.

name: Clint Barton
line: This is sealed tight.

name: Bruce Banner
line: We're going to need to access the program, break it down from within.

name: Tony
line: Hm. Any chance Natasha might leave you a message, outside the internet, old school spy stuff?

name: Clint Barton
line: There's some nets I can cast. Yeah, alright. I'll find her. [Barton leaves]

name: Bruce Banner
line: I can work on tissue degeneration, if you can fry whatever operational system Cho implanted.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, about that.

name: Bruce Banner
line: [Banner looks at Stark] No.

name: Tony
line: You have to trust me.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Kinda don't.

name: Tony
line: Our ally? The guy protecting the military's nuclear codes? I found him. [he brings up the 3D image of Jarvis's consciousness]

name: JARVIS
line: Hello, Dr. Banner.

name: Tony
line: Ultron didn't go after JARVIS cause he was angry. He attacked him because he was scared of what he can do. So JARVIS went underground. Okay? Scattered, dumped his memory. But not his protocols. He didn't even know he was in there, until I pieced him together.

name: Bruce Banner
line: So, you want me to help you put JARVIS into this thing?

name: Tony
line: No, of course not! I want to help you put JARVIS in this thing. [Banner shakes his head] We're out of my field here. You know bio-organics better than anyone.

name: Bruce Banner
line: And you just assume that JARVIS' operational matrix can beat Ultron's?

name: Tony
line: JARVIS has been beating him from inside without knowing it. This is the opportunity, we can create Ultron's perfect self, without the homicidal glitches he thinks are his winning personality. We have to.

name: JARVIS
line: I believe it's worth a go.

name: Bruce Banner
line: No, I'm in a loop! I'm caught in a time loop, this is exactly where it all went wrong.

name: Tony
line: I know, I know. I know what everyone's going to say, but they're already saying it. We're mad scientists. We're monsters, buddy. You gotta own it. Make a stand. [Banner shakes his head] It's not a loop. It's the end of the line.

name: Ultron
line: [as Natasha becomes conscious] I wasn't sure you'd wake up. I hoped you would, I wanted to show you something. I don't have anyone else. I think a lot about meteors, the purity of them. Boom! The end, start again. The world made clean for the new man to rebuild. I was meant to be new. I was meant to be beautiful. The world would've looked to the sky and seen hope, seen mercy. Instead they'll look up in horror because of you. You've wounded me. I give you full marks for that. But, like the man said, "What doesn't kill me" [a bigger body of Ultron's destroys him] "just makes me stronger." [he locks Natasha in a cell]

name: Tony
line: This framework is not compatible.

name: Bruce Banner
line: The genetic coding tower's at ninety-seven percent. You have got to upload that schematic in the next three minutes.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I'm gonna say this once.

name: Tony
line: How about "nonce"?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Shut it down!

name: Tony
line: Nope, not gonna happen.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You don't know what you're doing.

name: Bruce Banner
line: And you do? She's not in your head?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I know you're angry.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Oh, we're way past that. I could choke the life out of you and never change a shade.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Banner, after everything that's happened--

name: Tony
line: That's nothing compared to what's coming!

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: You don't know what's in there!

name: Steve Rogers
line: This isn't a game--

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: The creature--

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: No, no. Go on. You were saying?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Pietro!

name: Clint Barton
line: What? You didn't see that coming?

name: Tony
line: I'm rerouting the upload.

name: Bruce Banner
line: [to Wanda, as he grabs her] Go ahead, piss me off. [After some fighting, Thor enters and hits the cradle with his hammer, sending a powerful bolt of lightning through it that brings the body to life] Wait! [they all look in shock at the new entity]

name: Vision
line: [In JARVIS' voice, as everyone gathers around him] I'm sorry, that was...odd. [to Thor] Thank you.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Thor, you helped create this?

name: Thor
line: I've had a vision. A whirlpool that sucks in all hope of life and at its center is that. [he points to the gem inside Vision's head]

name: Bruce Banner
line: What, the gem?

name: Thor
line: It's the Mind Stone. It's one of the six Infinity Stones, the greatest power in the universe, unparalleled in its destructive capabilities.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Then why would you bring it to...

name: Thor
line: Because Stark is right.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Oh, it's definitely the end times.

name: Thor
line: The Avengers cannot defeat Ultron.

name: Vision
line: Not alone.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Why does your "vision" sound like JARVIS?

name: Tony
line: We... reconfigured JARVIS' matrix to create something new.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I think I've had my fill of new.

name: Vision
line: You think I'm a child of Ultron?

name: Steve Rogers
line: You're not?

name: Vision
line: I'm not Ultron. I'm not JARVIS. I am... I am.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I looked in your head and saw annihilation.

name: Vision
line: Look again.

name: Clint Barton
line: Yeah. Her seal of approval means jack to me.

name: Thor
line: Their powers, the horrors in our heads, Ultron himself, they all came from the Mind Stone, and they're nothing compared to what it can unleash. But with it on our side...

name: Steve Rogers
line: Is it? Are you? On our side?

name: Vision
line: I don't think it's that simple.

name: Clint Barton
line: Well it better get real simple real soon.

name: Vision
line: I am on the side of life. Ultron isn't, he will end it all.

name: Tony
line: What's he waiting for?

name: Vision
line: You.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Where?

name: Clint Barton
line: Sokovia. He's got Nat there too.

name: Bruce Banner
line: If we're wrong about you, if you're the monster that Ultron made you to be...

name: Vision
line: What will you do? [he looks around at them all] I don't want to kill Ultron. He's unique, and he's in pain. But that pain will roll over the earth, so he must be destroyed. Every form he's built, every trace of his presence on the net, we have to act now. And not one of us can do it without the others. Maybe I am a monster. I don't think I'd know if I were one. I'm not what you are, and not what you intended. So there may be no way to make you trust me. But we need to go. [he holds up Thor's hammer as everyone stares in shock. When Thor takes it, Vision walks off.]

name: Thor
line: Right. [pats Stark on the shoulder] Well done.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [to the others] Three minutes. Get what you need.

name: FRIDAY
line: Good evening, boss.

name: Tony
line: No way we all get through this. If even one tin soldier is left standing, we've lost. It's gonna be blood on the floor.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I got no plans tomorrow night.

name: Tony
line: I get first crack at the big guy. Iron Man's the one he's waiting for.

name: Vision
line: [walks past] That's true, he hates you the most.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Ultron knows we're coming. Odds are we'll be riding into heavy fire, and that's what we signed up for. But the people of Sokovia, they didn't. So our priority is getting them out.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: We're under attack! Clear the city, now! [no one takes this seriously so Pietro returns with a rifle and starts shooting in the air] Get off your asses.

name: Steve Rogers
line: All they want is to live their lives in peace, and that's not going to happen today. But we can do our best to protect them. And we can get the job done, and find out what Ultron's been building. We find Romanoff, and we clear the field. Keep the fight between us. Ultron thinks we're monsters and we're what's wrong with the world. This isn't just about beating him. It's about whether he's right.

name: Bruce Banner
line: [inside her cell, Natasha hears Banner's voice] Natasha! Natasha!

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Bruce?

name: Bruce Banner
line: [he walks over to her cell] You alright?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Yeah.

name: Bruce Banner
line: The team's in the city, it's about to light up.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I don't suppose you found a key lying around somewhere?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Yeah, I did. [holds up an alien rifle and blasts the cell door open]

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: So what's our play?

name: Bruce Banner
line: I'm here to get you to safety.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Job's not finished.

name: Bruce Banner
line: We could help with the evacuation, but I can't be in a fight near civilians. And you've done plenty. Our fight is over.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: So we just disappear?

name: FRIDAY
line: [as the city is being evacuated] Your man's in the church, boss. I think he's waiting for you. [Stark flies into the church]

name: Ultron
line: Come to confess your sins?

name: Tony
line: I don't know, how much time you got?

name: Ultron
line: More than you.

name: Tony
line: Uhhh. Have you been juicing? A little Vibranium cocktail? You're looking, I don't wanna say, puffy...

name: Ultron
line: You're stalling to protect the people.

name: Tony
line: Well, that is the mission. Did you forget?

name: Ultron
line: I've moved beyond your mission. I'm free. [the Vibranium core he's placed beneath the floor erupts] What, you think you're the only one stalling?

name: FRIDAY
line: There's the rest of the Vibranium. Function: still unclear.

name: Ultron
line: This is how you end, Tony. This is peace in my time.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Go!

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Get off the bridge! Run!

name: Vision
line: Ultron.

name: Ultron
line: My Vision. They really did take everything from me.

name: Vision
line: You set the terms, you can change them.

name: Ultron
line: Alright.

name: Tony
line: FRIDAY! The Vision?

name: FRIDAY
line: Boss, it's working. He's burning Ultron out of the net, he won't escape through there.

name: Ultron
line: [to the Vision as he throws him away] You shut me out! You think I care? You take away my world, I take away yours. [he activates the Vibranium core, and the earth around Sokovia starts to crack]

name: Tony
line: FRIDAY?

name: FRIDAY
line: Sokovia's going for a ride.

name: Ultron
line: [as Sokovia is rising into the air] Do you see? The beauty of it, the inevitability. You rise, only to fall. You, Avengers, you are my meteor, my swift and terrible sword and the earth will crack with the weight of your failure. Purge me from your computers, turn my own flesh against me. It means nothing. When the dust settles, the only thing living in this world will be metal.

name: Bruce Banner
line: [as the earth is shaking falling in around them] We gotta move.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: You're not going to turn green?

name: Bruce Banner
line: I've got a compelling reason not to lose my cool.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I adore you. [she kisses Banner then pushes him off the edge] But I need the other guy. [the Hulk jumps up in front of her] Let's finish the job. [with Natasha on his back yelling in fright, Hulk gets into the city] I really hope this makes us even. Now go be a hero. [Hulk goes off and Natasha rushes off in the opposite direction]

name: FRIDAY
line: The Vibranium core has got a magnetic field, that's what's keeping the rock together.

name: Tony
line: If it drops?

name: FRIDAY
line: Right now the impact would kill thousands. Once it gets high enough: Global extinction. [Stark flies towards the city and a building starts to collapse as the ground shakes] That building's not clear, the tenth floor. [Stark flies in to find a family still in their apartment]

name: Tony
line: Hi. Okay. Get in the tub! [Stark flies the family in the tub out of the collapsing building]

name: FRIDAY
line: I got airborne, heading up to the bridge.

name: Tony
line: Cap, you got incoming.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Incoming already came in. Stark, you worry about bringing the city back down safely. The rest of us have one job: tear these things apart. You get hurt, hurt 'em back. You get killed, walk it off.

name: Clint Barton
line: Go, go, move!

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: How could I let this happen? [Wanda starts to break down]

name: Clint Barton
line: Hey, hey, you okay?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: This is all our fault.

name: Clint Barton
line: Hey, look at me. It's your fault, it's everyone's fault, who cares. Are you up for this? Are you? Look, I just need to know, cause the city is flying. Okay, look, the city is flying, we're fighting an army of robots, and I have a bow and arrow. None of this makes sense. But I'm going back out there because it's my job. Okay? And I can't do my job and babysit. It doesn't matter what you did, or what you were. If you go out there, you fight, and you fight to kill. Stay in here, you're good, I'll send your brother to come find you, but if you step out that door, you are an Avenger. [Wanda just looks at him] Alright, good chat. [he gets up and gets ready to leave] Yeah, the city is flying. [he leaves and starts shooting at the robots]

name: Steve Rogers
line: [to the woman Thor threw up at Steve after her car fell of the edge of a collapsing bridge] I got you! Just look at me. [Steve helps her up to safety]

name: Ultron
line: You can't save them all. You'll never-- [he throws the attacking robots off the edge of the bridge]

name: Steve Rogers
line: You'll never what? You didn't finish! [Thor lands on the bridge on the top of another car he was saving] What, were you napping?

name: Ultron
line: [as Thor and Steve are fighting off the robots] Thor! You're bothering me.

name: Clint Barton
line: Alright, we're all clear here.

name: Steve Rogers
line: We are not clear! We are very not clear!

name: Clint Barton
line: Alright, coming to you. [just then Pietro speeds in, picks up Wanda and leaves]

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: Keep up old man!

name: Clint Barton
line: [Barton aims an arrow at Pietro] Nobody would know. Nobody. [He starts jogging towards the action.] "The last I saw him, when Ultron was sitting on him. Uh...yeah, he'll be missed, that quick little bastard. I miss him already."

name: Soldier
line: [as Wanda uses her powers to destroy the robots] Hold your fire!

name: Steve Rogers
line: [as Natasha joins them in their battle with the robots] Romanoff!

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Thanks.

name: FRIDAY
line: The anti-gravs are rigged to flip. Touch 'em, they'll go full reverse thrust. The city's not coming down slow.

name: Tony
line: The spire's Vibranium. If I get Thor to hit it...

name: FRIDAY
line: It'll crack, but that's not enough, the impact would still be devastating.

name: Tony
line: Maybe if we cap the other end, keep the atomic action doubling back.

name: FRIDAY
line: That could vaporize the city, and everyone on it.

name: Steve Rogers
line: The next wave's gonna hit any minute. What have you got, Stark?

name: Tony
line: Well, nothing great. Maybe a way to blow up the city. That'll keep it from impacting the surface if you guys can get clear.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I asked for a solution, not an escape plan.

name: Tony
line: Impact radius is getting bigger every second. We're going to have to make a choice.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Cap, these people are going nowhere. If Stark finds a way to blow this rock...

name: Steve Rogers
line: Not 'til everyone's safe.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Everyone up here versus everyone down there? There's no math there.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I'm not leaving this rock with one civilian on it.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I didn't say we should leave. [Steve turns to look at her] There's worse ways to go. Where else am I gonna get a view like this?

name: Nick Fury
line: [over comms] Glad you like the view, Romanoff. It's about to get better. [the Helicarrier show up; cut to interior] Nice, right? I pulled her out of mothballs with a couple of old friends. She's dusty, but she'll do.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Fury, you son of a bitch.

name: Nick Fury
line: Oooh! You kiss your mother with that mouth?

name: Maria Hill
line: Altitude is eighteen thousand and climbing.

name: Specialist Cameron Klein
line: Lifeboats secure to deploy. Disengage in three, two... take 'em out.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: [as they watch the lifeboats fly in towards them] This is SHIELD?

name: Steve Rogers
line: This is what SHIELD's supposed to be.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: This is not so bad.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Let's load 'em up.

name: Maria Hill
line: Sir, we have multiple bogies converging on our starboard flank.

name: Nick Fury
line: Show 'em what we got.

name: Maria Hill
line: You're up.

name: James Rhodes
line: Yes! Now this is gonna be a good story.

name: Tony
line: Yep. If you live to tell it.

name: James Rhodes
line: You think I can't hold my own?

name: Tony
line: We get through this, I'll hold your own.

name: James Rhodes
line: You had to make it weird.

name: Clint Barton
line: [as the team helps the people onto the Helicarrier lifeboats] Alright, let's load 'em up! Alright, here we go. Here we go, let's move. Let's go everyone!

name: Specialist Cameron Klein
line: Number six boat is topped and locked. Or, uh, or stocked, topped. It... it's, uh, full of people.

name: Maria Hill
line: Incoming! [one of the robots crashes in through the Helicarrier window]

name: Specialist Cameron Klein
line: Oh, God! [Hill shoots at it and Fury stabs in with a piece of metal, destroying it]

name: Ultron
line: [as he's hitting Thor] You think you're saving anyone? I turn that key and drop this rock a little early and it's still billions dead. Even you can't stop that.

name: Thor
line: I am Thor, son of Odin, and as long as there is life in my breast, I am...running out of things to say! Are you ready? [Vision uses Thor's hammer to hit Ultron. Vision then throws the hammer back to Thor]

name: Vision
line: It's terribly well balanced.

name: Thor
line: Well, if there's too much weight, you lose power on the swing, so.

name: Tony
line: I got it! Create a heat seal. I can...I can supercharge the spire from below.

name: FRIDAY
line: Running numbers. [Stark fights off the robots from the Helicarrier's lifeboats] A heat seal could work with enough power.

name: Tony
line: Thor, I got a plan!

name: Thor
line: We're out of time. They're coming for the core.

name: Tony
line: Rhodey, get the rest of the people on board that carrier.

name: James Rhodes
line: On it.

name: Tony
line: Avengers, time to work for a living.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: [the rest of the team joins Thor and Vision; to Wanda] You good?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Yeah.

name: Tony
line: Romanoff? You and Banner better not be playing "hide the zucchini."

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Relax, Shell-head. Not all of us can fly. [as she joins the rest of the team] What's the drill?

name: Tony
line: [points to the Vibranium core] This is the drill. If Ultron gets a hand on the core, we lose.

name: Thor
line: Is that the best you can do?

name: Steve Rogers
line: You had to ask.

name: Ultron
line: This is the best I can do. This is exactly what I wanted. All of you, against all of me. How could you possibly hope to stop me?

name: Tony
line: Well, like the old man said. Together.

name: Ultron
line: You know, with the benefit of hin[A cinematic sequence; they all collectively fight off Ultron's robots with their own respective abilities. Ultron and Vision start battling it out. After a moment, Thor and Stark join him. The combined power is enough to damage Ultron's Vibranium body.]dsight-- [Hulk interrupts him by knocking him far away. The robots start to retreat]

name: Thor
line: They'll try to leave the city.

name: Tony
line: We can't let 'em, not even one. Rhodey!

name: James Rhodes
line: I'm on it. [to the approaching robots] Oh, no, I didn't say you could leave. War Machine, comin' at you, right-- [Vision flies in and helps to destroy the robots] Okay, what?

name: Steve Rogers
line: We gotta move out. Even I can tell the air is getting thin. You guys get to the boats, I'll sweep for stragglers, be right behind you.

name: Clint Barton
line: What about the core?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I'll protect it. It's my job. [Steve, Barton and Natasha leave; to Pietro] Get the people on the boats.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: I'm not going to leave you here.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I can handle this. [she blasts off an approaching robot] Come back for me when everyone else is off, not before.

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: Hmm.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: You understand?

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: You know, I'm twelve minutes older than you.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: [Wanda chuckles] Go.

name: FRIDAY
line: Boss, power levels are way below opt...

name: Tony
line: Re-route everything. We get one shot at this.

name: Clint Barton
line: I know what I need to do. The dining room! If I knock out that east wall, it'll make a nice work space for Laura, huh? Put up some baffling, she can't hear the kids running around, what do you think?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: You guys always eat in the kitchen anyway.

name: Clint Barton
line: No one eats in a dining room. [they reach the lifeboats] We don't have a lot of time.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: So get your ass on a boat. [Natasha finds the Hulk] Hey, big guy. Sun's getting real low.

name: Zrinka
line: Costel? We were in the market. Costel?!

name: Tony
line: Thor, I'm gonna need you back in the church.

name: Thor
line: [referring to the people getting onto the lifeboats; to Steve] Is this the last of them?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Yeah. Everyone else is on the carrier.

name: Tony
line: You know, if this works, we maybe don't walk away.

name: Thor
line: Maybe not.

name: Ultron
line: [sings] I got no strings, so I have fun. I'm not tied up to anyone. [as Barton is saving the boy, Costel, Ultron starts shooting at them. Barton prepares to take the shots to save the kid, but Pietro runs into the line of fire and takes the shots to save both of them]

name: Pietro Maximoff
line: You didn't see that coming. [Pietro falls to the ground as he dies. In the church, Wanda senses his death, causing her to fall in despair, and release a wave of energy that destroys all the robots around her.]

name: Ultron
line: Oh, for God's sake!

name: Clint Barton
line: No, no. I'm fine. [Barton lies down next to the dead body of Pietro] Oh, it's been a long day.

name: Ultron
line: Wanda. If you stay here, you'll die.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I just did. Do you know how it felt? [she uses her power to rip Ultron's core out of his body] It felt like that.

name: Tony
line: Thor, on my mark. [Thor brings on a blast of lightning, at the same time Vision flies in, picks up Wanda and flies off with her as the city is being destroyed] Now!

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: [to Hulk from a screen as he remains on the jet he knocked Ultron out of] Hey, big guy. We did it, the job's finished. Now I need you to turn this bird around, okay? We can't track you in stealth mode, so help me out. I need you t-- [Hulk turns off Natasha's camera, then sits as the jet flies off to an unknown destination]

name: Vision
line: You're afraid.

name: Ultron
line: Of you?

name: Vision
line: Of death. You're the last one.

name: Ultron
line: You were supposed to be the last. Stark asked for a savior, and settled for a slave.

name: Vision
line: I suppose we're both disappointments.

name: Ultron
line: [Ultron chuckles] I suppose we are.

name: Vision
line: Humans are odd. They think order and chaos are somehow opposites, and try to control what won't be. But there is grace in their failings. I think you missed that.

name: Ultron
line: They're doomed.

name: Vision
line: Yes. But a thing isn't beautiful because it lasts. It's a privilege to be among them.

name: Ultron
line: You're unbearably naive.

name: Vision
line: Well, I was born yesterday. [as Ultron goes to attack him Vision uses the infinity stone in his head to destroy him]

name: Laura Barton
line: [From a video of Barton's new baby on Natasha's phone] Say hi to Auntie Nat. [Natasha sees the baby has been named Nathaniel Pietro Barton]

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Fat.

name: Nick Fury
line: One of our tech boys flagged this, splashed down in the Banda Sea. Could be the Quinjet. But with Stark's stealth tech, we still can't track the damn thing.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Right.

name: Nick Fury
line: Probably jumped out and swam to Fiji. He'll send a postcard.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: "Wish you were here." You sent me to recruit him, way back when. Did you know then what was going to happen?

name: Nick Fury
line: You never know. You hope for the best and make do with what you get. I got a great team.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Nothing lasts forever.

name: Nick Fury
line: Trouble, Miss Romanoff. No matter who wins or loses, trouble still comes around.

name: Steve Rogers
line: The rules have changed.

name: Tony
line: We're dealing with something new.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Well, the Vision's artificial intelligence.

name: Tony
line: A machine.

name: Steve Rogers
line: So it doesn't count.

name: Tony
line: No. It's not like a person lifting the hammer.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Right. Different rules for us.

name: Tony
line: Nice guy, but artificial.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Thank you.

name: Thor
line: If he can wield the hammer, he can keep the Mind Stone. It's safe with the Vision and these days, safe is in short supply.

name: Steve Rogers
line: But if you put the hammer in an elevator...

name: Tony
line: It would still go up.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Elevator's not worthy.

name: Thor
line: I'm going to miss these little talks of ours.

name: Tony
line: Well, not if you don't leave.

name: Thor
line: I have no choice. The Mind Stone is the fourth of the Infinity Stones to show up in the last few years. That's not a coincidence. Someone has been playing an intricate game and has made pawns of us. But once all these pieces are in position...

name: Tony
line: Triple Yahtzee?

name: Steve Rogers
line: You think you can find out what's coming?

name: Thor
line: I do. [In reference to Stark] Besides this one, there's nothing that can't be explained. [Thor returns to Asgard, and the Bifrost burns a sigil in the grass he was standing on]

name: Tony
line: That man has no regard for lawn maintenance. I'm gonna miss him though. And you're gonna miss me. There's gonna be a lot of manful tears. [as they walk over towards Stark's car]

name: Steve Rogers
line: I will miss you, Tony.

name: Tony
line: Yeah? Well, it's time for me to tap out. Maybe I should take a page out of Barton's book and build Pepper a farm, hope nobody blows it up.

name: Steve Rogers
line: The simple life.

name: Tony
line: You'll get there one day.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I don't know, family, stability. The guy who wanted all that went in the ice seventy-five years ago. I think someone else came out. [Stark turns to get into his car]

name: Tony
line: You alright?

name: Steve Rogers
line: I'm home. [Stark gets into his car; Steve finds Natasha standing alone] You want to keep staring at the wall, or do you want to go to work? I mean, it's a pretty interesting wall.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I thought you and Tony were still gazing into each other's eyes. How do we look?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Well, we're not the '27 Yankees. [hands Natasha a tablet]

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: We've got some hitters.

name: Steve Rogers
line: They're good. They're not a team.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Let's beat 'em into shape. [they gather Rhodes in his War Machine suit, Vision, Sam in his Falcon suit, and Wanda in a new outfit.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: Avengers...!

name: Thanos
line: Fine, I'll do it myself.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [on radio] All right, what do you see?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Standard beat cops. Small station. Quiet street. Its a good target.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Theres an ATM in the south corner, which means . . .

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Cameras.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Both cross streets are one way.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: So, compromised escape routes.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Means our guy doesn't care about being seen, he isn't afraid to make a mess on the way out. You see that Range Rover halfway up the block?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Yeah, the red one? Its cute.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: [on radio] It's also bulletproof, which means private security, which means more guns, which means more headaches for somebody. Probably us.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: You guys know I can move things with my mind, right?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Looking over your shoulder needs to become second nature.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Anybody ever tell you you're a little paranoid?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Not to my face. Why? Did you hear something?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Eyes on target, folks. This is the best lead we've had on Rumlow in six months. I don't want to lose him.

name: Sam Wilson
line: If he sees us coming that won't be a problem. He kind of hates us.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Sam, see that garbage truck? Tag it.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Give me X-ray.

name: weight analysis
line: Cargo Weight: 13825 kgs. Max capacity.]

name: Sam Wilson
line: That trucks loaded for max weight. And the drivers armed.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Its a battering ram.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Go now.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: What?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Hes not hitting the police.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Body armor, AR-15's. I make seven hostiles.

name: Sam Wilson
line: I make 5.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Sam.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Four.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Rumlows on the third floor.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Wanda, just like we practiced.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: What about the gas?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Get it out.

name: Brock Rumlow
line: Pack it up.

name: Brock Rumlow
line: Hes here.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Rumlow has a biological weapon.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: (on radio) Im on it.

name: Brock Rumlow
line: I don't work like that no more.

name: Brock Rumlow
line: Fire in the hole.

name: Mercenary
line: No!

name: Steve Rogers
line: Sam. He's in an AFV heading north.

name: Brock Rumlow
line: Take this to the airstrip. We're not gonna outrun them. Lose the truck.

name: Brock Rumlow
line: Im not.

name: Sam Wilson
line: I got four, they're splitting up.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I got the two on the left.

name: Steve Rogers
line: They ditched their gear. It's a shell game now. One of them has the payload.

name: Brock Rumlow
line: There you are, you son of a bitch. Ive been waiting for this!

name: Sam Wilson
line: He doesn't have it. Im empty.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Out of the way!

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Payload secure. Thanks, Sam.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Don't thank me.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Im not thanking that thing.

name: Sam Wilson
line: His name is Redwing.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I'm still not thanking it.

name: Sam Wilson
line: He's cute. Go ahead, pet him.

name: Brock Rumlow
line: Come on!

name: Brock Rumlow
line: This is for dropping a building on my face.

name: Brock Rumlow
line: I think I look pretty good, all things considered.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Who's your buyer?

name: Brock Rumlow
line: You know, he knew you. You pal, your buddy, your Bucky.

name: Steve Rogers
line: What did you say?

name: Brock Rumlow
line: He remembered you. I was there. He got all weepy about it. Till they put his brain back in a blender. He wanted you to know something. He said to me, "Please tell Rogers. When you gotta go, you gotta go." And you're coming with me.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Oh my . . . [Steve stares up.] Sam . . . We need . . . Fire and Rescue . . . on the south side of the building. We gotta get up there.

name: Maria Stark
line: Try to remember the kind of September. When grass was green . . . [She stops singing as Howard Stark walks in, but continues playing.] Wake up, dear, and say goodbye to your father.

name: Howard Stark
line: Who's the homeless person on the couch?

name: Young Tony
line: This is why I love coming home for Christmas . . . right before you leave town.

name: Maria Stark
line: Be nice, dear, he's been studying abroad.

name: Howard Stark
line: Really, which broad? What's her name?

name: Young Tony
line: Candice.

name: Howard Stark
line: Do me a favor? Try not to burn the house down before Monday.

name: Young Tony
line: Okay, so it's Monday. That is good to know. I will plan my toga party accordingly. Where you going?

name: Maria Stark
line: Your father's flying us to the Bahamas for a little getaway.

name: Howard Stark
line: We might have to make a quick stop.

name: Young Tony
line: At the Pentagon. Right? Don't worry, you're gonna love the holiday menu at the commissary.

name: Howard Stark
line: You know, they say sarcasm is a metric for potential. If that's true, you'll be a great man some day. I'll get the bags.

name: Maria Stark
line: He does miss you when you are not here. And frankly, you're going to miss us. Because this is the last time we're all going to be together. You know what's about to happen. Say something. If you don't, you'll regret it.

name: Young Tony
line: I love you, Dad. And I know you did the best you could.

name: Tony
line: That's how I wished it happened. Binarily Augmented Retro-Framing, or BARF. God, I gotta work on that acronym. An extremely costly method of hijacking the hippocampus to . . . clear traumatic memories. Huh.

name: Tony
line: It doesn't change the fact that they never made it to the airport . . . or all the things I did to avoid processing my grief, but . . . [He takes off his glasses.] Plus, 611 million dollars for my little therapeutic experiment? No one in the right mind would've ever funded it.

name: A sign reads MIT Alumni Honors
line: Tony.]

name: Tony
line: Help me out, what's the MIT mission statement? "To generate, disseminate . . . and preserve knowledge. And work with others . . . to bring it to bear on the world's great challenges." Well, you are the others. And, quiet as it's kept . . . the challenges facing you are the greatest mankind's ever known. Plus, most of you are broke.

name: Tony
line: Oh, I'm sorry. Rather, you were. As of this moment . . . every student has been made an equal recipient of the Inaugural September Foundation Grant. As in . . . all of your projects have just been approved and funded.

name: Tony
line: No strings, no taxes just re-frame the future! Starting now.

name: Now I would like to introduce the head of the foundation
line: Pepper Potts.' Tony stares at it sadly.]

name: Tony
line: Go break some eggs.

name: MIT teacher
line: Wow. Wow. That uh . . . that took my breathe away. Oh, Tony! So generous. So much money! Wow! Out of curiosity . . . will any portion of that grant be made available to faculty? I know, "Ooh, gross," but hear me out. I have got this killer idea for a self-cooking hot dog. Basically, chemical detonator embedded . . .

name: Tony
line: Restroom's this way, yeah?

name: MIT teacher
line: Yeah. Embedded in the meat shaft.

name: s Assistant
line: Mr. Stark, I am so sorry about the teleprompter. I didn't know Miss Potts had cancelled. They didn't have time to fix it.

name: Tony
line: It's . . . fine. I'll be right back.

name: MIT teacher
line: We'll catch up later.

name: Spencer
line: That was nice, what you did for those young people.

name: Tony
line: Ah, they deserve it. Plus, it helps ease my conscience.

name: Spencer
line: They say there's a correlation between generosity and guilt. But if you've got the money . . . break as many eggs as you like. Right?

name: Tony
line: Are you going up?

name: Spencer
line: I'm right where I want to be.

name: Tony
line: Okay, okay. Hey! Sorry, it's an occupational hazard.

name: Spencer
line: I work for the State Department. Human Resources. I know it's boring . . . but it enabled me to raise a son. I'm very proud of what he grew up to be.

name: Mrs Spencer
line: His name was Charlie Spencer. You murdered him. In Sokovia. Not that it matters in the least to you. You think you fight for us. You just fight for yourself.

name: Mrs Spencer
line: Who's going to avenge my son, Stark? He's dead . . . and I blame you.

name: Chaka
line: Our people's blood is spilled on foreign soil. Not only because of the actions of criminals, but by the indifference of those pledged to stop them. Victory at the expense of the innocent, is no victory at all.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: It's my fault.

name: Steve Rogers
line: That's not true.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Turn the TV back on. They're being very specific.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I should've clocked that bomb vest long before you had to deal with it.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Rumlow said "Bucky" and . . . all of a sudden I was a 16-year-old kid again, in Brooklyn. [He sits beside Wanda.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: And people died. It's on me.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: It's on both of us.

name: Steve Rogers
line: This job . . . we try to save as many people as we can. Sometimes that doesn't mean everybody. But if we can't find a way to live with that, next time . . . maybe nobody gets saved.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Vis! We talked about this.

name: Vision
line: Yes, but the door was open so I assumed that . . .

name: Vision
line: Captain Rogers wished to know when Mr. Stark was arriving.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Thank you. We'll be right down.

name: Vision
line: I'll . . . use the door. Oh, and apparently, he's brought a guest.

name: Steve Rogers
line: We know who it is?

name: Vision
line: The Secretary of State.

name: Secretary Ross
line: Five years ago, I had a heart attack. I dropped right in the middle of my back-swing. Turned out it was the best round of my life, because after 13 hours of surgery and a triple bypass . . . I found something 40 years in the Army had never taught me: Perspective. The world owes the Avengers an un-payable debt. You have fought for us, protected us, risked your lives . . . but while a great many people see you as heroes, there are some . . . who would prefer the word "vigilantes".

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: And what word would you use, Mr. Secretary?

name: Secretary Ross
line: How about "dangerous"? What would you call a group of US-based, enhanced individuals who routinely ignore sovereign borders and inflict their will wherever they choose and who, frankly, seem unconcerned about what they leave behind?

name: Secretary Ross
line: New York.

name: Secretary Ross
line: Washington DC.

name: Secretary Ross
line: Sokovia.

name: Secretary Ross
line: Lagos.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Okay. That's enough.

name: Secretary Ross
line: For the past four years, you've operated with unlimited power and no supervision. That's an arrangement the governments of the world can no longer tolerate. But I think we have a solution. [he places a thick document on the desk and passes it to Wanda]

name: Secretary Ross
line: The Sokovia Accords. Approved by 117 countries . . . it states that the Avengers shall no longer be a private organization. Instead, they'll operate under the supervision of a United Nations panel, only when and if that panel deems it necessary.

name: Steve Rogers
line: The Avengers were formed to make the world a safer place. I feel we've done that.

name: Secretary Ross
line: Tell me, Captain, do you know where Thor and Banner are right now?

name: Secretary Ross
line: If I misplaced a couple of 30 megaton nukes . . . you can bet there'd be consequences. Compromise. Reassurance. That's how the world works. Believe me, this is the middle ground.

name: James Rhodes
line: So, there are contingencies.

name: Secretary Ross
line: Three days from now, the UN meets in Vienna to ratify the Accords.

name: Secretary Ross
line: Talk it over.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: And if we come to a decision you don't like?

name: Secretary Ross
line: Then you retire.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Hello? Is this your car out front?

name: Helmut Zemo
line: I jumped the curb.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Maybe we could take care of it ourselves. If you wanna call the cops, tha--that's okay too, I guess.

name: Vasily Karpov
line: No. No cops.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Thank you.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: You have kept your looks, Colonel. Congratulations.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: "Mission report: December 16, 1991."

name: Vasily Karpov
line: Who are you?

name: Helmut Zemo
line: My name is Zemo. I will repeat my question. Mission report. December 16, 1991.

name: Vasily Karpov
line: How did you find me?

name: Helmut Zemo
line: When SHIELD fell, Black Widow released HYDRA files to the public. Millions of pages much of it encrypted, not easy to decipher. But . . . I have experience. And patience. A man can do anything if he has those.

name: Vasily Karpov
line: What do you want?

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Mission report. December 16. 1991.

name: Vasily Karpov
line: Go . . . to . . . hell.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: HYDRA deserves its place on the ash heap. So your death would not bother me. But I'd have to use this book . . . and other bloodier methods to find what I need. I don't look forward to that. You'd only be dying for . . . your pride.

name: Vasily Karpov
line: Hail HYDRA.

name: James Rhodes
line: Secretary Ross has a Congressional Medal of Honor, which is one more than you have.

name: Sam Wilson
line: So let's say we agree to this thing. How long is it gonna be before they LoJack us like a bunch of common criminals?

name: James Rhodes
line: A 117 countries want to sign this. 117, Sam, and you're just like, "No, that's cool. We got it. "

name: Sam Wilson
line: How long are you going to play both sides?

name: Vision
line: I have an equation.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Oh, this will clear it up.

name: Vision
line: In the eight years since Mr. Stark announced himself as Iron Man, the number of known enhanced persons has grown exponentially. And during the same period, the number of potentially world-ending events has risen at a commensurate rate.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Are you saying it's our fault?

name: Vision
line: I'm saying there may be a causality. Our very strength invites challenge. Challenge incites conflict. And conflict . . . breeds catastrophe. Oversight . . . oversight is not an idea that can be dismissed out of hand.

name: James Rhodes
line: Boom.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Tony. You are being uncharacteristically non-hyper-verbal.

name: Steve Rogers
line: It's because he's already made up his mind.

name: Tony
line: Boy, you know me so well.

name: Tony
line: Actually, I'm nursing an electromagnetic headache.

name: Tony
line: That's what's going on, Cap. It's just pain. It's discomfort. Who's putting coffee grounds in the disposal? Am I running a bed and breakfast for a biker gang?

name: Tony
line: Oh, that's Charles Spencer, by the way. He's a great kid. Computer engineering degree, 3.6 GPA. Had a floor level gig at Intel planned for the fall. But first, he wanted to put a few miles on his soul, before he parked it behind a desk. See the world. Maybe be of service. Charlie didn't want to go to Vegas or Fort Lauderdale, which is what I would do. He didn't go to Paris or Amsterdam, which sounds fun. He decided to spend his summer building sustainable housing for the poor. Guess where, Sokovia.

name: Tony
line: He wanted to make a difference, I suppose. I mean, we won't know because we dropped a building on him while we were kicking ass. [He takes a pill with some coffee, then faces the others.]

name: Tony
line: There's no decision-making process here. We need to be put in check! Whatever form that takes, I'm game. If we can't accept limitations, if we're boundary-less, we're no better than the bad guys.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Tony, someone dies on your watch, you don't give up.

name: Tony
line: Who said we're giving up?

name: Steve Rogers
line: We are if we're not taking responsibility for our actions. This document just shifts the blames.

name: James Rhodes
line: I'm sorry. Steve. That - that is dangerously arrogant. This is the United Nations we're talking about. It's not the World Security Council, it's not SHIELD, it's not HYDRA.

name: Steve Rogers
line: No, but it's run by people with agendas, and agendas change.

name: Tony
line: That's good. That's why I'm here. When I realized what my weapons were capable of in the wrong hands, I shut it down and stop manufacturing.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Tony, you chose to do that. If we sign this, we surrender our right to choose. What if this panel sends us somewhere we don't think we should go? What if there is somewhere we need to go, and they don't let us? We may not be perfect, but the safest hands are still our own.

name: Tony
line: If we don't do this now, it's gonna be done to us later. That's the fact. That won't be pretty.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: You're saying they'll come for me.

name: Vision
line: We would protect you.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Maybe Tony's right.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: If we have one hand on the wheel, we can still steer. If we take it off -

name: Sam Wilson
line: Aren't you the same woman who told the government to kiss her ass a few years ago?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I'm just . . . I'm reading the terrain. We have made . . . some very public mistakes. We need to win their trust back.

name: Tony
line: Focus up. I'm sorry, did I just mishear you or did you agree with me?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Oh, I want to take it back now.

name: Tony
line: No, no, no. You can't retract it. Thank you. Unprecedented. Okay, case closed--I win.

name: A text message reads
line: 'She's gone. In her sleep.']

name: Steve Rogers
line: I have to go.

name: Priest
line: And now, I would like to invite Sharon Carter to come up and say a few words.

name: Sharon Carter
line: Margaret Carter was known to most as a founder of SHIELD . . . but I just knew her as Aunt Peggy.

name: Sharon Carter
line: She had a photograph in her office. Aunt Peggy standing next to JFK. As a kid, that was pretty cool. But it was a lot to live up to. Which is why I never told anyone we were related.

name: Sharon Carter
line: I asked her once how she managed to master diplomacy and espionage in a time when no one wanted to see a woman succeed at either. And she said, compromise where you can. But where you can't, don't. Even if everyone is telling you that something wrong is something right. Even if the whole world is telling you to move . . . it is your duty to plant yourself like a tree, look them in they eye and say " No, you move."

name: Steve Rogers
line: When I came out of the ice, I thought everyone I had known was gone. Then I found out that she was alive. I was just lucky to have her.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: She had you back, too.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Who else signed?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Tony. Rhodey. Vision.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Clint?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Says he's retired.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Wanda?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: TBD (To Be Determined). I'm off to Vienna for the signing of the Accords. There's plenty of room on the jet.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Just because it's the path of least resistance doesn't mean it's the wrong path. Staying together is more important than how we stay together.

name: Steve Rogers
line: What are we giving up to do it?

name: Steve Rogers
line: I'm sorry, Nat. I can't sign it.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I know.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Then what are you doing here?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I didn't want you to be alone.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Come here.

name: UN staffer
line: Excuse me, Miss Romanoff?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Yes?

name: UN staffer
line: These need your signature. [T'Challa looks over at Natasha.] Thank you.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Thanks.

name: Challa
line: I suppose neither of us is used to the spotlight.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Oh, well, it's not always so flattering.

name: Challa
line: You seem to be doing alright so far. Considering your last trip to Capitol Hill . . . I wouldn't think you would be particularly comfortable in this company.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Well, I'm not.

name: Challa
line: That alone makes me glad you're here, Miss Romanoff.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Why? You don't approve of all this?

name: Challa
line: The Accords, yes. The politics, not really. Two people in a room can get more done than a hundred.

name: Chaka
line: Unless you need to move a piano.

name: Challa
line: Father.

name: Chaka
line: Son. Miss Romanoff.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: King T'Chaka. Please, allow me to apologize for what happened in Nigeria.

name: Chaka
line: Thank you. Thank you for agreeing to all this. I'm sad to hear that Captain Rogers will not be joining us today.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Yes, so am I.

name: Man on speakers
line: If everyone could please be seated. This assembly is now in session.

name: Challa
line: That is the future calling. Such a pleasure.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Thank you. [Natasha goes.]

name: Chaka
line: For a man who disapproves of diplomacy, you're getting quite good at it.

name: Challa
line: I'm happy, Father.

name: Chaka
line: Thank you.

name: Challa
line: Thank you.

name: Chaka
line: When stolen Wakandan vibranium was used to make a terrible weapon, we in Wakanda were forced to question our legacy. Those men and women killed in Nigeria, were part of a goodwill mission from a country too long in the shadows. We will not, however, let misfortune drive us back. We will fight to improve the world we wish to join. I am grateful to the Avengers for supporting this initiative. [T'Challa spots something outside.] Wakanda is proud to extend its hand in peace.

name: Challa
line: EVERYBODY GET DOWN!

name: Sharon Carter
line: My mom tried to talk me out of enlisting, but, um, not Aunt Peggy. She bought me my first thigh holster.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Very practical.

name: Sharon Carter
line: And stylish. [Sharon and Steve wait by an elevator. They stand facing each other.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: CIA has you stationed over here now?

name: Sharon Carter
line: In Berlin, Joint Terrorism Task Force.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Right. Right. Sounds fun.

name: Sharon Carter
line: I know, right?

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Steve nods and smiles at Sharon.] I've been meaning to ask you. When you were spying on me from across the hall . . . .

name: Sharon Carter
line: You mean when I was doing my job.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Did Peggy know?

name: Sharon Carter
line: She kept so many secrets. I didn't want her to have one from you. [The elevator arrives.] Thanks for walking me back.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Sure. [Sam comes over.]

name: Sam Wilson
line: Steve. There's something you gotta see.

name: Sharon Carter
line: Who's coordinating?

name: Sharon Carter
line: Good. They're solid. Forensics?

name: Sharon Carter
line: I have to go to work.

name: Sharon Carter
line: Call MI-6, see if we can get Micro Forensics to hurry this up. We need the whole team here in two hours or it's not worth it. [Sharon strides through with a man in a green jumpsuit. They pass T'Challa who sits on a bench looking stunned. There's a cut on his head. Natasha sits on the next bench along.]

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I'm very sorry.

name: Challa
line: [He glances at her. He's holding an ornate silver ring which he toys with between his fingers.] In my culture death is not the end. It's more of a . . . stepping-off point. You reach out with both hands and Bast and Sekhmet, they lead you into the green veldt where . . . you can run forever.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: That sounds very peaceful.

name: Challa
line: My father thought so. [He puts the ring on his finger.] I am not my father.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: T'Challa. Task force will decide who brings in Barnes.

name: Challa
line: [He clenches his fist.] Don't bother, Miss Romanoff. I'll kill him myself. [He walks away.]

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Yeah?

name: Steve Rogers
line: You alright?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Ah, yeah, thanks. I got lucky. [Frowning she looks around, then stands up.] I know how much Barnes means to you. I really do. Stay home. You'll only make this worse. For all of us. Please.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Are you saying you'll arrest me?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: No. Someone will. If you interfere. That's how it works now.

name: Steve Rogers
line: If he's this far gone, Nat, I should be the one to bring him in.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Why?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Because I'm the one least likely to die trying. [Not far away Steve ends the call.]

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Shit.

name: Sam Wilson
line: She tell you to stay out of it? [He's also in a cap and shades.] Might have a point.

name: Steve Rogers
line: He'd do it for me.

name: Sam Wilson
line: 1945, maybe. I just want to make sure we considered all our options. The people that shoot at you usually wind up shooting at me. [Sharon arrives by Steve.]

name: Sharon Carter
line: Tips have been pouring in since that footage went public. Everybody thinks the Winter soldier goes to their gym. Most of it's noise. Except for this. [She slides Steve a file.] My boss expects a briefing, pretty much now . . . so that's all the head start you're gonna get.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Thank you.

name: Sharon Carter
line: And you're gonna have to hurry. We have orders to shoot on sight.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: .   . . .    . - ([subtitled] Homecoming. One. One. Fright Car.) [Knocking at the door. He puts the book in a drawer and goes to the door. He reaches for a gun tucked in the back of his trouser and cocks it.]

name: German Innkeeper
line: Herr Mller, ich habe Ihr Frhstck. ([subtitled] Mr. Mller. I have your breakfast.) [Zemo opens the door.]

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Ich konnte es schon von weitem riechen. Danke. ([subtitled] I could smell it before I opened the door. Thank you.)

name: German Innkeeper
line: Speck und schwarzer Kaffe. Wieder. Ich kann Ihnen auch was anderes machen, wenn Sie das mchten. ([subtitled] Side of bacon and black coffee. Again. I can make you something different, if you like.)

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Bitte sehr, das ist wunderbar. ([subtitled] It's okay. This is wonderful.)

name: German Innkeeper
line: Ich stell es dann mal hier hin ([subtitled] I'll put this on your . . .)

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Nein, nein. Das geht schon. Ich mach das. Vielen Dank, Frau Leiber. ([subtitled] No, no. It's okay. I can manage. Thank you Mrs. Leiber.) [Zemo closes the door. In the room is a large device with a cage at the bottom and a drum of coppered wire on top.]

name: Bucky Barnes
line: [talking to the vendor in Romanian] ([assumed translation] How are they? Are they good? Give me six, thank you.[2])

name: photos of a man and the head line
line: 'Winter Soldier cautat pentru Bombardmentul din Viena'. Bucky glances around tensely.]

name: Sam Wilson
line: [on radio] Heads up, Cap. German Special Forces, approaching from the south.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Understood. [Bucky's standing behind Steve. Steve slowly turns around to face him.] Do you know me?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: [Bucky stares at him.] You're Steve. I read about you in a museum.

name: Sam Wilson
line: They've set the perimeter.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I know you're nervous. And you have plenty of reason to be. But you're lying.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: I wasn't in Vienna. I don't do that anymore.

name: Sam Wilson
line: They're entering the building.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Well, the people who think you did are coming here now. And they're not planning on taking you alive.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: That's smart. Good strategy.

name: Sam Wilson
line: They're on the roof. I'm compromised.

name: Steve Rogers
line: This doesn't have end in a fight, Buck.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: It always ends in a fight.

name: Sam Wilson
line: 5 seconds.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You pulled me from the river. Why?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: I don't know.

name: Sam Wilson
line: 3 seconds!

name: Steve Rogers
line: Yes, you do.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Breach! Breach! Breach! [A grenade crashes through the window. Bucky kicks it to Steve, and he smothers it with his shield.]

name: Soldier
line: Schie die Tr auf! (Shoot the door!) [The cop slams the battering ram against the door. Bucky shields himself with the mattress against an attack from the window. He blocks the door with a table as cops swing in on cables. Steve pulls the rug from under a policeman, sending him flying. Bucky slams another policeman into the wall.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: Buck, stop! You're gonna kill someone.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: [Bucky slams Steve down and punches a hole in the floor.] I'm not gonna kill anyone.

name: Soldier
line: Der Verdchtige ist ausgebrochen. Er ist am stlichen Treppenschacht. ([subtitled] Suspect has broken containment! He's headed down the east stairwell!)

name: Steve Rogers
line: Come on, man.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Sam, southwest rooftop.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Who the hell's the other guy?

name: Steve Rogers
line: About to find out.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Sam.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Got him. [Sam flies down and shoves the chopper off course. Then swoops towards street level.]

name: Driver
line: Stand down! Stand down! [The vehicle closes in, blue lights flashing. Steve leaps onto the vehicle and splinters the windshield. The driver stops, Steve yanks him from the vehicle and kicks the windshield out, then drives off.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: Sam, I can't shake this guy.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Right behind you.

name: James Rhodes
line: Stand down, now. [Bucky stands beside Steve who puts his shield on his back.] Congratulations, Cap. You're a criminal. [Police move in and force Bucky to his knees. Black Panther raises his hands. A cop moves Steve's arms behind his back. Black Panther retracts his claws and pulls off his mask revealing his face. It's T'Challa. Steve and Rhodes look curious.]

name: Soldier
line: Wie lautet der Befehl? (What's the order?)

name: James Rhodes
line: Your highness. [Bucky's hauled flat on the ground.]

name: Vision
line: 'A pinch of paprika.' A pinch. [He adds a pinch. Wanda strolls in.]

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Is that paprikash?

name: Vision
line: I thought it might . . . lift your spirits.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: [She chuckles, stirs the ingredients in the pan with a spoon. She lifts the spoon to her lips, blows and has a taste. She smiles.] Spirits lifted.

name: Vision
line: In my defense, I haven't actually ever . . . eaten anything before, so . . .

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: May I?

name: Vision
line: Please. Wanda?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Hmm.

name: Vision
line: No one dislikes you, Wanda. [She frowns curiously.]

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Thanks.

name: Vision
line: Oh, you're welcome. No, it's a . . . involuntary response in their amygdala. They can't help but be afraid of you.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Are you?

name: Vision
line: My amygdala is synthetic, so . . . [Wanda laughs.]

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I used to think of myself one way. But after this . . . [her fingers glow.] I am something else. I'm still me, I think, but . . . that's not what everyone else sees.

name: Vision
line: [He touches the mind stone in his forehead.] Do you know, I don't know what this is? [It glows.] Not really. I know it's not of this world, that it powered Loki's staff, gave you your abilities, but . . . its true nature is a mystery. And yet, it is part of me.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Are you afraid of it?

name: Vision
line: I wish to understand it. The more I do, the less it controls me. One day . . . who knows? I may even control it.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: [Wanda looks at the food.] I don't know what's in this but it is not paprika. I'm gonna go to the store. I'll be back in 20 minutes.

name: Vision
line: Alternatively, we could order a pizza?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Vision, are you not letting me leave?

name: Vision
line: [He blocks her way.] It is a question of safety.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I can protect myself.

name: Vision
line: [He holds her arm.] Not yours. Mr. Stark would like to avoid the possibility of another public incident. Until the Accords are on a . . . more secured foundation.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: And what do you want?

name: Vision
line: For people to see you . . . as I do. [She looks at him gravely.]

name: Sam Wilson
line: So, you like cats?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Sam.

name: Sam Wilson
line: What? Dude shows up dressed like a cat and you don't wanna know more?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Your suit . . . t's Vibranium?

name: Challa
line: [T'Challes eyes narrow as he glances sideways.] The Black Panther has been the protector of Wakanda for generations. A mantle, passed from warrior to warrior. And now, because your friend murdered my father, I also wear the mantle of king. So, I ask you . . . as both warrior and king . . . how long do you think you can keep your friend safe from me? [Steve is stony faced as the convoy heads underground.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: What's gonna happen to him?

name: Everett Ross
line: Same thing that ought to happen to you. Psychological evaluation and extradition.

name: Sharon Carter
line: This is Everett Ross, Deputy Task Force Commander.

name: Steve Rogers
line: What about our lawyer?

name: Everett Ross
line: Lawyer. That's funny. See their weapons are placed in lockup. Oh, we'll write you a receipt.

name: Sam Wilson
line: I better not look out the window and see anybody flying around in that. [As they go Steve looks back and catches Bucky's eye.]

name: Everett Ross
line: You'll be provided with an office instead of a cell. Now, do me a favor, stay in it?

name: Challa
line: I don't intend on going anywhere.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: For the record, this is what making things worse looks like.

name: Steve Rogers
line: He's alive.

name: Tony
line: [on his phone] No. Romania was not Accords-sanctioned. And, Colonel Rhodes is supervising cleanup.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Try not to break anything while we fix this.

name: Tony
line: [still on the phone.] Consequences? You bet there'll be consequences. Obviously you can quote me on that 'cause I just said it. Anything else? Thank you, sir.

name: Steve Rogers
line: 'Consequences'?

name: Tony
line: Secretary Ross wants you both prosecuted. Had to give him something.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I'm not getting that shield back, am I?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Technically, it's the government's property. Wings, too.

name: Sam Wilson
line: That's cold.

name: Tony
line: Warmer than jail.

name: Delivery Truck Driver
line: Das kann nicht richtig sein. Was zum Teufel? (This can't be right. What the hell?)

name: Tony
line: Hey, you wanna see something cool? I pulled something from Dad's archives. Felt timely. [Tony shows him two pens in a black presentation box.] FDR signed the Lend-Lease bill with these in 1941. Provided support to the Allies when they needed it most.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Some would say it brought our country closer to war.

name: Tony
line: See? If not for these, you wouldn't be here. I'm trying to . . . what do you call it? That's an olive branch. Is that what you call it?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Is Pepper here? I didn't see her.

name: Tony
line: We're kinda . . . well, not kinda . . .

name: Steve Rogers
line: Pregnant?

name: Tony
line: No. Definitely not. We're taking a break. It's nobody's fault.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I'm so sorry, Tony. I didn't know.

name: Tony
line: A few years ago, I almost lost her, so I trashed all my suits. Then, we had to mop up HYDRA . . . and then Ultron. My fault. And then, and then, and then, I never stopped. Because the truth is I don't wanna stop. I don't wanna lose her. I thought maybe the Accords could split the difference. [Tony stands up and paces.] In her defense, I'm a handful. Yet, Dad was a pain in the ass, but he and Mom always made it work.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You know, I'm glad Howard got married. I only knew him when he was young and single.

name: Tony
line: Oh, really? You two knew each other? He never mentioned that. Maybe only a thousand times. God, I hated you.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I don't mean to make things difficult.

name: Tony
line: I know, because you're a very polite person.

name: Steve Rogers
line: If I see a situation pointed south . . . I can't ignore it. Sometimes I wish I could.

name: Tony
line: No, you don't.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Steve smiles thinly.] No, I don't. Sometimes . . .

name: Tony
line: Sometimes I wanna punch you in your perfect teeth. But I don't wanna see you gone. We need you, Cap. So far, nothing's happened that can't be undone, if you sign. We can make the last 24 hours legit. Barnes gets transferred to an American psych-center . . . instead of a Wakandan prison.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Steve frowns thoughtfully and picks up one of the fountain pens. He stands up and paces, then turns to Tony. In the control room beyond there are multiple screens on the walls.] I'm not saying it's impossible, but there would have to be safeguards.

name: Tony
line: Sure. Once we put out the PR fire, those documents can be amended. I'd file a motion to have you and Wanda reinstated . . .

name: Steve Rogers
line: Wanda? What about Wanda?

name: Tony
line: She's fine. She's confined to the compound, currently. Vision's keeping her company.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Oh God, Tony! Every time. Every time I think you see things the right way . . .

name: Tony
line: What? It's a 100 acres with a lap pool. It's got a screening room. There's worse ways to protect people.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Protection? Is that how you see this? This is protection? It's internment, Tony.

name: Tony
line: She's not a US citizen.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Oh, come on, Tony.

name: Tony
line: And they don't grant visas to weapons of mass destruction.

name: Steve Rogers
line: She's a kid!

name: Tony
line: GIVE ME A BREAK! I'm doing what has to be done . . . to stave off something worse.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Steve nods faintly.] You keep telling yourself that. [He puts the pen down.] Hate to break up the set. [He leaves the office and rueful Tony watches Bucky on one of the control room's screens.]

name: Helmut Zemo
line: [The evaluator sits at a desk facing Bucky's pod. Inside Bucky's still restrained.] Hello, Mr. Barnes. I've been sent by the United Nations to evaluate you. Do you mind if I sit? Your first name is James?

name: Sharon Carter
line: [In an office with Sam and Steve.] The receipt for your gear.

name: Sam Wilson
line: 'Bird costume'? Come on.

name: Sharon Carter
line: I didn't write it. [Sharon pushes a button witch stops the restriction on the audio from Bucky's evaluation.]

name: Helmut Zemo
line: I'm not here to judge you. I just want to ask you a few questions. Do you know where you are, James? I can't help you if you don't talk to me, James.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: My name is Bucky.

name: Delivery Truck Driver
line: Hallo? ([subtitled] Hello?) [The custodian comes outside and the driver comes out of his van.] Hey. Ich hab eine groe fr dich. ([subtitled] Hey. I have a big one for you.) [He opens the van's back doors and removes a large wooden crate.] Ja. Okay, hier unterzeichnen. (Okay. Here. Just sign here.)

name: Custodian
line: Hier? (Here?)

name: Delivery Truck Driver
line: Ja. (Yeah.) [The custodian signs for the crate.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: Why would the Task Force release this photo to begin with?

name: Sharon Carter
line: Get the word out, involve as many eyes as we can?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Right. It's a good way to flush a guy out of hiding. Set off a bomb, get your picture taken. Get seven billion people looking for the Winter Soldier.

name: Sharon Carter
line: You're saying someone framed him to find him.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Steve, we looked for the guy for two years and found nothing.

name: Steve Rogers
line: We didn't bomb the UN. That turns a lot of heads.

name: Sharon Carter
line: Yeah, but that doesn't guarantee that whoever framed him would get him. It guarantees that we would. [Sharon's gaze falls on the evaluator in the screen, her eyes narrow.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Steve frowns and looks around.] Yeah.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: [In the secure chamber.] Tell me, Bucky. You've seen a great deal, haven't you?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: I don't want to talk about it.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: You fear that if you open your mouth, the horrors might never stop. Don't worry. [Zemo gets a message on his screen: 'message inbox:1' touches it 'status: package delivered'.] We only have to talk about one.

name: Custodian
line: Hey, was ist das? (Hey. What is this?)

name: Delivery Truck Driver
line: Ich wei es nicht. (I don't know.)

name: Everett Ross
line: Great. Come on, guys, get me eyes on Barnes. Go.

name: Tony
line: FRIDAY, get me the source of that outage.

name: Sharon Carter
line: [In the office.] Sub-level 5, east wing. [T'Challa spots Steve and Sam bolting.]

name: Bucky Barnes
line: What the hell is this?

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Why don't we discuss your home? Not Romania. Certainly not Brooklyn, no. I mean, your real home. [Zemo removes his glasses then walks towards Bucky reading from the red book by torchlight.] . ([subtitled] Longing.)

name: Bucky Barnes
line: [Bucky shuts his eyes.] No. [Bucky's head snaps back.]

name: Helmut Zemo
line: . ([subtitled] Rusted.)

name: Bucky Barnes
line: Stop.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: . ([subtitled] Seventeen.)

name: Bucky Barnes
line: [Bucky's metal arm trembles in its restraint.] Stop. [He sneers angrily.]

name: Helmut Zemo
line: . ([subtitled] Daybreak.)

name: Helmut Zemo
line: . ([subtitled] Furnace.) . ([subtitled] Nine.)

name: Helmut Zemo
line: . ([subtitled] Benign.)

name: Helmut Zemo
line: . ([subtitled] Homecoming.) . ([subtitled:] One.)  . ([subtitled] Freight car.)

name: Helmut Zemo
line: ? ([subtitled] Soldier?)

name: Bucky Barnes
line: . ([subtitled] Ready to comply.)

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Mission report. December 16, 1991.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Help me. Help.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Steve finds Zemo in a heap inside the chamber.] Get up. [he grabs Zemo and shoves him against the wall.] Who are you? What do you want?

name: Helmut Zemo
line: To see an empire fall.

name: Ich wiederhole
line: Der Ostflgel ist kompromittiert. (The east wing is compromised. I repeat: the east wing is compromised.)

name: Sam Wilson
line: Hey.

name: Everett Ross
line: Evac all civilians. Get me a perimeter around the building, and gunships in the air.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Please tell me you brought a suit.

name: Tony
line: Sure did. It's a lovely Tom Ford, three-piece, two-button. I'm an active-duty non-combatant.

name: Sharon Carter
line: Follow me. [Sharon runs past Tony and Natasha.]

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: [on radio:] We're in position.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: You could at least recognize me.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Damn it. [he looks around the wide courtyard and scowls.]

name: s Wife
line: He asked me again if you were going to be there. I said I wasn't sure. You should've seen his little face. Just try, okay? I'm going to bed. I love you.

name: A TV news report is playing nearby
subtitled
line: ] James Barnes, the suspect in the UN Vienna bombing escaped custody today. Also missing Avenger Captain Steve Rogers and Sam Wilson.)

name: The screen above the gate reads
line: 'Gate 06 | Berlin Flughafen | AEM2103 | 14:10 | Moskau/Moscow']

name: Sam Wilson
line: Hey, Cap! [Steve goes over to join Sam by Bucky who sits with his arm in the vice. They stare at him.]

name: Bucky Barnes
line: Steve.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Which Bucky am I talking to?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: Your mom's name was Sarah...You used to wear newspapers in your shoes.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Can't read that in a museum.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Just like that, we're suppose to be cool?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: What did I do?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Enough.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: Oh, God, I knew this would happen. Everything HYDRA put inside me is still there. All he had to do was say the goddamn words.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Who was he?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: I don't know.

name: Steve Rogers
line: People are dead. The bombing, the setup. The doctor did all that just to get 10 minutes with you. I need you to do better than "I don't know."

name: Bucky Barnes
line: He wanted to know about Siberia. Where I was kept. He wanted to know exactly where.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Why would he need to know that?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: Because I'm not the only Winter Soldier.

name: Vasily Karpov
line: , . ([subtitled] Good work.)

name: Vasily Karpov
line: ,   ! ([subtitled] Get me out of here.)

name: Steve Rogers
line: Who were they?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: Their most elite death squad. More kills than anyone in HYDRA history. And that was before the serum.

name: Sam Wilson
line: They all turn out like you?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: Worse.

name: Steve Rogers
line: The doctor, could he control them?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: Enough.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Said he wanted to see an empire fall.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: With these guys he could do it. They speak 30 languages, can hide in plain sight, infiltrate, assassinate, destabilize, They can take a whole country down in one night. You'd never see them coming.

name: Sam Wilson
line: [Sam steps up to Steve.] This would have been a lot easier a week ago.

name: Steve Rogers
line: If we call Tony . . .

name: Sam Wilson
line: No, he won't believe us.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Even if he did . . .

name: Sam Wilson
line: Who knows if the Accords would let him help.

name: Steve Rogers
line: We're on our own.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Maybe not. I know a guy.

name: Secretary Ross
line: I don't suppose you have any idea where they are?

name: Tony
line: We will. GSG-9's got the borders covered. Recon's flying 24/7. They'll get a hit. We'll handle it.

name: Secretary Ross
line: You don't get it, Stark. It's not yours to handle. It's clear you can't be objective. I'm putting Special Ops on this.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: What happens when the shooting starts? What, do you kill Steve Rogers?

name: Secretary Ross
line: If we're provoked. Barnes would've been eliminated in Romania if it wasn't for Rogers. There are dead people who would be alive now. Feel free to check my math.

name: Tony
line: All due respect, you're not going to solve this with boys in bullets, Ross. You gotta let us bring them in.

name: Secretary Ross
line: How would that end any differently from the last time?

name: Tony
line: Because this time, I won't be wearing loafers and a silk shirt. 72 hours, guaranteed.

name: Secretary Ross
line: 36 hours. Barnes. Rogers. Wilson.

name: Tony
line: Thank you, sir. [Tony slumps, exhaling.] My left arm is numb, is that normal?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: [She pats him on the shoulder.] You alright?

name: Tony
line: Always. [He has a massive black eye and a cut on his brow.] 36 hours, jeez.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: We're seriously understaffed.

name: Tony
line: Oh, yeah. It'd be great if we had a Hulk right about now. Any shot?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: No. You really think he'd be on our side?

name: Tony
line: No.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I have an idea.

name: Tony
line: Me too. Where's yours?

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Downstairs. Where's yours? [Tony smiles slightly.]

name: Peter Parker
line: Hey, May.

name: May Parker
line: Mmm. Hey. How was school today?

name: Peter Parker
line: Okay. This crazy car parked outside . . . [Peter sees Tony and his eyes widen.]

name: Tony
line: Oh, Mr. Parker.

name: Peter Parker
