line: Um . . . [He takes out his earphones.] What--what are you doing . . .? Hey! Uh, I'm--Im--I'm Peter.

name: Tony
line: Tony.

name: Peter Parker
line: What are . . .what are you--what are you--what are you doing here?

name: Tony
line: It's about time we met. You've been getting my e-mails, right?

name: Peter Parker
line: Yeah. Yeah.

name: Tony
line: Right?

name: Peter Parker
line: Regarding the . . .

name: May Parker
line: You didn't tell me about the grant.

name: Peter Parker
line: About the grant.

name: Tony
line: The September Foundation.

name: Peter Parker
line: Right.

name: Tony
line: Yeah. Remember when you applied?

name: Peter Parker
line: Yeah.

name: Tony
line: I approved, so now we're in business.

name: May Parker
line: You didn't tell me anything. What's up with that? You keeping secrets from me now?

name: Peter Parker
line: Why, I just, I just . . . I just know how much you love surprises, so I thought I would let you know . . . wh . . . anyway, what did I apply for?

name: Tony
line: That's what I'm here to hash out.

name: Peter Parker
line: Okay. Hash, hash out, okay.

name: Tony
line: It's so hard for me to believe that she's someone's aunt.

name: May Parker
line: Yeah, well, we come in all shapes and sizes, you know?

name: Tony
line: This walnut date loaf is exceptional.

name: Peter Parker
line: Let me just stop you there.

name: Tony
line: Yeah?

name: Peter Parker
line: Is this grant, like, got money involved or whatever? No?

name: Tony
line: Yeah.

name: Peter Parker
line: Yeah?

name: Tony
line: It's pretty well funded.

name: Peter Parker
line: Wow.

name: Tony
line: Look who you're talking to. Can I have 5 minutes with him?

name: May Parker
line: Sure.

name: Tony
line: [In Peter's bedroom Tony bolts the door and spits out the walnut loaf.] As walnut date loaves go, that wasn't bad. [He notices Peter's collection of old computers.] Whoa, what do we have here? Retro tech, huh? Thrift store? Salvation Army?

name: Peter Parker
line: Uh, the garbage, actually.

name: Tony
line: You're a dumpster diver.

name: Peter Parker
line: Yeah, I was . . . anyway, look, um, I definitely did not apply for your grant.

name: Tony
line: Ah-ah! Me first.

name: Peter Parker
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: Quick question of the rhetorical variety. [He pulls out his phone which projects a video of Peter Parker in his Spider-Man outfit.] That's you, right?

name: Peter Parker
line: Um, no. What do you. What do you mean?

name: Tony
line: Yeah. Look at you go. Wow! Nice catch. 3,000 pounds, 40 miles an hour. That's not easy. You got mad skills.

name: Peter Parker
line: That's all- That's all on YouTube, though, right? I mean, that's where you found that? Because you know that's all fake. It's all done on the computer.

name: Tony
line: Mm-Hmm.

name: Peter Parker
line: It's like that video. What is it?

name: Tony
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah . . . oh, you mean like those UFOs over Phoenix?

name: Peter Parker
line: Exactly.

name: Tony
line: Oh, what have we here?

name: Peter Parker
line: [Peter hides his Spider-Man suit.] Uh . . . that's a . . .

name: Tony
line: So. You're the . . . Spider . . . ling. Crime-fighting Spider . . .you're Spider-Boy?

name: Peter Parker
line: [Peter folds his arms petulantly.] S . . . Spider-Man.

name: Tony
line: Not in that onesie, you're not.

name: Peter Parker
line: It's not a onesie. [Tony picks up the suit.] I don't believe this. I was actually having a real good day today, you know, Mr. Stark. Didn't miss my train, this perfectly good DVD player was just sitting there and . . . Algebra test. Nailed it!

name: Tony
line: Who else knows? Anybody?

name: Peter Parker
line: Nobody.

name: Tony
line: Not even your . . . unusually attractive aunt?

name: Peter Parker
line: No. No, no. No, no. If she knew, she would freak out. And when she freaks out, I freak out.

name: Tony
line: You know what I think is really cool? This webbing. That tensile strength is off the charts. Who manufactured that?

name: Peter Parker
line: I did.

name: Tony
line: Climbing the walls, how you doing that? Adhesive gloves?

name: Peter Parker
line: It's a long story. I was uh . . .

name: Tony
line: Lordy! Can you even see in these?

name: Peter Parker
line: Yes. Yes, I can! I can. I can-I can see in those. Okay? It's just that when whatever happened, happened . . . it's like my senses have been dialed to 11. There's way too much input, so . . . they just kinda help me focus.

name: Tony
line: You're in dire need of an upgrade. Systemic, top to bottom. 100-point restoration. That's why I'm here. [Peter sits on his bed and looks at Tony.] Why you doing this? I gotta know. What's your MO? What gets you outta that twin bed in the morning?

name: Peter Parker
line: Because . . . [he fiddles with his fingers] because l've been me my whole life, and l've had these powers for 6 months.

name: Tony
line: Mm-Hmm.

name: Peter Parker
line: I read books, I build computers . . . and--and yeah. I would love to play football. But I couldn't then so I shouldn't now.

name: Tony
line: Sure, because you're different.

name: Peter Parker
line: Exactly. But I can't tell anybody that, so I'm not. When you can do the things that I can, but you don't . . . [Tony leans closer.] and then the bad things happen . . . they happen because of you.

name: Tony
line: [he looks affected by Peter's words.] So you wanna look out for the little guy? You wanna do your part? Make the world a better place, all that, right?

name: Peter Parker
line: Yeah. Yeah just looking out . . . for the little guy. That's--that's what it is.

name: Tony
line: [He slowly steps over to Peter whose leg is stretched out on the bed. Tony looks down at it.] I'm gonna sit here, so you move the leg. [Peter moves along. Tony sits beside him and raises his hand. He hesitantly clasps Peter's shoulder.] You got a passport?

name: Peter Parker
line: Uh, no. I don't even have a driver's license.

name: Tony
line: You ever been to Germany?

name: Peter Parker
line: No.

name: Tony
line: Oh, you'll love it.

name: Peter Parker
line: I can't go to Germany!

name: Tony
line: Why?

name: Peter Parker
line: I got . . . homework.

name: Tony
line: I'm gonna pretend you didn't say that.

name: Peter Parker
line: I'm---I'm being serious! I can't just drop out of school!

name: Tony
line: Might be a little dangerous. Better tell Aunt Hottie I'm taking you on a field trip.

name: Peter Parker
line: [He webs Tony's hand to the door.] Don't tell Aunt May.

name: Tony
line: Alright, Spider-Man. [They share an earnest look before Tony returns to his usual attitude.] Get me out of this.

name: Peter Parker
line: Sorry, I'll get the . . .

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: What is it?

name: Vision
line: Stay here, please.

name: Clint Barton
line: Guess I shoulda knocked.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Oh my god! What are you doing here?

name: Clint Barton
line: Disappointing my kids. [He shoots arrows to both sides of the room.] I'm supposed to go water-skiing. Cap needs our help. Come on.

name: Vision
line: Clint! [Wanda and Clint stop.] You should not be here.

name: Clint Barton
line: [He turns around.] Really? I retire for, what, like five minutes, and it all goes to shit.

name: Vision
line: Please consider the consequences of your actions.

name: Clint Barton
line: Okay, they're considered. Okay, we gotta go. [Vision is held in a force field, crackling and sparkling between the two arrows.] It's this way.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I've caused enough problems.

name: Clint Barton
line: [Frowning Clint runs back from the door.] You gotta help me, Wanda. Look, you wanna mope, can go to high school. You wanna make amends, you get off your ass. Shit. [Vision breaks the force field with his mind stone. He punches Clint to the floor, Clint recovers quickly.] I knew I should've stretched. [He extends a baton and tries to hit Vision, but the blows go through him. Clint resorts to punches, then tries the baton again. It breaks. Clint tries to kick Vision, but his leg goes right through him. Vision gets Clint in a headlock.]

name: Vision
line: Clint, you can't overpower me.

name: Clint Barton
line: I know I can't. But she can.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Vision, that's enough. Let him go. I'm leaving.

name: Vision
line: I can't let you.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: [She holds her hands apart, glowing with energy. Clint slips from Vision's grasp.] I'm sorry.

name: Vision
line: [He falters.] If you do this . . . they will never stop being afraid of you.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I can't control their fear, only my own. [She moves closer. Vision glows from within and crashes through the floor, and several floors beneath. Wanda and Clint stand over the holes in the floors.]

name: Clint Barton
line: Oh . . . come on. We got one more stop.

name: Back at the Joint Counter Terrorist Centre
Attache
line: It's just a matter of time. Our satellites are running facial, bio-metric, and behavioral pattern scans.

name: Security Chief
line: [to Natasha who's standing in their way] Move, or you will be moved.

name: Challa
line: As entertaining as that would be . . .

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: You really think you can find him?

name: Challa
line: My resources are considerable.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Yeah, it took the world 70 years to find Barnes . . . so you could probably do that in about half the time.

name: Challa
line: You know where they are.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I know someone who does.

name: Sharon Carter
line: Not sure you understand the concept of a getaway car.

name: Steve Rogers
line: It's low profile.

name: Sharon Carter
line: Good, because this stuff tends to draw a crowd. [She opens the trunk of her car, revealing Steve's and Sams's gear.]

name: Bucky Barnes
line: [He sits behind Sam in the getaway car.] Can you move your seat up?

name: Sam Wilson
line: No.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I owe you again.

name: Sharon Carter
line: Keeping a list. [She glances at Bucky.] You know, he kinda tried to kill me.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Sorry. I'll put it on the list, too. They're going to come looking for you.

name: Sharon Carter
line: I know.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Thank you, Sharon.

name: Sharon Carter
line: That was . . .

name: Steve Rogers
line: Late.

name: Sharon Carter
line: Damn right. I should go.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Okay.

name: Clint Barton
line: Cap.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You know I wouldn't have called If I had any other choice.

name: Clint Barton
line: Hey man, you're doing me a favor. Besides, I owe a debt.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Thanks for having my back.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: It was time to get off my ass.

name: Steve Rogers
line: How about our other recruit?

name: Clint Barton
line: He's rarin' to go. Had to put a little coffee in him, but he should be good.

name: Scott Lang
line: What timezone is this?

name: Clint Barton
line: Come on. Come on.

name: Scott Lang
line: [Scott shakes Steve's hand with an amazed look.] Captain America.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Mr. Lang.

name: Scott Lang
line: It's an honor. I'm shaking your hand too long. Wow! This is awesome! Captain America. [He looks at Wanda.] I know you, too. You're great! [He turns back and feels Steve's shoulders.] Jeez. Ah, look, I wanna say, I know you know a lot of super people, so . . . thinks for thanking of me. [(sic!) To Sam.] Hey, man!

name: Sam Wilson
line: What's up, Tic Tac?

name: Scott Lang
line: Uh, good to see you. Look, what happened last time when I . . .

name: Sam Wilson
line: It was a great audition, but it'll . . . it'll never happen again.

name: Steve Rogers
line: They tell you what we're up against?

name: Scott Lang
line: Something about some . . . psycho-assassins?

name: Steve Rogers
line: We're outside the law on this one. So, if you come with us, you're a wanted man.

name: Scott Lang
line: Yeah, well, what else is new?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: We should get moving.

name: Clint Barton
line: We got a chopper lined up.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: They're evacuating the airport.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Stark.

name: Scott Lang
line: Stark?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Suit up.

name: Tony
line: Wow, it's so weird how you run into people at the airport. Don't you think that's weird?

name: James Rhodes
line: Definitely weird.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Hear me out, Tony. That doctor, the psychiatrist, he's behind all of this.

name: Challa
line: [T'Challa leaps over a truck.] Captain.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Your highness.

name: Tony
line: Anyway, Ross gave me 36 hours to bring you in. That was 24 hours ago. Can you help a brother out?

name: Steve Rogers
line: You're after the wrong guy.

name: Tony
line: Your judgment is askew. Your old war buddy killed innocent people yesterday.

name: Steve Rogers
line: And there are five more super soldiers just like him. I can't let the doctor find them first, Tony. I can't.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Steve . . . you know what's about to happen. Do you really wanna punch your way out of this one?

name: Tony
line: All right, I've run out of patience. Underoos! [Peter shoots a web, stealing Steve's shield and binding his hands.] Nice job, kid.

name: Peter Parker
line: Thanks. Well, I could've stuck the landing a little better. It's just the new suit Well, it's nothing, Mr. Stark. It's--it's perfect. Thank you.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, we don't really need to start a conversation.

name: Peter Parker
line: Okay. Cap . . . Captain. Big fan, I'm Spider-Man.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, we'll talk about it later. Just . . .

name: Peter Parker
line: Hey, everyone.

name: Tony
line: . . . Good job.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You've been busy.

name: Tony
line: And you've been a complete idiot. Dragging in Clint. 'Rescuing' Wanda from a place she doesn't even want to leave, a safe place. I'm trying to keep . . . I'm trying to keep you from tearing the Avengers apart.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You did that when you signed.

name: Tony
line: Alright, We're done. You're gonna turn Barnes over, you're gonna come with us. NOW! Because it's us! Or a squad of J-SOC guys . . . with no compunction about being impolite. [Steve looks aside.] Come on.

name: Sam Wilson
line: [He radios Steve.] We found it. Their Quinjet's in hanger five, north runway.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Steve holds his hands up and Clint shoots the web off.] Alright, Lang.

name: Peter Parker
line: Hey, guys, something . . .

name: James Rhodes
line: Whoa. What--what the hell was that?

name: Scott Lang
line: [He retrieves Steve's shield.] I believe this is yours, Captain America.

name: Tony
line: Oh, great. Alright, there's two on the parking deck. One of them's Maximoff, I'm gonna grab her. Rhodey, you want to take Cap?

name: James Rhodes
line: Got two in the terminal, Wilson and Barnes.

name: Challa
line: Barnes is mine!

name: Peter Parker
line: Hey, Mr. Stark, what should I do?

name: Tony
line: What we discussed. Keep your distance. Web 'em up.

name: Peter Parker
line: Okay, copy that!

name: Challa
line: Move, Captain. I won't ask a second time.

name: Scott Lang
line: [He faces Natasha.] Look, I really don't want to hurt you.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I wouldn't stress about it. [She kicks him in the groin and he miniaturizes, throwing her head over heels. She zaps him off her wrist and he slams into a nearby truck, laving a small dent.]

name: Bucky Barnes
line: [In the terminal.] What the hell is that?

name: Sam Wilson
line: Everyone's got a gimmick now.

name: Peter Parker
line: [Peter swings through the glass wall and kicks Sam backwards. Bucky throws a punch, Peter catches his fist.] You have a metal arm? That is awesome, dude! [Sam hits Peter.] You have the right to remain silent! [Mid-air Peter fends Sam off, then swings after him using his webs.]

name: James Rhodes
line: Sorry, Cap. This won't kill you but it ain't gonna tickle either. [He smacks Steve's shield with a mace.]

name: Tony
line: [Hovering above the ground.] Wanda, I think you hurt Vision's feelings.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: You locked me in my room.

name: Tony
line: Okay. First, that's an exaggeration. Second, I did it to protect you. Hey, Clint.

name: Clint Barton
line: Hey, man.

name: Tony
line: Clearly, retirement doesn't suit you. You got tired of shooting golf?

name: Clint Barton
line: Well, I played 18, I shot 18. Just can't seem to miss. [He fires an arrow which Tony deflects.]

name: Tony
line: First time for everything.

name: Clint Barton
line: Made you look.

name: FRIDAY
line: Multiple contusions detected.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, I detected that too.

name: Peter Parker
line: Oh god. [Bucky throws something at him.] Hey buddy, I think you lost this! [Peter throws it back. Sam kicks him off the beam and Peter fires a web which sends Sam crashing to the floor. Peter webs Sam's wrist to a balcony railing.] Those wings carbon fiber?

name: Sam Wilson
line: Is this stuff coming out of you?

name: Peter Parker
line: That would explain the rigidity-flexibility ratio, which, gotta say, that's awesome, man.

name: Sam Wilson
line: I don't know if you've been a fight before but there's usually not this much talking.

name: Peter Parker
line: Alright, sorry, my bad. [He swings down and Bucky jumps in the way. Bucky and Sam fall through the glass down onto the next floor and Peter webs them.] Guys, look. I'd love to keep this up but I've only got one job here today and I gotta impress Mr. Stark, so, l'm really sorry. [Redwing drags Peter through the glass wall.] Wwahhhh!

name: Bucky Barnes
line: You couldn't have done that earlier?

name: Sam Wilson
line: I hate you.

name: James Rhodes
line: Great.

name: Scott Lang
line: Hey, Cap, heads up! [He throws Steve a miniature truck.] Throw it at this. Now! [Steve throws it and the truck enlarges, tumbling towards War Machine.]

name: James Rhodes
line: Oh, come on! [The truck lands and explodes.]

name: Scott Lang
line: Oh, man. I thought it was a water truck. Uh . . . sorry. [Scott and Steve run off.]

name: James Rhodes
line: Alright. Now, I'm pissed.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: [Tony helps her up.] Is this, part of the plan?

name: Tony
line: Well, my plan was to go easy on them. You wanna switch it up?

name: Clint Barton
line: [To Wanda as he spots the Quinjet.] There's our ride.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Come on!

name: Vision
line: Captain Rogers. I know you believe what you're doing is right. But for the collective good you must surrender now. [Tony's team arrives.]

name: Sam Wilson
line: What do we do, Cap?

name: Steve Rogers
line: We fight.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: This is gonna end well. [The two teams stride towards each other with grim determination etched on their faces.]

name: Peter Parker
line: They're not stopping.

name: Tony
line: Neither are we. [Everyone breaks into a sprint.]

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: We're still friends, right?

name: Clint Barton
line: Depends on how hard you hit me. [She spins him with her legs. As she's about to kick his head, her foot stops and glows bright red. Wanda projects Natasha down.]

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: You were pulling your punches. [Clint nods sheepishly.]

name: Bucky Barnes
line: [Bucky and T'Challa have each other by the throat.] I didn't kill your father.

name: Challa
line: Then why did you run? [T'Challa pulls Bucky's hand off his neck, then spins him and fly-kicks him backwards. He sprouts claws and aims for Bucky's neck, but Wanda stops his hand, then waves her arms and sends T'Challa crashing into a passenger gangway.]

name: Peter Parker
line: That thing does not obey the laws of physics at all.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Look kid. There's a lot going on here that you don't understand.

name: Peter Parker
line: Mr. Stark said you'd say that. Wow. [he fires webs which stick to Steve's shield and ankle. He pulls and Steve slides towards him. Peter kicks him backwards, then rolls clear.] He also said to go for your legs. [As Steve runs to get his shield, Peter webs his hands and pulls. Steve grits his teeth, spins and somersaults, propelling Peter through the air.]

name: Sam Wilson
line: [Evading fire from Iron Man.] Clint, can you get him off me?

name: Clint Barton
line: Buckled in?

name: Scott Lang
line: Yeah. No, I'm good. I'm good, Arrow Guy. Let's go. Let's go! [Miniaturized Scott is on the tip of Clint's arrow. As he fires it, the head splits and Iron Man shoots the shards. Scott dives between Iron Man's splayed fingers and slips inside the Iron Man Suit at the shoulder joint.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Steve catches a web and tugs Peter towards him, knocking him down with the shield. Peter recovers and pulls himself up on top of a gangway.] Stark tell you anything else?

name: Peter Parker
line: That you're wrong. You think you're right. That makes you dangerous. [He swings down and Steve leaps to kick him backwards onto the gangway's leg.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: Guess he had a point. [He throws his shield at the leg and the gangway falls. Peter holds it up.] You got heart, kid. Where're you from?

name: Peter Parker
line: Queens.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Brooklyn. [Steve leaves Peter holding the gangway.]

name: Tony
line: [Clint fires arrows at hovering Iron Man whose arm-lasers malfunction.] Friday?

name: FRIDAY
line: We have some weapon systems offline.

name: Tony
line: They what?

name: Scott Lang
line: Oh, you're gonna have to take this into the shop.

name: Tony
line: Who's speaking?

name: Scott Lang
line: It's your conscience. We don't talk a lot these days.

name: Tony
line: Friday?

name: FRIDAY
line: Deploying fire suppression system.

name: Scott Lang
line: Uh -oh. Oh boy. Whoa! [Inside the suit Scott sprints through narrow banks of components, chased by a rolling cloud of CO2. He's ejected from the suit.]

name: Bucky Barnes
line: [To Steve.] We gotta go. That guy's probably in Siberia by now.

name: Steve Rogers
line: We gotta draw out the flyers. I'll take Vision. You get to the jet.

name: Sam Wilson
line: No, you get to the jet! Both of you! [Being chased by War Machine.] The rest of us aren't getting out of here.

name: Clint Barton
line: As much as I hate to admit it, if we're gonna win this one, some of us might have to lose it.

name: Sam Wilson
line: This isn't the real fight, Steve.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Alright, Sam, what's the play?

name: Sam Wilson
line: We need a diversion, something big.

name: Scott Lang
line: I got something kind of big, but I can't hold it very long. On my signal, run like hell. And if I tear myself in half . . . don't come back for me.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: He's gonna tear himself in half?

name: Steve Rogers
line: You're sure about this, Scott?

name: Scott Lang
line: I do it all the time. I mean once . . . in a lab. Then I passed out. I'm the boss. I'm the boss. I'm the boss. I'm the boss. I'm the BOSS! [He leaps from mobile stairs and lands on War Machine's back as he flies past. He operates his suit's wrist, shuts his eyes and activates a remote. Scott grows into a towering Behemoth and grabs War Machine's leg.]

name: Peter Parker
line: Holy shit!

name: James Rhodes
line: Okay, tiny dude is big now. He's big now.

name: Steve Rogers
line: I guess that's the signal.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Way to go, Tic Tac!

name: Tony
line: Give me back my Rhodey. [Sam flies feet first into Iron Man.]

name: Peter Parker
line: I got him! [Scott sends War Machine flying and Peter catches him with a web.]

name: Tony
line: Okay, anybody on our side hiding any shocking and fantastic abilities they'd like to disclose, I'm open to suggestion.

name: Scott Lang
line: You wanna get to them you gotta go through me. [He sweeps his gigantic foot through the crates T'Challa's standing on, smashing them to pieces. Scott is engulfed in explosions as War Machine swoops towards him with Peter clinging to a web stuck to War Machine's back. He fires more webs and wraps them around Scott's over-sized arms.]

name: Clint Barton
line: We haven't met yet. [He flattens his bow and spins it around.] I'm Clint.

name: Challa
line: I don't care. [Wielding the bow like a staff Clint attacks T'Challa who a acrobatically ducks then counters with a high kick.]

name: James Rhodes
line: Ahhh! [Wanda waves her hands flinging vehicles into War Machines path.]

name: Scott Lang
line: Get off. [Distracted by Peter Ant-Man doesn't spot Vision curling into a ball and ramming into him. Vision spots Steve and Bucky approaching the hangar as Ant-Man wavers. He simply floats through Ant-Man's chest. Something just flew in me! [Vision fires a shining beam of energy from his mind stone and the control tower collapses towards the entrance of the hangar. Wanda struggles to slow its collapse. Then War Machine descends behind her fires a sonic disruptor. Wanda holds her head and screams. The tower falls all around Steve and Bucky, but they make it into the hangar where Natasha is waiting for them.]

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: You're not gonna stop.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You know I can't.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I'm gonna regret this. [She stuns T'Challa who's arrived behind them.] Go. [Steve and Bucky run for the Quinjet as she keeps T'Challa at bay.]

name: Peter Parker
line: [Outside] Hey, guys, you ever see that really old movie, Empire Strikes Back?

name: James Rhodes
line: Jesus, Tony, how old is this guy?

name: Tony
line: I don't know, I didn't carbon-date him. He's on the young side.

name: Peter Parker
line: [He swings towards Ant-Man.] You know that part . . . where they're on the snow planet . . . with the walking thingies? [He wraps webs around Scott's legs.]

name: Tony
line: Maybe the kid's on to something.

name: James Rhodes
line: High now, Tony. Go high.

name: Peter Parker
line: [He swings around and around Ant-Man's legs as Iron Man and War Machine power towards his head, both landing blows together.] YES! Ha ha! That was awesome! [Giant Ant-Man topples. A flailing limb catching Peter and knocking him flying just before Scott slams into the ground on his back. He returns to normal size and removes the face-plate of his helmet, grimacing.]

name: Scott Lang
line: Does anyone have any orange slices?

name: Tony
line: [He lands by Peter who's in a heap. Retracting the helmet Tony looks concerned.] Kid, you alright?

name: Peter Parker
line: Hey! Get off me!

name: Tony
line: Same side. Guess who. Hi. It's me.

name: Peter Parker
line: Oh. Hey, man.

name: Tony
line: Yeah.

name: Peter Parker
line: That was scary.

name: Tony
line: Yeah. You're done. Alright?

name: Peter Parker
line: What?

name: Tony
line: You did a good job. Stay down.

name: Peter Parker
line: No, I'm good. I'm fine.

name: Tony
line: Stay down.

name: Peter Parker
line: No, it's good I gotta get him back!

name: Tony
line: You're going home or I'll call Aunt May! You're done!

name: Peter Parker
line: Wait. Mr. Stark, wait! I'm not done, I'm not . . . [He slumps down.] Okay, I'm done. I'm done.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: [In the partially wrecked hangar the Quinjet's engines fire and the guns blast debris from the entrance. Natasha keeps T'Challa held until the jet rises. Black Panther leaps, but can't keep hold and the Quinjet flies out of the hangar. War Machine flies after it. In the hangar:] I said I'd help you find him, not catch him. There's a difference.

name: Vision
line: [Outside Vision kneels beside Wanda and gently holds her in his arms. She pants for breath.] I'm sorry.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Me, too.

name: Vision
line: It's as I said. Catastrophe.

name: James Rhodes
line: Vision, I got a bandit on my six. [Falcon fires small explosives which erupt and buffet War Machine.] Vision! You copy? Target his thrusters, turn him into a glider.

name: Tony
line: Rhodey! [Iron Man and Falcon dive.]

name: James Rhodes
line: Tony, I'm flying dead stick. [As he plunges the suit emits black smoke. Iron Man swoops down towards him. Rhodes' eyes start to close.]

name: Tony
line: RHODES! [Mar Machine smacks into a wide, grassy field just before Iron Man lands nearby. His helmet retracts and he pulls off War Machine's face plate. Rhodes' eyes are closed and there's blood on his face.] Read vitals.

name: FRIDAY
line: Heartbeat detected. Emergency medical is on its way.

name: Sam Wilson
line: [He swoops down and lands on his feet. His wings retract.] I'm sorry. [Tony zaps Falcon backwards with a blast of energy from the palm of his suit. Vision glides to the ground just in front of Falcon. Stony faced Tony remains with his arms around War Machine.]

name: German Innkeeper
line: Guten Morgen, Zimmerservice? (Good morning. Room service.)

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Guten Morgen Frau Leiber. Zimmer 201 hier (Good morning, Mrs. Leiber. [subtitled] This is room 201.)

name: German Innkeeper
line: Ah, Herr Mller. Speck und schwarzer Kaffee fr Sie, ja? (Ah, Mr. Mller. [subtitled] Bacon and black coffee again today?)

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Wie gut Sie mich kennen. ([subtitled] You know me so well.)

name: German Innkeeper
line: Hallo? Ihr Frhstck ist hier. Darf ich mich reinlassen? Herr Mller? Herr Mller? Oh mein Gott! ([subtitled] Hello? Your breakfast is here. May I let myself in? Mr Mller? Mr Mller? Oh God!) [She comes in and discovers the dead body of Dr. Theo Broussard in the bathtub.]

name: Bucky Barnes
line: What's gonna happen to your friends?

name: Steve Rogers
line: [Steve stares ahead, heavyhearted. He sighs and shakes his head.] Whatever it is I'll deal with it.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: [He looks thoughtful.] I don't know if I'm worth all this, Steve.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [He glances around at Bucky.] What you did all those years . . . it wasn't you. You didn't have a choice.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: I know. But I did it.

name: Tony
line: How did this happen?

name: Vision
line: I became distracted.

name: Tony
line: I didn't think that was possible.

name: Vision
line: Neither did I. [Tony leaves Vision looking in on Rhodes. Along the corridor Tony spots an equally concerned Natasha.]

name: Tony
line: The doctors say he shattered L4 through S1. Extreme laceration in the spinal cord. Probably looking at some form of paralysis.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Steve's not gonna stop. If you don't either, Rhodey's gonna be the best case scenario.

name: Tony
line: You let them go, Nat.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: We played this wrong.

name: Tony
line: 'We'? Boy, it must be hard to shake the whole double agent thing, huh? It sticks in the DNA.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: Are you incapable of letting go of your ego for one goddamn second?

name: Tony
line: T'Challa told Ross what you did, so . . . they're coming for you.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: I'm not the one that needs to watch their back. [She walks away.]

name: Tony
line: [He activates holographic images appearing on his wrist device.] What am I looking at, Friday?

name: FRIDAY
line: Priority upload from Berlin police.

name: Tony
line: Fire up the chopper.

name: FRIDAY
line: The Task Force called for a psychiatrist as soon as Barnes was captured. The UN dispatched Dr. Theo Broussard from Geneva within the hour. He was met by this man.

name: Tony
line: Did you run facial recognition yet?

name: FRIDAY
line: What do I look like?

name: Tony
line: Uh, I don't know. I've been picturing a red head.

name: FRIDAY
line: You must be thinking of someone else.

name: Tony
line: Must be.

name: FRIDAY
line: The fake doctor is actually Colonel Helmut Zemo, Sokovian Intelligence. [Tony projects the image.] Zemo ran Echo Skorpion, a Sokovian covert kill squad.

name: Tony
line: So, what happened to the real Broussard?

name: FRIDAY
line: He was found dead in a Berlin hotel room. Where police also found a wig and facial prosthesis approximating the appearance of one James Buchanan Barnes.

name: Tony
line: Son of a bitch. Get this to Ross.

name: FRIDAY
line: Yes, Boss.

name: he climbs up the ladder and removes a filing box labeled
Guard
line: [on radio] This is the Raft Prison Control. You're clear for landing, Mr. Stark.

name: Tony
line: So? You got the files? Let's reroute the satellites, start facial scanning for this Zemo guy.

name: Secretary Ross
line: You seriously think I'm gonna listen to you after that fiasco in Leipzig? You're lucky you're not in one of these cells. [Ross looks at Tony sternly and leads on through a thick, steel security door. Soldiers stand guard in an operations room. Tony looks at a surveillance screen. it shows Wanda, sitting hunched and bedraggled in a cramped prison cell.]

name: Clint Barton
line: [clapping] The Futurist, gentlemen! The Futurist is here! He sees all! He knows what's best for you, whether your like it or not.

name: Tony
line: Give me a break, Barton. I had no idea they'll put you here. Come on.

name: Clint Barton
line: [spits] Yeah, well, you knew they'd put us somewhere, Tony.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, but not some super-max floating ocean pokey. You know, this place is for maniacs. This is a place for . . .

name: Clint Barton
line: Criminals? [He stands up.] Criminals, Tony. Think that's the word you're looking for. [He eyes Tony through the bars.] Right? That didn't used to mean me. Or Sam, or Wanda. But here we are.

name: Tony
line: Because you broke the law.

name: Clint Barton
line: Yeah.

name: Tony
line: I didn't make you.

name: Clint Barton
line: La, la, la, la, la . . .

name: Tony
line: You read it, you broke it.

name: Clint Barton
line: La, la, la, la la

name: Tony
line: Alright, you're all grown up, you got a wife and kids. I don't understand, why didn't you think about them before you chose the wrong side? [He walks away.]

name: Clint Barton
line: You gotta watch your back with this guy. There's a chance he's gonna break it.

name: Scott Lang
line: Hank Pym always said, you never can trust a Stark.

name: Tony
line: Who are you?

name: Scott Lang
line: Come on, man.

name: Sam Wilson
line: How's Rhodes?

name: Tony
line: They're flying him to Columbia Medical tomorrow. So . . . fingers cross. [Sam shakes his head.]What do you need? They feed you yet?

name: Sam Wilson
line: [He raises his eyebrows.] You're the good cop now?

name: Tony
line: I'm just the guy who needs to know where Steve went.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Well, you better go get a bad cop, because you're gonna have to go Mark Fuhrman on my ass to get information out of me.

name: Tony
line: Oh, I just knocked the 'A' out of their 'AV'. We got about 30 seconds before they realize it's not their equipment.

name: Secretary Ross
line: [In the operations room.] What did you do? Get it back up!

name: Tony
line: [Back in the cell.] Just look. Because that is the fellow who was supposed to interrogate Barnes. [He shoes a holographic image of Doctor Broussard.] Clearly, I made a mistake. Sam, I was wrong.

name: Sam Wilson
line: That's a first.

name: Tony
line: Cap is definitely off the reservation but he's about to need all the help he can get. We don't know each other very well. You don't have to

name: Sam Wilson
line: Hey, it's alright. [Tony leans closer to the window. Sam sighs and looks uneasy.] Look, I'll tell you but you have to go alone and as a friend.

name: Tony
line: Easy.

name: Secretary Ross
line: Stark? Did he give you anything on Rogers?

name: Tony
line: Nope. Told me to go to hell. I'm going back to the compound instead, but you can call me anytime. I'll put you on hold, I like to watch the line blink. [Ross stares at Tony who smiles as he gets in the chopper and the door slides shut. The chopper rises off the helipad and flies away. The doors close on the prison roof.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: You remember that time we had to ride back from Rockaway Beach in the back of that freezer truck?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: Was that the time we used our train money to buy hot dogs?

name: Steve Rogers
line: You blew three bucks trying to win that stuffed bear for a redhead.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: What was her name again?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Dolores. You called her Doll.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: She's gotta be a hundred years old right now.

name: Steve Rogers
line: So are we, pal. [He clamps his hand on Bucky's shoulder.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: He can't have been here more than a few hours.

name: Bucky Barnes
line: Long enough to wake them up.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You ready?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: Yeah.

name: Tony
line: You seem a little defensive.

name: Steve Rogers
line: It's been a long day.

name: Tony
line: At ease, Soldier. I'm not currently after you.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Then why are you here?

name: Tony
line: Could be your story's not so crazy. Maybe. Ross has no idea I'm here. I'd like to keep it that way. Otherwise, I gotta arrest myself.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Well, that sounds like a lot of paperwork. [He lowers his shield.] It's good to see you, Tony.

name: Tony
line: You too, Cap. [to Bucky] Hey, Manchurian Candidate, you're killing me. There's a truce here. You can drop . . . [Steve signs Bucky to lower his weapon and he does.]

name: Tony
line: I got heat signatures.

name: Steve Rogers
line: How many?

name: Tony
line: Uh, one.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: [on speaker] If it's any comfort, they died in their sleep. [All of the enhanced soldiers have been shot in the head. Bucky stares at Josef's corpse.] Did you really think I wanted more of you?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: What the hell?

name: Helmut Zemo
line: I'm grateful to them, though. They brought you here. [Zemo appears in a control room. Steve hurls his shield but it flies back.] Please, Captain. The Soviets built this chamber to withstand the launch blast of UR-100 rockets.

name: Tony
line: I'm betting I could beat that.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Oh, I'm sure you could, Mr. Stark. Given time. But then you'd never know why you came.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You killed innocent people in Vienna just to bring us here? [Black Panther watches from the shadows. Steve looks at Zemo through a window.]

name: Helmut Zemo
line: I thought about nothing else for over a year. I studied you. I followed you. But now that you're standing here, I just realized . . . there's a bit of green in the blue of your eyes. How nice to find a flaw.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You're Sokovian. Is that what this is about?

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Sokovia was a failed state long before you blew it to hell. No. I'm here because I made a promise.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [He studies Zemo.] You lost someone?

name: Helmut Zemo
line: [He looks grave, clicks his tongue.] I lost everyone. And so will you. [He plays surveillance footage from December 16th 1991. Steve steps over to the screen.] An empire toppled by its enemies can rise again. But one which crumples from within? That's dead . . . forever.

name: Tony
line: [He looks at the freeze frame of a secluded road and the date, December 16 1991. His eyes rove, anxiously.] I know that road. What is this?

name: Howard Stark
line: Help my wife. Please. Help.

name: Howard Stark
line: Sergeant Barnes?

name: Maria Stark
line: Howard!

name: Maria Stark
line: Howard!

name: Steve Rogers
line: Tony. Tony.

name: Tony
line: [Consumed with grief and tears glistening in his eyes he turns and looks at Steve.] Did you know?

name: Steve Rogers
line: I didn't know it was him.

name: Tony
line: Don't bullshit me, Rogers! Did you know?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Yes.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [to Bucky] Get out of here!

name: Steve Rogers
line: It wasn't him, Tony. Hydra had control of his mind!

name: Tony
line: Move!

name: Steve Rogers
line: It wasn't him!

name: FRIDAY
line: Left boot jet failing. Flight systems compromised.

name: Tony
line: Ah crap.

name: Steve Rogers
line: He's not going to stop. Go.

name: Tony
line: Come on, come on.

name: FRIDAY
line: Targeting system's knackered, boss.

name: Tony
line: I'm eyeballing it. [His helmet retracts and he shuts one eye, taking aim at the opening hatch. He fires and hits the giant hinge which explodes, cutting of Bucky's escape route. He flies up, blocks two swings from an iron pipe from Bucky, then grabs him around the neck from behind.] Do you even remember them?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: I remember all of them.

name: Steve Rogers
line: This isn't gonna change what happened.

name: Tony
line: I don't care. He killed my mom.

name: s Wife
line: You should've seen his little face. Just try, okay? I'm going to bed. I love you.

name: Challa
line: [Sneaks up behind him] I almost kill the wrong man.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: Hardly an innocent one.

name: Challa
line: This is all you wanted? To see them rip each other apart.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: [Deletes the voice message] My father lived outside the city. I thought we would be safe there. My son was excited. He could see the Iron Man from the car window. I told my wife, "Don't worry. They are fighting in the city. We're miles from harm." When the dust cleared . . . and the screaming stopped. It took me two days until I found their bodies. My father . . . still holding my wife and son in his arms. And the Avengers? They went home. I knew I couldn't kill them. More powerful men than me have tried. But, if I could get them to kill each other . . . I'm sorry about your father. He seemed a good man. With a dutiful son.

name: Challa
line: Vengeance has consumed you. It's consuming them. [He blinks ruefully and retracts the claws in his gloves.] I am done letting it consume me. Justice will come soon enough.

name: Helmut Zemo
line: [Holding a gun Zemo smiles thinly.] Tell that to the dead. [He tries to shoot himself but T'Challa grabs him just as he fires.]

name: Challa
line: The living are not done with you yet.

name: FRIDAY
line: You can't beat him hand to hand.

name: Tony
line: Analyse his fight pattern.

name: FRIDAY
line: Scanning! [Iron Man's HUD flashes red as Steve lands blow after blow.] Countermeasures ready.

name: Tony
line: [He grabs Captain America's shield.] Let's kick his ass. [He flings the shield away then zaps Steve backwards, head over heels. Steve rises and Tony blocks his punches then zaps him to his knees, right in front of Bucky who's lying on his back.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: He's my friend.

name: Tony
line: So was I. [He punches Steve then throws him back towards the gaps in the wall.] Stay down. Final warning.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [He struggles to his feet, his face bloody and his gate weary. He raises his fists and stares Iron Man down.] I can do this all day.

name: Tony
line: That shield doesn't belong to you. [Steve turns his back.] You don't deserve it. My father made that shield! [Steve stops, raises his chin, then drops the shield and walks away with Bucky's arm around his shoulder.]

name: Everett Ross
line: Meals at eight and five. Toilet privileges twice a day. Raise your voice, zap. Touch the glass, zap. You step out of line, you deal with me. Please, step out of line. Hmm? [Zemo just stares.] So how does it feel? To spend all that time, all that effort . . . and, to see it fail so spectacularly?

name: Helmut Zemo
line: [He looks up to meet Everett's gaze.] Did it?

name: Tony
line: It's just the first pass.

name: James Rhodes
line: Yeah.

name: Tony
line: Give me some feedback. Anything you can think of. Shock absorption. Lateral movement. Cup holder?

name: James Rhodes
line: You may wanna think about some AC down in . . . [He falls onto his hands.]

name: Tony
line: Let's go. I'll give you a hand.

name: James Rhodes
line: No, no, don't. Don't help me. Don't help me. [He rises to his hands and knees, turns to sit on the floor beside Tony.] 138. 138 combat missions. That's how many I've flown, Tony. Every one of them could've been my last, but I flew 'em. Because the fight needed to be fought. It's the same with these Accords. I signed because it was the right thing to do. And, yeah, this sucks. This is . . . this is a bad beat. But it hasn't change my mind. I don't think. [He gives a crooked smile and takes Tony's hand.]

name: Tony
line: You okay?

name: James Rhodes
line: Oh yeah.

name: FedEx Driver Stan Lee
line: [Knocks on the window with a packet in his hand.] Are you Tony "Stank"?

name: James Rhodes
line: Yes, this is--this is Tony "Stank". You're in the right place. Thank you for that! I'm never dropping that, by the way. Table for one, Mr. "Stank". Please, by the bathroom.

name: Steve Rogers
line: [letter to Stark] Tony, I'm glad you're back at the compound. I don't like the idea of you rattling around a mansion by yourself. We all need family. The Avengers are yours, maybe more so than mine. I've been on my own since I was 18. I never really fit in anywhere, even in the army. My faith's in people, I guess. Individuals. And I'm happy to say that, for the most part, they haven't let me down. Which is why I can't let them down either. Locks can be replaced, but maybe they shouldn't. I know I hurt you, Tony. I guess I thought by not telling you about your parents I was sparing you, but I can see now that I was really sparing myself, and I'm sorry. Hopefully one day you can understand. I wish we agreed on the Accords, I really do. I know you're doing what you believe in, and that's all any of us can do. That's all any of us should . . . [As Steve reads his letter off screen it's indicated that he breaks his team out of the Raft.]

name: FRIDAY
line: Priority call from Secretary Ross. There's been a breach at the Raft prison.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, put him through.

name: Secretary Ross
line: Tony, we have a problem.

name: Tony
line: Ah, please hold.

name: Secretary Ross
line: No. Don't . . .

name: Steve Rogers
line: [letter to Stark] So, no matter what. I promise you, if you need us, if you need me, I'll be there.

name: Steve Rogers
line: You sure about this?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: I can't trust my own mind. So, until they figure out how to get this stuff out of my head I think going back under is the best thing . . . for everybody. [He goes back into cryo.]

name: Steve Rogers
line: Thank you for this.

name: Challa
line: Your friend and my father, they were both victims. If I can help one of them find peace

name: Steve Rogers
line: You know, If they find out he's here . . . they'll come for him.

name: Challa
line: Let them try.

name: May Parker
line: So. Who was it? Who hit you?

name: Peter Parker
line: Some guy. So itchy, man. God. [He fiddles with a wrist band.]

name: May Parker
line: What's "some guy's" name?

name: Peter Parker
line: Uh, Steve.

name: May Parker
line: Steve? From 12-C? With the overbite?

name: Peter Parker
line: No, no, no. You don't know him, he's from Brooklyn. [Peter's wrist band emits a red beam which he hides when his aunt comes into the room.] Ouch.

name: May Parker
line: Well . . . I hope you got a few good licks in.

name: Peter Parker
line: Yeah, I got quite a few in, actually. His friend was huge. Like huge. [May gives him ice in a towel.] That's way better. Thank you.

name: May Parker
line: Okay, tough guy. [She smiles broadly then leaves the room.]

name: Peter Parker
line: Love you, May. Hey, can you shut the door? [He shines the red beam onto his bedroom ceiling and grins looking up at a glowing image of Spider-Man's mask.]

name: Toomes
line: Things are never gonna be the same now. I mean, look at this. You got aliens. You got big green guys tearing down buildings. When I was a kid, I used to draw cowboys and Indians.

name: Mason
line: Actually, it's Native American, but whatever.

name: Toomes
line: Yeah. Tell you what, though. It ain't bad, is it?

name: Mason
line: No. Yeah. Kid's got a future.

name: Toomes
line: Yeah, well... We'll see, I guess.

name: Toomes
line: No, hey! Uh-uh! You can't saw through that stuff. These alien bastards are tough. You gotta use the stuff they use.

name: Toomes
line: See?

name: Schultz
line: All right.

name: Toomes
line: All right. (to Brice) Oh, hey! Glad you could join us. Afternoon.

name: Brice
line: Yeah. My alarm didn't go off.

name: Toomes
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah, your alarm. Look, just go stack that armor plating like I asked you. This is a huge deal for us.

name: Anne Marie Hoag
line: Attention, please! In accordance with Executive Order 396B, all post-battle cleanup operations are now under our jurisdiction. Thank you for your service. We'll take it from here.

name: Toomes
line: Who the hell are you?

name: DODC Agent
line: Qualified personnel.

name: Toomes
line: Look, I have a city contract to salvage all this, okay, with the city, so-

name: Anne Marie Hoag
line: I apologize, Mr. Toomes, but all salvage operations are now under our jurisdiction. Please turn over any and all exotic materials that you've collected, or you will be prosecuted.

name: Toomes
line: Ma'am, what am I- Please. Come here. Hey, lady, come on. Look... I bought trucks for this job. I brought in a whole new crew. These guys have a family. I have a family. I'm all in on this. I could lose my house.

name: Anne Marie Hoag
line: I'm sorry, sir. There's nothing I can do.

name: DODC Agent
line: Maybe next time, don't over extend yourself.

name: Toomes
line: What'd you say?

name: Toomes
line: Yeah, he's right. I overextended myself.

name: Worker
line: Don't do it.

name: Anne Marie Hoag
line: Put them down.

name: Anne Marie Hoag
line: If you have a grievance, you may take it up with my superiors.

name: Toomes
line: Your superiors. Who the hell are they?

name: News Anchor
line: A joint venture between Stark Industries and the federal government, the Department of Damage Control will oversee the collection and storage of alien and other exotic materials.

name: Schultz
line: So now the assholes who made this mess are being paid to clean it up.

name: Mason
line: Yeah, its all rigged.

name: News Anchor
line: Experts estimate there are over fifteen hundred tons of exotic material scattered throughout the tri-state area.

name: Worker
line: Hey, chief! We still have another load from yesterday. Were supposed to turn this in, right?

name: Brice
line: I aint hauling it.

name: Mason
line: Its too bad. We could have made some pretty cool stuff from all that alien junk.

name: Toomes
line: I tell you what, lets keep it. The worlds changing.

name: Toomes
line: Its time we change, too.

name: Toomes
line: There you go, Mason.

name: Toomes
line: Business is good.

name: Peter
line: (in a gravelly voice) New York. Queens. Its a rough borough, but hey, its home.

name: Happy
line: Who are you talking to?

name: Peter
line: (in a normal voice) No one. Just making a little video of the trip.

name: Happy
line: You know you cant show it to anyone.

name: Peter
line: Yeah, I know.

name: Happy
line: Then why are you narrating in that voice?

name: Peter
line: Uh... Because its fun.

name: Happy
line: Fun.

name: Peter
line: So, uh, why do they call you Happy?

name: Happy
line: Come on. Im not carrying your bags. Lets go.

name: Peter
line: Hey, should I go to the bathroom before?

name: Happy
line: Theres a bathroom on it.

name: Peter
line: Whoa. No pilot? Thats awesome.

name: Happy
line: Is that where youre gonna sit?

name: Peter
line: Yeah.

name: Happy
line: This is your first time on a private plane?

name: Peter
line: My first time on any plane.

name: Peter
line: Should it...? Should it be...? Should it be making that noise?

name: Peter
line: Shh.

name: Peter
line: No one has actually told me why Im in Berlin or what Im doing. Something about Captain America going crazy.

name: Happy
line: (pointing at a door) This is you.

name: Peter
line: Oh, were neighbors?

name: Happy
line: Were not roommates. Suit up.

name: Peter
line: Okay, Peter, you got this. You got this.

name: Happy
line: What the hell are you wearing?

name: Peter
line: Its my suit.

name: Happy
line: Wheres the case?

name: Peter
line: What case? Thats not my...

name: Peter
line: What? I thought that was a closet. This is still my room?

name: Happy
line: Go. Please.

name: Peter
line: My room is way bigger than...

name: Happy
line: There.

name: Peter
line: I found the case. I found the case. I found the case.

name: Peter
line: A minor upgrade?

name: Peter
line: Whoa. Oh my God.

name: Happy
line: Put it on.

name: Peter
line: What the...? This is the coolest thing Ive ever seen-

name: Happy
line: Lets go.

name: Peter
line: But, yeah. Well, I dont understand. Is it for me?

name: Peter
line: Happy, Happy, wait.

name: Peter
line: This is insane. Insane. Look at this thing. Look. Look at the eyes. This is the greatest day of my life.

name: Happy
line: Lets go.

name: Peter
line: Okay.

name: Happy
line: Come on.

name: Peter
line: (whispers) Okay, theres Captain America, Iron Man, Black Widow. Whoa. Whos that new guy?

name: Tony
line: Underoos!

name: Peter
line: Oh, thats me. I gotta go. I gotta go.

name: Peter
line: Hey, everyone.

name: Peter
line: Okay, so the craziest thing just happened, right? I just had a fight with Captain America and I stole his shield and I threw it at him-

name: Peter
line: What the hell? Hes big now. I gotta go. Hang on.

name: Peter
line: Whoa!

name: Peter
line: It was the most amazing thing thats ever happened! So Mr. Stark was like, Hey, Underoos! and I just sort of flipped in and I stole Caps shield. I was like, Hey, whats up, everybody? And then...

name: Peter
line: Hey, just a second! Coming!

name: Peter
line: Hey.

name: Happy
line: We have thin walls here.

name: Tony
line: What are you doing, a little video diary?

name: Peter
line: (embarrassed) Yeah.

name: Tony
line: Its all right. Id probably do the same.

name: Happy
line: (from the drivers seat) I told him not to do it. He was filming everything.

name: Tony
line: Its okay.

name: Happy
line: Im gonna wipe the chip.

name: Tony
line: Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. You know what? We should actually... We should make an alibi video for your aunt anyway. You ready?

name: Peter
line: Yeah, hold on.

name: Tony
line: We rolling?

name: Peter
line: An alibi? Sure.

name: Tony
line: Get in the frame.

name: Peter
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: Hey, May. How you doing? What are you wearing? Something skimpy, I hope.

name: Tony
line: Peter, thats inappropriate. All right, lets start over. You can edit it.

name: Peter
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Tony
line: Three, two, one. Hey, May. My gosh, uh, I wanted to tell you what an incredible job your nephew did this weekend at the Stark internship retreat. Everyone was impressed.

name: Happy
line: Come on! Its a freaking merge. (to Tony) Im sorry.

name: Tony
line: This is because youre not on Queens Boulevard. (to the camera) See, Happy is... is hoping to get bumped up to asset management. He was forehead of security, and before that, he was just a driver.

name: Happy
line: That was a private conversation. I dont like joking about this. It was hard for me to talk to you about that.

name: Tony
line: No, seriously, was he snoring a bunch?

name: Happy
line: All right. Here we are. End of the line. Whoops.

name: Tony
line: Happy, can you give us a moment?

name: Happy
line: You want me to leave the car?

name: Tony
line: Why dont you grab Peters case out of the trunk.

name: Peter
line: I can keep the suit?

name: Tony
line: Yes, we were just talking about it.

name: Tony
line: Do me a favor, though. Happys kind of your point guy on this. Dont stress him out. Dont do anything stupid. Ive seen his cardiogram. All right?

name: Peter
line: (enthusiastically) Yes.

name: Tony
line: Dont do anything I would do, and definitely dont do anything I wouldnt do. Theres a... Theres a little grey area in there, and thats where you operate.

name: Peter
line: Wait, does that mean that Im an Avenger?

name: Tony
line: No.

name: Happy
line: This it?

name: Tony
line: Seventh floor.

name: Peter
line: I can take that. You dont have to take it.

name: Happy
line: Youre gonna take it?

name: Peter
line: Yeah, I can take that.

name: Happy
line: Thank you.

name: Peter
line: So whens, whens our next... Whens our next retreat, you know? Like...

name: Tony
line: What, next mission?

name: Peter
line: Yeah, the mission. The missions.

name: Tony
line: Well call you.

name: Peter
line: Do you have my numbers?

name: Tony
line: No, I mean, well call you. Like, someone will call you.

name: Peter
line: Oh.

name: Tony
line: All right?

name: Peter
line: From your team.

name: Tony
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: Its not a hug. Im just grabbing the door for you. Were not there yet.

name: Tony
line: Bye.

name: Peter
line: Theyre gonna call me.

name: Flash
line: Whats up, Penis Parker?

name: Betty
line: Rise and shine, Midtown Science and Technology.

name: Jason
line: Students, dont forget about your homecoming tickets. Do you have a date for homecoming?

name: Betty
line: Thanks, Jason, but I already have a date.

name: Jason
line: Okay.

name: Betty
line: Yeah.

name: Principal Morita
line: Good morning.

name: Principal Morita

line: Ned, I need you to track my phone for me.

name: Ned
line: Yeah, but where is it?

name: Ned
line: Genius move. Okay, he just passed the GameStop on Jackson Avenue.

name: Peter
line: Hey, where are the headlights on this thing? Im in Flashs car.

name: Ned
line: Ill pull the specs.

name: Peter
line: Okay, youre on speakerphone.

name: Ned
line: You stole Flashs car. Awesome.

name: Peter
line: Yeah, its awesome. Its awe... Whoa!

name: Peter
line: Get out of the way, get out of the way! Move! Move!

name: Ned
line: Peter, are you okay?

name: Peter
line: Ive never really driven before. Only with May in parking lots. This is a huge step up...

name: Peter
line: Hey, have you gotten through to Happy yet?

name: Ned
line: Yeah. Im working on it. I just gotta backdoor the phone system.

name: Ned
line: Guy in the chair.

name: Happy
line: Takeoff in nine minutes. (to Ned) Hello? Hello? Who is this?

name: Ned
line: Uh... Mr. Happy, its Ned.

name: Happy
line: Who?

name: Ned
line: Im an associate of Peter Parker. Got something very important to tell you-

name: Happy
line: You gotta be shitting me.

name: Ned
line: Damn.

name: Peter
line: Hey, Ned, how we coming on with those headlights?

name: Ned
line: Uh... Round knob to the left of the steering wheel, turn clockwise.

name: Peter
line: Left. Okay. Okay, perfect. So wheres my phone now?

name: Ned
line: Um... He stopped in an old industrial park in Brooklyn.

name: Peter
line: What? That makes no sense. I thought he said he was going out of town!

name: Ned
line: Weird. Oh, I reached Mr. Happy. Dont think he likes you, by the way. It sounded like he was catching a flight. He said something about taking off in nine minutes.

name: Peter
line: What?

name: Ned
line: He was surrounded by a bunch of boxes.

name: Peter
line: Boxes? Its moving day. Its moving day! Its moving day! Hes gonna rob that plane! I gotta stop him!

name: Happy
line: All right, wheels up in eight minutes. We just got to load Tonys old Hulkbuster armor, prototype for Caps new shield, and the Meging... the Meg... the... Thors magic belt.

name: Ned
line: Okay, slow down. Youre getting close. Its on your right.

name: Peter
line: What?

name: Ned
line: Turn right! Turn right!

name: Ned
line: Peter, are you okay?

name: Peter
line: Yeah. Just keep trying to get through to Happy.

name: Ned
line: Its been an honor, Spider-Man.

name: Warren
line: What are you doing here? Theres a dance.

name: Ned
line: Uh...

name: Ned
line: (awkwardly) Im... looking... at... porn.

name: Peter
line: Hey! Surprised?

name: Toomes
line: Oh, hey, Pete. I didnt hear you come in.

name: Peter
line: Its over. Ive got you.

name: Toomes
line: You know, I gotta tell you, Pete, I really, really admire your grit. I see why Liz likes you. I do. When you first came to the house, I wasnt sure. I thought, Really? But I get it now.

name: Peter
line: How could you do this to her?

name: Toomes
line: To her? Im not doing anything to her, Pete. Im doing this for her.

name: Peter
line: Huh, yeah.

name: Toomes
line: (sighs) Peter, youre young. You dont understand how the world works.

name: Peter
line: Yeah, but I understand that selling weapons to criminals is wrong.

name: Toomes
line: How do you think your buddy Stark paid for that tower? Or any of his little toys? Those people, Pete, those people up there, the rich and the powerful, they do whatever they want. Guys like us, like you and me, they dont care about us. We build their roads and we fight all their wars and everything, but they dont care about us. We have to pick up after em. We have to eat their table scraps. Thats how it is. I know you know what Im talking about, Peter.

name: Peter
line: Why are you telling me this?

name: Toomes
line: Because I want you to understand. And... I needed a little time to get her airborne.

name: Toomes
line: Im sorry, Peter.

name: Peter
line: What are you talking about? That thing hasnt even touched me yet.

name: Toomes
line: True. Then again, wasnt really trying to.

name: Mason
line: Chief, theyre powering up engines.

name: Toomes
line: Okay.

name: Mason
line: Come on, come on, come on.

name: Toomes
line: Yeah, yeah.

name: Peter
line: Oh, god. Okay, ready?

name: Peter
line: Hello! Hello! Please. Hey, hey, please. Im down here. Im down here. Im stuck. Im stuck. I cant move. I cant...

name: Tony
line: If youre nothing without this suit, then you shouldnt have it.

name: Peter
line: Come on, Peter. Come on, Spider-Man. Come on, Spider-Man. Come on, Spider-Man. Come on, Spider-Man!

name: Mason
line: Launch for intercept. Green light. Green light.

name: Toomes
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Tech
line: Retro-reflective panels engaged.

name: Toomes
line: Got a visual on the plane, feeling a little resistance.

name: Mason
line: Its probably just a drag on the new turbines.

name: Peter
line: Ah! Whoa!

name: Mason
line: Look out for the cloaking cameras. Stay in the blind spots.

name: Peter
line: Oh, my god! Oh, my god!

name: Mason
line: Deploy high-altitude vacuum seal.

name: Toomes
line: This better work, Mason.

name: Mason
line: Trust me, boss. Even one of those boxes and we are set for life.

name: Toomes
line: Yeah.

name: Peter
line: Hey! Ah! Whew.

name: Mason
line: You have thirty seconds to get to the cockpit and override their security.

name: Toomes
line: Cloning transponder signal.

name: Mason
line: Launching decoy drone.

name: Toomes
line: Entering new coordinates.

name: Happy
line: Good, so its on its way?

name: Tech
line: Yes, sir, right on course.

name: Happy
line: Okay, thank you. All right.

name: Toomes
line: Hot dog.

name: Peter
line: Just a typical homecoming on the outside of an invisible jet... Fighting my girlfriends dad.

name: Peter
line: Oh, god!

name: Peter
line: Whew. I cant believe that worked.

name: Mason
line: Chief, chief, theyre losing altitude. Get out of there.

name: Toomes
line: Im not going home empty-handed.

name: Peter
line: Oh, my god.

name: Mason
line: Get out of there! What are you doing?

name: Peter
line: Please turn! Please turn!

name: Toomes
line: Hey, Pedro.

name: Toomes
line: Bingo.

name: Peter
line: Your wing suit. Your wing suits gonna explode!

name: Toomes
line: Time to go home, Pete.

name: Peter
line: Im trying to save you!

name: Peter
line: No.

name: A note is attached beside him
line: FOUND FLYING VULTURE GUY. SPIDER-MAN. P.S. SORRY ABOUT YOUR PLANE. Happy raises his head and looks around as if searching for someone.]

name: Ned
line: It looked so insane. That whole... Like, it was just crazy. He, he was just like, Zzzz, and you were like, Ah!

name: Peter
line: Shh.

name: Ned
line: And then I just hit him with the pew. It was so, oh, my god.

name: Peter
line: You saved me. It was awesome.

name: Peter
line: Hey, Liz!

name: Betty
line: Im gonna miss you.

name: Liz
line: Bye.

name: Peter
line: Liz.

name: Peter
line: Liz, look. Im so sorry.

name: Liz
line: You say that a lot. What are you sorry for this time?

name: Liz
line: The dance? That was a pretty crappy thing to do.

name: Peter
line: Well, yeah, but I... I mean, your dad... I cant imagine what youre going through. If theres anything I can do to help...

name: Liz
line: (fighting tears) I guess were moving to Oregon. Mom says its nice there, so thats cool. Anyways, Dad doesnt want us here during the trial, so...

name: Peter
line: Liz, I... I...

name: Liz
line: Bye, Peter. Whatevers going on with you, I hope you figure it out.

name: Harrington
line: Congratulations, Decathlon national champions.

name: Decathlon Team
line: (clapping) Yeah!

name: Harrington
line: Im gonna have to put this back in the trophy case soon, but just for motivation right now at this practice. Im a little ahead of the game, but we will need a new team captain next year. So Im appointing Michelle.

name: Decathlon Team
line: Yeah!

name: Michelle
line: Uh, thank you. My friends call me M.J.

name: Ned
line: I thought you didnt have any friends.

name: Michelle
line: I didnt.

name: He picks the broken phone up and reads a message from an unknown number
line: Go to the bathroom.]

name: Peter
line: I... I gotta go.

name: Michelle
line: Hey, where you going?

name: Michelle
line: What are you hiding, Peter?

name: Michelle
line: Im just kidding. I dont care. Bye. (to Decathlon team) All right, so we should run some drills.

name: Ned
line: Yeah.

name: Peter
line: Hey, Happy. What, uh... What are you doing here?

name: Happy
line: I really owe you one. I dont know what I would do without this job. I mean, before I met Tony-

name: Peter
line: So, uh, how long you been here?

name: Happy
line: Long enough to be awkward. Boss wants to see you.

name: Peter
line: (whispers) Is he here too?

name: Happy
line: In the toilet? No, hes upstate.

name: Peter
line: Upstate? Like, upstate-upstate?

name: Happy
line: Yeah, lets go.

name: Dashboard display says
line: You may take your hands off the steering wheel.]

name: Happy
line: Take a look. Its pretty impressive, huh?

name: Happy
line: They just finished remodeling the whole thing.

name: Happy
line: You dont see that every day.

name: Tony
line: Oh, there they are. How was the ride up?

name: Happy
line: Good.

name: Tony
line: Give me a minute with the kid.

name: Happy
line: Seriously?

name: Tony
line: Yeah. I gotta talk to the kid.

name: Happy
line: Ill be close behind.

name: Tony
line: How about a loose follow? All right? Boundaries are good.

name: Tony
line: Sorry I took your suit. I mean, you had it coming. Actually, it turns out it was the perfect sort of tough-love moment that you needed, right? To urge you on, right? Wouldnt you think? Dont you think?

name: Peter
line: Yeah, yeah, I guess.

name: Tony
line: Lets just say it was.

name: Peter
line: Mr. Stark, I really-

name: Tony
line: You screwed the pooch hard. Big time. But then you did the right thing. Took the dog to the free clinic, you raised the hybrid puppies... All right, not my best analogy. (beat) I was wrong about you. I think, with a little more mentoring, you could be a real asset to the team.

name: Peter
line: To the... To the team?

name: Tony
line: Yeah. Anyway... (points at a door) Theres about fifty reporters behind that door. Real ones, not bloggers.

name: Tony
line: When youre ready... Why dont you try that on? And Ill introduce the world to the newest official member of the Avengers: Spider-Man.

name: Tony
line: Yeah. Give that a look.

name: Tony
line: So, after the press conference, Happy will show you to your room, your new quarters. (to Happy) Wheres he between? Hes next to Vision?

name: Happy
line: Yeah, Visions not big on doors.

name: Tony
line: Its fun.

name: Happy
line: Or walls.

name: Tony
line: (to Peter) Youll fit right in.

name: Peter
line: Thank you, Mr. Stark. But Im good.

name: Tony
line: Youre good? Good? How are you good?

name: Peter
line: Well, I mean, Im... Id rather just stay on the ground for a little while. Friendly neighborhood Spider-Man. Somebodys got to look out for the little guy, right?

name: Tony
line: You turning me down? You better think about this. (pointing at the new Spider-Man suit) Look at that. Look at me. Last chance, yes or no?

name: Peter
line: No.

name: Tony
line: Okay. Its kind of a Springsteen-y, working class hero vibe that I dig. Uh, Happy will take you home. Yeah?

name: Happy
line: Yeah. (to Peter) Mind waiting in the car? I need a minute.

name: Peter
line: Thank you, Mr. Stark.

name: Tony
line: Yes, Mr. Parker. Very well.

name: Peter
line: See you around.

name: Tony
line: Okay.

name: Peter
line: That was a test, right? Theres, uh, nobody back there?

name: Tony
line: Yes, you passed. All right, skedaddle there, young buck.

name: Peter
line: Thank you, Mr. Stark. Thank you.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, thank you.

name: Happy
line: Told you hes a good kid.

name: Pepper
line: Wheres the kid?

name: Happy
line: He left.

name: Pepper
line: Everybodys waiting.

name: Tony
line: You know what? He actually made a really mature choice. It just surprised the heck out of us.

name: Pepper
line: Did you guys screw this up?

name: Tony
line: (points at Happy) He told the kid to go wait in the car.

name: Pepper
line: Are you kidding me? I have a room full of people in there waiting for some big announcement. What am I gonna tell them?

name: Tony
line: Think of something. How about, um... Hap, you still got that ring?

name: Happy
line: Do I... I, uh...

name: Tony
line: The engagement ring?

name: Happy
line: Are you kidding? Ive been carrying this since 2008.

name: Tony
line: Okay.

name: Pepper
line: I think I can think of something better than that.

name: Tony
line: Well, it would buy us a little time.

name: Tony
line: Like we need time.

name: Pepper
line: I cant believe you have that thing in your pocket.

name: Tony
line: Want me to get the door for you, hon?

name: Pepper
line: I got it.

name: Peter
line: Aunt May, did you do dinner already?

name: Peter
line: May?

name: May
line: What the fu...?

name: Gargan
line: Look who it is! What are the odds you and Id end up in the same summer camp? Relax. This? (points at the scar on his forehead) Its not on you. Its on our, uh... little spider friend. Ive got some boys on the outside who would love to meet him. You know, take a picture, slice his throat, put his head in a dryer. And I heard a rumor... you know who he is.

name: Toomes
line: If I knew who he was, hed already be dead.

name: Guard
line: Toomes, your familys here.

name: Steve
line: Hi. Im Captain America. Here to talk to you about one of the most valuable traits a soldier or student can have. Patience. Sometimes patience is the key to victory. Sometimes it leads to very little. It seems like its not worth it. And you wonder why you waited so long for something so disappointing.

name: Steve
line: How many more of these?

name: Thanos
line: [Looking out the large window we saw at the end of Thor: Ragnarok.] I know what it's like to lose. To feel so desperately that you're right... yet to fail, nonetheless. [grabs Thor by the head.] It's frightening. Turns the legs to jelly. I ask you, to what end? Dread it. Run from it. Destiny arrives all the same. And now, it's here. Or should I say... I AM.

name: Thor
line: [exhaustedly spitting blood from his mouth] You talk too much.

name: Thanos
line: [to Loki] The Tesseract, or your brother's head. I assume you have a preference.

name: Loki
line: Oh, I do. Kill away!

name: Loki
line: [cringing and looking away from his brother's pain and has just thought for a few seconds] ALRIGHT, STOP!

name: Thor
line: We don't have the Tesseract. It was destroyed on Asgard.

name: Thor
line: You really are the worst, brother.

name: Loki
line: [While holding the Tesseract out to Thanos and advancing] I assure you, brother, the Sun will shine on us again.

name: Thanos
line: Your optimism is misplaced, Asgardian.

name: Loki
line: Well, for one thing: I'm not Asgardian. And for another... We have a Hulk.

name: Ebony Maw
line: Let him have his fun.

name: Heimdall
line: Allfathers... let the dark magic flow through me one last... time.

name: Thanos
line: That was a mistake.

name: Thor
line: NO!!! You're going to die for that!

name: Ebony Maw
line: Shhhh. [Holding the Tesseract, on one knee] My humble personage... bows before your grandeur. No other being has ever had the might, nay the nobility, to wield not one, but two Infinity Stones. The universe lies within your grasp.

name: Thanos
line: There are two more Stones on Earth. Find them, my children, and bring them to me on Titan.

name: Proxima Midnight
line: Father, we will not fail you.

name: Loki
line: [Emerging from a separate section of the ship] If I might, interject... If you're going to Earth, you might want a guide. I do have a bit of experience in that arena.

name: Thanos
line: If you consider failure experience...

name: Loki
line: I consider experience, experience. Almighty Thanos. I, Loki, Prince of Asgard... Odinson... The rightful King of Jotunheim, God of Mischief, do hereby pledge to you, my undying fidelity.

name: Thanos
line: Undying. You should choose your words more carefully.

name: Loki
line: [Giving up on fighting against Thanos] You... will never be... a god. [Thanos snaps Loki's neck, killing him]

name: Thanos
line: No resurrections this time.

name: Thor
line: No... Loki...

name: Doctor Strange
line: Seriously? You don't have any money?

name: Wong
line: Attachment to the material is detachment from the spiritual.

name: Doctor Strange
line: I'll tell the guys at the deli. Maybe they'll make you a metaphysical Ham on Rye.

name: Wong
line: Oh, wait, wait, wait, I think I have 200.

name: Doctor Strange
line: Dollars?

name: Wong
line: Rupees.

name: Doctor Strange
line: Which is?

name: Wong
line: Uh, buck and a half.

name: Doctor Strange
line: What do you want?

name: Wong
line: I wouldn't say no to a Tuna Melt.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Thanos is coming. He's coming...

name: Doctor Strange
line: [Sharing a look with Wong, now in his normal fighting attire] ... Who?

name: Title Screen
line: Avengers: Infinity War)

name: Tony
line: Slow down, slow down. I'm totally not kidding. Pepper Potts: [laughing slightly] You're totally rambling.

name: Tony
line: No, I'm not.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Lost me.

name: Tony
line: Look, you know how you're having a dream, and in the dream you gotta pee?

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yeah.

name: Tony
line: Okay, and then you're like, Oh my god, there's no bathroom, what am I gonna do? Oh! Someone's watching. I'm gonna go in my pants.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Right. And then you wake up, and in real life you actually have to pee.

name: Tony
line: Yes.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yeah. Everybody has that.

name: Tony
line: Right! That's the point I'm trying to make. Apropos of that, last night, I dreamt, we had a kid. So real. We named him after your eccentric uncle. Uh, what was his name?

name: Pepper Potts
line: [Nodding in understanding] Right.

name: Tony
line: Morgan! Morgan.

name: Pepper Potts
line: So you woke up, and thought that we were...

name: Tony
line: Expecting.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yeah.

name: Tony
line: [Becoming excited] Yes?

name: Pepper Potts
line: [Shaking her head} No.

name: Tony
line: I had a dream about it. It was so real.

name: Pepper Potts
line: If you wanted to have a kid, you wouldn't have done that.

name: Tony
line: I'm glad you brought this up, 'cause it's nothing. It's just a housing unit for nano particles.

name: Pepper Potts
line: It's not helping your case, OK?

name: Tony
line: No, no, it's an attachment, it's not a-

name: Pepper Potts
line: {Insistently] You don't need that.

name: Tony
line: I know. I had the surgery. I'm just trying to protect us. The future, us, and that's it. Just in case there's a monster in the closet, instead of, you know...

name: Pepper Potts
line: Shirts?

name: Tony
line: You know me so well. You finish all my sentences.

name: Pepper Potts
line: You should have shirts in your closet.

name: Tony
line: Yeah. You know what there should be? No more surprises. We're gonna have a nice dinner tonight. Show off this Harry Winston. Right? And we should have no more surprises. Ever. I should promise you.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Yes.

name: Tony
line: I will. (Tony kisses Pepper.)

name: Doctor Strange
line: Tony, I'm Doctor Stephen Strange. I need you to come with me. Oh, uh, congratulations on the wedding, by the way.

name: Tony
line: I'm sorry, you giving out tickets or something?

name: Doctor Strange
line: We need your help. Look, it's not overselling to say that the fate of the universe is at stake.

name: Tony
line: And who's we?

name: Bruce Banner
line: [Emerges behind Doctor Strange] Hey, Tony.

name: Tony
line: [Looking surprised] Bruce.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Pepper.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Hi.

name: Tony
line: You okay?

name: Wong
line: [Using magic to show the universe and five out of six Infinity Stones] From the dawn of the universe, there was nothing. Then, boom! The Big Bang sent six elemental crystals, hurdling across the virgin universe. These Infinity Stones each control an essential aspect of existence.

name: Doctor Strange
line: Space. Reality. Power. Soul. Mind. And Time.

name: Tony
line: Tell me his name again. Bruce Banner: Thanos. He's a plague, Tony. He invades planets, he takes what he wants, he wipes out half the population. He sent Loki! The attack on New York, that's him! Tony: [Speaking to himself] This is him...What's our timeline? Bruce Banner: No telling. He has the Power and Space Stones, that already makes him the strongest creature in the whole universe! If he gets his hands, on all six Stones, Tony... Doctor Strange: He can destroy life on a scale hither to undreamt of.

name: Tony
line: [Leans against a cauldron, stretching casually] Did you seriously just say hither to undreamt of?

name: Doctor Strange
line: Are you seriously leaning on the Cauldron of the Cosmos?

name: Tony
line: Is that what this is...?

name: Tony
line: [Looking offended] I'm going to allow that. If Thanos needs all six, why don't we just stick this one down the garbage disposal?

name: Doctor Strange
line: No can do.

name: Wong
line: We swore an oath to protect the Time Stone. With our lives.

name: Tony
line: And I swore off dairy, but then, Ben & Jerry's named a flavor after me, so...

name: Doctor Strange
line: Stark Raving Hazelnuts.

name: Tony
line: It's not bad.

name: Doctor Strange
line: A bit chalky.

name: Wong
line: A Hunka-Hulka Burning Fudge is our favorite.

name: Bruce Banner
line: That's a thing?

name: Tony
line: Whatever. Point is: Things change.

name: Doctor Strange
line: Our oath to protect the Time Stone cannot change. This Stone may be the best chance we have against Thanos.

name: Tony
line: And still conversely, it may also be his best chance against us.

name: Doctor Strange
line: Well, if we don't do our jobs.

name: Tony
line: What is your job exactly, besides making balloon animals?

name: Doctor Strange
line: Protecting your reality, douchebag.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Okay, guys, can we quick cable this discussion right now? The fact is that we have the Stone. We know where it is. Vision is out there somewhere with the Mind Stone, and we have to find him now.

name: Tony
line: [awkwardly] Yeah, that's the thing.

name: Bruce Banner
line: What do you mean?

name: Tony
line: Two weeks ago, Vision turned off his transponder. He's offline.

name: Bruce Banner
line: What?! Tony, you lost another super bot?!

name: Tony
line: I didn't lose him. He's more than that. He's evolving.

name: Doctor Strange
line: Who could find Vision, then?

name: Tony
line: Shit. Probably Steve Rogers.

name: Doctor Strange
line: [sighing in exasperation] Oh, great.

name: Tony
line: Maybe. But...

name: Bruce Banner
line: [missing the events of Civil War] Call him.

name: Tony
