line: It's not that easy. God, we haven't caught up in a spell, have we?

name: Bruce Banner
line: No.

name: Tony
line: The Avengers broke up. We're toast.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Broke up? Like a band? Like The Beatles?

name: Tony
line: Cap and I fell out hard. We're not on speaking terms.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Tony, listen to me. Thor's gone. Thanos is coming. It doesn't matter who you're talking to or not.

name: Tony
line: Say, Doc, you wouldn't happen to be moving your hair, would you?

name: Doctor Strange
line: [Trying to look up at one of his stray hairs fluttering] ... Not at the moment, no. [Tony looks at the opening on the ceiling and sees metal scraps flying by outside. He exits the Sanctum and scans the chaotic surroundings. He helps a woman up.]

name: Tony
line: You okay?

name: Tony
line: Help him! Wong, Doc.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Go! Got it!

name: Tony
line: [Putting on his sunglasses] F.R.I.D.A.Y., what am I looking at?

name: Tony
line: Hey! You might wanna put that Time Stone in your back pocket, Doc!

name: Doctor Strange
line: Might wanna use it.

name: Peter Parker
line: [Tapping his friend from the seat in front of him] Ned, hey. I need you to cause a distraction.

name: Ned Leeds
line: Holy shit! We're all gonna die! There's a spaceship!

name: Stan Lee
line: What's the matter with you kids? You've never seen a spaceship before?

name: Tony
line: F.R.I.D.A.Y., evac anyone south of 43rd Street, notify first responders.

name: Ebony Maw
line: Hear me, and rejoice. You are about to die at the hands of the Children of Thanos. Be thankful, that your meaningless lives are now contributing to...

name: Tony
line: I'm sorry, Earth is closed today. You better pack it up and get outta here.

name: Ebony Maw
line: [Looks at Strange] Stone keeper... Does this chattering animal speak for you?

name: Doctor Strange
line: Certainly not. I speak for myself. But you're trespassing in this city and on this planet.

name: Tony
line: It means get lost Squidward!

name: Ebony Maw
line: He exhausts me. Bring me the Stone.

name: Tony
line: Banner, you want a piece?

name: Bruce Banner
line: No, not really, but when do I ever get what I want?

name: Tony
line: That's right.

name: Tony
line: Been a while. Good to have you, buddy.

name: Bruce Banner
line: I just... I need to concentrate here for one second. Come on, come on, man.

name: Tony
line: Where's your guy?

name: Bruce Banner
line: I don't know. We've sort been havin' a thing.

name: Tony
line: There's no time for a thing.

name: Bruce Banner
line: I know.

name: Tony
line: That's the thing right there. Let's go.

name: Tony
line: {Glances at Strange] Dude, you're embarrassing me in front of the wizards.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Tony, I'm sorry. (STAMMERS) Either I can't or he won't-

name: Tony
line: It's okay. Hey, stand down. [to Wong] Keep an eye on him. Thank you.

name: Wong
line: I have him.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Damn it.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Where'd that come from?

name: Tony
line: It's nano-tech. You like it? A little somet-

name: Doctor Strange
line: Dr. Banner, if the rest of your green friend won't be joining us...

name: Tony
line: Gotta get that stone outta here, now.

name: Doctor Strange
line: It stays with me.

name: Tony
line: Exactly. Bye.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Tony, you okay? How we doing? Good? bad?

name: Tony
line: Really, really good. Really good. Do you plan on helping out?

name: Bruce Banner
line: I'm trying. He won't come out.

name: Tony
line: Hammer. [Pushing Bruce out of the way]

name: Bruce Banner
line: [begins hitting himself]Come on, Hulk. What are you doing to me? Come out! Come out! Come out!

name: Hulk
line: No!

name: Bruce Banner
line: What do you mean, no?

name: Peter Parker
line: Hey, man. What's up, Mr. Stark?

name: Tony
line: Kid, where'd you come from?

name: Peter Parker
line: Field trip to MoMA.

name: Peter Parker
line: What is this guy's problem, Mr. Stark?

name: Tony
line: He's from space. He came here to steal a necklace from a wizard.

name: Ebony Maw
line: Your powers are quaint. You must be popular with children.

name: Doctor Strange
line: It's a simple spell but quite unbreakable.

name: Ebony Maw
line: Then I'll take it off your corpse.

name: Doctor Strange
line: You'll find...removing a dead man's spell... Troublesome.

name: Ebony Maw
line: You'll only wish you were dead. [Strange falls unconscious and is Maw moves to grab him. The Cloak of Levitation flies Strange away} No!

name: Tony
line: [As Strange passes through the park] Kid, that's the wizard. Get on it.

name: Peter Parker
line: On it!

name: Peter Parker
line: Not cool!

name: Peter Parker
line: Mr. Stark? I'm being beamed up.

name: Tony
line: Hang on, kid. [As Black Dwarf jumps towards Tony he is sent through a portal. Tony turns towards Wong, the one who made the portal} Wong, you're invited to my wedding. [Tony begins to fly towards the large ship] Give me a little juice, F.R.I.D.A.Y. [Tony's feet thrusters turn morph together into a larger one] Unlock 17-A. [a pod jettisons from the New Avengers Facility] Pete, you gotta let go. I'm gonna catch you.

name: Peter Parker
line: But you said save the wizard! [Peter, based on lack of oxygen, pulls off his mask] I can't breathe!

name: Tony
line: You're too high up. You're running out of air.

name: Peter Parker
line: Yeah! That makes sense.

name: Peter Parker
line: Mr. Stark, it smells like a new car in here!

name: Tony
line: Happy trails, kid. F.R.I.D.A.Y, send him home.

name: Y
line: Yup.

name: Peter Parker
line: Oh, come on!

name: Y
line: Boss, incoming call from Miss Potts.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tony? Oh, my God. Are you all right? What's going on?

name: Tony
line: Yeah, I'm fine. I just think we might have to push our 8:30 res.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Why?

name: Tony
line: [While looking at the ship around him] Just 'cause I'll... probably not make it back for awhile.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Tell me you're not on that ship.

name: Tony
line: Yeah.

name: Pepper Potts
line: God, no. Please tell me you're not on that ship.

name: Tony
line: Honey, I'm sorry. I'm sorry, I don't know what to say.

name: Pepper Potts
line: Come back here, Tony. I swear to God...

name: Tony
line: Pep...

name: Pepper Potts
line: Come back here right now! Come back!

name: Y
line: Boss, we're losing her. I'm going, too...

name: Peter Parker
line: Oh my God. I should have stayed on the bus.

name: Bruce Banner
line: Where you going?

name: Wong
line: The Time Stone's been taken. The Sanctum remains unguarded. What will you do?

name: Bruce Banner
line: [Holding Rogers' cell phone] I'm gonna make a call.

name: SPACE
line: Guardians of the Galaxy)

name: Peter Quill
line: (While dancing to the song) Sing it, Drax!

name: Rocket
line: (After yawning briefly) Why are we doing this again?

name: Gamora
line: (In annoyance) It's a distress signal, Rocket. Someone could be dying.

name: Rocket
line: I get that, but why are we doing it?

name: Peter Quill
line: Cause we're nice. And maybe whoever it is will give us a little cheddar cheese for our help.

name: Gamora
line: Which isn't the point.

name: Peter Quill
line: (Points at Gamora) Which isn't the point... I mean... If he doesn't pony up...

name: Rocket
line: We'll take his ship.

name: Peter Quill
line: B-b-b-bingo!

name: Mantis
line: (Adjusting a few things on the ship) We are arriving.

name: Peter Quill
line: All right, Guardians. Don't forget, this might be dangerous, so let's put on our mean faces. (Looks back at Groot is playing a video game) Groot, put that thing away. Now. I don't wanna tell you again. Groot.

name: Groot
line: (Now a teenager and playing a handheld gaming device) [in a mocking tone] I am Groot!

name: Peter Quill
line: Whoa!

name: Rocket
line: Language!

name: Gamora
line: Hey!

name: Drax
line: Wow.

name: Peter Quill
line: You got some acorns on you, kid.

name: Rocket
line: Ever since you got your little sap, you're a total d-hole. Keep it up, and I'm gonna smash that thing to pieces!

name: Mantis
line: What happened?

name: Rocket
line: Looks like we're not getting paid.

name: Rocket
line: (Waving his hands) Wipers! Wipers! Get it off.

name: Peter Quill
line: How the hell is this dude still alive?

name: Drax
line: He is not a dude. You're a dude. This... This is a man. A handsome, muscular man.

name: Peter Quill
line: I'm muscular.

name: Rocket
line: Who are you kidding, Quill? You're one sandwich away from fat.

name: Peter Quill
line: Yeah, right.

name: Drax
line: It's true. You have gained a little weight... (Drax motions to his chin and belly)

name: Peter Quill
line: What? Gamora, do you think I'm...

name: Mantis
line: He is anxious. Angry. He feels tremendous loss and guilt.

name: Drax
line: It's like a pirate had a baby with an angel.

name: Peter Quill
line: Wow. This is a real wake-up call for me. Okay. I'm gonna get a Bowflex. I'm gonna commit. I'm gonna get some dumbbells.

name: Rocket
line: You know you can't eat dumbbells, right?

name: Gamora
line: It's like his muscles are made of Cotati metal fibers.

name: Peter Quill
line: Stop massaging his muscles. Wake him up.

name: Mantis
line: Wake.

name: Thor
line: Who the hell are you guys?

name: Gamora
line: The entire time I knew Thanos, he only ever had one goal: To bring balance to the Universe by wiping out half of all life. He used to kill people planet by planet, massacre by massacre...

name: Drax
line: Including my own.

name: Gamora
line: If he gets all six Infinity Stones, he can do it with the snap of his fingers, like this. (she snaps her fingers)

name: Thor
line: You seem to know a great deal about Thanos.

name: Drax
line: Gamora... is the daughter of Thanos.

name: Thor
line: Your father killed my brother.

name: Peter Quill
line: Oh, boy. Stepfather. Technically, she hates him as much as you do. (Thor softens a bit.)

name: Thor
line: Families can be tough. Look. Before my father died, he told me I had a half-sister...that he imprisoned in Hel. Then she returned home, and stabbed me in the eye, so... I had to kill her. It's life, isn't it, I guess. Goes round and round and... I feel your pain.

name: Peter Quill
line: And I feel your pain, as well. I mean it's not a competition, but I've been through a lot. My father killed my mother, then I had to kill my father. And that was hard. Probably even harder than having to kill a sister. Plus, I, came out of it with both of my eyes-

name: Thor
line: I need a hammer, not a spoon... (he attempts to fiddle with machinery) How do I open this thing? Is there some sort of a four-digit code maybe... Maybe a birth date or something...

name: Peter Quill
line: What are you doing?

name: Thor
line: Taking your pod.

name: Peter Quill
line: No, you're not! (mimics THOR's accent) You'll not, be taking our pod today, sir.

name: Rocket
line: Quill. Are you making your voice deeper?

name: Peter Quill
line: No.

name: Drax
line: You are. You're imitating the god-man. It's weird.

name: Peter Quill
line: No I'm not.

name: Mantis
line: He just did it again!

name: Peter Quill
line: This is my voice!

name: Thor
line: (Thor stepping closer to Quill) Are you mocking me?

name: Peter Quill
line: Are you mocking me?

name: Thor
line: Stop it. You did it again.

name: Peter Quill
line: He's trying to copy me.

name: Thor
line: Would you stop doing that? He's doing it first.

name: Gamora
line: Enough! We need to stop Thanos. Which means we need to find out where he's going next.

name: Thor
line: Knowhere.

name: Mantis
line: He must be going somewhere.

name: Peter Quill
line: No. Knowhere? It's a place. We've been there. It sucks. Excuse me, that's our food. (To Thor as he rummages through there food stores)

name: Thor
line: Not anymore.

name: Gamora
line: Thor... Why would he go to Knowhere?

name: Thor
line: Because for years, the Reality Stone has been safely stored, there with a man we call the Collector.

name: Peter Quill
line: If it's with the Collector, then it's not safe. Only an idiot would give that man a stone.

name: Thor
line: Or a genius.

name: Gamora
line: (To Thor) How do you know he's not going for one of the other Stones?

name: Thor
line: There's six stones out there. Thanos already has the Power Stone because he stole it last week, when he decimated Xandar. He stole the Space Stone from me when he destroyed my ship and slaughtered half my people. The Time and Mind Stones are safe on Earth. They're with the Avengers.

name: Peter Quill
line: The Avengers?

name: Thor
line: They're Earth's Mightiest Heroes.

name: Mantis
line: Like Kevin Bacon?

name: Thor
line: ...He may be on the team. I don't know. Haven't been there in a while. As for the Soul Stone, well, no one's ever seen that. No one even knows where it is. Therefore, Thanos can't get it. Therefore, he's going to Knowhere. Hence, he'll be getting the Reality Stone. You're welcome.

name: Gamora
line: Then we have to go to Knowhere now.

name: Thor
line: Wrong. Where we have to go, is Nidavellir.

name: Drax
line: That's a made up word.

name: Thor
line: All words are made up.

name: Rocket
line: Nidavellir is real? (Climbing on to the table) Seriously? I mean, that place is a legend. They make the most powerful, horrific weapons to ever torment the Universe. I would very much like to go there, please.

name: Thor
line: The rabbit is correct, and clearly the smartest among you.

name: Rocket
line: Rabbit?

name: Thor
line: Only Eitri the dwarf king can make me the weapon I need. (To ROCKET) I assume you're the captain, sir?

name: Rocket
line: You're very perceptive.

name: Thor
line: You seem like a noble leader. Will you join me on my quest to Nidavellir?

name: Rocket
line: Lemme just ask the captain. Wait a second, it's me! Yeah, I'll go.

name: Thor
line: Wonderful.

name: Peter Quill
line: Except that I'm the captain.

name: Rocket
line: Quiet!

name: Peter Quill
line: And that's my backpack.

name: Rocket
line: Quill, sit down.

name: Peter Quill
line: (To Thor) Look, this is my ship. And I'm not going to... Wait, what kind of weapon are we talking about here?

name: Thor
line: The Thanos killing kind.

name: Peter Quill
line: Don't you think that we should all have a weapon like that?

name: Thor
line: No. You simply lack the strength to wield them. Your bodies will crumble as your minds collapse into the madness.

name: Rocket
line: Is it weird that I wanna do it even more now?

name: Thor
line: A little bit. Yeah.

name: Gamora
line: If we don't go to Knowhere and Thanos retrieves another stone, he'll be too powerful to stop.

name: Thor
line: He already is.

name: Rocket
line: I got it figured out. We got two ships, and a large assortment of morons. So me and Groot will go with the pirate-angel here, and the morons will go to Knowhere to try and stop Thanos. Cool? Cool.

name: Thor
line: So cool.

name: Peter Quill
line: (To Rocket) For the record... I know that you're only going with him because it's where Thanos isn't.

name: Rocket
line: You know, Quill, you shouldn't talk that way to your captain. (As he enters the pod) Come on, Groot. Put that game down. You'll rot your brain.

name: Thor
line: I bid you farewell and good luck, morons. Bye.

name: Vision
line: (Holding his hand to the Mind Stone in pain)

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Vis? Is it the stone again?

name: Vision
line: It's as if it's speaking to me.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: What does it say?

name: Vision
line: I don't... I don't know. But something... Tell me what you feel.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I just feel you.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: So there's a 10 AM to Glasgow to give us more time together before you went back.

name: Vision
line: What if I miss that train?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: There is an 11.

name: Vision
line: What if I missed all the trains? What if this time, I didn't go back?

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: You gave Stark your word.

name: Vision
line: I'd rather give it to you.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: There are people who are expecting me too, you know. We both made promises.

name: Vision
line: Not to each other. Wanda... For two years, we've stolen these moments, trying to see if this could work. And... I don't know. You know what, I'm just gonna speak for myself.  I, I... I think...

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: It works.

name: Vision
line: It works.

name: Vision
line: Then stay. Stay with me. (a pause) Or not. If I'm overstepping...

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: What are they?

name: Vision
line: What the stone was warning me about. I have to go.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: No. Vision. If that's true... Then maybe going isn't the best idea.

name: Vision
line: Wanda, I... (CORVUS GLAIVE appears suddenly behind vision, stabbing him through the back.)

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Vision!

name: Vision
line: The blade. It stopped me from phasing.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Is that even possible?

name: Vision
line: It isn't supposed to be. My systems are failing. I'm beginning to think... we should have stayed in bed.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Vis!

name: Corvus Glaive
line: (to VISION) Give up the Stone, and she lives.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Hands off.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Come on. Come on. Come on, you gotta get up. You gotta get up. Come on. Hey. Hey. We have to go.

name: Vision
line: Please. Please leave.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: You asked me to stay... I'm staying.

name: Vision
line: Please.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: Get up.

name: Proxima Midnight
line: (To GLAIVE) Get up.

name: Corvus Glaive
line: I can't.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: We don't wanna kill you. But we will.

name: Proxima Midnight
line: You'll never get the chance again.

name: Sam Wilson
line: (To Vision) Can you stand?

name: Vision
line: Thank you, Captain.

name: Steve Rogers
line: Let's get you on the jet.

name: Natasha Romanoff
line: (Closing the doors to the Quinjet, while addressing Wanda) I thought we had a deal. Stay close, check in. Don't take any chances.

name: Wanda Maximoff
line: I'm sorry. We just wanted time.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Where to, Cap?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Home.

name: s Mother
line: (To Young Gamora) Shhh. We'll be safe. We'll be safe.

name: Ebony Maw
line: Zehobereans...

name: Young Gamora
line: (As she is dragged away) Mother!

name: Ebony Maw
line: Choose a side, or die.

name: Young Gamora
line: Mother! (She pulls away from the one who is dragging her and punches him as he leaves)

name: Ebony Maw
line: One side, for reservation. The other, an honor...

name: Thanos
line: What's wrong, little one?

name: Young Gamora
line: My mother. Where is my mother?

name: Thanos
line: (Kneels down to Gamora) What's your name?

name: Young Gamora
line: Gamora.

name: Thanos
line: You're quite the fighter, Gamora. Come. Let me help you. (THANOS takes her hand and leads her to a pavilion, where he produces a small red-jeweled dagger) Look. Pretty, isn't it? Perfectly balanced. As all things should be. Too much to one side, or the other... Here. You try.

name: Ebony Maw
line: Now go in peace, and meet your Maker.

name: Thanos
line: Concentrate. There! You've got it.

name: Peter Quill
line: Gamora. Do you know if these grenades are the blow off your junk kind or the gas kind? Cause I was thinking I might hang a couple on my belt right here. But I don't want to-

name: Gamora
line: I need to ask a favor.

name: Peter Quill
line: Yeah, sure.

name: Gamora
line: One way or another, the path that we're on leads to Thanos.

name: Peter Quill
line: Which is what the grenades are for. (GAMORA silences him with a look.) I'm sorry. What's the favor?

name: Gamora
line: If things go wrong... If Thanos gets me... I want you to promise me... you'll kill me.

name: Peter Quill
line: (A beat. Confusion.): What?

name: Gamora
line: I know something he doesn't. If he finds out... The entire Universe could be at risk.

name: Peter Quill
line: What do you know?

name: Gamora
line: If I tell you, you'd know, too.

name: Peter Quill
line: If it's so important, shouldn't I?

name: Gamora
line: Only if you wanna die.

name: Peter Quill
line: Why does somebody always have to die in this scenario?

name: Gamora
line: Just... trust me. And possibly, kill me.

name: Peter Quill
line: I mean, I'd like to. I really would...(GAMORA silences him by covering his mouth with her hand)

name: Gamora
line: Swear to me. Swear to me on your mother.

name: Peter Quill
line: (beat) Okay.

name: Peter Quill
line: Dude! How long have you been standing there?

name: Drax
line: An hour.

name: Peter Quill
line: An hour? Are you serious?

name: Drax
line: I've mastered the ability, of standing so incredibly still... That I've become invisible to the eye. Watch.

name: Peter Quill
line: You're eating a zark nut

name: Drax
line: But my movement... So slow... And it's imperceptible.

name: Peter Quill
line: No.(Peter and Gamora shake their head)

name: Drax
line: I'm sure I'm invisible.

name: Mantis
line: Hi, Drax.

name: Drax
line: Damn it.

name: DRAX
line: I'm reading movement. From the third quadrant.

name: PETER QUILL
line: Yep. I'm picking that up, too.

name: QUILL
line: Let's put it down right here.

name: THANOS
line: Everyone in the Galaxy knows you'd sell your own brother if you thought it would add the slightest trinket to your pathetic collection. I know you have the Reality Stone. Giving it to me will spare you a great deal of suffering.

name: COLLECTOR
line: I told you. I sold it. Why would I lie?

name: THANOS
line: I imagine it's like breathing for you.

name: COLLECTOR
line: Like suicide.

name: THANOS
line: So you do understand. Not even you would surrender something so precious.

name: COLLECTOR
line: I didn't know what it was.

name: THANOS
line: Then you're more of a fool than I took you for. Last chance, Tivan. Where's the Stone?

name: DRAX
line: Today...

name: Peter Quill
line: Drax. Drax.

name: Drax
line: ...he pays for the deaths of my wife and daughter.

name: QUILL
line: Drax, wait! not yet, not yet, not yet. He doesn't have the Stone yet. We get it, and then we can stop him. We have to get the Stone first. Yeah.

name: DRAX
line: No. No. For Ovette. For Camaria.

name: MANTIS
line: Sleep. (DRAX is knocked out, causing a ruckus.)

name: QUILL
line: Okay. Gamora, Mantis, you go right. I'm... (GAMORA moves towards THANOS.) The other right!

name: THANOS
line: Why? Why you? Daughter... (he falls down, holding his hand out to her, blood pooling out from his neck wound. GAMORA breaks down in tears.)

name: QUILL
line: That was quick.

name: COLLECTOR
line: Magnificent! Magnificent! Magnificent!

name: THANOS
line: Is it sadness I sense in you, daughter? In my heart, I knew you still cared. But one ever knows for sure. Reality is often disappointing. That is, it was. Now... Reality can be whatever I want.

name: GAMORA
line: You knew I'd come.

name: THANOS
line: I counted on it. There's something we need to discuss, little one.

name: DRAX
line: Thanos!

name: QUILL
line: Let her go, Grimace!

name: GAMORA
line: Peter...

name: QUILL
line: I told you to go right.

name: GAMORA
line: Now? Really?

name: QUILL
line: You let her go!

name: THANOS
line: Ah, the boyfriend.

name: QUILL
line: I like to think of myself more as a Titan-killing long term booty call. Let her go.

name: GAMORA
line: Peter...

name: QUILL
line: Or I'm gonna blow that nut-sack of a chin right off your face!

name: GAMORA
line: Not him.

name: GAMORA
line: You promised! You promised.

name: THANOS
line: Oh, daughter. You expect too much from him. (To PETER) She's asked, hasn't she? Do it. (he shoves GAMORA towards PETER's gun, egging him on.) Do it!

name: QUILL
line: I told you to go right.

name: GAMORA
line: I love you, more than anything.

name: QUILL
line: I love you, too.

name: THANOS
line: I like you.

name: ROSS
line: Still no word from Vision?

name: RHODES
line: Satellites lost him somewhere over Edinburgh.

name: ROSS
line: On a stolen quinjet with four of the world's most wanted criminals.

name: RHODES
line: You know they're only criminals because you've chosen to call them that, right, sir?

name: ROSS
line: My God, Rhodes, your talent for horseshit rivals my own.

name: RHODES
line: If it weren't for those Accords, Vision would've been right here.

name: ROSS
line: I remember your signature on those papers, Colonel.

name: RHODES
line: That's right. And I'm pretty sure I've paid for that.

name: ROSS
line: You have second thoughts?

name: RHODES
line: Not anymore.

name: ROGERS
line: Mr. Secretary.

name: ROSS
line: You got some nerve. I'll give you that.

name: NATASHA
line: You could use some of that right now.

name: ROSS
line: The world's on fire. And you think, all is forgiven?

name: ROGERS
line: I'm not looking for forgiveness. And I'm way past asking for permission. Earth just lost her best defender. So we're here to fight. And if you wanna stand in our way... We'll fight you, too.

name: RHODES
line: All over it. (Turns off hologram) That's a court-martial. It's great to see you, Cap.

name: ROGERS
line: You too, Rhodey.

name: RHODES
line: Well. You guys, really look like crap. Must've been a rough couple of years.

name: SAM
line: Yeah, well, the hotels weren't exactly five star.

name: BRUCE
line: Uh, I think you look great. Yeah. I'm back.

name: NATASHA
line: Hi, Bruce.

name: BRUCE
line: Nat.

name: SAM WILSON
line: This is awkward.

name: BRUCE
line: So we gotta assume they're coming back, right? And they can clearly find us. We need all hands on deck. Where's Clint?

name: NATASHA
line: After the whole Accords situation, he and Scott took a deal. It was too tough on their families.

name: BRUCE
line: Who's Scott?

name: ROGERS
line: Ant-Man.

name: BRUCE
line: There's an Ant-Man and a Spider-Man? Okay, look... Thanos has the biggest army in the Universe. And he is not gonna stop until he... He gets...Vision's stone.

name: Natasha
line: Well then, we have to protect it.

name: VISION
line: No, we have to destroy it. I've been giving a good deal of thought to this entity in my head, about its nature. But also, its composition. I think if it were exposed to a sufficiently powerful energy source, something, very similar to its own signature, perhaps... Its molecular integrity could fail. (VISION addresses WANDA as he nears her)

name: WANDA
line: And you, with it. We're not having this conversation.

name: VISION
line: Eliminating the stone is the only way to be certain that Thanos can't get it.

name: WANDA
line: That's too high a price.

name: VISION
line: Only you, have the power to pay it. Thanos threatens half the Universe. One life cannot stand in the way of defeating him.

name: ROGERS
line: But it should. We don't trade lives, Vision.

name: VISION
line: (While walking toward Steve) Captain, 70 years ago, you laid down your life to save how many millions of people. Tell me, why is this any different?

name: BRUCE
line: Because you might have a choice. Your mind is made up of a complex construct of overlays. Jarvis, Ultron, Tony, me, the Stone. All of them mixed together. All of them learning from one another.

name: WANDA
line: You're saying Vision isn't just the stone?

name: BRUCE
line: I'm saying that... If we take out the stone, there's still a whole lot of Vision left. Perhaps the best parts.

name: NATASHA
line: Can we do that?

name: BRUCE
line: Not me. Not here.

name: RHODEY
line: You better find someone, and somewhere fast. Ross isn't exactly just gonna let you guys have your old rooms back.

name: ROGERS
line: (pause) I know somewhere.

name: Okoye
line: You'll have the King's Guard, and the Dora Milaje have been alerted.

name: Challa
line: And the border tribe?

name: Okoye
line: Those that are left.

name: Challa
line: Send word to the Jabari as well. M'Baku likes a good fight.

name: Okoye
line: And what of this one?

name: Challa
line: This one may be tired of war. but the White Wolf has rested long enough.

name: BUCKY
line: Where's the fight?

name: CHALLA
line: On it's way.

name: Ebony Maw
line: In all the time I've served Thanos, I've never failed him. If I were to reach our rendezvous on Titan with the Time Stone still attached to your vaguely irritating person, there would be...judgement. Give me... the stone.

name: TONY
line: Wow you're a seriously loyal piece of outerwear, aren't you?

name: Peter Parker
line: Yeah, uh, speaking of loyalty...

name: Tony
line: What the-

name: Peter Parker
line: I know what you're gonna say.

name: Tony
line: You should not be here.

name: Peter Parker
line: I was gonna go home-

name: Tony
line: I don't wanna hear it.

name: Peter Parker
line: But it was such a long way down and I just thought about you on the way-

name: Tony
line: And now I gotta hear it.

name: Peter Parker
line: ...And I kinda stuck to the side of the ship. And this suit is ridiculously intuitive, by the way. So if anything, it's kinda your fault that I'm here.

name: Tony
line: (seriously) What did you just say?

name: Peter Parker
line: I take that back. And now I'm here in space.

name: Tony
line: Yeah. Right where I don't want you to be. This isn't Coney Island. This isn't a field trip. It's one-way ticket. You hear me? Don't pretend like you thought this through. You could not have possibly thought this through.

name: Peter Parker
line: No. I did think this through.

name: Tony
line: You could not have possibly thought this through.

name: Peter Parker
line: It's just- You can't be a friendly neighborhood Spider  Man when there's no neighborhood. (Pause) Okay. That didn't really make any sense, but you know what I'm trying to say.

name: Tony
line: Come on. We got a situation. See him down there? He's in trouble. What's your plan? Go.

name: Peter Parker
line: Um. Okay. Okay...uh...did you ever see that really old movie, Aliens?

name: EBONY MAW
line: Painful aren't they? They were originally designed for microsurgery. And any one of them...

name: EBONY MAW
line: ...could end your friend's life in an instant.

name: Tony
line: I gotta tell you, he's not really my friend. Saving his life is more a professional courtesy.

name: EBONY MAW
line: You've saved nothing. Your powers are inconsequential compared to mine.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, but the kid's seen more movies.

name: Peter Parker
line: Yes! Wait what are those!

name: Peter Parker
line: Hey, we haven't officially met. (it ignores him and goes to Strange.) Cool.

name: Strange
line: We've gotta turn this ship around.

name: Tony
line: Yeah. Now he wants to run. Great plan.

name: Strange
line: No, I want to protect the stone.

name: Tony
line: And I want you to thank me. Go ahead. I'm listening.

name: Strange
line: For what? Nearly blasting me into space?

name: Tony
line: Who just saved your magical ass? Me.

name: Strange
line: I seriously don't know how you fit your head into that helmet.

name: Tony
line: Admit it. You should have ducked out when I told you to. I tried to bench you. You refused.

name: Strange
line: Unlike everyone else in your life, I don't work for you.

name: Tony
line: And due to that fact, we're now in a flying doughnut billions of miles away from Earth with no backup.

name: Peter Parker
line: I'm backup.

name: Tony
line: No. You're a stowaway. The adults are talking.

name: Strange
line: I'm sorry, I'm confused as to the relationship here. What is he, your ward?

name: Peter Parker
line: No. I'm peter, by the way.

name: Strange
line: Doctor Strange.

name: Peter Parker
line: Oh we're using our made-up names. Um...I'm Spider-Man, then.

name: Tony
line: This ship is self-correcting its course. Thing's on autopilot.

name: Strange
line: Can we control it? Fly us home? (Tony doesn't make eye contact.) Stark?

name: Tony
line: Yeah.

name: Strange
line: Can you get us home?

name: Tony
line: Yeah I heard you. I'm thinking...I'm not so sure we should.

name: Strange
line: Under no circumstance can we bring the Time Stone to Thanos. I don't think you quite understand what's at stake here.

name: Tony
line: No. It's you who doesn't understand. Thanos has been inside my head for six years...Since he sent an army to New York and now he's back! And I don't know what to do. So I'm not so sure if it's a better plan to fight him on out turf or his but you saw what they did, what he can do. At least on his turf, he's not expecting it. So I say we take the fight to him. Doctor. Do you concur?

name: Strange
line: (a pause) Alright , Stark. We go to him. But you have to understand...if it comes to saving you or the kid or the Time Stone... I will not hesitate to let either of you die. I can't, because the fate of the universe depends on it.

name: Tony
line: Good. Nice. Moral compass.We're straight. (Turning to Peter, he puts his outstretched arm briefly on either shoulder) Alright, kid. You're an Avenger now.

name: Thanos
line: I thought you might be hungry.

name: Gamora
line: I always hated that chair.

name: Thanos
line: So I've been told. Even so. I'd hoped you'd sit on it one day.

name: Gamora
line: I hated this room. This ship. I hated my life.

name: Thanos
line: You told me that too. Every day. For almost twenty years.

name: Gamora
line: I was a child when you took me.

name: Thanos
line: I saved you.

name: Gamora
line: No. No. We were happy on my home planet.

name: Thanos
line: Going to bed hungry. scrounging for scraps. Your planet was on the brink of collapse. I'm the one who stopped that. Do you know what's happened since then? The children born have known nothing but full bellies and clear skies. It's a paradise.

name: Gamora
line: Because you murdered half the planet.

name: Thanos
line: A small price to pay for salvation.

name: Gamora
line: You're insane.

name: Thanos
line: Little one, it's a simple calculus. This universe is finite, it's resources finite. If life is left unchecked, life will cease to exist. It needs correction.

name: Gamora
line: You don't know that!

name: Thanos
line: I'm the only one who knows that. At least, I'm the only one with the will to act on it. For a time...you had that same will...as you fought by my side. Daughter.

name: Gamora
line: I'm not your daughter. Everything I hate about myself you taught me.

name: Thanos
line: And in doing so, made you the fiercest woman in the galaxy. That's why I trusted you to find the Soul Stone.

name: Gamora
line: I'm sorry I disappointed you.

name: Thanos
line: I am disappointed. But not because you didn't find it. But because you did. And you lied.

name: Gamora
line: Nebula.

name: Gamora
line: Don't do this.

name: Thanos
line: Some time ago, your sister snuck aboard this ship to kill me.

name: Gamora
line: Please don't do this.

name: Thanos
line: And very nearly succeeded. So I brought her here. To talk.

name: Gamora
line: Stop. Stop it. I swear to you on my life. I never found the Soul Stone.

name: Memory Nebula
line: You know what he's about to do. He's finally ready, and he's going for the stones. All of them.

name: Memory Gamora
line: He can never get them all.

name: Memory Nebula
line: He will!

name: Memory Gamora
line: He can't, Nebula. Because I found the map to the Soul stone and I burnt it to ash. I burnt it.

name: Thanos
line: (To Gamora) You're strong. Me. You're generous. Me. But I never taught you to lie. That's why you're so bad at it. Where is the Soul Stone?

name: Gamora
line: Vormir!

name: Gamora
line: The Soul Stone is on Vormir.

name: Thanos
line: Show me.

name: Groot
line: (Irritably) I am Groot.

name: Rocket
line: Tinkle in the cup. We're not looking. What's there to see? What's a twig? Everybody's seen a twig.

name: Groot
line: (Still irritably) I am Groot.

name: Thor
line: (While looking out the window) Tree, pour what's in the cup out in space, and go in the cup again.

name: Rocket
line: You speak Groot?

name: Thor
line: Yes, they taught it on Asgard. It was an elective.

name: Groot
line: (shortly) I am Groot.

name: Thor
line: You'll know when we're there. Nidavellir's forge harnesses the power of a blazing neutron star. (nostalgically) It's the birth place of my hammer. It's truly awesome.

name: Rocket
line: Okay, time to be the captain. (walks to a console near by Thor) So, dead brother, huh? Yeah, that can be annoying.

name: Thor
line: Well, he's been dead before, but this time I think it really might be true.

name: Rocket
line: And you said your sister and your dad?

name: Thor
line: Both dead.

name: Rocket
line: Still got a mom, though?

name: Thor
line: Killed by a dark elf.

name: Rocket
line: A best friend?

name: Thor
line: Stabbed through the heart.

name: Rocket
line: Are you sure you're up to this particular murder mission?

name: Thor
line: (Smiling widely) Absolutely. Rage, vengeance, anger, loss, regret...They're all tremendous motivators. They really clear the mind. So I'm good to go.

name: Rocket
line: Yeah, but this Thanos we're talking about...He's the toughest there is.

name: Thor
line: Well, he's never fought me.

name: Rocket
line: Yeah, he has.

name: Thor
line: He's never fought me twice. And I'm getting a new hammer, don't forget.

name: Rocket
line: Better be some hammer.

name: Thor
line: You know, I'm 1,500 years old. I've killed twice as many enemies as that, and every one would have rather killed me, but none succeeded. I'm only alive because fate wants me alive. Thanos is the latest in a long line of *morons* and he will be the latest to feel my vengeance.

name: Rocket
line: And what if you're wrong?

name: Thor
line: If I'm wrong then what more could I lose?

name: Rocket
line: I could lose a lot. Me personally. I could lose a lot. (Rocket takes an eyeball from somewhere on his person) Okay. If fate does want you to kill that crapsack... You're gonna need more than one stupid eyeball. (He gives Thor the eyeball)

name: Thor
line: What's this?

name: Rocket
line: What's it look like? Some jerk lost a bet with me on on Contraxia.

name: Thor
line: He gave you his eye?

name: Rocket
line: He gave me 100 credits. I snuck in later that night and stole his eye.

name: Thor
line: Thank you, sweet rabbit.

name: Rocket
line: Hmm. Huh? Oh. I would've washed that. The only way I could sneak it off Contraxia was up my...Hey, we're here!

name: Thor
line: (Smacking his palm against the side of his head) I don't think this thing works. Everything seems dark.

name: Rocket
line: It ain't the eye.

name: Thor
line: Something's wrong. The star's gone out. And the rings are frozen.

name: Rocket
line: I hope these dwarves are better at forging than they are cleaning...Maybe they realized they live in a junk pile in the middle of space...

name: Thor
line: This forge hasn't gone dark in centuries...

name: Rocket
line: (Looking to a pedestal) You said Thanos had a gauntlet, right?

name: Thor
line: Yes. Why?

name: Rocket
line: Look anything like that?

name: Groot
line: I am Groot.

name: Rocket
line: Go back to the pod.

name: Thor
line: Eitri, wait! Stop! Stop.

name: Eitri
line: Thor?

name: Thor
line: What happened here?

name: Eitri
line: You were supposed to protect us. Asgard was supposed to protect us!

name: Thor
line: Asgard is destroyed. Eitri, the glove. What did you do?

name: Eitri
line: (He pauses before beginning his solemn story) 300 dwarves lived on this ring. I thought if I did what he asked, they'd be safe. I made what he wanted. A device capable of harnessing the power of the stones. Then he killed everyone anyway. All except me. Your life is yours. he said But your hands are mine alone.

name: Thor
line: Eitri, this isn't about your hands. Every weapon you've designed, every axe, hammer sword...It's all inside your head. Now I know all hope feels lost. Trust me, I know. But together, you and I, we can kill Thanos.

name: Nebula
line: Mantis, listen very carefully. I need you to meet me on Titan.

name: Peter Parker
line: (To Tony) Hey, what's going on?

name: Tony
line: I think we're here. I don't think this rig has a self-park function. (Instructing Peter to put his arm in the machine for piloting) Get your hand into this steering gimbal. Close those around it. You understand?

name: Peter Parker
line: Yep, got it.

name: Tony
line: This was meant for one big guy, so we gotta to move at the same time.

name: Peter Parker
line: Okay. Okay. Ready.

name: Tony
line: We might wanna turn.

name: Peter Parker
line: Turn! Turn! Turn!

name: Tony
line: (To Strange) You alright?

name: Tony
line: That was close. I owe you one.

name: Peter Parker
line: Let me just say, if aliens wind up implanting eggs in my chest or something...And I end up eating you, I'm sorry.

name: Tony
line: (While pointing at Peter) I don't wanna hear another single pop culture out of you for the rest of the trip. You understand?

name: Peter Parker
line: I'm trying to say that something is coming.

name: Drax
line: (Yelling) Thanos!

name: Peter Parker
line: (While crawling backward from Mantis) Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! Please don't put your eggs in me!

name: Lord
line: Stay down, clown.

name: Drax
line: (Struggling with the Cloak of Levitation) Die, blanket of death!

name: Lord
line: Everybody stay where you are. Chill F out. (Quill powers off his helmet) I'm gonna ask you this one time. Where's Gamora?

name: Tony
line: Yeah, I'll do you one better. Who's Gamora?

name: Drax
line: I'll do you one better! Why is Gamora?

name: Lord
line: Tell me where the girl is, or I swear to you, I'm gonna French fry this little freak.

name: Tony
line: Let's do it! You shoot my guy, I blast him. Let's go! (Tony extends his nanotech gun)

name: Drax
line: Do it, Quill! I can take it.

name: Mantis
line: No he can't take it!

name: Strange
line: She's right. You can't.

name: Lord
line: Oh yeah? You don't wanna tell me where she is? That's fine. I'll kill all three of you and beat it out of Thanos myself. (To Parker) Starting with you.

name: Strange
line: Wait, what, Thanos? All right, let me ask you this one time. What master do you serve?

name: Lord
line: What master do I serve? What am I supposed to say? Jesus?

name: Tony
line: You're from Earth?

name: Lord
line: I'm not from Earth. I'm from Missouri.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, that's on Earth dip-shit. What are you hassling us for?

name: Peter Parker
line: So, you're not with Thanos?

name: Lord
line: With Thanos? (scoffs) No, I'm here to kill Thanos. He took my girl- Wait, who are you?

name: Peter Parker
line: We're the Avengers, man.

name: Lord
line: Oh.

name: Mantis
line: You're the ones Thor told us about.

name: Tony
line: You know Thor?

name: Lord
line: Yeah. Tall guy, not the good-looking, needed saving.

name: Tony
line: Where is he now?

name: Rocket
line: This is plan? We're gonna hit him with a brick?

name: Eitri
line: It's a mold. A king's weapon. Meant to be the greatest in Asgard. In theory, it could even summon the Bifrost.

name: Thor
line: Did it have a name?

name: Eitri
line: Stormbreaker.

name: Rocket
line: That's a bit much.

name: Thor
line: So how do we make it?

name: Eitri
line: You'll have to restart the forge. Awaken the heart of a dying star.

name: Thor
line: Rabbit, fire up the pod.

name: Quill
line: The *heck* happened to this planet? It's eight degrees off its axis. Gravitational pull is all over the place.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, we got one advantage. He's coming to us. We'll use it. All right, I have a plan. Or at least the beginnings of one. It's pretty simple. We draw him in, pin him down, get what we need. Definitely don't wanna dance with this guy. We just need the gauntlet.

name: Tony
line: Are you yawning? In the middle of this, while I'm breaking it down? Huh? Did you hear what I said?

name: Drax
line: I stopped listening after you said, We need a plan.

name: Tony
line: (To Quill) Okay, Mr. Clean is on his own page.

name: Quill
line: See, not winging it isn't really what they do.

name: Peter Parker
line: Uh, what exactly do they do?

name: Mantis
line: Kick names, take ass.

name: Drax
line: (Quietly as he shifts to a commanding position beside Mantis) Yeah, that's right

name: Tony
line: (Tony stands for a moment with an expression of hopelessness) Alright, just get over her, please. Mr. Lord can you get your folks to circle up?

name: Quill
line: Mr. Lord. Star-Lord is fine. (Motions to Drax and Mantis)

name: Tony
line: We gotta coalesce. Cause if all we come at him with is a plucky attitude..

name: Quill
line: Dude, don't call us plucky. We don't know what is means. Alright, we're optimistic, yes. I like your plan. Except it sucks, so let me do the plans, and that way it might be really good.

name: Drax
line: Tell him about the dance-off to save the universe.

name: Tony
line: What dance-off?

name: Quill
line: It's nothing.

name: Peter Parker
line: Like in Footloose, the movie?

name: Quill
line: (Excitedly) Exactly like Footloose. Is it still the greatest movie in history?

name: Peter Parker
line: It never was.

name: Tony
line: Don't encourage this, alright?

name: Peter Parker
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: We're getting no help from Flash Gordon here.

name: Quill
line: Flash Gordon? By the way, that's a compliment. Don't forget, I'm half human. (Quill points at Stark and Parker) So that 50% of me that's stupid... That's 100% you.

name: Tony
line: Your math is blowing my mind.

name: Mantis
line: Excuse me, but...Does your friend often do that?

name: Tony
line: Strange, we alright?

name: Tony
line: You're back. You're alright. Hi.

name: Peter Parker
line: Hey, what was that?

name: Strange
line: (Speaking breathlessly) I went forward in time to view alternate futures. To see all the possible outcomes of the coming conflict.

name: Quill
line: How did you see?

name: Tony
line: How many did we win?

name: Strange
line: One.

name: Thanos
line: The stone had better be up there...For your sister's sake.

name: Stonekeeper
line: Welcome, Thanos, son of Eros. Gamora, daughter of Thanos.

name: Thanos
line: You know us?

name: Stonekeeper
line: It is my curse to know all who journey here.

name: Thanos
line: Where's the Soul Stone?

name: Stonekeeper
line: You should know...It extracts a terrible price.

name: Thanos
line: I am prepared.

name: Stonekeeper
line: We all think that at first. (The figure glides farther out of the shadows and reveals the face of who we know to be Red Skull from Captain America: The First Avenger) We are all wrong.

name: Thanos
line: How is it you know this place so well?

name: Red Skull
line: A lifetime ago, I, too, sought the stones. I even held one in my hand. But it cast me out, banished me here. Guiding others to a treasure I cannot possess.

name: Red Skull
line: What you seek lies before you. As does what you fear.

name: Thanos
line: What's this?

name: Red Skull
line: The price. Soul hold a special place among the Infinity Stones. You might say it has a certain wisdom.

name: Thanos
line: Tell me what it needs.

name: Red Skull
line: To ensure that whoever possesses it... Understands its power... The stone demands a sacrifice.

name: Thanos
line: Of what?

name: Red Skull
line: In order to take the stone you must lose that which you love. A soul...For a soul.

name: Gamora
line: All my life, I dreamed of a day...A moment when you would get what you deserved. And I was always so disappointed. But now...You kill and torture...And you call it mercy. The universe has judged you. You asked it for a prize, and it told you no. You failed. And do you wanna know why? Because you love nothing. No one.

name: Thanos
line: (Turning to face Gamora with tears in his eyes) No.

name: Gamora
line: Really? Tears?

name: Red Skull
line: They're not for him.

name: Gamora
line: No. This isn't love.

name: Thanos
line: I ignored my destiny once. I cannot do that again. Even for you. I'm sorry, little one.

name: Gamora
line: No!

name: Sam
line: Drop to 2600, heading 0-3-0. I hope you're right about this, Cap. Or we're gonna land a lot faster than you want to.

name: Okoye
line: (Walking with T'Challa and a band of the King's Guard) When you said we were going to open Wakanda to the rest of the world...This is not what I imagined.

name: Challa
line: And what did you imagine?

name: Okoye
line: The Olympics. Maybe even a Starbucks.

name: Bruce Banner
line: (To Rhodey) Should we bow?

name: Rhodes
line: Yeah, he's a king.

name: Steve Rodgers
line: Seems like I'm always thanking you for something. (Shaking hands with T'Challa)

name: Rhodes
line: What are you doing?

name: Challa
line: Uh, we don't do that here. (He dissuades with a motion of his hand) So how big of an assault can we expect?

name: Bruce Banner
line: Uh, sir, I think you can expect quite a big assault.

name: Steve Rodgers
line: How we looking?

name: Challa
line: You will have my King's Guard, the Border Tribe, the Dora Milaje, and...

name: Bucky
line: (Walking forward toward Steve) A semi-stable, 100-year-old man.

name: Steve
line: How you been, Buck?

name: Bucky
line: Uh, not bad, for the end of the world.

name: Shuri
line: Whoa. The structure is polymorphic.

name: Bruce
line: Right, we had to attach each neuron non-sequentially.

name: Shuri
line: Why didn't you just reprogram the synapses to work collectively?

name: Bruce
line: (Staring for a moment) Because, we didn't think of it.

name: Shuri
line: (smiling) I'm sure you did your best.

name: Wanda
line: Can you do it?

name: Shuri
line: Yes, but there are more than two trillion neurons here. One misalignment could cause a cascade of circuit failures. (To T'Challa) It will take time, brother.

name: Steve
line: How long?

name: Shuri
line: As long as you can give me.

name: Okoye
line: (Looking at a device that just alerted her) Something's entered the atmosphere.

name: Sam
line: (Over the comm) Hey, Cap, we got a situation here.

name: Bucky
line: God, I love this place.

name: Sam
line: Yeah, don't start celebrating yet, guys. We got more incoming outside the dome.

name: Vision
line: (Appearing beside the window with the others) It's too late. We need to destroy the stone now.

name: Natasha
line: (Turning toward Vision) Vision, get your *rear* back on the table.

name: Challa
line: We will hold them off.

name: Steve
line: (To Wanda) Wanda, as soon as the stone's out of his head...you blow it to hell.

name: Wanda
line: I will.

name: Challa
line: Evacuate the city. Engage all defense procedures. (He points to Steve) And get this man a shield.

name: Rocket
line: I don't think you get the scientifics here. These rings are gigantic.You wanna get them moving...You're gonna need something a lot bigger to yank 'em loose.

name: Thor
line: Leave that to me.

name: Rocket
line: Leave that to you? Buddy, you're in space. All you got is a rope and a-

name: Thor
line: More power, rabbit!

name: Eitri
line: Well done, boy.

name: Thor
line: That's Nidavellir.

name: Eitri
line: *Dang* it.

name: Rocket
line: *Dang* it.? What's *dang* it?

name: Eitri
line: The mechanism is crippled.

name: Thor
line: What?

name: Eitri
line: With the iris closed I can't heat the metal.

name: Thor
line: How long will it take to heat?

name: Eitri
line: A few minutes, maybe more. Why?

name: Thor
line: I'm gonna hold it open.

name: Eitri
line: That's suicide.

name: Thor
line: So is facing Thanos without that axe.

name: Natasha
line: How we looking, Bruce?

name: Bruce
line: (While walking) Yeah, I think I'm getting the hang of it. Wow! It's like being the Hulk without actually- (He stumbles on a rock, and a carrier goes by, from which Okoye gives him a dubious look. He stands) I'm okay. I'm okay.

name: Sam
line: We got two heat signatures breaking through the tree line.

name: Challa
line: Thank you for standing with us.

name: Baku
line: (Translated) Of course, brother.

name: Natasha
line: Where's your other friend?

name: Proxima
line: You will pay for his life with yours. Thanos will have that stone.

name: Steve
line: That's not gonna happen.

name: Challa
line: You are in Wakanda now. Thanos will have nothing but dust and blood.

name: Proxima
line: We...Have blood to spare. (She raises her right arm with a cry, and several large ships emerge from the forest behind her.)

name: Bucky
line: Did they surrender?

name: Steve
line: Not exactly.

name: Bucky
line: What the hell?

name: Natasha
line: Looks like we pissed her off.

name: Okoye
line: (Watching as the Outriders bombard the dome only a few getting through) They're killing themselves.

name: Sam
line: (Sending Redwings into the fight as he flies) You seen the teeth on those things?

name: Rhodes
line: Alright, back up, Sam. You're gonna get your wings singed. (He flies over a section that has been breached and drops a barrage of mines)

name: Sam
line: Cap, if these things circle the perimeter and get in behind us...There's nothing between them and Vision.

name: Steve
line: Them we better keep 'em in front of us.

name: Okoye
line: (To T'Challa) How do we do that?

name: Challa
line: We open the barrier. (Putting his hand to his ear) On my signal, open North-West Section Seventeen.

name: Wakandan Officer
line: Requesting confirmation, My King. You said open the barrier?

name: Challa
line: On my signal.

name: Baku
line: (To Okoye) This will be the end of Wakanda.

name: Okoye
line: Then it will be the noblest ending in history.

name: Challa
line: Wakanda Forever! (He crosses his hands over his chest as his Black Panther helmet covers his face, leading the army as they run toward the barrier. T'Challa and Steve are at the front of the advancing army) Now! (The section in the barrier disappears and the Outriders charge at them)

name: Challa
line: How much longer, Shuri? (Over the comm)

name: Shuri
line: We've barely begun, brother.

name: Challa
line: You might want to pick up the pace.

name: Thor
line: Allfathers, give me strength.

name: Eitri
line: You understand, boy? You're about to take the full force of a star. It'll kill you.

name: Thor
line: Only if I die.

name: Eitri
line: Yes. That's what killing you means.

name: Eitri
line: Hold it! Hold it, Thor!

name: Rocket
line: (Kneeling over Thor) Thor! Say something. Come on. Thor, you okay? (To Eitri) I think he's dying.

name: Eitri
line: He needs the axe! Where's the handle? Tree, help me find the handle!

name: Bruce
line: [laughing with joy] Hah! Hah! Hah! You guys are so screwed now!

name: Thor
line: BRING ME THANOS!!! (He charges toward the hoards of Outriders, followed by Groot and Rocket)

name: Strange
line: Oh, you're much more of a Thanos.

name: Thanos
line: I take it the Maw is dead. This day extracts a heavy toll. Still, he accomplished his mission.

name: Strange
line: You may regret that. He brought you face-to-face with the Master of the Mystic Arts.

name: Thanos
line: And where do you think he brought you? (Star-Lord is near by behind wreckage with his weapon ready, and Spiderman is above the structure where Strange sits.

name: Strange
line: Let me guess. Your home?

name: Thanos
line: (Smiling reminiscently) It was. And it was beautiful. (Thanos uses the Reality Stone to show Strange Titan before it was destroyed) Titan was like most planets. Too many mouths, and not enough to go around. And when we faced extinction, I offered a solution.

name: Strange
line: Genocide.

name: Thanos
line: But at random, dispassionate, fair to rich and poor alike. They called me a madman. And what I predicted came to pass. (The illusion fades into the true state of Titan)

name: Strange
line: Congratulations. You're a prophet.

name: Thanos
line: I'm a survivor.

name: Strange
line: Who wants to murder trillions.

name: Thanos
line: With all six stones, I could simply snap my fingers, and they would all cease to exist. I call that...Mercy.

name: Strange
line: And then what?

name: Thanos
line: I finally rest...And watch the sun rise on a grateful universe. The hardest choices require the strongest wills.

name: Strange
line: I think you'll find our will (Using his hand motions) equal to yours.

name: Thanos
line: Ours? (He looks up in time to a see a chunk of wreckage coming down on him, and tries to use the Power to stop, but is too late)

name: Iron Man
line: (Flying in) Piece of cake, Quill.

name: Quill
line: (Flying in from the other side) Yeah, if your goal was to *tick* him off.

name: Lord
line: Boom!

name: Strange
line: (To the Cloak of Levitation) Do not let him close his fist.

name: Man
line: Magic. (He kicks him in the head) More magic.

name: Man
line: Magic with a kick! (He kicks him again in the head with his right leg)

name: Man
line: Magic with a-

name: Thanos
line: Insect! (He then throws him, about to use the gauntlet, but is interrupted by an explosion caused by Iron Man shooting a missile at him. As the flames blind Thanos, Spiderman attaches a web to him, and strains against it. Thanos pulls Spiderman toward him, but looks up as a ship crashes beside him, and Nebula jumps in front of him)

name: Thanos
line: Well, well.

name: Nebula
line: You should have killed me.

name: Thanos
line: It would've been a waste of parts!

name: Nebula
line: [she runs at Thanos, attacking him with her sword] Where's Gamora?!

name: Iron Man
line: [while pulling on the gauntlet] Is he under? Don't let up.

name: Mantis
line: [starting to cry] Be quick... He is very strong!

name: Iron Man
line: Parker, help! Get over here. [Parker withdraws his web, and hurries to help Tony with the gauntlet] She can't hold him much longer. Let's go. We gotta open his fingers to get it off!

name: Lord
line: [lands, then joins with the others] I thought you'd be harder to catch. For the record, this was my plan. Not so strong now, huh? Where's Gamora?

name: Thanos
line: ... My... Gamora...?

name: Lord
line: Oh, bullshit. Where is she?

name: Mantis
line: [shocked] He is in anguish!

name: Lord
line: Good.

name: Mantis
line: [crying] He... he... he mourns!

name: Drax
line: What does this monster have to mourn?!

name: Nebula
line: [she suddenly understands in horror what Thanos has done with...] Gamora.

name: Lord
line: ... What?

name: Nebula
line: He took her to Vormir. He came back with the Soul Stone...but she didn't.

name: Iron Man
line: Okay, Quill, you gotta cool it right now, understand?

name: Iron Man
line: Don't, don't, don't engage, we've almost got this off!

name: Lord
line: Tell me she's lying. [enraged] ASSHOLE!!! Tell me you didn't do it!!!

name: Thanos
line: I... had... to.

name: Lord
line: [while starting to tear up; quietly] No, you didn't... No, you didn't... [he continues to rage and then proceeds to pistol-whipping Thanos in the face] NO, YOU DIDN'T!!!

name: Drax
line: Quill!

name: Iron Man
line: [to the struggling Quill] Hey, stop! Hey, stop! Stop! Hey, stop! Stop!

name: Man
line: It's coming! It's coming! I got it! I got it...!!

name: Man
line: [seeing Mantis flying] Oh, God! [he jumps and hugs her, extending his spider legs which give them a safe landing]

name: Stonekeeper
line: Welcome, Thanos, son of Eros, Gamora, daughter of Thanos.

name: Thanos
line: You know us?

name: Stonekeeper
line: It is my curse to know all who journey here.

name: Thanos
line: Where is the Soul Stone?

name: Stonekeeper
line: You should know: it extracts a terrible price.

name: Thanos
line: I am prepared.

name: Stonekeeper
line: We all think that at first. [his face is revealed as the Red Skull] We are all wrong.

name: Thanos
line: How is it you know this place so well?

name: Red Skull
line: A lifetime ago, I too sought the stones. I even held one in my hand. But it cast me out, banished me here, guiding others to a treasure I cannot possess.

name: Gamora
line: I was a child when you took me.

name: Thanos
line: I saved you.

name: Gamora
line: No, no, we were happy on my home planet.

name: Thanos
line: Going to bed hungry, scrounging for scraps? Your planet was on the brink of collapse. I was the one who stopped that. You know what's happened since then? The children born have known nothing but full bellies and clear skies. It's a paradise.

name: Gamora
line: Because you murdered half the planet!

name: Thanos
line: A small price to pay for salvation.

name: Gamora
line: You're INSANE.

name: Thanos
line: Little one, it's a simple calculus. This universe is finite, its resources ... finite. If life is left unchecked, life will cease to exist. It needs correcting.

name: Gamora
line: YOU DON'T KNOW THAT!

name: Thanos
line: I'm the only one who knows that. At least, I'm the only who the will to act on it.

name: Rocket
line: You speak Groot?!

name: Thor
line: Yes, they taught it on Asgard. It was an elective.

name: Groot
line: I am Groot?

name: Thor
line: You'll know when we're close. Nidavellir's forge harnesses the blazing power of a Neutron Star. It's the birthplace of my hammer; it's truly awesome.

name: Rocket
line: [to himself] Okay, time to be the Captain. [to Thor] So, dead brother, huh? That can be annoying.

name: Thor
line: Well, he's been dead before. But this time... I think it really might be true.

name: Rocket
line: And you said that your sister and your dad...

name: Thor
line: Both dead.

name: Rocket
line: But, still got a mom, though?

name: Thor
line: Killed by a Dark Elf.

name: Rocket
line: Best friend?

name: Thor
line: Stabbed through the heart.

name: Rocket
line: You sure you're up for this particular murder mission?

name: Thor
line: Absolutely. The rage, vengeance, anger, loss, regret, they're all tremendous motivators. They truly clear the mind... so, I'm good to go.

name: Rocket
line: Yeah, but this is Thanos we're talking about, he's the toughest there is.

name: Thor
line: Well, he's never fought me.

name: Rocket
line: ... Yeah, he has!

name: Thor
line: Well, he's never fought me twice. And I'll have a new hammer, don't forget.

name: Rocket
line: Well, it'd better be some hammer.

name: Thor
line: You know, I'm one thousand and five hundred years old. I've killed twice as many enemies as that, and every one of them would have rather killed me, but none succeeded. I'm only alive because Fate wants me alive. Thanos is just the latest in a long line of bastards, and he'll be the latest to feel my vengeance. Fate wills it so.

name: Rocket
line: And what if you're wrong?

name: Thor
line: Well, if I'm wrong, then... what more could I lose?

name: Gamora
line: All my life I dreamed of a day, a moment, when you got what you deserved. And I was always so disappointed. But now, you kill and torture and you call it mercy. The universe has judged you. You asked it for a prize and it told you no. You failed. And do you wanna know why? Because you love nothing. No one.

name: Thanos
line: [sheds a tear] No.

name: Gamora
line: Really? Tears?

name: Red Skull
line: They are not for him.

name: Gamora
line: No. This isn't love.

name: Thanos
line: I ignored my destiny once. I cannot do that again. Even for you.

name: Thanos
line: [anguished] I'm sorry, Gamora.

name: Gamora
line: [muted] NO!

name: Banner
line: Who's Scott?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Ant-Man.

name: Banner
line: There's an Ant-Man and a Spider-Man?!

name: Stark
line: [to the Guardians] We gotta work together. Because if all we come out with is a plucky attitude...

name: Quill
line: Dude, don't call us plucky. We don't know what it means. We're more optimistic, yes. I like your plan. Except...it sucks. So, let me do the plan and that way...it might be really good.

name: Drax
line: Tell him about the dance-off to save the universe.

name: Stark
line: What dance-off?

name: Quill
line: It's not a thing.

name: Parker
line: Like in Footloose? The movie?

name: Quill
line: Exactly like Footloose. Is it still the greatest movie in history?

name: Parker
line: It never was.

name: Stark
line: Don't encourage this alright we're not getting any help from Flash Gordon.

name: Quill
line: Flash Gordon? That's a compliment. Don't forget, I'm half human. So that 50% of me that's stupid, that's 100% you.

name: Strange
line: Oh, yeah. You're much more of a Thanos.

name: Thanos
line: I take it that Maw is dead? This day extracts a heavy toll. Still, he accomplished his mission.

name: Strange
line: You may regret that. He brought you face-to-face with the Master of the Mystic Arts.

name: Thanos
line: Where do you think he brought you?

name: Strange
line: Let me guess. Your home.

name: Thanos
line: It was. [activates the Reality Stone, showing a holographic image of a populated Titan] And it was beautiful. Titan was like most planets; too many mouths, not enough to go around. And when we faced extinction, I offered a solution.

name: Strange
line: Genocide?

name: Thanos
line: At random. Dispassionate, fair; To rich and poor alike. They called me a madman... and what I predicted came to pass.

name: Strange
line: Congratulations, you're a prophet.

name: Thanos
line: I'm a survivor.

name: Strange
line: Who wants to murder trillions.

name: Thanos
line: With all six stones, I could simply snap my fingers; They would all cease to exist. I call that... mercy.

name: Strange
line: Then what?

name: Thanos
line: I finally rest and watch the Sun rise on a grateful universe. The hardest choices require the strongest wills.

name: Strange
line: [he summons his Mandalas, entering a fighting pose] I think you'll find our wills equal to yours.

name: Thanos
line: Ours?

name: Stark
line: Piece of cake, Quill.

name: Quill
line: Yeah, if your goal is to piss him off!

name: Tony
line: So this is it. It's all been leading to this.

name: Thor
line: Ready?

name: Steve Rogers
line: Let's go.

name: Gamora
line: He won't stop. Until he destroys half the universe. Everything you know... Everything you love... It will all be gone.

name: Peter Quill
line: Let's talk about this plan of yours. I think it's good, except it sucks. So let me do the plan and that way it might be really good. Tony: Wow.

name: Thanos
line: The end is near. When I'm done, half of humanity will still exist. Perfectly balanced, as all things should be.

name: Thor
line: New haircut? I notice you've copied my beard. Oh, by the way, this is a friend of mine. A tree. Groot: I am Groot. Steve Rogers: I am Steve Rogers.

name: Black Panther
line: Thank you for standing with us, M'Baku. M'baku: Of course, brother.

name: Black Panther
line: How much longer, Shuri?

name: Bruce Banner
line: [trying to change into the Hulk] Hulk. Hulk, I know you like making your entrance at the last second, well, this is it, man. This is the last, last second. Hulk! Hulk! Hulk! [Hulk: NOOOO!] Oh, screw you, you big green asshole! I'll do it myself!

name: Thor
line: I told you. You'd die for that!

name: Thanos
line: You should've... You... You should've gone for the head!!

name: Thor
line: NO!

name: Thanos
line: Daughter?

name: Gamora
line: Did you do it?

name: Thanos
line: Yes.

name: Gamora
line: [beat] What did it cost?

name: Thanos
line: [solemnly] ... Everything.

name: Thor
line: What did you do? [angrily] WHAT DID YOU DO?!

name: Captain America
line: Where'd he go? Thor... where'd he go?

name: Bucky Barnes
line: [feeling his prosthetic arm turning into ash] Steve?

name: Challa
line: [while reaching for a fallen Okoye] Up, General. Up! This is no place to die. [he suddenly disintegrates into ashes and Okoye falls back on the ground, much to her anguish]

name: Okoye
line: Hezvo...?!

name: Groot
line: [resting on a tree branch; slowly disintegrating, to Rocket] I am Groot... [Translation: Dad?]

name: Rocket
line: [as Groot starts slowly to corrode into ashes, much to Rocket's horror] No... No. No. No. No! Groot... no.

name: War Machine
line: [searching for Falcon, missing him by only a few feet] Sam? Sam!? Where you at?!

name: Mantis
line: Something... is... happening. [she gets killed into ashes]

name: Drax
line: [to Quill; his right arm and lower-half of his body slowly turns to ashes] Quill...?

name: Tony
line: Steady, Quill.

name: Quill
line: Aw, man.

name: Strange
line: [calmly turns to Stark] Tony, there was no other way. [he finally gets erased]

name: Parker
line: [feels himself starting to disintegrate and doesn't want to die] Mister Stark? I don't feel so good...

name: Tony
line: [trying to be calm] You're all right.

name: Parker
line: [stumbling] I don't know what's  I don't know what's happening. I don't  [Parker falls into Stark's arms, clutching him tight and crying] Save me, save me! I don't wanna go, I don't wanna go, Mister Stark, please. Please, I don't wanna go. I don't wanna go... I'm sorry.

name: Nebula
line: [to Tony, seeing Thanos' victory] He did it.

name: War Machine
line: What is this? What the hell is happening?

name: Captain America
line: ... Oh, God.

name: Nick Fury
line: Still no word from Stark?

name: Maria Hill
line: No, not yet. We're watching every satellite in both hemispheres, there's still nothing. [receives three beeps from her device]

name: Fury
line: What is it?

name: Hill
line: Multiple bogeys over Wakanda.

name: Fury
line: Same energy signatures as New York?

name: Hill
line: Ten times bigger.

name: Fury
line: Call Klein. We'll meet him at

name: Hill
line: NICK!

name: Fury
line: They okay?

name: Hill
line: There's no one here.

name: Fury
line: Call control. Code Red!

name: Hill
line: [alerting Fury] Nick...?

name: Fury
line: Hill?

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Okay, hold on. Don't shoot. You see where you're going?

name: LILA BARTON
line: Mhm.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Okay, now let's worry about how you get there. [Clint corrects his daughter's foot to the proper position, and adjusts her shooting stance.]

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Here. Can you see?

name: LILA BARTON
line: Yeah.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: You sure?

name: LILA BARTON
line: Mhm. [Clint pushes Lila's hair in front of her face while covering her left eye.]

name: CLINT BARTON
line: How about now?

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Alright. Ready your fingers.

name: COOPER BARTON
line: Nice.

name: LAURA BARTON
line: Nice throw, kiddo.

name: COOPER BARTON
line: You go.

name: LAURA BARTON
line: Hey, you guys want mayo or mustard, or both? [Camera switches to Lila who then proceeds to look at Clint.]

name: LILA BARTON
line: Who wants mayo on a hotdog?

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Probably your brothers.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Uh, two mustard, please! Thanks, mama. [Camera switches to Laura facing Nathaniel]

name: LAURA BARTON
line: Mayo or mustard?

name: NATHANIEL BARTON
line: How about ketchup?

name: LAURA BARTON
line: Ketchup? [Camera switches back to Clint and his daughter] I can do ketchup.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Mind your elbow. [Lila releases the arrow and it hits the target directly in the bullseye.] Hahaha! Good job, Hawkeye. Go get your arrow.

name: LAURA BARTON
line: Hey guys! Enough practice, soup's on!

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Alright, we're coming; we're hungry. [Clint looks behind him, but there's no one there, but dust being blown away by the wind.] Lila, let's go. [Clint starts to look around] Lila? [Clint starts to move and look around, and pick up the bow she had.] Honey? [Clint looks around to see Laura and the boys, only they are gone now. He looks seriously panicked and confused as he hurriedly drops the arrows and jogs over to where they were.] Hey, babe! Babe? Babe? Boys? Boys? Laura?

name: NEBULA
line: Wrra! [Nebula, frustrated, puts her hands in a fighting stance while looking at Tony.]

name: Tony
line: You don't need to do that. Because uh... you're just holding position. [Nebula flicks a paper football towards Tony] Oh yeah, that was close. [Nebula once again flicks a paper football towards Tony] That's a goal. We're now one apiece.

name: NEBULA
line: I would like to try again. [Nebula flicks a paper football towards Tony]

name: Tony
line: We're tied up. Feel the tension? It's fun.

name: Tony
line: That was terrible. Now you have a chance to win. [Nebula flicks the paper football towards Tony]

name: Tony
line: And... you've won. Congratulations. [Tony reaches his hand out to shake Nebula's hand]

name: Tony
line: Fair game. Good sport. [Nebula shakes Tony's hand] Have fun?

name: NEBULA
line: It was fun.

name: Tony
line: This thing on? [The helmet scans Tony. Tony leans against the wall while taking deep breaths. He looks skinnier and weak with malnutrition.] Hey, Miss Potts... Pep. If you find this recording, don't post it on social media. It's gonna be a real tear-jerker. I don't know if you're ever going to see these. I don't even know if you're... if you're still... Oh god, I hope so. Today is day 21, uh 22. [Cut to Tony standing at a window to stare out in space, waiting for his impending doom to arrive.] You know, if it wasn't for the existential terror of staring into a void of space, I'd say I'm feeling better today. The infection's run its course, Thanks to the blue meanie back there. [Cut to a shot of Nebula sitting in the back of the Benatar.] You'd love her. Very practical. Only a tiny bit sadistic. Some fuel cells were cracked during battle, but we figured out a way to reverse the ion charge to buy ourselves about 48 hours of time. [A shot of Tony and Nebula working on the fuel cells of the Benatar.] But it's now dead in the water. We're 1000 light years from the nearest 7-11. Oxygen will run out tomorrow. And that'll be it. And Pep, I ... I know I said no more surprises, but I was really hoping to pull off one last one. But it looks like... well you know what it looks like. Don't feel bad about this. I mean, if you grovel for a couple of weeks, and then move on with enormous guilt. I should probably lie down. Please know that... when I drift off, I will think about you. Because it's always you.

name: Tony
line: Couldn't stop him.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Neither could I.

name: Tony
line: I lost the kid.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Tony, we lost.

name: Tony
line: Is, uh...? [Tony struggles to ask about Pepper.]

name: PEPPER POTTS
line: Oh, my God! Oh, my God! [She and Tony embrace.]

name: Tony
line: It's okay.

name: JAMES RHODES
line: It's been 23 days since Thanos came to Earth.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: World governments are in pieces. The parts that are still working are trying to take a census. And it looks like he did... he did exactly what he said he was gonna do. Thanos wiped out fifty percent, of all living creatures.

name: Tony
line: Where is he now? Where?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: We don't know. He just opened a portal and walked through.

name: Tony
line: What's wrong with him?

name: ROCKET
line: Oh, he's pissed. He thinks he failed. Which of course he did, but you know there's a lot of that's going around, ain't there?

name: Tony
line: Honestly, until this exact second, I literaly thought you were a Build-A-Bear.

name: ROCKET
line: Maybe I am.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: We've been hunting Thanos for three weeks now. Deep Space scans, and satellites, and we got nothing. Tony, you fought him.

name: Tony
line: Who told you that? [Surprised] I didn't fight him. No, he wiped my face with a planet while the Bleecker Street Magician gave away the store. That's what happened. There was no fight.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: He's unbeatable.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Did he give you any clues, any coordinates, anything?

name: Tony
line: Pfft! I saw this coming a few years back. I had a vision. I didn't wanna believe it. Thought I was dreaming.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Tony, I'm gonna need you to focus.

name: Tony
line: [starting to seethe] And I needed you. As in past tense. That trumps what you need. It's too late buddy. Sorry. You know what I need? [Tony stands, pushing things off the table with a clatter. Everyone winces at the noise.] I need to shave. And I believe I remember telling all youse -

name: RHODEY
line: Tony, Tony, Tony!

name: Tony
line: Alive and otherwise what we needed was a suit of armor around the world! Remember that? Whether it impacted our precious freedoms or not- that's what we needed!

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Well, that didn't work out, did it?

name: Tony
line: I said, "we'd lose". You said, "We'll do that together too." And guess what, Cap? We lost. And you weren't there. But that's what we do, right? Our best work after the fact? We're the Avengers, we're the Avengers. Not the Prevengers.

name: RHODEY
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: Right?

name: RHODEY
line: You made your point. Just sit down.

name: Tony
line: Okay...

name: RHODEY
line: Okay?

name: Tony
line: Nah, nah. Here's my point. You know what?

name: RHODEY
line: Tony, you're sick.

name: Tony
line: [Referring to Carol] She's great, by the way.

name: RHODEY
line: Sit down. Sit.

name: Tony
line: We need you. You're new blood. Bunch of tired old mules! [Tony walks right up to Steve's face, his voice hushing down to a venomous whisper] I got nothing for you, Cap! I got no coordinates, no clues, no strategies, no options. Zero. Zip. Nada. No trust. Liar.

name: Tony
line: Here, take this. You find him, and you put that on. You hide.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Tony!

name: Tony
line: I'm fine. I...

name: RHODEY
line: Bruce gave him a sedative. He's gonna probably be out for the rest of the day.

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: You guys take care of him. And I'll bring him a Xorrian Elixir when I come back.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Where are you going?

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: To kill Thanos.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Hey, you know, we usually work as a team here, and between you and I, morale's a little fragile.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: We realize up there is more your territory, but this is our fight too.

name: RHODEY
line: You even know where he is?

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: I know people who might.

name: NEBULA
line: [Standing behind Carol] Don't bother. I can tell you where Thanos is. Thanos spent a long time trying to perfect me. And when he worked, he talked about his great plan. Even disassembled, I wanted to please him. I'd ask "where would we go once his plan was complete?". His answer was always the same: "To the Garden."

name: RHODEY
line: That's cute, Thanos has a retirement plan.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: So where is he?

name: ROCKET
line: When Thanos snapped his fingers, Earth became ground zero for a power surge of ridiculously cosmic proportions. No one's ever seen anything like it... Until two days ago. [A hologram of a planet pops up, with a shockwave visibly traversing the surface.] On this planet.

name: NEBULA
line: Thanos is there.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: He used the stones again.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Hey, hey, hey. We'd be going in short-handed, you know.

name: RHODEY
line: Look, he's still got the stones, so...

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: So let's get him... Use them to bring everyone back.

name: RHODEY
line: Just like that?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Yeah, just like that.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Even if there's a small chance that we can undo this... I mean we owe it to everyone who's not in this room to try.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: If we do this, how do we know it's gonna end any differently than it did before?

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: Because before, you didn't have me.

name: RHODEY
line: Hey, new girl, everyone here is about that superhero life. And if you don't mind my asking, where the hell have you been all this time?

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: There are a lot of other planets in the universe. And unfortunately, they didn't have you guys.

name: Thor
line: I like this one. [smiles]

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Let's go get this son of a bitch.

name: Title Screen
line: Avengers: Endgame]

name: ROCKET
line: Okay, who here hasn't been to space?

name: RHODEY
line: Why?

name: ROCKET
line: You better not throw up on my ship.

name: NEBULA
line: Approaching jump in 3... 2... 1!

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: I'll head down for recon.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: This is gonna work, Steve.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: I know it will.

name: STEVE ROGERS
