line: Cause I don't know what I'm going to do if it doesn't.

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: No satellites, no ships, no armies, no ground defenses of any kind. It's just him.

name: NEBULA
line: And that's enough.

name: ROCKET
line: Oh no.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Where are they?

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: Answer the question!

name: THANOS
line: The universe required correction. After that, the stones served no purpose, beyond temptation.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: You murdered trillions! [Bruce pushes him to the ground wearing Hulk Buster armor]

name: THANOS
line: You should be grateful. [Punched by Hulk Buster]

name: NATASHA ROMANONFF
line: Where are the Stones?

name: THANOS
line: Gone. Reduced to atoms.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: You used them two days ago!

name: THANOS
line: I used the stones to destroy the stones. It nearly killed me. But the work is done. It always will be. [sits himself a little straighter.] I am... inevitable.

name: RHODEY
line: We have to tear this place apart, he-he-he has to be lying.

name: NEBULA
line: My father is many things. A liar is not one of them.

name: THANOS
line: Ah, thank you, daughter. [Nebula looks down, a little uncomfortable.] Perhaps I treated you too harshly.

name: ROCKET
line: What... What did you do?

name: THOR
line: I went for the head.

name: JOE RUSSO
line: So I, uh... Went on a date the other day. It's the first time in five years, you know? I'm sitting there at dinner... I didn't even know what to talk about.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: What did you talk about?

name: JOE RUSSO
line: Same old crap, you know? How things have changed, and... my job, his job... How much we miss the Mets. And then things get quiet... He cried as they were serving the salads.

name: JIM STARLIN
line: What about you?

name: JOE RUSSO
line: I cried... just before dessert. But I'm seeing him again tomorrow, so...

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: That's great. You did the hardest part. You took the jump, you didn't know where you were gonna come down. And that's it. That's those little brave baby steps we gotta take. To try and become whole again, try and find purpose. I went in the ice in '45 right after I met the love of my life. Woke up 70 years later. You gotta move on. Gotta to move on. The world is in our hands. It's left to us guys, and we got to do something with it. Otherwise... Thanos should have killed all of us.

name: Screen Title
line: SAN FRANCISCO]

name: Scott Lang
line: (grunts as he pushes away a cushion out of his body, and deactivates the helmet, but still grunting in pain, as he sweeps away sparks from an electrical failure out of his suit, then try to stand up.) What the hell?

name: Scott Lang
line: Hope?

name: Scott Lang
line: [yells] Kid! Hey kid!

name: Scott Lang
line: What the hell happened here?

name: Scott Lang
line: No. Please. Please, please. [moves on to check the other side of the engraved stone] No, no, no. No. [Lang excuses aside a young couple as he keeps on checking another engraved stone if his daughter's name is on one.] Excuse me, sorry. No, Cassie, no.

name: Scott Lang
line: [in a mantra-like] Please, please, please, please... No, Cassie. [Lang looks at the engraved stone in shock, revealing his name in it.]

name: Scott Lang
line: What?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Cassie?

name: CASSIE LANG
line: Dad? [Both of them emotionally hug each other as both dad and daughter had reunited. Then Lang shoves her back, realizing that her daughter is now a full-grown teenager.]

name: SCOTT LANG
line: You're so big!

name: ROCKET
line: Yeah, we boarded that highly suspect warship Danvers pinged.

name: respectively
line: Nebula and Rocket Raccoon, Okoye, Danvers with a tomboyish haircut, and Rhodes.]

name: NEBULA
line: It was an infectious garbage scowl.

name: ROCKET
line: So, thanks for the hot tip. [turns to Danvers and replies back with a smirk]

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: Well, you were closer.

name: ROCKET
line: Yeah. And now we smell like garbage.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: [turns to Okoye] You get a reading on those tremors?

name: OKOYE
line: It was a mild subduction under the African plate.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Do we have a visual? How are we handling it?

name: OKOYE
line: Nat, it's an earthquake under the ocean. We handle it by not handling it.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: [turns to Danvers] Carol, are we seeing you here next month?

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: Not likely.

name: ROCKET
line: What, you gonna get another haircut?

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: [irritated] Listen fur-face, I'm covering a lot of territory. The things that are happening on Earth, are happening everywhere, on thousands of planets.

name: ROCKET
line: [murmurs to himself] All right, all right, that's a good point. That's a good point.

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: So you might not see me for a long time.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Alright. Uh, well. This channel is always active. So, if anything goes sideways... anyone's making trouble where they shouldn't... comes through me.

name: ROCKET
line: Okay.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Alright.

name: CAROL DANVERS
line: [To Rhodey] Good luck. [cuts off call]

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Where are you?

name: RHODEY
line: Mexico. The Federales found a room full of bodies. Looks like a bunch of cartel guys. Never even had the chance to get their guns off.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: It's probably a rival gang.

name: RHODEY
line: Except it isn't. (Nat realizes something.) It's definitely Barton. What he's done here, what he's been doing for the last few years... I mean, the scene that he left... (Nat starts to show signs of sadness as she gradually tears up.) I gotta tell you, there's a part of me that doesn't even want to find him.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Will you find out where he's going next?

name: RHODEY
line: Nat...

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Please.

name: RHODEY
line: [reluctantly] Okay. [then Rhodes cuts off his]

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: You know I'd offer to cook you dinner but you seem pretty miserable already.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: You here to do your laundry?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: And to see a friend.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Clearly, your friend is fine.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: You know I saw a pod of whales when I was coming up the bridge.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: In the Hudson?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: There's fewer ships, cleaner water.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: You know, if you're about to tell me to look on the bright side. Um... I'm about you to hit you in the head with a peanut butter sandwich. [jokingly smiles, as Rogers does the same]

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Sorry. Force of habit. [Throws his jacket, then sits down on another chair, opposite Natasha.]

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: You know, I keep telling everybody they should move on and... grow. Some do. But not us.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: If I move on, who does this?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Maybe it doesn't need to be done.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: [Deep in her thoughts] I used to have nothing. And then I got this. This job... this family. And I was... I was better because of it. And even though... they're gone... I'm still trying to be better.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: I think we both need to get a life.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: [Smiling] You first.

name: Scott Lang
line: Oh! Hi. Hi! Is anyone home? This is Scott Lang. We met a few years ago, at the airport? In Germany? I got really big, and I had my mask on. You wouldn't recognize me.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: [Standing up] Is this an old message?

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: [Also standing up] It's the front gate.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Ant-Man? Ant-Man, I know you know that. I need to talk to you guys.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Scott. Are you okay?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Yeah. I'm fine.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Have you ever studied Quantum Physics?

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Only to make conversation.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Alright. So... five years ago, right before Thanos, I was in a place called the Quantum Realm. The Quantum Realm is like its own microscopic universe. To get in there, you have to be incredibly small. Hope, she's my... She was my... [struggling to not tell the entire truth about their relationship] She was supposed to pull me out. And then Thanos happened, and I got stuck in there.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: I'm sorry. That must've been a very long five years.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Yeah, but that's just it. It wasn't. For me, it was five hours.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: See, the rules of the Quantum Realm aren't like they are up here. Everything is unpredictable. Is that anybody's sandwich? I'm starving.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Scott, what are you talking about?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: What I'm saying is, time works differently in the Quantum Realm. The only problem is right now, we don't have a way to navigate it. But what if we did? I can't stop thinking about it. What if, we could somehow control the chaos, and we could navigate it? What if there was a way to enter the Quantum Realm at a certain point in time but then exit at another point in time? Like... Like before Thanos.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Wait, are you talking about a time machine?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: No. No, of course not. No, not a time machine. It's more like a... Yeah, a time machine. I know it's crazy. But I can't stop thinking about it. There's gotta be some way... There's gotta be...some w... it's crazy.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Scott, I get e-mails from a raccoon, so nothing sounds crazy anymore.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: So who do we talk to about this?

name: Tony
line: [Clapping his hand in a famous beat. Clap! Clap! Clap-Clap-Clap! Clap-Clap-Clap- Clap!] Chow time! [He seems to be speaking to someone unknown by the audience.] Maguna? Morgan H. Stark. You want some lunch?

name: MORGAN STARK
line: Define lunch or be disintegrated. [She puts on a silver and blue helmet similar to Iron Man's]

name: Tony
line: Okay, You should not be wearing that, okay? That is part of a special anniversary gift I'm making for Mom. (Takes the helmet off Morgan's head. She emerges out smiling mischievously.)

name: MORGAN STARK
line: Okay.

name: Tony
line: There you go. Are you thinking about lunch? I can give you a handful of crickets on a bed of lettuce.

name: MORGAN STARK
line: No.

name: Tony
line: That's what you want. How did you find this?

name: MORGAN STARK
line: Garage.

name: Tony
line: Really? Were you looking for it?

name: MORGAN STARK
line: No. I found it, though.

name: Tony
line: You like going to the garage, huh? So does daddy. It's fine, actually. Your mom never wears anything I buy her.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: (Cut to after Scott's plan has been explained to Tony) Now, we know what it sounds like...

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Tony, after everything you've seen, is anything really impossible?

name: Tony
line: Quantum fluctuation messes with the Planck Scale, which then triggers the Deutsch Proposition. Can we agree on that?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: (Tony giving a drink to him.) Thank you.

name: Tony
line: In Layman's terms, it means you're not coming home.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: I did.

name: Tony
line: No, you accidentally survived. It's a billion to one cosmic fluke. And now you wanna pull off a... What do you call it?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: (Trying to hide his pride) A time heist?

name: Tony
line: Yeah, a time heist. Of course, why didn't we think of this before? Oh, because it's laughable? Because it's a pipedream?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: The Stones are in the past. We can go back and get them.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: We can snap our own fingers. We can bring everyone back.

name: Tony
line: Or screw it up worse than he already has, right?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: I don't believe we would.

name: Tony
line: Gotta say, sometimes I miss that giddy optimism. However, high hopes won't help if there's no logical, tangible way for me to safely execute said time heist. I believe the most likely outcome would be our collective demise.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Not if we strictly follow the rules of time travel. That means no talking to our past selves, no betting on sporting events -

name: Tony
line: I'm gonna stop you right there, Scott. Are you seriously telling me that your plan to save the universe is based on Back To The Future?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: [embarrassed] No.

name: Tony
line: Good. You had me worried there. 'Cause that'd be horse shit. That's not how quantum physics works.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Tony... We have to take a stand.

name: Tony
line: We did stand. And yet, here we are.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: I know you got a lot on the line. You got a wife, a daughter. But I lost someone very important to me. A lot of people did. [His voice gets louder as he tries to sell his desperation to Tony.] And now, now we have a chance to bring her back. To bring everyone back. And you're telling me that won't even...

name: Tony
line: That's right, Scott, I won't even. I got a kid.

name: MORGAN STARK
line: Mommy told me to come and save you.

name: Tony
line: Good job. I'm saved. [Turning to face Cap, Nat and Scott.] I wish you'd come here to ask me something else. Anything else. Honestly, I... I missed you guys, it was... Oh, and table's set for six.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Tony, I get it. And I'm happy for you, I really am. But this is a second chance. Tony: I got my second chance right here, Cap. I can't roll the dice again. If you don't talk shop, you can stay for lunch.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: He's scared.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: He's not wrong.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Yeah, but I mean, what are we gonna do? We need him. What, are we gonna stop?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: No, I wanna do it right. We're gonna need a really big brain.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: (Incredulous, pointing to Tony's house) Bigger than his?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Come on, I feel like I'm the only one eating. [Pushing a plate forward] Try some of that. Have some eggs.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: I'm so confused.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [seriously] These are confusing times.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Right. No, no, that's not what I meant.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [dropping the act] No, I get it. I'm kidding! I know. It's crazy. I'm wearing shirts now.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Yeah! Wh...How? Why?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Five years ago, we got our asses beaten. Except it was worse for me. Because I lost twice. First, Hulk lost, then Banner lost. Then, we all lost.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: No one blamed you, Bruce.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: I did. For years, I've been treating the Hulk like he's some kind of disease, something to get rid of. But then I started looking at him as the cure. Eighteen months in a gamma lab. I put the brains and the brawn together. And now look at me. Best of both worlds...

name: GIRL
line: Excuse me, Mr. Hulk?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Yes?

name: GIRL
line: Can we get a photo?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: 100%, little person. Come on, step up. [Holding out the phone to Scott] You mind?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Oh, yeah.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Thanks, [To the Children] Say "green"! [The children and Bruce say Green as Scott snaps the photo.]

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Did you get that?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: [leaning forward to hand back the phone] Don't you wanna grab one with me? I'm Ant-Man.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: They're Hulk fans, they don't know Ant-Man. Nobody does.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Wait, no, no, he feels bad. No, he wants you to...he wants to...[to one of the boys] You want to take a picture with him, right? [The boy shakes his head vigorously.]

name: BOY
line: Stranger Danger.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: He's even saying no he doesn't. I get it. I don't want it either.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: But, come on, the kid! But he...but you...

name: SCOTT LANG
line: I don't want a picture with them.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [To the children] He's gonna feel bad. [To Scott] Sorry. They said they'd do it.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: I don't want it anymore.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: No, no...you feel bad.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Just take the goddamn phone. [Maybe next time, Scott.]

name: GIRL
line: Thank you, Mr. Hulk.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: No, it's great kids. Thank you very much. [Same time with kids] Hulk out!

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Bruce.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [Awkwardly] Dab!

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Bruce.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Listen to your Mom. She knows better.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: About we were saying...

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Right. The whole time travel do-over? Guys, it's outside my area of expertise.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Well, you pulled this off. I remember a time when that seemed pretty impossible time, too.

name: Tony
line: Look at a mod inspiration, let me see what check out. So, recommend one last sim before we pack it in for the night. This time, in the shape of a mobius strip, inverted, please.

name: Y
line: Processing...

name: Tony
line: Give me that eigenvalue. That, particle factoring, and a spectral decomp. That will take a second.

name: Y
line: Just a moment.

name: Tony
line: And don't worry if it doesn't pan out. I'm just kinda -

name: Y
line: Model rendered.

name: Tony
line: Shit!

name: MORGAN STARK
line: Shit.

name: Tony
line: [Whispering] What are you doing up, little mess?

name: MORGAN STARK
line: Shit.

name: Tony
line: No, we don't say that. Only Mommy says that word. She coined it, it belongs to her.

name: MORGAN STARK
line: Why you up?

name: Tony
line: 'Cause I got some important shit going on here. [Morgan gives Tony a taste of the incredulous] What do you think? No, I got something on my mind. I got something on my mind.

name: MORGAN STARK
line: Was it Juice Pops?

name: Tony
line: Sure was. That's extortion. Great minds think alike. Juice Pops, exactly was on... [Looks back to the model, Then turns back] my mind.

name: Tony
line: You done? Yeah, now you are. [Tony wipes Morgan's lips and pushes her head onto her pillow] That face goes there.

name: MORGAN STARK
line: Tell me a story.

name: Tony
line: A story... Once upon a time, Maguna went to bed. The end.

name: MORGAN STARK
line: [Giggling] That's a horrible story.

name: Tony
line: Come on, that's your favorite story. I love you tons. [Kisses Morgan on the forehead.]

name: MORGAN STARK
line: I love you 3000.

name: Tony
line: [Silently] Wow. [Turns off the lamp] 3000. That's crazy. [Closed the door] Go to bed. Or I'll sell all your toys. Night, night.

name: Tony
line: Not that it's a competition, but she loves me 3000. You were somewhere on the low 6 to 900 range. [Pepper scoffs]

name: Tony
line: [Absentmindedly] What are you reading?

name: PEPPER POTTS
line: Oh, it's just a book on composting.

name: Tony
line: [Still absentmindedly] What's new with composting?

name: PEPPER POTTS
line: Just -

name: Tony
line: I figured it out, by the way.

name: PEPPER POTTS
line: You know, just so we're talking about the same thing -

name: Tony
line: Time travel.

name: PEPPER POTTS
line: [Amazed] What? Wow... That's amazing, and... terrifying.

name: Tony
line: That's right.

name: PEPPER POTTS
line: We got really lucky.

name: Tony
line: Yeah, I know.

name: PEPPER POTTS
line: A lot of people didn't.

name: Tony
line: No, I can't help everybody.

name: PEPPER POTTS
line: It sort a seems like you can.

name: Tony
line: Not if I stop. I can put a pin in it right now, and stop.

name: PEPPER POTTS
line: Tony, trying to get you to stop has been one of the few failures of my life. [Tony smiles]

name: Tony
line: I sometimes feel I should put it in a locked box and drop it at the bottom of a lake... go to bed.

name: PEPPER POTTS
line: But would you be able to rest?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Okay, here we go. Time travel test number one. Scott, fire up the uhhh... the van thing.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Breakers are set, emergency generators are on standby.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Good. 'Cause if we blow the grid, I don't wanna lose Tiny here in the 1950's. [Scott, Nat and Cap give Bruce a panicked look]

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Excuse me?

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: He's kidding. [In a hushed tone to Bruce] You can't say things like that!

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Just... It was a bad joke.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: You were kidding, right?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [Whispering to Nat] I have no idea. We're talking about time travel here. Either it's all a joke, or none of it is. [Loudly and gives Scott a thumbs up] We're good! Get your helmet on, Scott. I'm gonna send you back a week, let you walk around for an hour, then bring you back in 10 seconds. Makes sense?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Perfectly not confusing.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Good luck, Scott. You got this.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: You're right. I do, Captain America.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: On the count of three. 3... 2... 1!

name: TEEN SCOTT LANG
line: Uh, guys? This...this doesn't feel right.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: What is this?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: What's going on?

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: That...who is that?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Hold on. [Panicking]

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Is that Scott?

name: TEEN SCOTT LANG
line: Yes, it's Scott!

name: OLD SCOTT LANG
line: Ow! My back!

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: What is this?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Can I get a little space here.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Yeah yeah. Can you bring him back?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: I'm working on it! [Tapping the side of the button pad, trying to pull back Scott]

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: It's a baby. [seriously?]

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: It's Scott.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: As a baby!

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: He'll grow.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Bring Scott back!

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [motioning to Nat] When I say kill the power, kill the power.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Oh my god. [rapidly walk near to the generator]

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: And... Kill it!

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Somebody peed my pants.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Oh thank god.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: But I don't know if it was "baby" me or "old" me...Or just "me" me.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [holds up his his hands in a dramatic way] Time travel!

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: What? I..I see this as an absolute win!

name: Tony
line: Why the long face? Let me guess: He turned into a baby.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Among other things, yeah. What are you doing here?

name: Tony
line: [Ignoring Steve's question] That's the EPR Paradox. Instead of pushing Lang through time, you might've wound up pushing time through Lang. It's tricky. Dangerous. Somebody should've cautioned you against it.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: You did.

name: Tony
line: Oh, did I? [acting like he did not; there's the Tony we know] Thank God I'm here. Regardless, I fixed it. [He holds up his right hand, with a device on it] A fully functioning Time-Space GPS. I just want peace. [Makes peace sign with his fingers] Turns out, resentment is corrosive, and I hate it.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Me too.

name: Tony
line: We got a shot at getting these stones, but I gotta tell you my priorities: Bring back what we lost? I hope, yes. Keep what I got? I have to, at all costs. And... maybe not die trying will be nice.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Sounds like a deal. [Steve reaches out his hand to shake in the deal, in which Tony replies in the same way.]

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Tony...

name: Tony
line: Why? He made it for you. [referring to Howard Stark] Plus, honestly I have to get it out of the garage before Morgan takes it sledding.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Thank you, Tony.

name: Tony
line: Will you keep that a little quiet? Didn't bring one for the whole team. [Hesitates] ...We are getting the whole team, yeah?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: We're working on that right now.

name: ROCKET
line: Hey, humie! Where's Big Green?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Uh, Kitchen, I think. [To himself as he sees Nebula] That's awesome.

name: NEBULA
line: [into an earpiece] Rhodey, careful on re-entry. There's an idiot on the landing zone.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Oh, God!

name: RHODEY
line: What's up, regular sized man?

name: ROCKET
line: Kind of a step down from a golden palace and magic hammers and whatnot.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Hey, have a little compassion, pal. First they've lost Asgard, then half the people. They're probably just happy to have a home. [Bruce spots Valkyrie looking over at him, and heads over to her.]

name: VALKYRIE
line: You shouldn't have come!

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Ah, Valkyrie! Great to see you, Angry Girl.

name: VALKYRIE
line: [Noticing Bruce's change of appearance] I think I liked you better either of the other ways.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [motioning to Rocket] This is Rocket.

name: ROCKET
line: How you doin'?

name: VALKYRIE
line: [Eyeing Rocket] He won't see you.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: That bad, huh?

name: VALKYRIE
line: We only see him once a month, when he comes for... [looking over to a pile of kegs of stout and other beer on the side] ... supplies.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: It's that bad.

name: VALKYRIE
line: Yeah.

name: ROCKET
line: [Grimacing at the smell] What the... Woo! Something died in here.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Hello? Thor?

name: THOR
line: [From another room.] Are you here about the cable?

name: THOR
line: The Cinemax ran out about two weeks ago, and the sports were all kind of fuzzy. [He grabs a beer]

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Thor?

name: THOR
line: [He notices Bruce and Rocket standing there. He cracks into joy.] BOYS! Oh my God! Its so to see you! [To Rocket, trying to hug him] Come here, you little rascal! [growling]

name: ROCKET
line: No, I'm good. I'm good. That's not necessary.

name: THOR
line: Hulk, you know my friends, Miek, Korg, right?

name: KORG
line: Hey boys!

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Hey guys, long time no see.

name: KORG
line: Beer's on the bucket. Feel free to log on to the Wi-Fi. No password, obviously. [He goes back to his game.] Thor, he's back. The kid on the TV that called me a dickhead again.

name: THOR
line: NoobMaster.

name: KORG
line: Yeah, NoobMaster69 called me a dickhead.

name: THOR
line: NoobMaster. Hey, it's Thor again. You know, the God of Thunder? Listen, buddy. If you don't log off this game immediately, I'm gonna fly over to your house, come down to that basement you're hiding in, rip off your arms and SHOVE THEM UP YOUR BUTT! Oh, that's right, go cry to your father, you little weasel!

name: KORG
line: [Thor brings his headphones back] Thank you, Thor.

name: THOR
line: Let me know if he bothers you again, okay?

name: KORG
line: Thank you very much. I will.

name: THOR
line: So you guys want a drink? What are you drinking? We have beer, tequila, all sorts of things.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Buddy, you all right?

name: THOR
line: Yes, I'm fine! Why, don't I look all right?

name: ROCKET
line: [Concerned] You look like melted ice cream.

name: THOR
line: [Laughs] So, what's up?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: We need your help. There might be a chance we could fix everything.

name: THOR
line: What, like the cable? [burps] Cause that's been driving me bananas for weeks.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Like Thanos.

name: THOR
line: Don't say that name.

name: KORG
line: Um, yeah. We don't actually say that name in here.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [quietly] Please take your hand off me. [He brushes away Thor's hand] Now, I know that... guy might scare you.

name: THOR
line: Why would I be? Why would, why would I be scared of that guy? I'm the one who killed that guy, remember? Anyone else here killed that guy? Nope. Didn't think so. Korg, why don't you, tell everybody who chopped Thanos' big head off.

name: KORG
line: Umm... Stormbreaker?

name: THOR
line: Now, who's swingin' Stormbreaker?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: I get it. You're in a rough spot, okay? I've been there myself. You wanna know who helped me out of it?

name: THOR
line: I don't know. Is it... Natasha?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: It was you. You helped me.

name: THOR
line: [walks over and looks out the window and points, still holding his beer] Why don't you ask the, Asgardians down there, how much my help was worth. [he drops onto the sofa] The ones that are left, anyway.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: I think we can bring them back.

name: THOR
line: Stop. stop, okay? [opens a packet on M&Ms] I know you think I'm down here wallowing in my own self-pity, waiting to be rescued and and saved. But I'm fine, okay? We're fine, aren't we? [The camera cuts to Korg and Miek eating pizza and playing once more]

name: KORG
line: Nah, all good here, mate.

name: THOR
line: So, whatever it is that you're offering, we're not into it, don't care, couldn't care less. Goodbye.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [from offscreen] We need you, pal.

name: ROCKET
line: [Crossing his arms] There's beer on the ship.

name: THOR
line: [pauses, but doesn't look up then puts the bottle down] What kind?

name: SCREEN TITLE
line: TOKYO]

name: Romanized
line: Aitsu da! Akihiko-san wo!) (Translated: It's him! He's after Akihiko!)

name: AKIHIKO
line: ? (Romanized: Tem naze konna koto wo suru? Oretachi tem ni nani mo shiten daro!) (English: Why are you doing this? We never did anything to you!)

name: RONIN
line: [As he draws out his katana and reversibly wields it.] ... (Romanized: Chiky no hanbun sanosu ni yarareta... Omae wa naze buji nano...) (English: You survived... Half of the planet didn't. They got Thanos... you get me.)

name: RONIN
line: [Also in Japanese] (Romanized:Omae mo jbun korshita daro) You're done hurting people.

name: AKIHIKO
line: [Japanese]? ! (Orera ga dato? Ki demo kurutta ka!) [he gestures to all the scattered bodies of his henchmen and chuckles] (English: WE hurt people? You're crazy!)

name: AKIHIKO
line: [in a Gatotsu-like sword stance] ! (Romanized: Shine!) (English: DIE!)

name: AKIHIKO
line: ! ! ! ? (Romanized: Mate! Tasukete kure! Omae ni nan demo yaru! Nani ga hos? (English: Wait! Help me! I'll give you anything! What do you want?)

name: RONIN
line: [Raising his katana, in English] What I want... You can't give me.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: You shouldn't be here.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Neither should you.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: I've got a job to do.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Is that what you're calling this? Killing all these people isn't gonna bring your family back.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: We found something. A chance, maybe...

name: CLINT BARTON
line: [Now openly crying] Don't...

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Don't what?

name: CLINT BARTON
line: ...don't give me hope.

name: NATASHA
line: I'm sorry I couldn't give it to you sooner.

name: Tony
line: [To Thor] Drifting left. On the side there, Lebowski. [To Rocket, who's working on something underneath a glass platform] Ratchet, How's it going?

name: ROCKET
line: It's Rocket. Take it easy. You're only a genius on Earth, pal.

name: RHODEY
line: Time travel suit? Not bad.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: [Response to Hulk touching the suit and something red in a glass tube] Hey, hey, hey! Easy, easy!

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: I'm being very careful.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: No, you're being very Hulky.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: I'm being careful.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: [Holding up the red glass bottle] These are Pym Particles, alright? And ever since Hank Pym got snapped out of existence, this is it. This is what we have. We're not making any more.

name: RHODEY
line: Scott, calm down.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Sorry. We've got enough for one round trip each. That's it. No do-overs. Plus two test runs. [He accidentally presses a button, and shrinks, and then grows back to his normal size.] One test run.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: All right. I'm not ready for this.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: I'm game. I'll do it.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Clint, now you're gonna feel a little discombobulated from the chronoshift. Don't worry about it.

name: RHODEY
line: Wai-Wait a second, let me ask you something. If we can do this, you know, go back in time, why don't we just find baby Thanos, you know, and... [he makes a hand gesture suggesting that they strangle baby Thanos with a rope.]

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [Disgusted] First of all, that's horrible...

name: RHODEY
line: [In a tone that says it's what we're all thinking.] It's Thanos.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: ...And secondly, time doesn't work that way. Changing the past doesn't change the future.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Look, we go back, we get the stones before Thanos gets them... Thanos doesn't have the stones. Problem solved.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Bingo.

name: NEBULA
line: That's not how it works.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Well, that's what I heard.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: What? By who? Who told you that?

name: RHODEY
line: [counting with his fingers] Star Trek, Terminator, TimeCop, Time After Time -

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Quantum Leap -

name: RHODEY
line: A Wrinkle in Time, Somewhere in Time -

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Hot Tub Time Machine -

name: RHODEY
line: Hot Tub Time Machine. Bill and Ted's Excellent Adventure. Basically, any movie that deals with time travel.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Die Hard? No, it's not one...

name: RHODEY
line: This is known.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: I don't know why everyone believes that, but that isn't true. Think about it: If you travel to the past, that past becomes your future. And your former present becomes the past. Which can't now be changed by your new future...

name: NEBULA
line: Exactly.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: So... Back To The Future's a bunch of bullshit?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [Turning to Clint] Alright, Clint. We're going in 3... 2... 1!

name: LILA BARTON
line: [offscreen] Cooper? Where are my headphones?

name: CLINT BARTON
line: [murmuring] Lila? [The device on his hand starts beeping, signalling the end of this visit] Lila! [He dives for the door, but only manages to open it before he shrinks back to go back to the future.]

name: LILA BARTON
line: Yeah, Dad? [She looks around] Dad?

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Hey, hey. Look at me. You okay?

name: CLINT BARTON
line: [Holding up the baseball glove and throw it to Stark] Yeah, it worked. It worked.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Okay, so the "how" works. Now we gotta figure out the when and the where. Almost all of us has had an encounter with at least one of the six Infinity Stones.

name: Tony
line: Well I'd substitute the word encounter for damn well near been killed by one of the six Infinity Stones.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: I haven't, I don't even know what the hell you're all talking about.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Regardless, we only have enough Pym Particles for one round trip each, and these stones have been in a lot of different places throughout history.

name: Tony
line: Our history. So, not a lot of convenient spots to just drop in.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Which means we have to pick our targets.

name: Tony
line: Correct.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Let's start with the Aether. Thor, what do you know?

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Is he asleep?

name: RHODEY
line: No, I'm pretty sure he's dead.

name: THOR
line: Where to start? Umm... The Aether, first, is not a stone, someone called it a stone before. It's more of a... an angry sludge thing, so... someones gonna need to amend that. Here's an interesting story though, many years ago... My grandfather had to hide the stones from the Dark Elves... [He wiggles his fingers to imitate a spooky ghost] Wooooh, scary beings. So Jane, [An image of Jane Foster pops up on the screen] Oh, there she is. That's Jane... She's... an old flame of mine... She... she stuck her hand inside a rock this one time... and then the Aether stuck itself inside her... And, she became very, very sick. So I had to take her to Asgard, which is where I'm from. And we had to try and fix her. We were dating at the time, you see. I got to introduce her to my Mother... who's dead, [Thor starts to look broken, and seems on the verge of tears] and oh you know, Jane and I aren't even dating anymore, these things happen though you know, nothing last forever, [Tony starts to push him back to his chair] I'm not done yet, the only thing permanent in life is impermanence.

name: Tony
line: Awesome. Eggs? Breakfast?

name: THOR
line: I'd like a Bloody Mary, thank you.

name: ROCKET
line: Quill said he stole the Power Stone from Morag.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Is that a person?

name: ROCKET
line: Morag's a planet. Quill was a person.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: A planet? Like in outer space?

name: ROCKET
line: Oh, look. It's like a little puppy, all happy and everything. [Imitating talking to a puppy] Do you wanna go to space? You wanna go to space, puppy? I'll get you to space.

name: NEBULA
line: Thanos found the Soul Stone on Vormir.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: [In a business-like tone] What is Vormir?

name: NEBULA
line: A dominion of death, at the very center of Celestial existence. It's where... Thanos murdered my sister.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Not it.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: That Time Stone guy...

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Doctor Strange.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Yeah, what kind of doctor was he?

name: Tony
line: Ear-nose-throat meets rabbit from a hat.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Nice place in the village, though.

name: Tony
line: Yeah. Sullivan Street.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Hmm... Bleecker.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Wait, he lived in New York?

name: Tony
line: No. He lived in Toronto. Were you even paying attention?

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Guys, if you pick the right year, there are three stones in New York.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: [Sitting up in surprise] Shut the front door.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: All right. We have a plan. Six Stones, three teams. One shot.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Five years ago, we lost. All of us. We lost friends... We lost family... We lost a part of ourselves. Today, we have a chance to take it all back. You know your teams, you know your missions. Get the stones, get them back. One round trip each. No mistakes. No do-overs. Most of us are going somewhere we know. But it doesn't mean we should know what to expect. Be careful. Look out for each other. This is the fight of our lives. And we're gonna win. [Tony gives Steve a look] Whatever it takes. Good luck.

name: ROCKET
line: [Refers to Steve's speaking] He's pretty good at that.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Right? [Looks very excited]

name: Tony
line: All right. You heard the man. Stroke those keys, jolly green.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Tractors engaged.

name: ROCKET
line: [Addressing the shrunk Benatar in Clint's hand] You promise to bring that back in one piece, right?

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah. Okay. I'll do my best.

name: ROCKET
line: As promises go, that was pretty lame.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: [Smiling excitedly] See you in a minute.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: All right, we all have our assignments. Two Stones uptown, one Stone, down. Stay low. Keep an eye on the clock.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Feel free to smash a few things along the way.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: I think it's gratuitous, but whatever.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: I'm looking for Doctor Strange.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: That, actually.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Sorry, but I wasn't asking.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Ah, you're right, I don't. [He makes a grab at the Eye of Agamotto] But I need that stone, and I don't have time to beat it-

name: THOR
line: That's Jane.

name: ROCKET
line: All right. Here's the deal, Tubby: You're gonna charm her and I'm gonna poke her with this thing, [He holds up a device.] and extract the Reality Stone and get gone, lickety-split.

name: THOR
line: I'll be right back, okay? There's a wine cellar, that's just down there. My father used to have this huge barrel of Aakonian ale. I'll see if the scullery has a couple of to-go cups...

name: ROCKET
line: Hey! Hey! Aren't you drunk enough already?

name: ROCKET
line: Who's the fancy broad?

name: THOR
line: It's my Mother. She dies today.

name: ROCKET
line: Oh. That's today?

name: THOR
line: I can't do this. I can't do this. I shouldn't be here. I shouldn't have come.This was a bad idea.

name: ROCKET
line: Come here. [Standing in front of him]

name: THOR
line: No, no, no. I think I'm having...I'm having a panic attack. I shouldn't be here...this is...this is a bad-

name: ROCKET
line: Come here. Right here.

name: ROCKET
line: You think you're the only one who lost people? What do you think we're doing here? I lost the only family I ever had. Quill, Groot, Drax, the chick with the antenna, all gone. Now, I get you miss your Mom. But she's gone. Really gone. And there are plenty of people who are only kinda gone. But you can help them. So is it too much to ask that you brush the crumbs outta your beard, make schmoopy talk to Pretty Pants, and when she's not looking, suck out the Infinity Stone and help me get my family back?

name: THOR
line: Okay.

name: ROCKET
line: Are you crying?

name: THOR
line: No...Yes!

name: ROCKET
line: Get it together! You can do this. You can do this. All right?

name: THOR
line: Yes, I can.

name: ROCKET
line: Good.

name: THOR
line: I can do this. I can do it, I can't do this.

name: ROCKET
line: Alright, Heartbreaker. She's alone. This is our shot. [He turns back to where Thor was moments ago] Thor? Thor! Aaagh!!!

name: RHODEY
line: Alright. Bring it down low. Right on that line. That's it. Down, down.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Hey, can we hurry it up?

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Guys, chop-chop. Come on. We're on a clock.

name: RHODEY
line: All that, is really helpful. [Hugging Natasha] Take care, okay?

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: Yeah.

name: RHODEY
line: Take that stone and come back. No messing around.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: [To Rhodey] Hey. You got this.

name: RHODEY
line: Let's get it done. Yes, sir.

name: NATASHA ROMANOFF
line: [Walking with Clint back into the ship] See you back.

name: RHODEY
line: You guys watch each other's six.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: Yeah.

name: NEBULA
line: The coordinates for Vormir are laid in. All they have to do is not fall out.

name: CLINT BARTON
line: It's a long way from Budapest.

name: RHODEY
line: Okay, so, uhh... We just wait around for this Quill guy to show up and then he leads us to the Power Stone, is that it?

name: NEBULA
line: [Looking around] Let's take cover. We're not the only ones in 2014 looking for the stones.

name: RHODEY
line: Wait a minute, what are you talking about right now? Who else is looking for these stones?

name: NEBULA
line: My father, my sister... and me.

name: RHODEY
line: And you? Where are you right now?

name: Tony
line: Got to hustle, Cap. Things look like they're just about wrapped up here. [Cut to Steve in Stark Tower, walking towards the elevator.]

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Got it. I'm approaching the elevator now.

name: Tony
line: Uh, Mr. Rogers. I almost forgot that that suit [A shot of Cap walking around in his 2012 suit] did nothing for your ass.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: No one asked you to look, Tony.

name: Tony
line: [whispers] It's ridiculous.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: I think you look great, Cap. As far as I'm concerned, that's America's ass. [Does a patriotic salute.]

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Who are these guys?

name: Tony
line: They are SHIELD...Well, actually Hydra. But, we didn't know that yet.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Seriously, you didn't? I mean...they look like bad guys.

name: Tony
line: You're small, but you're talking loud.

name: Tony
line: All right, you're up, little buddy. [Looking at the briefcase with the Tesseract] There's our stone.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: [Lying down on Tony's shoulder] Alright. Flick me.

name: Tony
line: All right, Cap. I got our scepter in the elevator just passing the 80th floor.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: On it. Head to the lobby.

name: Tony
line: Alright. I'll see you there.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Change of plans.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Rumlow. [everyone starts getting suspicious and has their guard up] I just got a call from the Secretary. I'm gonna be running point on the scepter.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: We got word there may be an attempt to steal it.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: That's okay. Trust me. [Steve leans over to Sitwell's ear.] Hail Hydra.

name: Tony
line: Thumbelina, do you copy? I've got eyes on the prize. It's go-time.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Bombs away. [Sliding down to Tony's Arc Reactor] Is... is that Axe body spray?

name: Tony
line: Yeah, I had a can just for emergencies. Relax. Can we focus, please?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: I'm going inside you. Now.

name: HYDRA AGENT
line: Hand over the case, Stark.

name: Tony
line: [To present Scott through radio as he inhales sharply] All right, move it, Stuart Little. Things are getting dicey up here. Let's go.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: You promise me you won't die?

name: Tony
line: You're only giving me a mild cardiac dysrhythmia.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: That doesn't sound mild.

name: Tony
line: Do it, Lang!

name: Tony
line: Window's closing. Pull my pin!

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Here goes!

name: Tony
line: MEDIC! You guys, some help!

name: Tony
line: Good job. Meet me in the alley. I'm gonna grab a quick slice.

name: SCOTT LANG
line: That wasn't supposed to happen, was it?

name: Tony
line: Oh, we blew it.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Tony, what's going on? Tell me you found that cube. [He looks up and groans.] Oh, you gotta be shitting me.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: [Puts the case down] I'm not Loki. And I don't wanna hurt you.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: [Standing up] Yeah, I know. I know.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Bucky... is... alive!

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: That is America's ass.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Please, please!

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: With all due respect, I'm not sure the science really supports that.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: No, but we can erase it. Because once we are done with the stones, we can return each one to its own timeline at the moment it was taken. So, chronologically, [Holds the Time Stone projection] in that reality, [puts it back to its spot] it never left.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: We will. I will. I promise.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Then, why the hell did Strange give it away?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Strange, he gave it away. He gave it to Thanos.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Yes!

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: I have no idea. Maybe he made a mistake.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: So he must have done it for a reason.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Thank you.

name: THOR
line: Aah!!!

name: THOR
line: OH, God!

name: THOR
line: Yeah, I was simply just going for a walk, and uh... [Trying to hide his belly]

name: THOR
line: I always wear this. This is one of my favorites.

name: THOR
line: Oh, my eye. That's... you remember the Battle of Haroquin? When I got hit in the face with a broadsword?

name: THOR
line: [Pretending] Yes, I am.

name: THOR
line: I didn't say I'm from the future.

name: THOR
line: [voice breaking up] I am totally, totally from the future.

name: THOR
line: I really need to talk to you.

name: THOR
line: His head was over there... His body over there... What was the point? I was too late. I was just standing there. Some idiot with an axe.

name: THOR
line: I guess, yeah.

name: THOR
line: That's a little bit harsh.

name: THOR
line: I'm not supposed to be like everyone else, am I?

name: THOR
line: I really missed you, Mum.

name: ROCKET
line: Thor! I got it!

name: THOR
line: Ma, I have to tell you something.

name: THOR
line: But this is about your future.

name: ROCKET
line: Hey. You must be Mom. I got the thing. Come on, we got to move.

name: THOR
line: I wish we had more time.

name: THOR
line: I love you, Mom.

name: ROCKET
line: Come on. We gotta go.

name: ROCKET
line: Three... two...

name: THOR
line: No, wait!

name: THOR

name: THOR

line: Sync up. [They both suit up.] Three.. two.. one...

name: NEBULA
line: No! He knows! [Runs back to the ship and gets on the comms.] Barton? Barton, come in. Romanoff? Come in, we have a problem. Come on! Come in, we have a prob....Thanos knows. Thanos He knows.

name: Tony
line: Cap

line: Sorry, buddy. We got a problem.

line: Huh. Yeah, we do.

line: You know what? Give me a break, Steve. I just got hit in the head with the Hulk.

line: You said that we had one shot. This this was our shot. We shot it. It's shot. Six stones or nothing. Six stones or nothing

line: You're repeating yourself, you know that? You're repeating yourself.

line: You're repeating yourself. You're repeating yourself. You know No.

line: I dropped the ball.

line: Is that what I did?

line: Yeah!

line: Are there any other options with the Tesseract?

name: SCOTT LANG
line: No, no, no. There's no other options. There's no do-overs. We're not going anywhere else. We have one particle left. Each. That's it, alright? We use that Bye, bye. You're not going home.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Yeah, well if we don't try, then no one else is going home, either.

name: Tony
line: I got it. There's another way. To retake the Tesseract and acquire new particles. We'll stroll down memory lane. Military installation, Garden State.

line: When were they both there?

name: Tony
line: They were there at a I've a vaguely exact idea.

line: How vague?

line: What are you talking about? Where are we going?

name: Tony
line: I know for a fact they were there

name: SCOTT LANG
line: Who's they? What are we doing?

name: Tony
line: And I know how I know.

line: Guys, what's up? What is it?

name: Tony
line: Well, it looks like we're improvising.

name: Tony

name: Tony
line: Suit up.

line: Cap. Captain. Steve, sorry, America. Rogers. Look, if you do this, and this doesn't work, you're not coming back.

But Doctor Strange was there, right? He was like, "It's been five years. Come on, they need us." And then he started doing the yellow sparkly thing that he does all the time Tony: He did? Oh, God.

line: You good? Okay. You hungry?

name: MORGAN STARK
line: Mm. Hm.

name: HAPPY
line: What do you want?

name: MORGAN STARK
line: Cheeseburgers.

name: HAPPY
line: You know your dad liked cheeseburgers? I'm gonna get you all the cheeseburgers you want.

name: MORGAN STARK
line: Okay.

name: VALKYRIE
line: So, when can we expect you back?

name: THOR
line: Um about that

name: VALKYRIE
line: Thor. Your people need a king.

name: THOR
line: No, they already have one.

name: VALKYRIE
line: That's funny. You're being serious?

name: THOR
line: It's time for me to be who I am rather than who I'm supposed to be. But you, you're a leader. That's who you are.

name: VALKYRIE
line: You know I'd make a lot of changes around here.

name: THOR
line: I'm counting on it. Your Majesty.

name: VALKYRIE
line: What will you do?

name: THOR
line: I'm not sure. For the first time in a thousand years, I I have no path. I do have a ride, though.

name: ROCKET
line: Move it or lose it, hairbag.

name: THOR
line: Well, here we are. Tree! Good to see you. Well [Thor removes his shades and taps Quill on the shoulder] The Asgardians of the Galaxy, back together again. Where to first? [Thor touches the screens map to pick their destination]

name: QUILL
line: Hey, just so you know, this is my ship still. I'm in charge.

name: THOR
line: I know. I know. Of course, you are. Of course.

name: QUILL
line: See, you say of course, but then you touch the map. It makes you think that maybe you didn't realize I was in charge.

name: THOR
line: Quail you that that's your own

name: QUILL
line: Quail?

name: THOR
line: insecurities in there. Okay? I'm merely trying to be of service and assisting.

name: QUILL
line: It's Quill.

name: THOR
line: That's what I said.

name: DRAX
line: You should fight one another for the honor of leadership.

name: NEBULA
line: Sounds fair.

name: QUILL
line: It's not necessary.

name: THOR
line: It's not.

name: QUILL
line: Okay?

name: ROCKET
line: I got some blasters, unless you guys wanna use knives.

name: MANTIS
line: [enthusiastically] Oooh, yes. Please, use knives.

name: DRAX
line: Yeah, knives.

name: GROOT
line: I am Groot.

name: QUILL
line: Not necessary...

name: THOR
line: There shall be no knifing one another. Everybody knows who's in charge.

name: QUILL
line: [glances at Thor] Me, right?

name: THOR
line: Yes, you. Of course. Of course. Of course.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Now, remember You have to return the stones to the exact moment you got them. Or you're gonna open up a bunch of nasty alternative realities.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Don't worry, Bruce. Clip all the branches.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: You know, I tried. When I had the gauntlet, the stones, I really tried to bring her back. [Looks at Steve] I miss her, man.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Me, too.

name: Sam Wilson
line: You know, if you want, I can come with you.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: You're a good man, Sam. This one's on me, though.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Don't do anything stupid 'till I get back.

name: BUCKY BARNES
line: How can I? You're taking all the stupid with you.

name: BUCKY BARNES
line: Gonna miss you, Buddy.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: It's gonna be okay, Buck.

name: Sam Wilson
line: How long is this gonna take?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: For him? As long as he needs. For us? Five seconds.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Ready, Cap? Alright. We'll meet you back here, okay?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: You bet.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Going quantum. Three, two, one

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: And returning in, five, four, three, two, one

name: Sam Wilson
line: Where is he?

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: I don't know. He blew right by his time stamp. He should be here.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Well, get him back.

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: I'm trying.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Get him the hell back!

name: BRUCE BANNER
line: Hey, I said, I'm trying!

name: BUCKY BARNES
line: Sam...

name: BUCKY BARNES
line: Go ahead.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Cap?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Hi, Sam.

name: Sam Wilson
line: So did something go wrong, or did something go right?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Well, after I put the stones back, I thought, maybe I'll try some of that life Tony was telling me to get.

name: Sam Wilson
line: How'd that work out for you?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: It was beautiful.

name: Sam Wilson
line: I'm happy for you. Truly.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Thank you.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Only thing bumming me out is the fact I have to live in a world without Captain America.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: Oh, That reminds me. [brings out his shield.] Try it on.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: How does it feel?

name: Sam Wilson
line: Like it's someone else's.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: It isn't.

name: Sam Wilson
line: Thank you. I'll do my best.

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: That's why it's yours. [shakes Sam's hand]

name: Sam Wilson
line: [seeing elderly Steve's wedding ring] You wanna tell me about her?

name: STEVE ROGERS
line: [smiling] No. No, I don't think I will. [Last lines]
